2a1(dkon brtsegs): b+had tA pa yan bra kar na ma ma
2a2(dkon brtsegs): yan suhA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon
2a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gangs
2b1(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
2b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
2b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod
2b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
2b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob
3a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gzungs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thob pa/ mi skye
3a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ lnga stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gros
3a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po can dan bzang po dang / byang chub
3a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos
3b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang / byang
3b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzi brjid
3b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po blo gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi snying po dang / byang chub
3b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba dul ba dang ldan pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub
3b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
4a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
4a2(dkon brtsegs): dang yang thabs gcig go/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / yang thabs gcig go/ rgyal po bzhi dang yang thabs
4a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig go/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
4a4(dkon brtsegs): po du mas kyang yongs su bskor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal
4a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus par byas/
4a6(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha
4a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong ni brnyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su
4b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar
4b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen
4b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen/ thams cad ni gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs
4b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang / snying
4b5(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun tu brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bsta
4b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so// bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa
4b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas btugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ 'khor skya yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtsa
4b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / shing dang / ri rab dang bcas pa/ 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin par mdzad do// yang de'i
5a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ni sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa gsang sngags la shin du mkhas pa bzo
5a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rig pa la 'byam pa/ las kyi bya ba byas zin pa/ rab tu byed pa byas pa/ sgra grags pa/ yul ma gtan sgyu ma mkhan nas/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag
5a3(dkon brtsegs): gi mchog du grags pa/ phul du grags pa zhig gnas te/ des yul ma ga ta ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas/ rmongs par byas/ 'go 'khor bar byas
5a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de bden pa mthong ba rnams dang / dad pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang dge snyen ma rnams ni ma gtogs so// /
5a5(dkon brtsegs): des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed rnyed pa dang / bskur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa yang lhag par rnyed de/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das
5a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
5a7(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
5a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ thams cad mkhyen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegasas pa'i mi 'jigs
5b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs
5b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
5b3(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul ni brnyes so// bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcad pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab
5b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtsa dang shing dang / ri rab bcas pa 'di na mkha' la bskal pa
5b5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yul ma ga ta ril kyi skye bo thams cad bdag
5b6(dkon brtsegs): gis 'dus par byas/ rmongs par byas/ mgo 'khor bar byas nas/ ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de bram ze dang khyim bdag chen por gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi ming
5b7(dkon brtsegs): gis rab tu mgu bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu de dung ma bgam sa/ rmongs par ma byas/ mgo 'khor bar ma
5b8(dkon brtsegs): byas kyis/ ma la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang bgam par byaste// gal te rmongs pa
6a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'gal la bar nu pasas de nan yul la gtams cad dag la gcig 'dug/ bdag gnyid pa dang / bkur sem ma thab sa na
6a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ardzun ma// de nas yang sgyum sangan pazang brdzun gyi dge pa'i rtsabs 'gul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po la la gyi grong khyer chen pa nas zung ste/ bran
6a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rig la ba dang / btsam ldan 'das gal bde sa dang // sang nas kyang rnams pa babang pos de bzhin gshegs pazhes bye ba phrag 'jam pas spyan
6a4(dkon brtsegs): zer 'bar ba zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa/ sku shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po lta bur nu zheng gab pa/ mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med pa 'od dag pa ltar gsal ba/ spyan
6a5(dkon brtsegs): pad ma dang / ud dpal sngon po kha bye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/ spyi gtsug tshangs pas kyang ltar mi mthong ba/ 'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pas tshes
6a6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de skra de lta bu mthong ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las de lta bu thos nas/ sems dang bar gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis 'di rtsa
6a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te ma yin pa bgam par bya/ gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan
6a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bgam pa'i bsam pas sang gi gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to// 'di snyam du yang sems te ci 'dis bdag gi sems
6b1(dkon brtsegs): shes sam/ 'on te mi shes zhig gu/ gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// ci ste mi shes na ni des na 'od par 'gyur ro// snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan
6b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad nas/ mkhyen bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la/
6b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te cang mi gsung pas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag rnam par thobatsam pa'i bsam pa
6b4(dkon brtsegs): dadang ldan pa la 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar na/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma yin la/ thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin no// snyam nas de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang
6b5(dkon brtsegs): po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
6b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu ma'i ma za me tog gis/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di la tho tsham par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
6b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ me'u 'gal gyi bu khyod snying las chung mar gyis shig/ ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/ de
6b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang tho ba tsam par mi nus so// me'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang 'dod chags ni tho tsham par byed pa yin no// zhe sda
7a1(dkon brtsegs): @natsartsam par byed/ gti mug ni po 'jam par byed pa yin na/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bag la nyal ba dang bcas te zad/ bral yongs su gyur/ bzod na
7a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang tho ba tsam par mi nus so// me'u 'gal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang
7a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas/ sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/ des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs
7a4(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas so// me'u 'gal gyi bu sems can gyi khams su gdags par 'dogs par ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang /
7a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro// bye ba 'bum gi char yang grangs su
7a6(dkon brtsegs): yang char yang bgrang bar yang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// me'u 'gal bu 'di snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
7a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par kun tu sten nus sam/ gsol ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ 'jig rten
7a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing de thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam la kun tu ston par mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan
7b1(dkon brtsegs): par ni mi 'gyur ro// me'u 'gal gyi bu phyogs bcun rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs
7b2(dkon brtsegs): gcod byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'di yongasu gcod par byed cing yongasu bcad nas kyang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil
7b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor kun tu 'phor byed dang / rnam par 'khor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba dang ngag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas yongasu 'jog pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo
7b4(dkon brtsegs): na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ri phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag
7b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces bya ba'i sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis na me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen par byed pa dang //
7b6(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis sreg pa'i med de zhi bar byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang dag gis/ stong gsum gyi
7b7(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig kun tu khebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyi 'khor nus 'debs shes bya ba gang gis na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe bar
7b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems zhes bya ba gang gis na/ chus 'jig pa de lhag par skem par byed pa yod do// me'u 'gal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lag
8a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te/ bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa la mtha' thug pa/
8a2(dkon brtsegs): med do// me'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/ gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
8a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ me'u 'gal gyi bu nga ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi nang du spyod lam bzhis gnas par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhad na rlung gi dkyil
8a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad/ 'jug par mdzad la yungs de yang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor
8a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang nye bar ston par mdzad la/ rlung de dag phan tshun du thug par yang mi 'gyur/ ltung bar yang mi 'gyu ro// me'u 'gal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos
8a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid de lta bu dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo tshar du gyur nas/ bcom
8a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// ngag mthun par tshig tu sbas pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sdud pa legs par rnyed do// ston pa 'di ltar rdzu
8a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba ni bdag gis legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mo 'di thos nas/ mos pa
8b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing mos par gyis nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa/ de dag kyang legs par rnyed pa leg so// de nas sgyu ma mkhan/
8b2(dkon brtsegs): bzang po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyog gang na grong khyer thams cad kyi brtsog dag dang / mi
8b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang / 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po dar gyi lda lding dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/ gzhi
8b4(dkon brtsegs): lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ me tog bkram pa spos bzang po mchog gis gdugs pa sted du bA re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to// 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du yang rin
8b5(dkon brtsegs): po che'i shing ljon pa/ me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa brgyad stong mngon par sprul to// rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du yang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas g.yog pa
8b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri'i g.yas g.yos su yang rin po che shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa bzhi mngon par
8b7(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu longs spyad par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to// rim gro byed pa phyed bgos
8b8(dkon brtsegs): dkar po bgos pa/ rgyan thams kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya yang mngon par sprul to// sgyu ma mkhan bzeng pos bkod pa de lta bu sprul ma thag du de nas de'i mdo la rgyal po chen po bzhi lus
9a1(dkon brtsegs): por sprul nas/ sbrum mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pag la ba der song nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyang /
9a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di
9a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs
9a4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dang / khyod la bstang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa nung zhig ston par byed na/ kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan
9a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gnas pa dang / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyis
9a6(dkon brtsegs): khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan cig bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas
9a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su long
9a8(dkon brtsegs): spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bzang po kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i bya zhing
9b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la bstang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na/ kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis/
9b2(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
9b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su longs spyad par bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed dang / yongs 'dus brtol bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
9b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i bkod pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bkod pa yang mgo mog por byas par gyur to// de nas sgyu ma mkhan
9b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson te/ lhag pa dang sbyar te/ sems can
9b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas/ bdag gis sems can mchog de lta bu la tho btsams par gyur na/ mi rung gyis bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dor gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan
9b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po sprul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par byed cing mi snang bar bya bar brgal kyang zhal zas
9b8(dkon brtsegs): rim gro ba dang / 'khar gyi khyams kyi bkod pa dang sang go'i khri yang de khan bzhin du snang ste/ gsong sngags dang rig sngags kyi skyes bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par bya bar/
10a1(dkon brtsegs): ma nus dang / de shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngon chad ni 'dod na sgyu ma mkhan yang byed/ 'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na/
10a2(dkon brtsegs): da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sems kyi rnam par rtog/
10a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med
10a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ma nus pa de bzhin du bzang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems skyed pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de yang med par mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi de ni yongasu
10a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi nur 'gyur ro// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po dga' mgu ying rangs te rab tu dga' zhing yad bde bar gyur nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / bcom/
10a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gdugs tshod la bab pa bskul byed de/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags pa'i dus tshod la bab na/ da gdugs tshod la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes
10a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs rnams ches gos gsol/ lhung bzed thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gris yongs su bskor cing / dge slong
10a8(dkon brtsegs): gdan 'an ga dang la gshegs te/ rgyal pa'i khab kyi zang kyar can par gshegs nas/ sbrum se na bzang ba 'khar gyi khyams gel ba gshegs te/ gang gis
10b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na/ bzhugs so snyam du shes/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag
10b2(dkon brtsegs): cag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so// snyam du shes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so//
10b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du 'dzad pa mngon par mdzad do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na gzhan mu stegs can dang / spyod pa pa dang /
10b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor gyi khyams der dong ste/ de ring dge slong go'u ta ma la tho 'tsham pa blta
10b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// snyam mo// rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen po de na dad pa'i dge slong dang dge slong dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'khor gyi dkyil
10b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor der dong nas/ de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la 'gam pa yang mnyam par bya/ cho 'phrul chen po yang blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos nga rgyal dang /
10b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyags pa dang / khengs pa nges par bcom nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
10b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par tho btsam pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gshegasu gsol ba gang lags pa'i nongs pa 'chag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang zhal zas
11a1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang / seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams sprul pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de
11a2(dkon brtsegs): la bslus par gyur na/ mi rung gis bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam ste/ shin tu spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub/ gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed
11a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis par bgyi ngom thogs nas/ zhal zas dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / seng ge'i khri dang / 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa yang de khon bzhin du
11a4(dkon brtsegs): gda'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal lo// bzang po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang //
11a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyad pa yang 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di yang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po nga yang
11a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// babang po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa
11a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ rkyen rtogs pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po 'on kyang de'i dus la bab par shes na/ ci ltar sprul pa
11a8(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / ldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sprul pa'i rim gro ba de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dgang /
11b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhan cig sprul pa'i bza ba dang bca' ba dang / myang ba dang bldag pa des bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par
11b2(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed do// de nas de'i tshe gnas rten 'od srung chen pos tshig su bcad pa 'di smras so// sbyin pa 'di ni ci 'dra dang // len par byed pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i chos nyid thob
11b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar/ yon ni rnam par spyod 'gyur cig/ me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang / de la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/ mi mnyam mchis
11b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa ste// mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ rim gro byed pa'i sems gang dang // len par byed pa'i sems gang dang / sbyin par byed ci lta bar// yon ni/
11b5(dkon brtsegs): myur du sbyong bar shog/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gtong med smin pa 'di btang ba/ len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs/ gang dag 'dir ni gshegs pa rnams/ de dag yon
11b6(dkon brtsegs): spyong byed pa yin/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'di ni na mkha'i sbyin pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyis sprad / gang dag sems lus grol ba de/ 'jig rten na ni yon skyo
11b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od tog gis smras pa/ ci lta bur sgyu ma'i mkhan/ bzang po bkod pa sprul byas pa/ dngos kun de dang 'dra ba ste/ byis pas de ni mi rtogs so//
11b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa/ ji ltar gdan dang ljon shing dag/ du ma mngon par sprul byas pa/ yid kyi sgyu ma lta bur stong / 'di la khyad par 'ga' yang med
12a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i smras pa/ seng ge'i smanas thos na/ sa ni nags tshal nang na sgrags/ da yis seng ge'i smra bas nas/ phyogs bcu dag tu brnas
12a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ de bzhin sgyum khan bzang po sang / de bzhin gshegs pa mamangan/ sra sngags mang du rgyal las/ bdag nyid mchog ces blags par byed/ bzang ba da zhin gshegs
12a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgyu mas sgyu ma rtog byed pa/ tshad mar gyur pa gsungs nas ni/ de la bdud kyis gting mi dpogs/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ zhal zas 'di ni
12a4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa ste/ bsnyen bkun byed pa'ang sprul pa yin/ spyod par byed pa'ang sprul pa ste/ sbyin pa dge ba bla na med/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ me ni mar dang til na/
12a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ phyi phyir zhing ni rab tu 'tshed/ de bzhin bzang po'i sgyu ma yis/ sangs rgyas sgyu ma nges par bstan/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ ji ltar 'di ni sngon gnas pa/
12a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad byed pa med pa ltar/ de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni/ sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu gdul ba
12a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang du mdzad nas/ khyim bdag gcig sprul te 'khor gyi khyims de'i nang du zhugs nas/ sgyu ma khan bzang po la 'di skad ces smra so// bzang po ci byed smras pa/ dge sbyong go
12a8(dkon brtsegs): ta ma'i gdugs chod la gsol bar byed// ngas mos pa bzang po zong de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po ma skyes
12b1(dkon brtsegs): dardza 'an gdag sa cang ga gag/ ma pa ya ba cangs sa rgyas kyi sa can gshegs padas kyang shi na dang mangs sa
12b2(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ de nang du zhugs te/ sgyu ma
12b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed smras pa/ dge sbyong ge'u ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa thong de skad ma zer/
12b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing bzhugaso// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs
12b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun tu rgya'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba mthong ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan
12b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis khyim bdag bzhan zhig sprul te/ de nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di
12b7(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshad gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po zong de skad mazer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'jo byed kyis bskyed mos tshal na/ 'khor ba ni la chos ston cing zhugs
12b8(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mjus de bzhin gshegs 'tsho byed kyi bskyed mos tshal na/ 'khor bzhi la chos ston par mthong // de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya/
13a1(dkon brtsegs): byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed smras pa dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di
13a2(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshod gsal bar byed do// des smras pa bzang po thong de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
13a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na/ shing yongs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas sgyu ma mkhan
13a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi lo ma thams cad dang / me tog thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge
13a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyis yongasu bkor ba mthong ngo // sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa dang / rgyal po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la
13a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor ba mthong ngo // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rtsig pa 'am/ khyim 'am/
13a7(dkon brtsegs): khang bzangs sam/ rtsalam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya
13a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis spyan snga na/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas/ nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing / de na sgyum mkhan/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i mig lam na/ gang cung zad mi snang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan nung zad kyangs mthong nas/ de ches ning mgul yad rangs te/ rab tu dga'
13b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde bar gyur to// de dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjes dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te/
13b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bzhed na brgyad phrag stong las lhag gyur cing / dper na gang go'i rlung gi bye ma snyed kyi// sangs rgyas
13b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po sprul par mdzad pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pi rdzu phrul de la mos// bdag gis sngon slabs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags// 'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na/ de ring rgyal
13b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong nas// 'di'i grangs dang char yang ma spyod do// bdag gi sha'i mig gis gang mthong ba// thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi brgyan pa'i sku/ chos kyi
13b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus/ rgyal ba gang dag gang lags bka' stsol cig/ gang zhig mchod na legs par mchod pa lags/ gang la 'bras chen por 'gyur ba lags//
13b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi byang chub 'thun par gzung ba 'di/ kun tu spyan gyi bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de ring 'jig rten mgon la bgam bgyis pa'i/ nongs pa gang lags deng 'dir kun
13b8(dkon brtsegs): du chags/ gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas/ sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde la gnas/ bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang 'khor 'dus gyur pa
14a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag kun gson cig/ sems cad thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du/ byang chub sems ni bdagis bskyed par bgyid/ bdag gis sems can thams
14a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mgron du gnyer/ bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag tshim par bgyi/ gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes par bgyi/ mthun dang bsgrub pas rnam par sad par bgyi/ rnam
14a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra mthong gyur cing / bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang / chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni/ su zhig dag pa'i rgyu sems
14a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mi bgyid/ byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi/ byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol// gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i/ de dag rnam
14a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis spyod pa ci lta bu/ chog spyod pa'i yon tan ji lta bu/ mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ci lta bu/ nges pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba/ bdag la the tsom mchis de bzhin gsungs
14a6(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar thos pa tshol la goms pa lags/ thog pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang po gang / gzhan la gsal bar ston pa ci lta bu/ srogs chags thams cad ji ltar chos
14a7(dkon brtsegs): la dang / ci ltar 'di dag gshes kyis khe mi tshol/ zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas/ byas pa shes shing rab tu phan 'dogs dang / sems can mi phyed
14a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas par ji ltar 'gyur/ grogs po gang dag bsten gyi ji lta bu/ sdigs pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong / ji ltar sangs rgyas rnam dang phrad par 'gyur
14b1(dkon brtsegs): ra tu sbyor
14b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag mthong nas ji ltar mchod pa'i gyi/ ci ltar slab pa dag la gus pa lags/ de'i bslab pa bca' ba gang zhig lags/ tshul khrims ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzi
14b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thog/ ci ltar tshul bzhin pa lags/ tshul bzhin ma lags ci ltar spong ba lags/ ci ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang / nyon mongs bdud kyi 'ching
14b4(dkon brtsegs): bas mi thub lags/ ci ltar dang ldan don ni sems bgyid cing / sems kyis sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags/ ci ltar sems can spyod la su smin bgying / nor mchog 'dzin
14b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med la dpa' ba lags/ ci ltar sems can spyod la 'jug pa dang / thabs dang byams pa snying rjes gnas pa lags/ mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur/
14b6(dkon brtsegs): dran dang blo gros gang gis rnam dag cing / so so yang dag rig gzugs bzod par 'gyur/ smon lam rnam dag spyod lam mi ldog cing / zab mo shes ldan don dam mkhas
14b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ ci ltar de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing / de bzhin byang chub rjes su 'thun par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i
14b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa kun shes shing / byang chub phyir ni spyod pa mi ldog pa/ kun mkhyen legs par don bsams shes rab 'tsho/ ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la gsungs/ bcom ldan
14b9(dkon brtsegs): phan yon bdag la bstan du gsol// bdag gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la slar tshigs
15a1(dkon brtsegs): dag sod nas sems can khye
15a2(dkon brtsegs): bcad de bka' bstsal pa/ chos kun sprul par gang gis shes pa de/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong sprul par byed/ sprul pa de dag ning rnams kyi
15a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'grol/ ci ltar bzang po khyod kyis gzugs med las/ sde tshogs mtha' yas gzugs ni sngon byed cing / de dag skye ba med cing 'gag med la/ 'gro med 'ang med gnas
15a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ltar/ bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog rgyal ba yis/ phung po dge 'dun tshogs bcas sprul de 'dra/ de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas bsam yas
15a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin/ ji ltar sgyu mas rmongs byas skye bo ni/ sems ma yon min de bzhin nga rgyal med/ 'di la grub pa med cing rdzas yod min/ phyin ci log gi sems
15a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mthong ba ltar/ de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs med kha dog dang / dbyibs min spong dang spyod lam med/ 'jigs tshogs lta ba kun nas bslang ma yin/ sangs
15a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas sangs rgyas snyam du 'du shes med/ sangs rgyas gzugasu mi lta mtshan dang ni/ no tsong rig su mi yin sgra dang ni/ 'chang bar 'gyur bar ma yin sems dang ni/ rnam pa
15a8(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis rab tu phyi ma yin/ chos nyid gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa/ rtag tu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/
15a9(dkon brtsegs): de la cho su bgrang bar rab tu bye ba med/ sangs rgyas 'byung gang chos nyid 'byung ba med/ de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung / chos de gnas pa mi g.yo rten pa med
15b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no// gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas blta snyam sems/ des ni gzhar yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ 'dren pa mthong ba med par mthong
15b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ dper na na mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ bzang po gang khyod chung zad sangs rgyas lta/ de kun don gcig yin par shes par bgyid/ nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de
15b3(dkon brtsegs): kun mtshungs/ bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin/ de dag ting 'dzin mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam/ de dag rnam par grol bar mnyam
15b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ rnam par ye shes mthong zhing stobs dang ni/ rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin/ de dag stong don go 'phang gnas par nyam/ thams cad chags pa
15b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos nyid gnas/ kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/ de dag 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin/ bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na/ phyogs bcu'i
15b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni mchod gyur te/ 'di ltar de dag nga'i chos dbyings dang / tha dad bya ba nam yang yong ma yin/ de dag thams cad yon bzhengs sbyong bar mdzad/ kun
15b7(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur/ de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa rnyes/ sangs rgyas rnams la ba dang bya ba 'ang med/ rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad/
15b8(dkon brtsegs): bya yis/ rtse gcig sems dang dran pa nyer bzhag cing / chos tshul rtogs la rnam par lta bas de/ legs par nges bsams sems kyis nga la nyon/ bzang
16a1(dkon brtsegs): bo dkun ma skyes yang dag pa min/ phyin ci logs gis de kun mthong bar zad/ gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na/ dngos thams cad du ni zad mi
16a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de phyir shin ta ma skyes yang dag min/ de dag skye med zad la gnas pa med/ des na ltar med ngo bo de dag snang / rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin/ ci ltar bzang
16a3(dkon brtsegs): pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang / ci ltar phyogasu mngon sprul rab mthong ba/ gzhan phung po rgya chen rten stobs dang / phung po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos/ chos rnams thams cad rang
16a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med pa ste/ sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med/ mtshan nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de/ sangs rgyas las ni shin du ring bar 'gyur/ chos yod ma yin
16a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rtog pas spang / dngos po med par yang ni brten nas shes/ byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das/ ming du 'dzin pas stong par rab tu ston/ gang gis rgyu dang
16a6(dkon brtsegs): byed po rkyen min shes/ des ni chags bral gyur pa'i chos kyang shes// 'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na/ des ni rnam dag gis sangs rgyas mthong / yang /
16a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshig su bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na// sgyu ma mkhar bzang po chos la nges par rtog pa dang / mthun pa'i bzod pa rlung du skyes// srog chags lnga stong ni bla na med pa
16a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngon ma bskyed pa skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la 'bod pa thob par gyur to// de nas yang
16b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas sprul pa de gsol nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i yon yongasu sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di bka' sprul to// gang gis
16b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang gang la sbyin/ sbyin pa ci ltar mi rtog pa/ sbyin pa ci ltar mi rtog pa mnyam pa de nyid ni/ bzang po la yang yongs rdzogs shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
16b3(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams 'di rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du/ dgung bdun du gnas shing / mi gda' bar mi 'gyur bar
16b4(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlab du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor khyams de ji ltar rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin tu zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang
16b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur par byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas yang bcom
16b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos bstan pa'i phyir bzhugs so// dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gan
16b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo // de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bsong ste phyin nas/
16b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ gus pa dang bcas par thul so sbyar te/ phyogs gcig
17a1(dkon brtsegs): du 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
17a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' las gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
17a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces ka' stsal to// bzang po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// sgyu ma
17a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la nyan tho ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang
17a5(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin te/ bzhi gang
17a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor pa dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngom mi shes pa nyid dang / dam
17a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gror 'gyur
17a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnams kyi lam yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag po yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/
17b1(dkon brtsegs): gas yosu dag pa dang /
17b2(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos
17b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas thas cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na pos gtan zlog pa dang / sems kyi rnam par 'byed pa dang /
17b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / spobs pa dang / skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
17b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'phags pa'i spong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'ji la mi dga' ba dang / de na gnas na sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed
17b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la
17b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems rtag tu dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa ska
17b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ji skad smra ba de bzhin du sgrub pa ste// bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub seMs dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spyod lam phun su tshogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang
17b9(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ dus shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / yang dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
18a1(dkon brtsegs): na the tsom med pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyo kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnod pa dang / mkhas pa dang / shes rab chen po la bsnyen bskur byed
18a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / thos pa'i don sems dpa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing / gleng pa gang yin pa yang byams pas gleng gi/ skyon gtser byed pas ma yin pa ste/ bzhi po de
18a3(dkon brtsegs): dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yin bzhi po 'di dag mthong na/ thos pa tshol bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang / phyogs
18a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi nas lhags pa rnams kyi the tsom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa zad mi shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin// bzang po bzhi po 'di
18a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no// bzhi gang zhe na thos nas chos kyi bye brag du shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas bya ba ma/
18a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas gzhan la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas don ston par byed pa 'di'i snying po yin no// don
18a7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub la gtod par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi
18a8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhen las byas nas zas la yongasu spyod pa dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /
18b1(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang stan dang / nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas
18b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos
18b3(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig gi lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyi chos sgrub pa ste/
18b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan/ shes kyi khe las 'byol zhing zang zing med par chos ston pa yang yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la 'jig pa
18b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzi don du mi gnyer ba dang / pha rol rje su srung ba dang 'phags pa'i rig la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub
18b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang / byas pa la lan tu phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan yang byang chub yang dag par len tu 'jug
18b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / las byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsal don du gnyer ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no//
18b8(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la mang shes mi byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na bzod pa'i stobs kyi go bgos pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs par chung
19a1(dkon brtsegs): zad kyang re ba med pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dar ba dang / log par zhugs pa rnams kyi spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can
19a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur ro// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bsten par bya ba'i grog po yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
19a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'di'i byang chub nye bar ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
19a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grog po yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa dman pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa zlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bsten na mi
19a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos glu yong su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs
19a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang /
19a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na/
19a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yon tan gnas gnas mchog la mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag
19b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du mchod par byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchad na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
19b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ mngon sum du mthong na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba stsogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon banizhi po de dag mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
19b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro// bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' don gyi dbang bzhi mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan 'gro las yang dag
19b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin// bzang
19b5(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi pa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam par
19b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yong su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mnyam pa la mi skrag pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang ba sems dpa' rnams kyi
19b7(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa yino// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yong su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong
19b8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal ba dang / bcas rwa yang dag par 'joms pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni
20a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ bzang ba ban pa de dag na byang chub sems dnga' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyu ga/
20a2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi med pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rtog pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang
20a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi
20a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag la 'dris
20a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / nges pa la mi 'jug pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag
20a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / rnal
20a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang / dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi byed/ bzang po bzhi po dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems
20a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nges par bsam pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can 'ga'i
20b1(dkon brtsegs): do kyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ sems kyis nges par bsam pa dang po yin no// bdag gis sems can thams
20b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes par bya zhing de dag gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir chos
20b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya ba'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no// bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad
20b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par byas nas/ byang chub kyi snying por la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung pham par byas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
20b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam pa ni sems kyi nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad gcig gis go bar byas te chos/
20b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis
20b7(dkon brtsegs): nges par bsam pa yin no// bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog/
20b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang // mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/ bzang po chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
21a1(dkon brtsegs): bdud 'dul ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no// bzhi gang zhe na gang zag med pa/
21a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye ba dang / brten nas skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / byang
21a3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems
21a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang / yongasu skyo ba drung / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud
21a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu smin par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi zeng
21a6(dkon brtsegs): zing sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus du su skul bas dran par byed pa yongasu gtong ba dang / bdag
21a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi bde ba spangs nas/ gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rton pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
21a8(dkon brtsegs): yong su smin par byed pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la mi 'jig pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na
21b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la yang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / des pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur
21b2(dkon brtsegs): sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can gyi spyod pa
21b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi
21b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan pa'i ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thab
21b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la yang rung na//
21b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud pas chos thams cad la/
21b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dnges pa yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol bar 'dod pas snyom par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 'du shes sgom par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems
21b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ thams mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o// babang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpu kyi byams bsgom pa yin te/
22a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o// snyam du
22a2(dkon brtsegs): byams bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o// snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
22a3(dkon brtsegs): brla'o// snyam du byams bsgom pa ste/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
22a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying rje yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la mgod pa'i snying rje dang / sdig pa'i las ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang /
22a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa smon pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi
22a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang ba dang /
22a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la gus pa dang / rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang / ni gnas la tse gcig du gyur pas/ rnam par shes
22a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba med pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don la rton pa
22b1(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gyi/ gang zag la mi rton pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags/
22b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med bcing thog pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhin dang ldan na/ gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi
22b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na mang du 'os pas ngoms mi shes dang / mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin du gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rtag gzhan dag la chos ston par btsun pa dang /
22b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
22b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshigs dang / yongs su mi slob ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub
22b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ spobs pa dag thob 'gyur/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos spang gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas zhing
22b7(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas khengs pa med pa dang / thos pa nyung du rnams la brnyes par mi byed pa ste/ bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
22b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsgyur ba dang / nyan thos las bsgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas las bsgru
23a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chos la 'du shes bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
23a2(dkon brtsegs): don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtog par byed pa dang / dgongs pa rtogs par byed dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang
23a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar stong pa nyi don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtog par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no// bzang po byang chub
23a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ smon lam grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na tshul khrims dang bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang /
23a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa las sems dbang byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam grub par 'gyur ba'o// bzang po byang
23a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan
23a7(dkon brtsegs): bas pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas/
23a8(dkon brtsegs): de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtogs pas/ chos gzhan dag gi rnam
23b1(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa yang dag par yang shes pa dang / chos nyid yin pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
23b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa grub pa 'di bshad pa na/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba
23b3(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde bar gyur nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun
23b4(dkon brtsegs): srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' lnga phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med
23b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bkye bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zerades khyab par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub po/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
23b6(dkon brtsegs): bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lgang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas
23b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad
23b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ de'i tshe tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// ye shes 'byung nas gzi brjid zhal yas shes rab grags/ rgya bar rang byung
23b9(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin rnyes grags/
24a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa/ mi'i dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gnas/ de dag
24a2(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni/ dman dang mchog dang tha bar ma'i rgyu ldan// N+DI slang du mdzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni
24a3(dkon brtsegs): gang lags dang / mi 'am ci dang mi dang brgya byin lha min dang / mkha' lding lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams/ sangs rgyas rdzu bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod
24a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang / brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa/ ci ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba ltar/ 'od rnams
24a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags/ sangs rgyas zhing de zab mo'i chos ni rjes su thob/ stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas/ yod dang
24a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mtha' gnyid rnam par spangasu nye/ dus gsum cu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa'o// deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de/ su zhig
24a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas/ su zhig dkon mchog gsum po rgya cher bskyed par bgyid/ gang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs/
24a8(dkon brtsegs): gal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsungs/ de tshe bde gshegs 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor nub/ gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gsus na phrag par nung /
24b1(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe sangs rgyas theg gsungs de tshe spyi bor nub/ ci ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ba/ bde bar gshegs kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur lags na/ phan mdzad lha'i lha ste
24b2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa mdzad pa po/ 'dir ni sangs rgyas theg par lung ston dgos ma mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod
24b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso// bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo// rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di ni bskal dgu khri nyis stong na/ bas
24b4(dkon brtsegs): pa legs par sprul pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/
24b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par sprul po'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod
24b6(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po de ni 'byor par 'gyur rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam
24b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ka tsa li 'di ltar rig na 'jam pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang / rol mo'i sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang / 6spos sna tshogs kyi gdugs pa dang /
24b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gdugs pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bza' ba dang btung ba ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
24b9(dkon brtsegs): sposmos sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang /
25a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi longs spyod ltar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ mi dag ni nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo
25a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de rtag tu bkod pa thams cad nye bar ston par byed de// des na 'jig rten gyi khams de bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o// kun dga'
25a3(dkon brtsegs): bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo
25a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i tshe'i tshad ni lo khrir 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kun
25a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe yang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par dgrapa 'di de'i 'og
25a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam
25a7(dkon brtsegs): par grags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas rigs kyi bu bzang po bar snang de nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
25a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dag deng slan cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyab su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid la log pa de bzhin
25b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis
25b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin nyid dang // mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsungs pa bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o//
25b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rje su thob bam ci na/ khyod
25b5(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de skad smra/ bzang pos smras pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa/
25b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyen med pa nyid thugs su nud de/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang yin
25b7(dkon brtsegs): pa der kho bo yang chud cing / ci ltar kho bo chud pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad chung la/ ci ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du chos thaMd kyang chung mi
25b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyi su med pa ni gang na kun
26a1(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa med pa nyid dang / yongasu shes pa med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
26a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
26a3(dkon brtsegs): rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo rmongs par bgyis so// de yang shes rab yang ye shes kyis mgo bla ngas par bgyid // de
26a4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na 'di'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de lta bu lags pa'i slad du'o de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di skad ces bka'
26a5(dkon brtsegs): to// bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgo mongs par byed pa bden rnam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo mongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag
26a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mgo rmongs par bgyid lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te/ chos ston pa dang /
26a7(dkon brtsegs): srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyis kyis/ gang zag du chos ston pa'i 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po lag pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub
26a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po la bzhugs nas/ chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/
26b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung ba bka' stsol pa lha lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma
26b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs legs so// khyod kyis ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad
26b3(dkon brtsegs): btags te/ chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa nyid kyi gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag du chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no// de bzhin gshegs
26b4(dkon brtsegs): bas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas/ chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba na zigs mod kyi/ 'chi ba 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i chos ston par
26b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mdzad de/ 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do// de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos
26b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang
26b7(dkon brtsegs): po rab tu byung shig/ de nas byams pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya'odang / rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das
26b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang rtags dang / tshul gyis rab tu 'byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ci'i skad
27a1(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la yang chags pa ma mchis la/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): gsasas ng+ya sa la na da nadang / sa na ngags dzang med
27a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dbaskyed do// dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
27a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di'i ming ci skad ces 'azung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
27a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kun dga'
27a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams las sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
27a7(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang /
27a8(dkon brtsegs): klags pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa nges na// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang
27b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa yin/ kun dga' bo de ltar bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / 'di lta ste lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang /
27b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang /
27b3(dkon brtsegs): thegs pa chen po 'di la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu ston te/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub yang dag par
27b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o// khong du chud par bya'o// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam byed pa 'am// lus la srel ba de'i lus la
27b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na/ gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad
27b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skal bas zhes bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
27b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams cad mngon gsum du gyur pa'i slad du lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
27b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi bu bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar ba nas
28a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten med rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal bangon par stong / 'phags pa dgon mchog bcas
28a2(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho//
28a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin ming dang prang nye bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ngan de yis shes sde la stsogs pas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa lags so//
28a4(dkon brtsegs): d+ha// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA pra ti ha r+ya u pa de sha na ma ma hA ya na sutra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs
28a5(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ cho 'phrul chen po bsten pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thabs cad la phyag 'tshal
28a6(dkon brtsegs): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' bo na/ dge slong
28a7(dkon brtsegs): nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya 'khor
28a8(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug go// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de
28b1(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems can rnams la 'dul bar mdzad lag/ bcom ldan 'das
28b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu nga ni 'tsho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ kun brjod pa'i chu 'phrul dang /
28b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa'i chos 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis
28b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po dag la ma dad
28b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da lta byung ba na nyes par spyad pa'i gzhis
28b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan song dang ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no// zhes kun brjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag de
28b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan song rnams las thar nas/ lha dang mi dag tu skye bar rnying theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba/
28b8(dkon brtsegs): nanyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar
29a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ci snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig
29a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur ba dang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma
29a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// zhes de kho na bzhin du kun brjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs
29a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi khas dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// theg pa gang gis nges par
29a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ci lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur
29a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de kho na bzhin du kun brjod cing lung ston par bar
29a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa dang / dge ba 'am mi dge ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ bar ma 'am/ mchog gam/ tha na sems skyed da pa cig kyang mi 'da' ste/ de ni de gshegs pa'i kun
29a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ rjes su bstan par mdzad pa
29b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba'o// 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni bsten par bya'o// 'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin no// 'di sgrub pa'o// 'di ni log par sgrub pa'o//
29b2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o// chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang gi cha dang mthun pa'o// zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blang
29b3(dkon brtsegs): ba rjesu ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad spang ba rjes su ston pa dang / dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad rjes su ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad spang lam 'di ni nyam
29b4(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di rnyeng sangs rgyas kyi theg pa chen
29b5(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhes rjesu ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rje su thob par mi 'gyur ba
29b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin te/ de ni gnas med do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnam su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang
29b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blangs na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid bar byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam su khrid par byed do//
29b8(dkon brtsegs): las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni mi rnam su khrid par byed do// de la gang dag mi dge ba
30a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ dge ba yang dag par blang ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su skyes nas/ rim gyis yon
30a2(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de lta bus kha na ma tho ba dang / rmongs pa med pa dang / rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
30a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyi 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas
