30a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa/ rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun tu ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste gcig tu gyur nas/ du mar 'gyur ro// du mar gyur nas/ gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang bar gyur cing
30a5(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro// rtsig pa la yang tha dkar 'gro'o// ra ba la yang thad dkar 'gro'o// ri la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o// sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang / bying
30a6(dkon brtsegs): zul byed de// dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la yang mi nus par 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun
30a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bab par byed do// lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed cing / lus kyi snod nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed cing // nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar ma
30a8(dkon brtsegs): che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag par 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen
30b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang kun tu 'bar bar ston te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par ci dang ci lta bus sems can
30b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa dag mngon par grub par byed de// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phru
30b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma la
30b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lag sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur
30b5(dkon brtsegs): ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grang gang thos na/ zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob 'gyur
30b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyang shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes
30b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol te/
30b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa/ de thams cad phya//
31a1(dkon brtsegs): gi khyor ba ya cig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni cho 'phrul 'di mnga'
31a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung
31a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma mchis pa dang / dbyangs ma mchis pa dang / tshig gi lam ma mchis dang / rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan
31a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma mchis pa dang / spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / sems dang //
31a5(dkon brtsegs): yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bral ba dang tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / rtag tu ma mchis pa dang //
31a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog gi'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang / brda' dang / tha snyad gyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de gzhan dag la
31a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma dang / yongs
31a8(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pa dang / bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad dang zhing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
31b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kyi sgor srul kyang / gling chen po bzhi'i sems can rnams dang / dgung zla dang / gdugs
31b2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / 'khor yug rnams dang / ran dang shing gyel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal rnams la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / slar byung ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang
31b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyis 'di ltar bdag cag yul gang du bkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa yang mtshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de yang de bzhin gsheg
31b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// 'di ni cho 'tsho 'phrul chen po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dacing / bsta
31b5(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang nga // bral baM dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa/
31b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhi ba dang byang bu dang / phra ba dang mthong bar dka' ba dang / rtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzob
31b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda' dang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gi chos de bstan pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so//
31b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'i dngos dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun
32a1(dkon brtsegs): 'as [।] sa du
32a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gsob ma mchis pa la gso bar tha snyad 'phe
32a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa la ga
32a4(dkon brtsegs): bur tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / ming ma mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa la tsher
32a5(dkon brtsegs): bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa la 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du byed ma mchis pa la 'du byed du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes
32a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa la rnam par shes pa tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa
32a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mig stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs stong ngo // zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang /
32a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo do// snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di
32b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / de bzhin du k+Sha ba dang / sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang ro dang lce'i rnam par
32b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / lus dang reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / yid ni 'di snyam du bdag ni stong ngo snyam du mi sems
32b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos rnams stong do zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes
32b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / yid kyi rnam par bla ni 'di snyam du bdag stong do snyam du bdag mi sems te/ 'di ltar bems po dang / sems pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po/
32b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad
32b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te// cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ mig gi/
32b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sgra dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang dra ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna dang
32b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ ro dang ldan pa yang ma lags/
33a1(dkon brtsegs): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
33a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i cho 'phrul/
33a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni yul ma mchis pa'i tshe 'phrulags so// de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par lta ba ma lags/ sems dang yid dang rnam
33a4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dang ldan par lta ba ma lags te/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo pa mi ches par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi
33a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing de dag gis phung po lnga po dag rtag par gzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du
33a6(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lagaso// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag mi rtag go zhes pa
33a7(dkon brtsegs): na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten tha
33a8(dkon brtsegs): cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rdzaka ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas ni/ de dag mi sdug gre sa bshad na 'jig rten thams cad gle pha mi rna
33b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag mi sdug go zhes
33b2(dkon brtsegs): bshad na 'jig rten ni thams cad glo ba mchis lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po bdag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes bshad
33b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad glo ba ma ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag pa zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag yang dag pa ma lags so zhes bshad na//
33b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so// cho 'phrul
33b5(dkon brtsegs): de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te// cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni mig du bgrang ba ma lags/ gzugasu bgrang ba ma lags
33b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags/ sgrar grang bar ma lags te/ cho 'phrul
33b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni rna ba dang / sgra'i yul las yang dag par radas pa lag so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid du chos kyi yul las ya bgrang ba ma lags/ chos su bgrang
33b8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/ rangs par bgyid pa
34a1(dkon brtsegs): @ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni rnam par bgyi ba ma lags so// stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ stong pa nyid brjod pa den
34a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lags so// mtshan ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni tshe 'phrul lags so// smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis
34a3(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mngon par 'du ba ma mchis pa brjod
34a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// skye ba ma mchis pa de ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ skye ba ma mchis pa brjod pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod
34a5(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis lags na/ dngos po ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni/
34a6(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul lags so// mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du/
34a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa lags na/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de cho 'phrul lags so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mya ngan las 'das pa brjod pa
34a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can du kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i
34b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang / ngag brjod pa ma sems rgyu bas
34b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems skad cig tu 'jig pa
34b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa
34b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste nang nye bar baHzhi ba dang / phyi rol du rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang /
34b5(dkon brtsegs): sems bstsag pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa
34b6(dkon brtsegs): bor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma
34b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa lags so// de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ rang gi ngo bo dang bral bar bshad
34b8(dkon brtsegs): bde ni tshe 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ yi ges kun tu phye ste/ bshang ba ni blo lpags so// chos thams ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /
35a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung bar
35a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni mngon par rtog pa gcig pa lags na/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams
35a3(dkon brtsegs): cad ni ro gcig pa lags na/ theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer mchis pa lags na/ chos thams cad rnam par
35a4(dkon brtsegs): dgod par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na// sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so//
35a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing thams cad ni zhing gcig pa lags ni/ zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni mo 'phrulags so// sems can thams cad ni gcig pa lags na/ sems can gyi rim pa bshad
35a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na/ tha ma dang / mchog dang / bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam
35a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na/
35a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan li rnam par rig pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// de nas lha'i bu dang dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jas dpal
35b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na ci tsam du brjod pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni cho 'phrul yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu de de bzhin no//
35b2(dkon brtsegs): ci skad smras pa bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin pas/ de dag la brjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu
35b3(dkon brtsegs): khris nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas tshe
35b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu ci khyod cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos ni skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun
35b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra da ti'i bu kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin na/ de la kho bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ lha'i
35b6(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med pa yin na/ de la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// btsun
35b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya
35b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin de ni sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes par mi byed do// de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi zla pho dang skye ba rlang sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes
36a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed de/ sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshe 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
36a2(dkon brtsegs): ji skad du las rnabs kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyi mi khyab bo// bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bas gtan gyi
36a3(dkon brtsegs): yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab po/ zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ de lta bas
36a4(dkon brtsegs): na chos thams ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// yang gnas shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu ji
36a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de ni thos na/ skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ zhes zer ba ni btsun pa shi ra dwa ti'i bu ci de bzhin gshegs pas
36a6(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa des/ namakha'i khams skrag par mi 'gyur mar/ spras pa lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa brdzun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de bzhin
36a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des na mkha'i khams skrag par mi 'gyur na/ kho bo yang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa lha'i bu ci khyod namakha' yin nan/
36a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni na mkha' yin no// smras pa lha'i bu khyod ci las bsam te de skad ces smra/ smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom
36b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi nang gi na mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi nam kha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid namakha'i khams ma yin nas/ smras pawa
36b2(dkon brtsegs): bu de ni yin no// smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang nam kha'i khams kyi rang bzhin can yin no// smras pa lha'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhi
36b3(dkon brtsegs): du khyod nyid kyang / ring por cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu cho 'phrul de dag nye bar bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ cho
36b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan
36b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das lha'i bu ded dpon 'di lta bu ston pa lags na/ 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing 'jam pa la gzhon nur gyur pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa/
36b6(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ci skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu lha'i bu deng dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon
36b7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas yongasu smin par byas pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe
36b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na/ bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
37a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rigs pa dang nabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten maldan pa skyes du'i 'dul ba'i khal sgyur ba blan mad pa lha dang ma rnams
37a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams den
37a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam med la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang rin po che sna bzhi la gser dang /
37a4(dkon brtsegs): dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las grub cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam la ka tsa li 'di gos ltar reg na/ 'jam zhing mi khom pa dang / ngan song rnams dang bral la lha dang mi
37a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kun tu gang zhing yid la bsam pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang / btung ba dag 'byor la bde ba dag 'byor la bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten
37a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig ste/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa/ gzungs
37a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ tshigs thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/
37a8(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba de bar bcom pa sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs
37b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bstsags pa/ gsol pa ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
37b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang / blo rgya mtsho
37b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su zhugs pa dang / sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / shes rab la shin tu gnas pa/ thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i
37b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa/ bsam gtan dang
37b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsungs rab la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang
37b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po gling bzhi'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa mo'i dbang por gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te/ de dag thams
37b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i tshogs/
38a1(dkon brtsegs): @rnams dang / lhan gcig tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
38a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri ba lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur ro// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa'i
38a3(dkon brtsegs): bu stong dang lhan gcig btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan gcig du chos la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
38a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshangs par thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du/ na bza' dab
38a5(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sman gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// rgyal po dge ba'i bko
38a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor dang bcas pas rtag par rgyun tu de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du nyin cig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas phul zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la
38a7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jug par gyur to// de bu dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'bum 'das kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing / yang dang yang du de la chos nyan pas
38a8(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa bani thob par gyur to// ngan gang zhe na/ sangs rgyasu rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes dran pa dang / sbyin pa dang ldan zhing byang chub
38b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to// de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos
38b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang / dral bar ma gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas/ btsun
38b3(dkon brtsegs): mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der dong ngo //
38b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa dus mas
38b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri ba rab lta bu de la/ rgyal
38b6(dkon brtsegs): po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ma mchis
38b7(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po
38b8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// brgyal po chen po cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do// de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste sos
39a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba 'gag pa rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung
39a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes pa ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du smos
39a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi byang chub la
39a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang / phyi ci log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems
39a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med
39a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byas par med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang // lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod
39a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod dang / pha rol dang tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi
39a8(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / brtag pa dang / gsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la mthabs la mkhas pa yod pa dang / skyobs pa med pa dang / rton pa med pa'i chos
39a9(dkon brtsegs): zhung bamad cing skad cig pa ma rnal ba 'i ba la sa
39b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa
39b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnas med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med pa
39b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang / dmigs pa dang / sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes
39b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang lus dang sgra dang brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i ches
39b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang
39b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i spong bsgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po ston pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su brjod pa dang
39b7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la
39b8(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas skyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos
40a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mya ngan las 'das so zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta
40a2(dkon brtsegs): des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang / bu steng po de dag dang / btsun me'i tshogs de la cho 'phrul snyan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de
40a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos bstan pa dang / srog chags brgya khrid bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs byang chub tu sems skyes so// rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa dang / de'i bu stong
40a4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de
40a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni//
40a6(dkon brtsegs): lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes// ci ltar nyi ma 'char ba yis// mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar//
40a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang / sangs rgyas maung rnams snang bar bgyid// ci ltar zla ba nya ba yi/ zla ba yangs rdzogs lta ltar/ sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs
40a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i/ 'jig rten mgo yang lha de lags// ji ltar me tog bad ma ni// chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar/ de bzhin 'jig rten mgon po yang / 'jig rten chos kyi mi ges
40b1(dkon brtsegs): lags/ ci ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal/ nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar// de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang / stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrogs// mchis sam yang nam mchis dang /
40b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis dang mchis thams cad dang / mthar lta ba las rnams 'das pa/ nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes dgyi/ skye ba 'am yang na 'jog pa 'ang rung // de dag mtshan mar bstan
40b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing / mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ pha rol dang ni tshur rol dag/ de dag rnam par rtog par bstan/ chos rnams kun la mi
40b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ nges par seng ge sgra zhes bgyi/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ba/ de gnyis mtshan gnyis ma mchis te/ shin tu dri ma ma mchis chos/ nges par seng ge'i zhes bgyi/
40b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang gtig ni// yongs su rtog las byung ba ste// rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa/ nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan las/ de dag
40b6(dkon brtsegs): lam du zhugs pa ste/ chos rnams shin du gsog lag pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni// phyi ci log las byung ba ste/ mi rtag sdug
40b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bdag med don/ nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes 'gyi// lha dang dmigs pa gnas lags te/ de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong par rab
40b8(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa/ nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ 'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni/ gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad pa/ de dag thams cad bshad pa ni/ nges par
41a1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/ sems ni mnyam pa nyid du slad du/ rjes su 'thun dang mi mthun pa'i/ gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa/ de ni rjes su 'thun bzong /
41a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'i// zab cing zhi la 'thun bgyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes su 'thun bzod pa lags// mi dge thams
41a3(dkon brtsegs): cad ma gtogs par// dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing // de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa// de ni brjes 'thun bzod pa lags// stong pa'i sgra dang sems can sgra// de
41a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni// sgra rnams kun la ma chags pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra// rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang // gang gi
41a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra la'ang mi rtog pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang // de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa//
41a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni rjes su 'thun bzod lags pa// thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems ni mi spong la// byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa
41a7(dkon brtsegs): lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la/ de 'dra'i chos ni bstan mdzad de// de la sau ba nyid ma mchis pa// de ni 'thun bzod pa lags// bdag kyang byang
41a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sangs rgyas zhing / seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni/ ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i/ cho 'phrul nges par bstan par bgyi// zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab/
41b1(dkon brtsegs): bla med bsod nams zhing de la/ bdag gis sa bon btab pas na/ bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags// dog sa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing / rgya mtsho 'ang bas pas 'gyur
41b2(dkon brtsegs): gda' yi/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa'i// sa bon rnams kyang chab mi 'tshal// sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thog gi/ byang chub
41b3(dkon brtsegs): tu ni bskrun pa'i sems// de'i bsod nams tshad ma mchis// bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i// dbang du lga dang dri za dang / mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te/ bcom ldan
41b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das nyid bdag gi dbang / 'dren pa bdag gi longs spyod dang // gzugs dang mtho ris mi 'tshal gyi// mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni/ ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig/
41b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas/ bdag gis dgu lo 'bum du ni/ ma chags sdang ba mchis par/ bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur gyis/ bdag gis byis
41b6(dkon brtsegs): pa stong rnams dang // mchis 'brang yongs su smin bgyis pa// gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi/ byang chub slad du spro ba mdzad/ bdag gis bde gshegs legs
41b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing / chos 'di legs par thos pa dang / byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba// bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa/ de ni chos nga
41b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dga'/ chos rnams spong bar mi/ 'gying pa/ sems can kun la rtag dga' lags/ de nas 'khor de nyid du chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te/
42a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ 'dug pa des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang mthun par ma byas
42a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ mi 'thun par byas pas na/ khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi/ gnas la gnas pas
42a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa med pa'o// rgyal chen byang chub ni tshor ba thams cad med pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing bor ba med pas thang
42a4(dkon brtsegs): ba med la dor ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni namakha' la bris pa dang 'dra bas/ gzugs med pa kha dog med pa/ rtags pa med pa/ dbyibs med pa yin//
42a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas gnyen po med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes
42a6(dkon brtsegs): su song ba yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas gama' ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin
42a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rgyal ba chen po byang chub brtag pa dang bsal ba dang rgal bas nye bar ni ba'o// rgyal ba chen po byang nub ni mi mthun pa med pas lhag g.yo ba med pa'o//
42a8(dkon brtsegs): po chen po byang chub ni yongasu grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma gnas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o//
42b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o// rgyal chen po byang chub ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes
42b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bral bas rnam par rig pas med do// rgyal chen po de byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub
42b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o// rgyal chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni
42b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen byang chub ni las kyi rnam
42b5(dkon brtsegs): bar smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag
42b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ngo bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'bebs par byed pa dang / gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed
42b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams can ni/ log par rtsol ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni ci 'dra bar byang chub sems
42b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa yang de dang 'dra ba yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas
43a1(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par nyid
43a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
43a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
43a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len
43a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang // khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab
43a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yongasu gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongasu gdung ba thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyi rlom sems
43a7(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bsam gtan gyis
43a8(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su mi byed pas mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyams par 'dug pa sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
43b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
43b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
43b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes paskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dang chos la
43b4(dkon brtsegs): nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba
43b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par ses
43b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don 'thun pa mnyam pa nyid
43b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid
43b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// na mkha' yong su dag pa dang / sems yongs su
44a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
44a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yi
44a3(dkon brtsegs): no// lus dang ngag dang sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang sems brgyan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la dag
44a4(dkon brtsegs): med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pa
44a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa med pa mnyam pa nyid
44a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhug dang dka' thub
44a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi go cha bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug bsngal skye ba med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang
44a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'dza' bshes dang / mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba bstan pa ni byang chub
44b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lan re ba med par mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no
44b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang sgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pas tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam
44b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs
44b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spong ba yin no// don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bden pa'i shes pa yongasu tshol ba ni byang chub sems
44b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can la shin du 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin//
44b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongs su tshol ba ni/ byang chub
44b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyis spyod pa deg thos nas/
44b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba bskyes nas/ gos dang rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos sgra
45a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par bkab bo// bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis chos smra ba'i dge
45a2(dkon brtsegs): slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas tshig 'di skad du gang dag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed
45a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag
45a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang /
45a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/ de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis de dag khyod kyis sgrub shig/ de glang zhen/
45a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun/ byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur
45a7(dkon brtsegs): cig/ ma zhum sems kyis bkal ba rdzogs par ni/ byang chub ma'i sbyin pa byas pa pas/ gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems skyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu bslab
45a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rab 'byung sems kyis gos pa gcig bor ba/ de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang dag sngan chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon 'byu
45b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bzhugs pa rnams// de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par// bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med// rang 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bstod cing
45b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags la bkur ba ste/ gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa/ rgyal ba'i bstan la rab 'byung gzung bar gyis/ gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i/
45b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i byed ma snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang // gang zhig rab 'byung nyin dang mtshan gcig tu// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na// gang zhig rab 'byung
45b4(dkon brtsegs): bag yod 'gyur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye pa dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin//
45b5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyis rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/ de ni dge ba chung zad ma yin zhing // de ni yongasu 'dzin pa spangs pa/
45b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni// khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med/ rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// spyod pa dag pas byang chub
45b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed mi dka'// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshig su bcad pa de dag thos nas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
45b8(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar gyur cing skyo la'adod chags dang bral ba skyes par gyur te/ rab tu byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
46a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen
46a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu 'byung ba ni dgag pa med pa
46a3(dkon brtsegs): ste// sems can thams cad la yang rab tu mi gcod cing bskabs yod do// khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/ gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gangs
46a4(dkon brtsegs): shing rjes su bstan gyis khyod kyis kyang gdams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po
46a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bkod pas/ bu stong po de dag la smras pa/ khyod cag las rgyal srid sgrub pa dang / sems can rnams la chos yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par spro ba su yod// de dag
46a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis smras pa// khyod yab bdag cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim mchis par rab 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cag mi dor bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa gal te
46a7(dkon brtsegs): cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang sems can rnam
46a8(dkon brtsegs): la bstan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des rgyal srid sgrub la// sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug shig/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gi
46b1(dkon brtsegs): nang nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rjer sems shes bya ba des/ rang gi ba de dang / rgan rabs de dag gi tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rab 'byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes/ de bzhi
46b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyis/ de lcags kyang snying rjer gyur na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis sgrub/ ci srid 'tshor bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing // gas
46b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar gyi/ me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang // de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi gyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing / mchil lham ma
46b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal rin chen gtsug phung mun/ khri rkang gser nas bgyis par mi nyal zhing / rgyal po rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo// sil sten glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing /
46b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ngang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid/ skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong zhing / gcig pu mal na mchil nyal rlung mi g.yab/ bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi ba
46b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing / dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi/ khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing / rab tu 'byung ba'i bsdigs pa'ang brjod par bgyi/ gzugs dang
46b7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod dbang phyug dregs pa yis/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi/ byang chub sems ni bskyed par mi bya zhing / rtag tu yid 'byung srid gsum spyad par
46b8(dkon brtsegs): dgyi/ sbyin dang stan sgra don 'thun pas// sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don 'thun pas/ sem can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing // bla med theg chen dam pa 'di la yang / srog
47a1(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba mang po yongs smin gyi// chos don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi slad du/ nyin mo dus sum mtshan mo dus sum du// ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi
47a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
47a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na// khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu
47a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / yon tan mtshungs pa yin no// khyod kyis snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i yongs su bsgrub pa yang sgrub par byed pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas
47a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang / lhan cig du bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pas dad pas khyim nas khyin
47a6(dkon brtsegs): med par rab tu byung bar gyur to// de dag rab tu byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de ltar btams shing rjes su bstan pas/ deg gis
47a7(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// gzungs dang dran pa dang chos mnyen pa'i shes pa yang bskyed par gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon nu
47a8(dkon brtsegs): snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ zla ba nyer/ cag na gling chen po bzhi po dag rjes su ston par byed de/ ci nas kyang srog chags dung phyur phrag dang /
47b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bye ba drag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang
47b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang
47b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can rnam
47b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rten tu gyur cing / dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de/
47b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyid dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar maM blta ste/ lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor
47b6(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyan
47b7(dkon brtsegs): du khyod som nyid dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos slu ba'i dge
47b8(dkon brtsegs): slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// shar dwa ti'i bu de'i de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyongs/
48a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas stong po de dag
48a2(dkon brtsegs): da'i tshing 'i dus na rgyal ba dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong ngas par gyur to// shar dwa t+yA'i bu rang ma'i dus na/ rgyal bu gan nu snying rje cher sabs shes bya bar gyur
48a3(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan nog yin snyam du khyod mam nyid dang yid gnyis pa bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de kar mi bas ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya bu gzhan nu snang
48a4(dkon brtsegs): sems zhes bya bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang shes bzhin gyi spyad pas bla na med pa yang
48a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags
48a6(dkon brtsegs): sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyeso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
48a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan gcig tu yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
48a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la/ lam ni'o
48b1(dkon brtsegs): byas yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin no// de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ying po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba
48b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ kho bo ni spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/ de'i kho bo ni ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
48b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyi su sbyor ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba yang ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring
48b4(dkon brtsegs): po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yi
48b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /
48b6(dkon brtsegs): chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad
48b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'du lam las yang dag par 'da'
48b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin gyi/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes
49a1(dkon brtsegs): nyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge bar dang sdig pa las nges par sbyor ba mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin/
49a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa ma zhes bya ba de nyan thos dang / rangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kho bo ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
49a3(dkon brtsegs): skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las byol ba
49a4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi// kho bo ni 'khor ba las byol ba ma yin te// de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba/
49a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin te// de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin
49a6(dkon brtsegs): no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang khyod 'di skad ces 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// zhes zer ba ni btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
49a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la nI bkur bya bar mi nus so// de'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gzugs med cing bstan du med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur
49a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang // de bzhin gshegs
49b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi bdud pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus
49b2(dkon brtsegs): ma byas brnyed pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur
49b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang / gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing / stong pa nyid kyi yul yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de
49b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang / sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i mu yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yul ma yin zhing
49b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin zhing rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de
49b6(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus
49b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing // chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba ma yin pas/ de la bskur bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus
49b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la/ gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i
50a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas de la/ bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab
50a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas de la bsten bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de
50a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa
50a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ de la bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
50a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi dmigs pa yin pas// de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas de la
50a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa kun bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas// de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig
50a7(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkun bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshes pa ni nye zhing rab bzhes la nye bar zhi ba yin das/
50a8(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhi/
50b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni kha dog dang gzugs dang / dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha nam
50b2(dkon brtsegs): tho ba med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod pa ma thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar
50b3(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa dang / banun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur pa gdab du med cing mamakha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus
50b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// zhes zer ba la btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtse ba
50b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'jig tshogs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang // srid pa'i sred rtsa ba ma yin pa dang // 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi
50b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga pa lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drag rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtsa ba ma yin
50b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa gang
50b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog
51a1(dkon brtsegs): partsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom
51a2(dkon brtsegs): sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa
51a3(dkon brtsegs): drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pas rloms sems
51a4(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa
51a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
51a6(dkon brtsegs): bdang rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sgrib pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa rtse ba ma yin pa gang yin pa
51a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang gang zag du
51a8(dkon brtsegs): lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
51b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang // 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
51b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
51b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nang dang sdug bsngal dang /
51b4(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams su rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams tsa
51b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sbyin pas rlom sems su byed partsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshul khrim
51b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa dang snying rje dang
51b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod
51b8(dkon brtsegs): ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
52a1(dkon brtsegs): @nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba
52a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len
52a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / bdag
52a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan la la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bstan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom pa'i rtsa ba dang / dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdug pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam
52a5(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / btang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang / thabs kyi rtsa ba dang / thams
52a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs
52a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// mus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyu
52a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//
52b1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// mngon par shes pa dang rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems pa'i
52b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro/
52b3(dkon brtsegs): bya byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bkor ba'i rtsa ba'i gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i
52b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya/
52b5(dkon brtsegs): ba byin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di/
52b6(dkon brtsegs): skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin par rig par bya'o// sems can gang dag
52b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi sku mi dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni/
52b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no// de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di la snang ba thob pa yin no// zhes kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang
53a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor des smras pa la rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad nas/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal
53a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur de yang tshe 'phrul chen po yin te/ de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
53a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi stag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang / bdag du 'du she
53a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par shad pa dang /
53a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa dang / khams sum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon pa med
53a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang nga 'ir 'dzin par 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/
53a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/ yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
53a8(dkon brtsegs): gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su ma bzung bas/ yongs su ma
53b1(dkon brtsegs): 'azung ba la rten par dang / rten med pa la g.yob med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med dang / blang ba med
53b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la dor ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin
53b3(dkon brtsegs): ci log med pa la/ log pa nyid med pa dang / log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang
53b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mig gas
53b5(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang / sems can gyi gnas pa med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang / rnam par rig
53b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang / bral bas dmigs pa spangs pa dang / dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med
53b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sgrib par med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom pa med
53b8(dkon brtsegs): kha de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sgyid lug
54a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i med pa dang / nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i sems la gsal ba snang ba dang / gsol ba thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang /
54a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba
54a3(dkon brtsegs): nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa med pa med pa mngon dur 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon 'du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu
54a4(dkon brtsegs): gang byas pa med cing skye ba'i chos rnams l+ya kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal
54a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhozhen nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dra ba de dang / de nyid kyi tshigs gi mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos
54a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste// de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed//
54a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bai rims po ste/
54a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du brjod par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ther gzug gnas pa ma yin ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin
54b1(dkon brtsegs): du rnam par 'jog par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin rnam par 'gong par byed do// btsun pa shar
54b2(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyom pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs gang du
54b3(dkon brtsegs): du yang ma khrid pa ste/ de dag ni brtsegs pa yang ma yin/ spungs pa yang ma yin no// de dag ni bshad kyang rung ma shad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid de mi 'dor ba
54b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no// sems can thams cad kyi cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad
54b5(dkon brtsegs): ni lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ste// rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no// ji ltar yi ge rnams la brtsegs pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang sems
54b6(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i chos rnams la yang bstsags pa med do/ ci ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bstsags pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa med pa'i
54b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa thams cad la yang bstsags pa med do// ci ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bstsags pa med pa de bzhin du shes pa gang gis nyon mongs
54b8(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams spangs pa shes pa de la yang bstsags pa med de/ btsun sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang mi gnas pa'i shes pas mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs
55a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
55a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spangs pa
55a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i tsa ba yang dag par bsdu shes dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba dang 'byung
55a4(dkon brtsegs): dra dang / lam ngan pa rnams par bcad pa shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang / chung mi za ba shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba ma spang ba shes pa
55a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rkyen shes pa dang tshogs bsgrags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel
55a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par shes pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spang ba shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang /
55a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin/
55a8(dkon brtsegs): pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang /
55b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rjesu bsrung ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang bsam gtan las
55b2(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs su shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa
55b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / sems can bskyab pa shes dang / snying rje shes pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dga' la mchog tu dag
55b4(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa dang / btang snyom shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye
55b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas med pa la gnas shes pa dang // mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon pa
55b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du bya ba med pa so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /
55b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chos tham
55b8(dkon brtsegs): cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang
56a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
56a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag
56a3(dkon brtsegs): par dmigs pa shes dang / zad pa shes pa dang / / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod/
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ba thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su grub pa shes pa dang // chos rjesu dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rang
56a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bskor ba shes pa dang // dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang // dge 'dun phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'dub shes pa dang //
56a6(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes pa shes pa dang / sems cad thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad yongs
56a7(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su/
56a8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa shes pa dang / thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes
56b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang // gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu
56b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang / rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jig pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa ma yin
56b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rje su rtog pa shes pa dang / 'dus pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs
56b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / rab tu
56b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa'i shes pa dang / lus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes dang
56b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs
56b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes
