56b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa nye bar bya zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs
57a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes dang / dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems le lo can yongasu gzungs pa shes pa dang /
57a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni
57a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob po// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
57a4(dkon brtsegs): ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar te/
57a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni go chang na don dang ldan nas yang dag par bsdu bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal gang de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//
57a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dam pal ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs
57a7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin no// smras pa 'jam
57a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal
57b1(dkon brtsegs): tsa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/ spras pa lha'i bu brtsams pa chen po nyams 'og tu chung bar byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ se
57b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ smras pa lha'i bu shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs
57b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos thams de yang dgad par bsdus pas/ de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i
57b4(dkon brtsegs): bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas de'i phyir
57b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par
57b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i bu 'di ltar
57b7(dkon brtsegs): lam de la gnas nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas/ de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir
57b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya// smras pa lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin tu 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes nya
58a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu ci tsam gyis bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges btsem zhing sems can yongasu
58a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir sred pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no// smras pa 'das dpal ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul ba dka'
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod
58a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe
58a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / thabs kyis sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang / dam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir kun tu snang ba de tsam gyis na/ byang chub
58a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mngon pa'i 'phags pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smras pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
58a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba'i zil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu ni chos smra ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal
58a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams bsal
58b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos ston par byed pa'i de lta bu ni 'dul ba smras pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na ngon smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi cha/ thos pa thams cad la nan tan snyi
58b2(dkon brtsegs): por byed cing don rje su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na don smra yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ thos pa thams cad la
58b3(dkon brtsegs): nan tan snying por byed cing don rjes su byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no// smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe
58b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la spobs par byed pa de lta bu ni sems can rnams la phan pa'i zhi phun sum tshogs
58b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang ngo min//
58b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnam
58b7(dkon brtsegs): khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo med pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji smras pa tshig
58b8(dkon brtsegs): las mi 'da' ba de lta ba ni g.yo ba med pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar ni sgyu med pa// smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ci ltar sems kyis mngon
59a1(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa de bzhin du tshig du brjod pa de lta bu sgra med pa yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar nang rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa lpaH
59a2(dkon brtsegs): bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
59a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe yongs su bsdus pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci ltar
59a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar
59a5(dkon brtsegs): na bzod pa smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnod pa bzod cing gzhan la gnod par mi byed pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/
59a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa lha'i bu gang rnam par bsam na/ chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsam gtan la bsam pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang 'dod
59a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i khams su phyis mi snang ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa gang shes rab kyis bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa yin no// smras
59a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam par lta ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal na
59b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar snying rje la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad na mkha' lta bur shes nas/ byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci ltar
59b2(dkon brtsegs): na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe thub cing zhi ba thob cing chos yongasu tshol ba la dga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na btang
59b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrog pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpa
59b4(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems can thams cad dang 'thun par ston pa yin no//
59b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na ngag yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa
59b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa'ajam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems yong su dag pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gcig
59b7(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i
59b8(dkon brtsegs): gang gi gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la/ gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa 'jam ci ltar na lha'i du rna ba thos pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang /
60a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol tu sems la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu
60a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur pa rnams kyis sems kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/
60a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha'i mu rje su dran zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yon/
60a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa yin no// smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin no//
60a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dang lha'i dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci ltar na rnam par dul ba
60a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su gyur pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci ltar na zhi ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams
60a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis gdung ba med pa sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na dang ba yin/ smras pa lha'i
60a8(dkon brtsegs): bu spangs rgyasargya kyi sku'i gzugs kyis phye yang mi phye ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa lnga'i/
60b1(dkon brtsegs): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi rag las par mthong ba yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
60b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming bshad pa de dad
60b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras te// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do// lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ bajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
60b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed la snyen bkur byas na/ khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ 'jam dpal gyis
60b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu mo sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed 'gags pa snyed la'o// smras pa 'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la yang sems dang sems
60b7(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba dag med ni/ ma sprul pa la lta ci smos/ smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de dag la bsten bkur
60b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ smras pa lha'i bu gag
61a1(dkon brtsegs): te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig ga la khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad ces dris
61a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ci de len ldon par byed dam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do// smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang sprul pa de nyid kyi yin pas na/ kho bos ji skad
61a3(dkon brtsegs): du spyan ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhes lan gdab par bya/ smras pa 'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod ser sna can yin nam/ smras pa lha'i
61a4(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang yongasu mi gtong ba de ser sna can ma yin
61a5(dkon brtsegs): nam/ smras pa 'jam dpal khyo ci zhig yongs su mi gtong / smras pa lha'i bu kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba
61a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te// de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin/ smras
61a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de bzhin te kho bo ni tshul khrims 'tshal pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod tsa las bsam te de skad sgra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal ba de ngan song
61a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag tu ltung ba ma yin nams/ smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du ngan so//
61b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'gro ste/ de'i phyir kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci khyod gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin na/ smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni gnod
61b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal yin no// khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gnod sems dang ldan pa de rjes su chags
61b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang byis pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
61b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la rjes su chags pa med de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci khyod le lo can yin nam/ smras pa lha'i bu
61b5(dkon brtsegs): ci de bzhin te// kho bo ni le lo can yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te/ de skad smra/ smras pa le lo can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang ngag dang yid
61b6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtsom pa yin no// kho bo yang rtsom pa med cing rtul bar mi byed pa dang / len pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa yino// de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no// smras pa 'jam
61b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin nam/ smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las
61b8(dkon brtsegs): bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin nam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin
62a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
62a2(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te// de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal ci khyod shes rab 'chal pa yin nam/ smras pa lha'i
62a3(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin te kho bo ni shes rab 'chal ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te/ de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag kyang / lhan
62a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal pa ma yin nam// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin de/ smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang 'khor bas mi skrag cing de dag nyid yongs su smin
62a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir sems can rmongs pa rnams dang / lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi sbyin
62a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas su yin/ smras pa lha'i gang sad pa gsod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams so// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu//
62a7(dkon brtsegs): gsad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams te// gang de dag gsod par byed pa de dag ni gsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas/
62a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa skrag par 'gyur ba yin no// smras pa lha'i bu gal te/
62b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par 'gyur 'jig rten gnas pa yang skrag par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir na 'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
62b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ smras pa lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyuraro//
62b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smras/ smras pa 'jas lha'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma spangs par ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par mi
62b4(dkon brtsegs): nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyon med par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas na/ gang dag mos par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/
62b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lnga'i bu rnam par grol ba'i yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med do// smras pa 'jam bral dam
62b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba 'gro ba yin no// smras pa lha'i bu gang dag rnam par grol ba de dag thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/ smras pa 'jam
62b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin no// smras pa lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus
62b8(dkon brtsegs): so// smras pa 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin// smras pa lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lce'i
63a1(dkon brtsegs): bkrung bang gas pa bams cad 'argya nanas pa ma // byung nan/ mang ca pa gdams par byeng pang
63a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams
63a3(dkon brtsegs): cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang / chang pa'i mthar lta bar yang mi ltung ba de lta'u ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha
63a4(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa yin no// smras pa 'jam sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu sems can gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi khams dang ldan
63a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa 'am lha'i bu na mkha'i dngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no//
63a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal na mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras
63a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ smras pa lha'i bu mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te// sangs rgyas kyi yul mig dang gzugs
63a8(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par shes pa'i yum ma yin no// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rna ba dang / sgra dang rnam par shes pa'i yin no//
63b1(dkon brtsegs): sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul yin no// lce dang ro dang rnam par shes pa'i yul ma
63b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang reg bya dang / rnam par shes pa'i lus ma yin no// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas
63b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyin te/ sangs kyi yul ni yid dang chos dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
63b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su rung ba'i yul ma yin no// tshol ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni myang ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du shes kyi yul/ sangs
63b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul yin te// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du byed kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon
63b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa'i yul ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul yin no// ma rig pa'i yul ni
63b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rgyu dad kyi yul ma yin no// rga shi'i bar dag gi yu la ni sangs rgyas kyi sbyin te/ sangs kyi yul ni nyid
63b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so sor rnam par rig
64a1(dkon brtsegs): // gdunas lasakyis panas / sas rgyas kyi la da gas kyi gcan pa
64a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gzugs med pa'i khas kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba las rnam par grol ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus ma byas kyi kha
64a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
64a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs kyi yul ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no// lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ mtha' dang mthe' ma yin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir der ni yul
64a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dus shing khong du chud pa yin no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad kyi rnam par spyod kyang bdud kyi
64a6(dkon brtsegs): yul thob pa yang ma yin te// des ni bdud kyi yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud do// lha'i bu gang mnyam
64a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'dab pa 'di yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de la mnyam pa nyid ni
64a8(dkon brtsegs): gang // mi mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad stod pa nyid mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag stong pa nyid la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam
64b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnya
64b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su
64b3(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed kyang / mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad smon pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam
64b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yong su smin par byed kyang smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang / chos
64b5(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag tu nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par
64b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad skye ba med
64b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mnyam pa nyid dang / 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang / dben par mnyam
64b8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang // dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam
65a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smi/
65a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/ lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems
65a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'
65a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spong ba la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spong ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no// smras pa
65a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub
65a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'dod chags
65a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyiraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ zhe sdang
65a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// gti mug gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shes
65b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni
65b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
65b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// brtson 'grus med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/
65b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bsam gtan
65b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis rloms sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 'chal ba'i shes rab med pa'i spyod ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems
65b6(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa'i spyod pa ma yin no// nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te// nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i
65b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ma yin no// nang dang phyi'i dngos po yongs su btong ba brtse ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bu dang bu mo chung ma yongs su
65b8(dkon brtsegs): btang bas mngon par dga' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'dod pa'i yod nal spong bas rtag tag tu gnod sems spyod
66a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
66a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta bas na lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong tshum chom med
66a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'khor ba dpag med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems
66a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bar khur chen po sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sngar dam
66a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid la bcags pa'i spyod
66a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// theg pa thams cad zil kyis mnan/ pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
66a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// yid ma zhig pas go ca rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems pas rang
66a8(dkon brtsegs): gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las byas pa chung mi za bas chung mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
66b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dgra thams cad
66b2(dkon brtsegs): nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bskal pa mnyam pa'i skye bo dang / 'thun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang/
66b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gshe ba dang / sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' byed pas/ rab tu dga' byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
66b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas blta ba dang / chos mnyam pa dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bi
66b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang ngag dang / sems dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pas/ rgyan kyi spyod pa byang chub sems
66b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams spyod pa yin no// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gnyen por gyur pas zil kyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// skye bo
66b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas shing 'dzangs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pas/ ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// tshul bzhin gyis nyom mongs
66b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams shin tu nges par brtags pas mi rdzi ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// khur blangs pa nyams su len pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod
67a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
67a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// byang chub dkyis phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun
67a3(dkon brtsegs): gtsad pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum 'bri bar byed pas/ dkon mchog gi spyod
67a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
67a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa/ 'di bshad pa pa na/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur
67a6(dkon brtsegs): to// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs
67a7(dkon brtsegs): bar smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
67a8(dkon brtsegs): bu de de bzhin no// ci skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu gang gi tsheng spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi nga bla na med pa yang
67b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ der ngas mi skye ba'i ches la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la byang /
67b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas bcom
67b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ 'jug pa gang gis ni byang chub sems dpa' mi
67b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas
67b5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de ni sngon byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin te// de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// de sngon srid par gyur la mi srid par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni bzod ma nas mi srid
67b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon skyes par gyur la/ phyis ma skye bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mngon pa 'dus byas pa yin
67b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byis mngon par 'dum byas pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon yod par gyur la phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/
67b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la/ phyis gang zag tu mi 'greng gyur pa ma yin te// de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid
68a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ni mtshan mar 'grang bar gyur la// phyis mtshan mar mi 'grang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni sngon yod par bzod sa nas mtshan ma med
68a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid yin no// gang gis de ltar rjes su rtog pa dang // sems kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// de la bzod pa
68a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ de dag ci ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang
68a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o//
68a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la yang
68a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de yang skad cig pa
68a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te// gang gi skad cig yin zhe na/ skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan
68a8(dkon brtsegs): ma med pas skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar na stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du gzugs dang
68b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ci ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
68b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid
68b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin chos thams cad kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /
68b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du skye mched thams cad kyang skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/
68b5(dkon brtsegs): skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma brla yin no// ya ma brla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no// gsog gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no// 'dod chags med
68b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no// ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos
68b7(dkon brtsegs): po med pa yin no// de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / skad cig pa dang ya ma brla dang / dben pa dang / gsog ces bya ste/ chos thams cad la de ltar
68b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de yang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
68b9(dkon brtsegs): so mayin no// maso ba gang yin pa de
69a1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin no// bzod pa de yang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de la dmigs pa/
69a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhen// gang gci bdag dang bzang pa gnyi ga dmigs na/ deni dmigs pa zhes byag// sems can dang srog dang gas pa dang / bzod pa gci gar dmigs na/ den
69a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa zhes bya'o// de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o// sems can dang / srog dang
69a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag dang // bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad
69a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no// ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ ngo bo nyid dang bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su
69a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa de yang /
69a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no// bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu
69a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos so// 'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to// sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dgrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to// me tog gi char pa dag
69b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bab po// srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug
69b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad rgyal po'i
69b3(dkon brtsegs): pho brang pad ma can du zhugs par gyur pa/ de lta bu yang kun tu snang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom
69b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog 'brum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po
69b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / brtsod kha dang / shel dang / rdul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te// de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
69b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te// nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang zin gyis
69b7(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas yang phyir log ste// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe ba
69b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
70a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mngon du mum du tshul dang 'dra' ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol
70a2(dkon brtsegs): to// thub pa ci slang du 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa// mi mnyam pa gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu// 'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la zhu// rab ri nyon mongs spong ba khyod la zhu//
70a3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs ci slang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// pha rol mchog rnams 'jom pa khyod la zhu// bdud dpung tha mar mdzad pa khyod la zhu// stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod pa ru//
70a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa stan mdzad pa// sums cu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa// de gshegs rab dga' bde ba mdzad pa po// gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba khyod
70a5(dkon brtsegs): la zhu// bcom ldan ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan bstod pa po// ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa// ye shes ljon
70a6(dkon brtsegs): shing mkhyen pa mtsho la zha// 'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas pa// gsum rig dri gsum tha mar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsung
70a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar byon// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// smon pa dab pa skye rga mthar mdzad pa/ bcom ldan zhabs la dra mchog 'khor lo mngang / sred med sras po rdo rje
70a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khregs pa po// thub pa b+h+ri ma mtshang sbyor ba bka' stsal gsol/ gang gi spyod pa de ni rnam spangs sam// gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam/
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gang sems can sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur tam// ci'i slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad// bde gshegs zla med rgyu zhig mngara' bar/ bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum
70b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mi ston pas/ de thob sems can glo ba rangs gyur kyis/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs can legs par gsung dbyung gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan dang
70b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srogs chags bdun khri nyis stong gis
70b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
70b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// kun dga' gzhan khyod kyis lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
70b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das bdag la sti steng du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror
70b7(dkon brtsegs): byas/ mchod par byas/ yongs su zhu ba byas/ yongs su dri ba byas shing sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
70b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug go// kun dga' bo lha'i bu de dpon 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la
71a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi sangs rgyas khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub mngon par rdzogs
71a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshes pa 'jig rten mkhyen
71a3(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar
71a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' 'jig gi khams yongs su dag pa de yang rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dur+ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying
71a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po las 'grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis mangs ris su kun nas bkab par 'gyur te/
71a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can smod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang / bdud
71a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams kyi ming yang med cing ming yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad de dag kyang med/
71a8(dkon brtsegs): cing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad po dag kyang yod la ngas med la/ bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang yid la bsam pa tsam
71b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'grub par gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba dang / 'khrul pa'i nyes pa dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gi
71b2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad
71b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur zhing pal tshor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag
71b4(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'jig gyi khams de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od
71b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i ske tshe tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin
71b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dung phyur phrag drug dang / bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te// bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems
71b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag gis bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / gang dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de dag 'jig
71b8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
72a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan rgyal ba 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/
72a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu sman ras gzigs shes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ tshig
72a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
72a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs
72a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur zhing / bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med
72a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rdzogs par 'tshang bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kan dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu
72a7(dkon brtsegs): spyan ras gzigs 'di ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
72a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur de'i tshe/ 'di yang der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas shing
72b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
72b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa
72b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
72b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong de yang du sa gzhan zhig na/ bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas par rab tu 'byung bar
72b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan
72b6(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par rdzo tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
72b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/ smras pa bcu
72b8(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho na ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lung bstan te// da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ci lta ba de bzhin nyid ci lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang
73a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yin pas/ de bzhin nyid da la ni lung bstan te/ da kar gyi de bzhin nyid tsa lta ba de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de//
73a2(dkon brtsegs): bu yin pas de bzhin nyid de la ni 'phel ba yang med la/ yongs su 'grib pa yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga'
73a3(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ shod cig kun nub par gyis shig/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang // da ltar dang sa 'ongs pa'i byang chub
73a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba rjes su yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan
73a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
73a6(dkon brtsegs): bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi
73a7(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / mos pa dang / mos nas kyang yi ger
73a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang // gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa/ de dag ni bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su
73b1(dkon brtsegs): zin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
73b2(dkon brtsegs): dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
73b3(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa lha'i bu ded dpon gyi zhus
73b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin na mi tra dang su ran tra bo dang / phra nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de yaM shes
73b5(dkon brtsegs): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#rgya gar skad du/ Ar me'i te ya ma he sing ha na da ni// na ma ma hA ya na su ta/ bo skad du/ 'phags pa dkon
73b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog pa rtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
73b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska des bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon ming sa
73b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
74a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / byams pa las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bu stong dang /
74a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston no// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
74a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
74a4(dkon brtsegs): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan
74a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang /
74a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris
74a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
74a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am ta rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas ji ltar
74b1(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bgyi/ ci ltar spyad par bgyi/ ci ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po la 'di skad
74b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung legs so legs so// 'od srung khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su snying btso ba
74b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su 'bri ba sems dpa' ni yang khyod
74b4(dkon brtsegs): legs so// 'od srung de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
74b5(dkon brtsegs): no// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
74b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas/ legs pa'i gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdam
74b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / phyogs phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tu tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ya
74b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par blangs te bslab par bya'o// bskam chags med pa dang // tshul chos pa med pa dang // kha sag med pa dang // gzhogs spong med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba
75a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / rnad pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa med pa dang / dam shes pa dang ldan pa dang // khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dzes pa dang ldan par bya'o/
75a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / 'khor ba la rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la
75a3(dkon brtsegs): phan yon du blta bar bya zhing / shing drung 'dug kyang rung / ri la 'dug kyang rung / gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung phug na 'dug kyang rung / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las
75a4(dkon brtsegs): yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa
75a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum
75a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i
75a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa/ yon tan gyi chos sam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gnal du med pa dang / ma
75a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa/ bden pa gsung ba/ yang dag par gsung ba/ ci skad gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa/ 'phags pa sman pa chen po/ zug rngu 'byin pa ma gsol bar bshes
75b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen mdzad pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa ded dpon chen po yin te/ de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa/ zab pa zab par snang ba/ zhi bzhi par ston pa/ sems can med pa/ 'khrul
75b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma yang dag par chad pa/ smon pa med pa/ smon pa dang bral ba/ spros pa med pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtog par
75b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba/ nye bar gtod pa/ dngos po dang bral ba/ bden pa bden pa bral ba/ dngos po med pa/ dngos po ma gos pa// rgyu ba med pa rgyu ba yang dag par chad pa/ 'gro
75b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa dang bral ba/ rlom sems med pa/ kun tu bstan pa nye ga med pa/ kun tu bstan pa rnyog pa med pa/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ blang ba med
75b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dor ba med pa/ sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/ sred pa yang dag par chad pa/ ston par mdzad yang dag pa ston par mdzad pa yin no// zhes rnam pa las yid la bye'o// 'od srad de
75b6(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jogs la zhugs pas ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa las yid la bye ste/ bdag gis me'i lus thob
75b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rab tu byung ba dang / bsten par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang thob/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang mnyes par byas pas na/ bdag le lo byed pa dang /
75b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'jidzis g.yen skyo zhing gnas pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa med pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang
76a1(dkon brtsegs): ma pa'i gnas de lta bu yang song sa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum par 'i ma tog ltar brgya la brgya las//
76a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de ltar na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// zhes
76a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong gis khyod dang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/ 'od srung 'di ltar khyod
76a4(dkon brtsegs): nga ma mthong ba thos pas 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi rjesu slob pa na rab tu 'byung ba ni 'od srung khyod chos
76a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du mthong zhing mthong nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
76a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag gi rab tu byung ba de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
76a7(dkon brtsegs): mo don gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas ni legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar khas blang bar bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe 'di la 'bras bu 'thob par
76a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang // ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'od srung de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
76b1(dkon brtsegs): gos ngur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po khas blang ste/ bslab pa rnams blangs nas/ gnas khang du song ngas phug tu
76b2(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang / rnam 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag
76b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lhung zed dang / chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang / 'dza' shes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/
76b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'di snyam du yang sems te/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen mi rig rnams par mi rtogs so// snyam du yang sems so// 'od srang gang gi tshe dge
76b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / 'chags na 'dag kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag
76b6(dkon brtsegs): gang rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la rnam par byed pa de'i tshe/ gnas kha ma phug gam/ 'chag sa de na
76b7(dkon brtsegs): lha gang dag g.yag ma gnyug mar gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de'i senas/ shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi phyir legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
76b8(dkon brtsegs): ba la rab tu byung la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so// snyam nas yid sa rangs pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
77a1(dkon brtsegs): mingam bde ba gyur te/ da srung de la skang bdag las cag na sprul bar yang byed// tsag gis ni snga ma yin par riganas/ byang du gas
77a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khod par yang byed do// 'od srung ltos dge ba'i rtsa ba cung ngu dang / shes pa chung ngu dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi sems shes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye
77a3(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa nas legs spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'amathugs sum
77a4(dkon brtsegs): chud pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus las rnam par
77a5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba dang / brjod par mi bya ba'i shes bya rnam lnga la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing the tsom dang bral yin no// 'od srung de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
77a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas bdag nyid la rag lus par shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis
77a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen la/ gang dag phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems thugs kyi
77a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas na/ bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge sbyong gi chos rkun mi bya'o// zhes bslab par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun ga
77b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na// bzhi po 'di dag ni dge slong gi chom rkun yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'od srung 'di la dge slong dge slong gi kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs la gnas shing de yang tshul khrims
77b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa dang / sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom kun dang po yin no// dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam
77b3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom kun gnyis pa yin no// bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang tshigs su
77b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkan gsum pa yin no//
77b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod par byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chos kun bzhi pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin no// 'od srung mi gtum pa
77b6(dkon brtsegs): brlang ba drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs chen rnogs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung skyes bu des 'dzam bu gling
77b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas sdigs sam/ mtshon gyis btab 'am// khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ bar bar byas nas nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod mgron bu dang
77b8(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / non bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim/
77b9(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang bza' ba dang bti dang / mal na dang / stan gyi nye bar spyod pa dang // yongasu spyad pa dang / dge' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod rdza
78a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin
78a2(dkon brtsegs): bamang du snyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das
78a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste// gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/
78a4(dkon brtsegs): de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing /
78a5(dkon brtsegs): za na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na// de ni de nas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang po skyed de/ de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i
78a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po ma bzod pa skyed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas rten 'od srang chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du
78a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas dpe bstan pas/ bstan pa'i gnas bka' stsal pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dpe rin po che de lta bu thos na/ su shig 'bras
78a8(dkon brtsegs): bum thob par ban dad pas stsal bcang snod gang tsam yang len par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'ang srung dade bzhin no// ji skad
78b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin te// mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bus gnas par bya zhing 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa chu snod gang tsam yang blang bar mi bya'o// 'od srung ma
78b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis bya ches brlang ba/ ches drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/
78b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung mi des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam// mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te phar bar byas nas
78b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod ba'agron bu dang / gser dang nor bu dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang man shal dang / byi ru dang swa sbram dang / dngul dang rin po che sna tshogs dang khang
78b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang / gzhon pa dang / gos dang bza' ba dang / btung dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs
78b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhi phrogs te khyer par gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa ma bskyed snyam 'am/
78b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
78b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang /
79a1(dkon brtsegs): chags su bcang ba 'ad pas bris kyis non pa sha gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin par khas 'chi bar byed cing / na
79a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyad par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa/
79a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// 'od srung gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa longs spyod pa longs spyod rnams lta zhog
79a4(dkon brtsegs): gi/ 'od srang mi gsum pa ches shin tu gtum pa/ ches shin tu brlang pa/ ches shin tu drag shal gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu nyam stobs dang ldan pa/ ches bzhin
79a5(dkon brtsegs): tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung mi des stong chu ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag dbyug
79a6(dkon brtsegs): pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu
79a7(dkon brtsegs): tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / gzhon pa dang / gos
79a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bza' ba dang btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
79b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom zhig phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
79b2(dkon brtsegs): mang du skyed lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/
79b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing / so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/ de rnyed pa dang / bskur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas
79b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi 'ong ba yin por khas che bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyad par byed na/ de ni de bas ches
79b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed do// de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no// 'od srung stong na du phra mo'i 'jig
79b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srung mi bzhi pa ches shin tu rab tu gtum pa/ ches shin tu
79b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu blang ba/ ches shin tu rab tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ chos shin tu rab tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches bzhin tu rab tu stobs chen po'i shags dang ldan
79b8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung mi des stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
80a1(dkon brtsegs): da/ pa # na ga /
80a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du gyis bsdu che bapa par bya nas// bar snang pa yangs byung bza pa dang / gas nga ra bru dang / mu TIg dang bdun dang dung dang / mangs
80a3(dkon brtsegs): byir+ya dang / sa la sgram dang / dngub dang / ring po na sna chags dang / khang khyim dang gnon pa dang / gos dang / bda' ba dang / 'dung ba dang / mal ma dang / snyan gyi na pa
80a4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i bde ba'i yod byed ci snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrog te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mar
80a6(dkon brtsegs): du skyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyed mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ gang dag bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so
80a7(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bskur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa
80a8(dkon brtsegs): yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis bdag dgra bcom pa yang dag yin par shes par bya'o// snyam nas dgra bcom pa steng nus 'byung
80b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar steng du 'byung bar byed/ dgra bcom pa dpe ston pa ltar dpe ston par yang byed la/ de ltar sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu dang ldam pas tha na gzhan gyis dad pas
80b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pasan gyi na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/ de ni
80b3(dkon brtsegs): de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no// 'od srung de lta bas na gang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i
80b4(dkon brtsegs): yod byed thams cad 'phrog par spro ba de ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bus des dad pas byin pa yongasu longs spyod par byed de/ 'od srung ngas ni sdig can gyi 'dod
80b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de las gzhan pa rab tu byung ba'i chos shin tu tha chad gcig shos gzhan ma mthong ngo // 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni nyin thos pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig la 'dod
80b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi rigs
80b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni nyan thos kyi thegs pa po rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa ma yin no// gang du 'ga' zhig la
80b8(dkon brtsegs): smod par byed na/ cher na mya ngan las 'das pa la smod par byed na yang / de yang sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te// de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas dge slong
81a1(dkon brtsegs): dag na ci na thang ba ldag ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ skad cig tsam skye ba la yang bsngags pa mi brjod do zhes ston te/
81a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po dri dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang
81a3(dkon brtsegs): zag du 'dzin pa dang / bslab po las 'da' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/ rab tu byung bas de
81a4(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyi sa thams cad du mi bya'o/ 'od srung dge sbyong dang bram ze 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa sdig pa'i 'dod pa med pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ drang po'i rang
81a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can g.yo med pa/ smyan can ma yin pa/ khengs pa med pa / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa rnams kyi ched du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par
81a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'od srung de dag dbugs 'byin par byed pa brjod par bya ste/ de thos na rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor
81a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dag dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
81a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byos/ ri
81b1(dkon brtsegs): mo byas/ mchod pa byas pa pas ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gi dang pas byin pas
81b2(dkon brtsegs): tha na nu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gis byas par gyur na/ de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung po ces rgya cher bar 'gyur gyi/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
81b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bskar sti dbyas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par
81b4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de la ni de lta ma yin no// 'od srung ci ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa des gang gi drang na chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyad
81b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i don de yongs su nyams par byed pa de lta bu ni dgra bo dang / gshed ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so//
81b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyen mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa lnga de dag dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na
81b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog gi chos nyid dang ldan pa dang /
81b8(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo ste thos nas tshul khrims kyi nyes pa 'byin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das sam/ bslab pa
82a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das sam/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'chal bar byed cing / rnam par 'byed par mi byed 'chags par mi byed pa dang / shes shing rtogs
82a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs cha phra ba rnams yin te/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs
82a3(dkon brtsegs): ba cha phra ba de dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste dper na mda' phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge
82a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa ste bzhi po
82a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu byung brgyags shing bag med pare/
82a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing mang du thos pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang /
82a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bskur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas rgyags shing de rnyed pa dang / bskur sti dang / tshigasu bcad pas zil gyis non pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang /
82a8(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bshes kyis khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags shing de mdza' be shes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster nga'i khyim gyis lpags pas bag med par
82b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags shing sbyangs man tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pas rgyags shing sbyangs pa'i bdag la stong par
82b2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gzhan la smod par byed pa ni byed pa ni bag med pa zhes bya ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu 'byung ba rgyags
82b3(dkon brtsegs): shing bag med par de dag dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas rten 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gas
82b4(dkon brtsegs): totatabacom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge sbyong dge sbyong ltar bcos pa/ ngur smig 'tshal ba gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba
82b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs me nis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pany+tsi Sh+yadi nub par bgyid par 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ de skad
82b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongs
82b7(dkon brtsegs): su dris pas khyod la ci byas thong shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mi blun po de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin par
82b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / g.yo dang chom kun dang / phyin ci log dang bdud kyi nyes pa dang // bdud kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi skyon yang dag pa thams cad brjod cing yang dag par
83a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad par gyur na/ 'od khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi sdig pa'i kun spyod pa de dag thos na/ yang dag pa ma yin yang snang bar mi 'gyur
83a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ci nas kyang /
83a3(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung de bzhin
83a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung gis gsol ba bcom
83a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhags par bzhugs su gsol// de
83a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed cig gis mi blun
83a7(dkon brtsegs): po de dag la cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos bstan tu zin kyang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dod pa dang / sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba 'am bzlog par
83a8(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod do// 'o srung gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro 'am/ sems can bsam pa dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa la gus pa
83b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa skyed par 'gyur ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
83b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang bcas pa/ brag dang ri bo'i zom dang bcas pa rgya mtsho dang / nu klung
83b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par phrag pa 'am/ spyi bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes kyi
83b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par mi spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgya shu ga gam/ til lam/ 'bras bu gcig gis bskal
83b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'tshe bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i su las de dag nyan par
83b6(dkon brtsegs): mi spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal pa'i zhugs chen po 'bar du kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched
83b7(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i nang du spyod lam bzhi bdag gis dgung lo bye ba snyed du gnas par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi
83b8(dkon brtsegs): par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyon par ni mi spro lags so// bcom ldan 'as bdag sems can thams cad las khro ba dang / skyo ba dang / spad pa dang / bshung ba dang /
84a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa dang / brtsegs pa dag bzod pas dang du len par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mi blun pos chos kyi
84a2(dkon brtsegs): rkun po chos kyi chom kun pa chos la mun tshor smrab chos ltar bcos pa/ ston pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
84a3(dkon brtsegs): nyits+tsha ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ de lta bu'i khur 'degs pa'i rngo mi thog lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i khur 'deg par rngo thog
84a4(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di la bdag dpe brjod pa spogs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig rgas shing 'dug
