84a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'khogs par gyur cing // de yang na chod dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam lags par gyur la/ mi de bro nad kyis thebs shing glo ba mi bde nas/ mchis mal gyi khri steng du
84a6(dkon brtsegs): cig ces smras te// de'i sug par gter te btams na// mi de ni gter de blangs nas/ legs par sbed pa dang / bsrung bar bgyid cing mi de slar mchis nas kyang gter de
84a7(dkon brtsegs): skar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' das pa'i chos kyi gter 'dams par bgyid na/ de ni bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig zag
84a8(dkon brtsegs): mang por yang chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po la yang sman 'dogs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung dang / chos kyi gdung dang / dgen 'dun gyi gdung rgyun gyi
84b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpas gang yongs su bsgrub par bgyid pa'i bgyi ba de dang / don de yongs su sgrub par rdzom
84b2(dkon brtsegs): thogs lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'khor 'di nyid ngas te/ mngon par chis lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
84b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la bka' stsol cig dang / 'dis ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs
84b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrub pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
84b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam su pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdo/
84b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs byi ngo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu thu bog
84b7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de ni rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal srid bgyid du stsal bar gyur pa lags pas/ de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin du yang /
84b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing tshes dang ldan par yang 'gyur la/ de 'di snyam du yang sems lags te// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i
85a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od tu ni/ bdag gis rgyal po bgyi'o snyam nas/ dbugs 'byin pa thob par yang 'gyur zhing / 'di ltar rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang lags pa de
85a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang mngon par brtson par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di yang
85a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi rgyal srid chen po bgyid du stsol par 'gyur pa lags pas/ 'dis ni dam pa'i chos kun tu srung ba la mngon par brtson par bgyi 'tshal
85a4(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rten 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung legs so legs so//
85a5(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag
85a6(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub pa'i phyog 'jam pa mchog tu mnyen pa bya ka len dka ltar reg na bde ba rgya skegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i mdog 'dra ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
85a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa'i mgo bor bzhag ste/ byugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur
85a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/ dam pa'i chos kun tu srung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
85b1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir spro bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa
85b2(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi mdog can bzhag ma thag du/ de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu
85b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/
85b4(dkon brtsegs): sa bla ba dang / bar snang la gnas pa dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la/ 'phags
85b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang
85b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / yongs su gzung bar spro bar mdzod cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub
85b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bu mo g.yas pa'i lha nga wa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
85b8(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gcig gi don gyi
86a1(dkon brtsegs): slad du yang slad ma'i mtha' bu'i bar du 'khor bar yang sgro lags na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/
86a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di
86a3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu srung ba dang / rgyas par bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa sa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lgang sa la gtsugs ma thag tu/ de nas
86a4(dkon brtsegs): yang stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drag du rab tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam
86a5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni su la yang 'gran par mi bgying / nga rgyal mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
86a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sug las lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas khur gang 'deg par
86a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i khur de lta bu de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'deg par rngo ma thog pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so// ci ltar de'i spyan sngar khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra
86b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams seng po
86b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra skrag shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di
86b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mchis kyi skye ba// glen pa blun po rnyed pa
86b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bkur sti 'tshal ba/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdub mdza' shes kyi sngam pa dang / slongs mo'i ster ba'i sdum pa la gdu' ba/ gsod nyams la sbyor bar brtson pa/ de dag gi nongs
86b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas bdag la stsal du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis rgya de dag thos na// de dag rtog pas myur bar spyod par bgyid cing / nongs
86b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag las bdag nyid bsrung par bgyid pa dang / skyes bu dam pa lags pa de dag las kyang le la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing de bzhin gshegs pas
86b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag rtogs so// rab tu rtogs so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dang bskyed par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
86b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyor la ying la lung shig dang / skyes drangs ba'i
87a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag gnyis pa'i gnas gang yin pa chung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya ba tha ma la byang chub
87a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag bshad par bya'o// byams pa snyems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpar/
87a3(dkon brtsegs): khas 'che bar yin par rig par bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na snyed pa 'dod pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / yang ba'i mtsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa yin te/ byams
87a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o// byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha
87a5(dkon brtsegs): ma pa la byang chub sems dpa' khas 'che ba/ khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na khyi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim
87a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig du khyi gzhan zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na/ khyim 'di ni bdag gi khyim yin no// de la gzugs par byed/ mkhyen skad 'byin khro bas lta bar byed/
87a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyis nyes pa skyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag byams pa de bzhin du phyi
87a8(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi khyim dang /
87a9(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed nas kyang yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ dge slong
87b1(dkon brtsegs): des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der dge slong gzhan zhig 'ong ba mthong na/ de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no// snyam nas/ khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems skyed par byed/ 'thab mo dang /
87b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa skyed par byed/ phan tshun dben gyi tshig smra bar byed// tshig rtsub por brjod par byed/ gcig la gcig dge slong che mo zhes bya
87b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do// dge slong mang de mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do// zhes mi snyan par brjod par byed cing khyim bdag la yang gal te khyod kho bo
87b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sten par 'dod na/ dge slong che ge mo zhig dang sten par mi bya zhing / dge slong mang de mo zhig dang yang ma sten cig ces zer te/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur 'gyur pa ring
87b5(dkon brtsegs): du mi gnas pa smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyed pa yin yin no// de dag ni yi dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos kun tu spyod cing / dbul ba dang /
87b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dman pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te// byang chub sems dpa' ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed
87b7(dkon brtsegs): cing bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa kun tu spyod pa yin bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod pa/ sangs
87b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod cing byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ gzhan dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod nas zas dang gos sgrub par
88a1(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ byabs pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrag cing seng ge'i sgra bsgrag cing seng ge'i las rnams bya'i rigs pa/ wa'i sgra sgrogs shing wa
88a2(dkon brtsegs): las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun mi ring ba yongs su gtong bar mi byed la
88a3(dkon brtsegs): ser snas non cing yod byed kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis gtong ba'i phyi rol tu byas pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing gnod sems
88a4(dkon brtsegs): dang tha ba dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang / bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / gcig tu gnod sems kyis sems su byed pa dang / bsdu
88a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po bzhi po de dag gi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing sems can 'ga' yang sbyin pa 'am/ snyan par sla ba 'am/ don spyod pa 'am/ don mthun par sdad
88a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa de dag ci ci tsam du mi bzad par 'gyur ba ltos/ de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par blang ba dang
88a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i spyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na//
88a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / chos shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang / da
88b1(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag 'das pa'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su
88b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig/
88b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ste/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/ de bar na da ltar khyad rang bzhin du snyig ma lnga dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo //
88b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos shes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ de bzhin
88b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur te/ de grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor de dag du song ste/
88b6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / chos ston par byed cing / rgyal po dang blon po dag dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas
88b7(dkon brtsegs): shes par byas/ yongs su shes par byas so// de khyim gang du zhugs shing / gang las tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / gza' ba dang gtung ba
88b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur pa'i khyim der ni/ de lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems bskyed par mi byed do// de 'jungs pa dang ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gan
89a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag tu song zhing de dag du son pa na/ de la de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/ de dag tshig snyan pa yang mi rjod pa'i steng du de la khro bar
89a2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ gshe bar byed na yang de bzod pa'i go bgos shing snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la/ khyim de dag du yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi blar yang mi 'gyur
89a3(dkon brtsegs): ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des khyim gang dag dad par byas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang /
89a4(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gis nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyu ro// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar mi byed
89a5(dkon brtsegs): cing / 'gro bar sems skyed par mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag la pa phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems bskyed par byed snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
89a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pam+b+ha lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de
89a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar
89a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho bar byas nas de dag du lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang / 'jungs pa dang ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag dad par byed cing de dag khro zhing /
89b1(dkon brtsegs): gshen yang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa nyid dang / chog shes pa nyid dang
89b2(dkon brtsegs): nges pa nyid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/ byams pa de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim bdag dad pas byas shing / gzhan gyi nye bar 'tshe bar byed kyi/
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
89b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du khyod nyid yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur to//
89b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'gras mos pa de'i rjengs su bslab par yang bya/ de las gzhan bI
89b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gis rjes su yang bslab par bya zhing / de dag gi chos kun tu spyad par yang bya'o/ byams pa yang phyi ni
89b7(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'di ltar ste snyed pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
89b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi khyim rnams su dang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ni mi yin te/ de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang / 'byed pa/
90a1(dkon brtsegs): dang btsung pab rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// de dag ni ci ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yid rangs par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni/
90a2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar ma yin la/ tsaM skar gzhan dag gi rnyeng pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin no// byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag
90a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par bya ba yin na/ de dag ci tsam du phyin ci log du 'gyur ba ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams 'di ltar
90a4(dkon brtsegs): des ni bdag gis sems can thams la bde ba skyed par bya'o// zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nan/
90a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gcig la bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa de/ le lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos brtson rar bcug par gyur na/ byams pa
90a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon na po khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ci lta bu dag gis rgyal po'i btson der 'jug par bdun par 'gyur snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsa
90a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das doni 'di ltar bu cig bdang bar
90a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i bsam pas 'dag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas srung du thar par brgya'o// snyam nas bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa khan dag gis btsan der 'dug pa zhin
90b1(dkon brtsegs): thar pa yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'jung bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa ngas dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa'i yin te/
90b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni don kyang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po'i brtson ra de ji lta ba bzhin du 'di ni 'khor ba'i btson ra blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste/
90b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na chod dpon nam khyim bdag de ci ltar ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na bu gcig pa de ci lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems
90b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba bltar bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi
90b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin zhing / ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi/ bu cig pa de'i don du brtson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ci lta ba de bzhin du ni byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gos kyi tshe/
90b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsod snyoms kyi tshad du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba lta bar
90b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi mi 'das lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dge slong lus ma sgoms pa sems ma sgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma sgoms pa shes rab ma skams pa/
90b8(dkon brtsegs): cig 'byung bar 'gyur te// de dag ni chos gos dang / shA snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes
91a1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / zlas las kyi sa gnas mas pa / sa/ byangs bdan blang bamanam na tha rgyu thar byan
91a2(dkon brtsegs): zan dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o// byams pa dge slong khyims rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas na chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya bam gtogs par skyes gzhan bkur bar mi byaste/
91a3(dkon brtsegs): des ni mang du thos pa dang gzung shid tu nags pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / nam chags med pa dang // lcags gas med pa dang / bdag gis bye ba med par bya zhing / chos
91a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba bskyed nas khyib rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// khyim rnams su song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul
91a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / bdod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par khang khyim gyi ched/
91a6(dkon brtsegs): dam/ zhing las kyi ched ngas/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam 'am/ rgyal po'i gtam 'am/ chom rkun gyi gtam 'am/ grong gi gtam 'am/ grong khyer gyi gtam 'am/ stong
91a7(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'am/ bu'i gtam 'am/ bu mor gtam 'am gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi byara'o// byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzidzin po chom
91a8(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyis yongs su kang ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma nig ma byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
91b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams su kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na/ nor bu rin po che phung po de tsam dang / bde
91b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse ba'am/ phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi/ de tshig bzhi pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig
91b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan du bcug ste/ de yang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi/ re shig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo
91b4(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyas pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba chen po shin tu mang du byed pa yin no// byams pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka'
91b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing / 'dra ci tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par btson par byed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa
91b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar ga ser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu dag gam/ rin po che dag gam/ mu tig gam/ bai dur+ya dag dang / dung dag gam/ byi ru dag gas/ bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag
91b7(dkon brtsegs): gis ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongasu thar bar mi 'gyur/ sems can no ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongasu thar par mi 'gyur/
91b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dga' ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jug pa'i chos can rnams kyang na ba dang / 'ching dang /
92a1(dkon brtsegs): byangan dang / smre sngags 'dun pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi 'de ba dang / 'jug pa dag las yongs su thar bar ma 'gyur gyi/ chos
92a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pas ni sems cad skye bo'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur la/ sems can na pa'i chos can rnams kyang nang rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur/
92a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang 'khrug pa dag la
92a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de las dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces stong chen po 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis/ bkang ste gang la sbyin
92a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ni/ tshigs bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas// ji ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin// phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis//
92a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi// bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag kun// sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas/ gang gis de las sangs rgyas lug
92a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ni// tshigs bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na// de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te// des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur zhes ston to//
92a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
92b1(dkon brtsegs): dbul bar phul ba bas ni/ snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems can gcig la tshigs bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bsgrags par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang
92b2(dkon brtsegs): du skyed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mi gang zhig gis gang ga'i byed snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams mchog rin chen bkang byas te// dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal
92b3(dkon brtsegs): ba phul ba dang // gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin// rin chen byin pa shin tu rgya chen des/ tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la// char yang mi phong grangs
92b4(dkon brtsegs): su'ang ma yin na/ gnyis sam gsum bsam/ dug la yod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams
92b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu 'thun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/
92b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na phyag g.yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu yog par mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad la bde
92b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub par mdzad cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos// rin po che 'dod
92b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la ni rin po rnams dang / gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang / tha ma med pa nas/
93a1(dkon brtsegs): sa nas
93a2(dkon brtsegs): sa su
93a3(dkon brtsegs): pangs pas da kyis kyang da'i rjes su bslab par bya zhi zung bang zing la gdu bar sa byar/ kyang rgyas la 'du bar bya'o// byams pa yang byas 'am bya ba'i dus sngal
93a4(dkon brtsegs): pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te// de dag gi ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur
93a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing lus ma sngams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma sngams pas sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas kyang nyes pa bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur sems kyi/
93a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin chad sdoms par yang mi byed la/ phyin chad yang dag par bsdams pa'i phyir sdom par yang mi byed do// ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdigs pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir phung
93a7(dkon brtsegs): po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po dag ni lhag par ltung ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i mngon par 'dus byas nas// nyes pa gshegs shing sbyang ba
93a8(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing / phyin chad sdom par ni mi byed do// byams pa gzhan yang nges byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
93b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsal bar byas pas na/ mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas sam/
93b2(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag du yang ltung bar mi nus mod kyi 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du med par bya zhing zem 'dogs
93b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba'i gnas thams cad la yid
93b4(dkon brtsegs): skrag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag rgal nas/ khyed cag thams cad bsgral bar bya'o// grol nas dgrol bar bya'o//
93b5(dkon brtsegs): dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes sems can thams cad la nye bar
93b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'i phyir te// byams pa ngas ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
93b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gi steng na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ci snyed pa dang / khur ci snyed pa dang / dgos pa ji snyed pa dang / don bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ji snyed
93b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de snyed ni sems can 'ga' la yang ma mthong ngo // byams pa 'di lta ste dper na la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phrag dang / ring
94a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho dang / du klung dang / nags 'tshal dang bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gis spyi bo 'am phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ 'di skad/
94a2(dkon brtsegs): ces kye skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags 'tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal
94a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du gdeg par bya zhing gzhag par mi bya/ ngal gso
94a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya'o// zhes kyang bsgo bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i khur de che ba dang / spro ba mthu dang ldan pa dang / mthu stobs mthu dang ldan pa
94a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthu dang ldan
94a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas kyang gang zhig
94a7(dkon brtsegs): gis kye sems can rnams ngas khyed cag la mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o// zhes sems can thams cad nye bar bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
94a8(dkon brtsegs): khur dang / spro ba dang / mthu stobs dang / brtson 'grus ches stobs dang ldan par blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig las/ stong
94b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ci tsam pa de tsam du gyur la/ des sems can thams cad kyi las de dag kyang se
94b2(dkon brtsegs): gol gtogs pa tsam gcig gis yongs su sgrub par byed cing / las kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yongs su rnams par ma gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems//
94b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i las de stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
94b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod
94b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di skad du bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dgrol
94b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// zhes tshig du brjod nas/ las su bya bar byed pa de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na khyim bdag la la zhig pu gcig/
94b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sdug pa dang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba mthong na/ mi 'thun pa med pa zhig bdog par gyur la khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ba' shig gi le lan gyis bu gcig pa dang bcas/
94b8(dkon brtsegs): chung mi dang bcas/ las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang bcas/ nor dang dbyig dang yo byad thams cad dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par
95a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / de nas rgyal po des khyim bdag de la 'di skad du/ ka'i khyim bdag khyod 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum gyi pha rol na/ grong khyer che ge ma
95a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zhig yod par don 'di'i phyir zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la/ cha khyer te phyir zhag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par shog shig/ dang / de lta na ngas khyod kyi bu
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor 'di thams ca dang / nor dang dbyig dang / yod byed 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya zhing gzhan yang
95a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa yang lhag par sbyin par bya'o// gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi phyir ma 'ongs na khyod phyir
95a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs na khyod chung zad kyang sbyin par mi bya ba'i steng du khyod bu gcig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ chad pas gcad pa dang / srog
95a6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bral zhing gsod par bya'o zhes bsgo bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag de de skad bsgo na bdag phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / bu phangs
95a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'khor phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor phangs pa dang ldan pa'i rtsom dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i mgyogs
95a8(dkon brtsegs): pas grong khyer der 'gro bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// bde bar gshegs pa de lhags te// bcom ldan 'das
95a9(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsung ba'i dan bdag gis 'tshal bskur na/ don ngon yangs su ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi byed/ mas kyi 'dus shes sbed par ma rjed
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems bskyed par mi 'gying lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de'i slad rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta zhog lags kyi
95b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid phangs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gal te sems cad thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po de ni byang chub
95b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba'i brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang
95b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni rgyan phyogs su ded pa'i sems can thams cad rgyun las bzlog pa g.yo ba med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rabar 'god par byed pa'i phyir// /
95b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi tsam du stobs dang ldan pa 'di tsam du shugs dang ldan pa 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa 'di tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig
95b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur la/ des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po de dag na chu'i phung po gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por
95b8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur pa'i klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas nu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas/ rgyun las bzlog thams cad kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du phab par
96a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ byams pa 'di snyam du sems/ maud dga' ba byed pa dang / nga mtshar che ba dang / can 'grus che ba yin snyam 'am/ byams pas
96a2(dkon brtsegs): gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya// khyod
96a3(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun tu bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
96a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag sangs rgyas yod do//
96a5(dkon brtsegs): chos yod do// dge 'dun yon do// legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do// zhes nges par rtogs par byed
96a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ches shin tu dka' bar byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyes
96a7(dkon brtsegs): sel bar byed pa dang / gtig mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dkar bar byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba min no// de bas kyang gang dag ladza
96a8(dkon brtsegs): bshes dang / gros grogs dang nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangs shing longs spyod chung ba dang / longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su
96b1(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis khyim gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa
96b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag gis dur smig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par kho nar rab
96b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas/ gdams ngag la nan tan gyis mdze
96b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bus pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dga' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i
96b5(dkon brtsegs): gtam pa la 'jigs par lta zhing dben par 'dod pas/ dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te// gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
96b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang /
96b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag rnam par
96b8(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon par 'du byas nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su thob par byed pa de
97a1(dkon brtsegs): nga bya / na// rnam / ga na 'dus pa la nga
97a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang bstan par rdzogs pa ngag spang gi dngos po dang / 'bras bu thab badzin shin tu dga' ba yin par phyir ro// byags pa de la yang phyima'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya
97a3(dkon brtsegs): them sa dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa can/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa legs par gsungs pa ches 'dus pa 'di la rab tu byung nas/ byang dub
97a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i las spangs te/ byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu
97a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so// nyi shu gang zhe na ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par bya ba dang / gtong ba chen po spel bar bya ba dang /
97a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar bya ba dang /
97a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang / le lo'i sems rnam par gnon par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po brtsams par bya ba dang / brjed ngas pa'i sems yongasu
97a8(dkon brtsegs): spang byar bya ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi rten par bsam gtan du bya ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa sgom par bya ba dang / shes rab kyi
97a9(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pas gnas par bya ba dang / smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /
97b1(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa'i yul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos gnas par bya ba dang / nyan thos
97b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems yid la mi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang / yid ches par bya ba ste/
97b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/ las de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por
97b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar mi nus so// byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong
97b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos kyi ngoms mi shes dang / chos yongs su tshol bas bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// sems can rnams
97b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba thog ma tha ma dang tha med pa las thar par bya'o// sems rgyun gyi khams tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin//
97b7(dkon brtsegs): du gzhugs par bya'o// zhes yang dag par dam bca' ste/ byams pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' ba yin no// byam
97b8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta ste dper na mi sman mkhas la gsang sngags mkhas shing dag dang rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod par gyur la/ de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal
98a1(dkon brtsegs): po che'i mdun du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyed par bya ba'i phyir/ dug za bar byed cing / zos nas kyang yan lag dang gnyid lag rnams shig shig bor/
98a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa las/ yang gsang sngags sngon tu btang ba'i sman za bar byed cing / de gsang sngags yang dag pa dang / sman des sdug gis nyes pa de
98a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / bral bar gyur la/ de nas mi des dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na sman de ma rnyed pas gnyen po ma rnyed pas dug des shi bar gyur la/ de nas mi gcig shos des 'di skad
98a4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras te/ kho bos ni sman gyis dug zhi bar byed nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo la ni ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi dgos/ yan lag dang nying lag shig shig por 'gyur ba
98a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dgos pas/ dug kyang mi za sman yang mi 'thung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gnas pa dang / rab
98a6(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba kha cig de dag 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing / de dag gi sdig pa mngon par 'du bya ba mngon
98a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byas nas yang bshags par bya'o// ltung ba skrag par 'byin par byed cing / phyis sdoms pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'chi ba'i
98a8(dkon brtsegs): can yin no// zhes ngasmras te/ 'chib yang gang zhi na 'di lta ste dper na dug zag pa'i mi de dang 'ad bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ log par lhung ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyum
98b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i thasam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag la ni dug kyang mi dgos/ sman
98b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dgos kyis/ bdag cag ni 'das pa'i dus na sdig pa'i las byas pa zad par bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bye ba ma gtogs par sdig
98b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las kyang mngon par 'du mi bya zhing ltung ba yang mi bya la/ bshags par yang mi bya'o zhes zer te/ byams pa 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni 'di
98b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste bslab pa'i gzhi ci ltar bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas khyed cag gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya'o// byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di lta ste// byang
98b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi kyang bya ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa'
98b6(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byangs pa mi gzo ba nyid dang / brdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang / bslabs pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te/ bzhi po de dag
98b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi bya ba ma yin na/ byang
98b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sa chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na rnyed pa dam
99a1(dkon brtsegs): bskur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lags pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnas gang na gnas pa na/ byang chub sems
99a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig gis kyang 'dug par gyur la/ gal te de dang lhan gcig tu mgu ba dang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes la 'thab pa med pa dang
99a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang ldan pa gnas na ni des der gnas par bya'i/ gal te de de la tha na za ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed na yang des
99a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la thab pa dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o// byams pa byang
99a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad spros sam/ brgyad
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dam/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de snyed cig la spyod pa 'am/
99a7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa dang / dbyig pas brdegs pa 'am/ mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa dang smas pa dang / nyams pa mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam 'am/ byams
99a8(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig cig la spyod sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab na yang bsod nams
99b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa mang du skyed lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ci snyed pa thams cad la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhen/
99b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' tsam la yang tha ba dang zhe sdang dang / gnod sems bskyed par mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa/
99b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyis
99b4(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la spyod sam/ brgyad dam/ dbyigs pas pas brdegs sam/ batshon gyis btab pa gang
99b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par gyur pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de smras pa dang /
99b6(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur te// byams pa byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos de la tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyed par byed na/ gal te byang chub
99b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpal de byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba zhig yin na/ sems ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na bskal par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha bgo bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta
99b8(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na lcags ni lcags nyid kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bod pa 'am/ shing ngam rtswas gcod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
99b9(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos la tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur te/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de ska bas na khyang cag gis gcig la gcig zhes dang bcas pa dang / gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par
100a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// zhes de ltar bslab par bya zhing sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
100a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la yang zhes dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pas gnas
100a4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnod sems la dpa' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni
100a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i stobs dang / mthu phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan bre dag ni g.yo la sten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid
100a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyi khyim la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par
100a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing lhur len mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos lhur len par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zas dang gos gyur med
100a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyid kyi/ bdag ni se na yongs su tshol bar 'byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni phrag dang ser snas kun nas dkris par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gzhan
100a9(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa dag la yid dga' ba dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dge sbyong gi ming lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
100b1(dkon brtsegs): ni dge sbyong gi yon tan dag la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smra ba lhur len par mi bgyid kyi// bdag ni sgrubs pa snying por bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan
100b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni rnyed pa dang / bskur sti la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni don nyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom
100b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgyid pa la mngon
100b4(dkon brtsegs): par brtson pas grong khyer du 'jug par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi slad du tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'arkos
100b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chog shes par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byis pa'i spyod pa la slob par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
100b6(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan dag gi bgyis pa dang / ma bgyis pa dag la so sor rtog par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
100b7(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ltung ba 'ga' yang gleng bar bgyid kyi/ bdag
100b8(dkon brtsegs): ni ngag gi las kyi mtha' sdoms par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slob pa thag ring du mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni so sor bar rapa la slob par bgyid pa dang /
101a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pas 'tsho bar sems par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sngags
101a2(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod cing de la de la dga' ba'i sems skyed par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni chos kyi bsngags pa brjod cing chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa la gnas par
101a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bdag ni dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rten par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyis mthong ba
101a4(dkon brtsegs): bslang du/ tshul 'a chos pas mchi ma 'byin par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byin par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyi ba sna
101a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi 'du 'jis spags te/ gnas par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jis
101a6(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i bgyi ba la dga' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tsog
101a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jogs gi zas dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis par kun tu spyod par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnas dang
101a8(dkon brtsegs): yul cig yong su 'dzin par mi dgyid kyi/ bdag ni ri dgas ltar kun tu rgyu bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsod snyoms la sbyor ba'i rjes
101b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su tshol ba la btson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis nyal bar mi bgyid
101b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ nabadag ni nam gyi cha stong dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni du 'dzi'i spyod yul la brtson
101b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dben pa la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan chung zad tsam gyi mchog shes par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni yon tan
101b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol pas ngoms ma 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyi'i chos rnams la kun tu spyod par gyi/ bdag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrog par bgyid pa dang /
101b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chung zad pa shes pa dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni 'dza' bshes shin tu brte par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyis pa
101b6(dkon brtsegs): mi gzo bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bgyis pa gzo ba dang / bgyis pa tshor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sbyin pa'i lam gyis mdza' bshes su mi bgyid
101b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bcos mar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag
101b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dman pa la mos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub lhar blang gargya
101'a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po la mos par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa ma mchis pa dang / bslab pa lung gus bam
101'a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bslab pa gus pa dang bcas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
101'a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang gzhan la/ smra ba yang gzhan pa'i lce gnyis su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul 'chos pa'i byang
101'a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang zhi ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan
101'a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni nga rgyal gyi nga rgyal bskyed par mi bgyid kyi// bdag ni gdol ba'i bu dang 'dra bar nga rgyal nges par 'joms par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chags
101'a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcas pas bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyid kyi// bdag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang // dad pas stsal pa la lci ba'i 'du shes su bgyid
101'a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul bzhin ma legs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yid la bgyid pa sngon du btang bas/ gdugs pas ma thag kho ra mchis nyal ba dang / rmu ga
101'a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang gnyid kyi bar gyis non par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba bgyid pa dang / bcom lda
101'a9(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni gang zag du lta ba la brten par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam par rtog pa dang /
101'b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul par smra bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni mtshan ma mchis par la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lus
101'b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang // bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis chos ston par mi bgyid kyi/
101'b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos ston par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gi sbyin pas 'dza' bshes pa su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni
101'b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sbyin pas 'dza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag dang gzhan la yongs su gdung bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag la sman pa dang
101'b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la sman pa'i slad du sgrub par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dgon par gnas pa la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ bsod snyoms la 'chos par mi
101'b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid / phyag dar khrod la tshu la 'chos par mi bgyid de// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni spangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par bgyid cing
101'b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la brten pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
101'b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yo su
102a1(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba la brtson pa de ltar seng ge'i sgra 'di sgrogs par byed pa ni/ khyod sngon gyi rgyal po la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
102a2(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag dang yon tan de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin te/ legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas seng ge'i sgra bsgrag
102a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong lnga brgya stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras
102a4(dkon brtsegs): so// dge sbyong chen po dag khyed cag yo byad bstangs pa'i gtam brjod pa'i tshe/ stan las langs te gar dong de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srung
102a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po la dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yo byad
102a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyungs pa'i gtam de lta bu bstan pa'i gnas de dag ni/ srid par dga' ba lags pas/ bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yon tan de dag
102a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par mi snang bas bdag cag phyir khyim du 'dong gor ma chag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad pas byin pa ni reg par dga' zhing sbyang bar dka' ba'i phyir ro//
102a8(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems dpa'i slad du'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legaso leg so//
102b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dad pas byin pa la yongs su longs spyod par mi spro ba dag gis de ltar 'dzem pa dang ldan pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ nyin gcig la lan brgya rab tu
102b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba phyir spangs pa ni bla'i/ tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pas dad pas byin pa la longs spyod pa ni de ltar ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur
102b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas stsal pa/ ji ltar rjes su gnang bar mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
102b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal ngas ni rigs pa dang grol ba la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//
102b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sbyor cig rtsol cing / 'bod cig sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni rnyed par dga' ba yin pas khyed cag rab tu byung ba las phyir mi ldog shig/ de nas
102b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur po la dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag gis ji ltar sbyor bar bgyi lags/ 'jam
102b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis ci ltar sbyor ba dang / 'bad pa dang / rtsol bar byed pa na chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'byed
102b8(dkon brtsegs): byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'gog par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang thob par mi byed/ chos 'ga' bsang spong bar mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang 'dzi
103a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'phel bar mi byed pa de ltar sbyor bar gyis shig/ dge slong gang de ltar sbyor ba de ni chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): gang chos 'ga' yong rtogs par mi 'gyuraro/ ba de ni gar yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo // gang la 'gro ba med pa de la ni 'ong ba yang med do//
103a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa'i dge slong zhes bya ste/ gang du yang rten pa yang ma yin/ mi rten pa yang ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga
103a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
103a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe bla ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ci snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
103a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'od srung gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ste// zas dang gos lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul
103a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa dag ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po
103a8(dkon brtsegs): la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du/ gnas gang dang / spyod pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyams chung ba dang / tshul 'chos
103a9(dkon brtsegs): pa lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dge legs pa legs par bshad du du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas de dag thos nas
103b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sun tshogs pa gang dag lhags pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyang srung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
103b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' to// 'od srung phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sdig
103b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grog pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa'i nyam chung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra gdung rnams la me tog dang / bdug pa dang phye ma dang /
103b4(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / me tog 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / mar me'i sprin dag gis mchod pa'i las la
103b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus par 'gyuraro// 'od srung ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pas rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na// mi
103b6(dkon brtsegs): blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i
103b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na de dag ni nga'i sgra gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par
103b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// zhes de skad ces gsungs na/ 'od bsrung mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor kyang spangs/ spong ba yang spangs/ lung nod pa yang spangs/ kha ton bya ba
104a1(dkon brtsegs): yang spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing de dag la brten nas/ 'tshor bar sems par byed/
104a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ltos/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i phung po nas bzung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
104a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste/ mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam/ btsugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ mar me bus
104a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa gcig shos kyis mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon gyi drung nas/
104a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung mnos te/ kha ton byed cing gom pa mdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de/ de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par
104a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dang / bdugs pa dang / phye ma dang / spos
104a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lo 'bum gyi bar du nyid lan gsum bya bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi'i gtam
104a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'jigs cing skrag pa gzhan zhig khams sum thams kyis 'jigs shing sems can gyi don mngon par bsgrub pa na/ dgon par mngon par phyogs te gom
104b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa te/ de bas bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'od bsrung 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal ka'i
104b2(dkon brtsegs): ched mA/ rjod pa'i ched du de skad gsung ba ma yin grang snyam na/ 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ ci ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni nga la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro// 'ong
104b3(dkon brtsegs): srang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba/ tshad med pa dang / bsam
104b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna
104b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shes bya ba rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi
104b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegaso ba me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen
104b7(dkon brtsegs): po ni bye ba 'bum phrag dag bcu rtsa drug du gyur to// 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/
104b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te/ 'od srung rgyal po su khyud de la bu ni dpa' pa rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sder rab
105a1(dkon brtsegs): 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to// 'od srung rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu stong po de dag gi rjes la de'i pang par chos shes bya ba dang / chos
105a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'u gnyis shig rdzus te skyes par gyur to// 'od srung rgyal po mu khyud des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi
105a3(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang bcas 'di la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang /
105a4(dkon brtsegs): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bya ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la yang zhag bdun bdun 'das shing
105a5(dkon brtsegs): chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang phul lo// gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag la kha zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de bu dag kyang phul
105a6(dkon brtsegs): lo// gang dang gang dag ji lta ji lta bu 'dod pa de dang de dag gi gtsugs lag khang yid du 'ong ba de dang de lta bu dag kyang rtsig du bcug go// dge slong re re la yang
105a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chags sa dang / bskyed mos 'tshal dang / bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo// 'od srung 'di ltar rgyal po rtsa
105a8(dkon brtsegs): khyud bzangs kho ra khor yug du dpag tshad brgyad bcu yod pa ngos bzhi khang mig can du shin tu 'brel ba/ bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa legs par byas pa shin tu
105b1(dkon brtsegs): zin par byas pa/ 'phrul 'khor gyi srad bus yongs su sbyangs pa/ byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas
105b2(dkon brtsegs): bde khang rangs de dag na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ 'khrul 'khor gyi srang bu de dag gi shugs kyis khang bzangs de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam pa du mi'i char dag kyang
105b3(dkon brtsegs): bab po// me tog de dag gis khang bzangs de dag pus mo nub tsam du gang bar yang gyur ro// 'od srung de ltar rgyal po mu khyud nges de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
105b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang / bde ba'i yod byed thams cad
105b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskar sti byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas so// 'od srud de nas lo brgyad khrid bzhi stong po de dag 'das pa'i phyi te/ nyin par de bzhin
105b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad lags pa'i 'og tu khye'u chos dang chos bzangs gnyis dpung gi tsho gas yan lag bzhi po thams cad dang bcas te/
105b7(dkon brtsegs): bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs de'i spyan sngar btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la
105b8(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis zhus pa 'di skad ces yongs su zhus so// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis yun ring po 'di srid du dge slo ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnam pa mang po 'ang/
106a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon cing yongs su gtugs te/ gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dang / longs spyod dang / dge ba'i
106a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/ 'od srung de ltar khye'u de gnyis su gdugs me thag du de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
106a3(dkon brtsegs): de rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten dus g.yos pa chen po yang byung bar gyur to// 'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i bsnyen
106a4(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba thub dka' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
106a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol te/
106a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ ci'i slad du na khye'u 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis
106a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur lags/ 'od srud de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur pa thub dka' la
106a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gtam de lta bu yongasu zhus pas khyod la ci bya/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam
106b1(dkon brtsegs): pab ci lta bu dang / zab mo la bzod pa sgom pa ci lta bu dang / snying rje chen po ci lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na/
106b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di mongs par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des/ nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i
106b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu khyod longs rdo la khye'u 'di gnyis slongs te// rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus ston cig/
106b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des de la khye'u gcig lag pa g.yas pas blangs la khye'u gcig shos lag pa g.yon pas blangs te/ gyen du 'phang do snya
106b5(dkon brtsegs): na gdegs par ma nus so// de yang rgya chen mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang spro ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par bstan cing gyen du 'phang ngo snyam
106b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ tha na de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar ma nus so// 'od srung de ltar des khye'u de gnyis shin tu 'phang par bskyed
106b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang / ri dang / rtsa dang shing dang / chu dang / bcas pa de rab tu g.yos shing bla 'og du 'gul
106b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur kyang khye'u de gnyis bslang bar ni ma nu so// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe nyan thos chen po'i'i sems yang
107a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi mthu nye bar bsgrub par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gri mthu nye bar bsgrubs pa des dge slong sred med kyi bu
107a2(dkon brtsegs): des 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'gul ba dang / g.yos pa dang rab tu 'khrugs pa dang / bla 'og tu 'gul bar byas kyang / tha na khye'u de
107a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo ba 'am/ 'gul bar byas mi nus so// 'od srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
107a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi rdza
107a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su nyams pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags grangs/ de ci'i slad du zho na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis khye'u skyes nas
107a6(dkon brtsegs): ring po ma lags pa byis pa'i gzugs su mchis pa/ lus bong chung ngu 'di gnyis kyis/ dogs la gtugs pa yang bslang bar rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces
107a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des dge slong srang med kyi bu khyod ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su ma nyams
107a8(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi// 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi bslabs 'di na bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par
107b1(dkon brtsegs): dkrug pa 'am/ bsam par sla ba ma yin te/ sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di
107b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na ngas da ltar khyod nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan par gyur cing / de tsam du rdza 'phrul
107b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi che ba dang / de tsam du mthu che ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rnam par 'phrul
107b4(dkon brtsegs): ba byas kyang / de dag gis khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba 'am/ bsgral bar mi nus so// 'od srung de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des tshig de skad
107b5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa na/ 'khor de nas srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa byang chub tu sems skyed cing de dag 'di
107b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa kho na yin yang / gang
107b7(dkon brtsegs): lanyan thos chen po 'di dag de rdugs par byas te/ bkod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis rlabs de lta bu
107b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o// snyam du sems shing de ltar yang dag par shes pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
108a1(dkon brtsegs): po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
108a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa
108a3(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs deg la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna
108a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bslang bar mdzad cing khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa rab tu rnam pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba yang
108a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol/ 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe se gol gri sgra mdzad de/ se gol gyi sgra des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
108a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mngon par grags par gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci snyed du se gol gyi sgras mngon par grags par gyur pa de snyed kho na rnam
108a7(dkon brtsegs): pa drug du rab du g.yos par gyur to// ji snyed rnam pa du rab tu g.yos par gyur pa de snyed kho na snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par yang gyur to// 'od srung de nas
108a8(dkon brtsegs): khye'u de gnyis kyis sgra de thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drang nas langs par gyur te/ 'od srung khye'u de gnyis langs par yang gyur pa na/ stong
108b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang mi'i sil snyan gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ma bsil ma dkrol bar rol mo'i sgra dag 'byin par gyur cing / me/
108b2(dkon brtsegs): tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to// 'od srung de nas khye'u de gnyis langs nas kyang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// de bzhin
108b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de la skor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
108b4(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po la bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga'i zhabs kyi drung du 'dug nas/ nga la yid/
108b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin par bya ba'i chos sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang lags pa dang /
108b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / yongs su gtong ba gang lags pa zil gyis gnon cing yongs su gdugs te/ gnas par gyur pa'i sbyin pa mchis sam/ yongs
108b7(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba ma mchis lags sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mchis lags sam zhes khye'u 'di gnyis nga la zhu ba de skad yongs su zhus nas/ de bzhin gshegs zhabs
108b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la gdug so// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po des 'di skad ces gsol te//
109a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal
109a2(dkon brtsegs): bo che'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ 'od srung de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin /
109a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang / bshad par bya'o//
109a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu rgyal po mu khyud 'dis bsod nams kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba gtong ba gang yin pa de bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pa zhig dgon pa
109a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu dgon pa dag na gnas shing / se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o// zhes bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa de/ bsod nam
109a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po ches che bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sprin lta zhog gi// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ci
109a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang so so nas rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig
109a8(dkon brtsegs): byin par gyur na// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams gang yin pa dang / byang/
109b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pa yang dag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ tshul khri bzhin la rab tu brtsod pa zhig chos thams cad stong pa dang /
109b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod cing gnas par gyur na/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni/ se
109b3(dkon brtsegs): gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang /
109b4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bun gyi bar gyi cha dang / grangs kyi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang
109b5(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtog
109b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po yang lta zhog gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dag na sems can ci snyed sems can
109b7(dkon brtsegs): du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can re res kyang skad cig dang thang cig yud tsam cig rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin pa byin pa dang / dge slo ba mngon par 'dus
109b8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig byas shing sems can de dag re res se go la gtogs pa tsam gcig la yang de snyed kyi sbyin pa byin zhing dge ba mngon pa 'dus
110a1(dkon brtsegs): byas par gyur la/ rnam grangs de lta bus sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin zhing dge ba mngon
110a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dus byas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mang ba yin snyam 'am/ 'od srung de la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin
110a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la byang chub sems dpa' blo glos bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dpe de lta bu de mdzad
110a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni bsam par yang slab pa ma lags pas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna
110a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ mkhas pa mngon par
