138a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa dag yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
138a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni ming 'bras bu mchis par sgrog pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spre leg so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa/
138b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam rgya chen pos sems can gyi khams pas 'tshal ba rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa'
138b2(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bde ba'i yod byad thams cad kyis sems can rnams rab tu dgod par spro lags so// byang
138b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mig bzangs gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsgrub par spro lags so
138b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das padag ni ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dag las sems can rnams yongs su
138b5(dkon brtsegs): skyob par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dag las ma rgal ba'i sems can rnams sgra
138b6(dkon brtsegs): bar spro lag so// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can ma dul ba rnams la dul ba'i shul nye bar ston
138b7(dkon brtsegs): par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' yid bzangs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams yongs su
138b8(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nges pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can shes rab dman pa rnams
139a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid phung pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
139a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dud 'gro skye gnas su skyes pa rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par sgro lags// byang chub sems dpa' nyan mongs pa med pa rtag par khong du chud bas
139a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul yang dag par ston pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro legs so// byang chub sems dpa' mthod
139a4(dkon brtsegs): dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad tshad ma mchis pa dag nye bar sgrub par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dbang
139a5(dkon brtsegs): po bzang gla sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sdug bsngal dran par bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa'
139a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsams pa tsam gyis yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du
139a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lag so// byang chub sems dpa' gnyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems
139a8(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lag so// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/
139b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid stobs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
139b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gums par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis spong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
139b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can dman pa rnams sgrol bar spro legs so// byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
139b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams bsdu ba'i slad du legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
139b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la 'das ma gyis kyi shul nye bar ston par sgro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bag
139b6(dkon brtsegs): tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mos ci lta ba bzhin du yang
139b7(dkon brtsegs): bar ston par spro lag so// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams rin po che'i phung po ku
139b8(dkon brtsegs): tu ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gro ni bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzugs sdug pa ston pas/ sems can
140a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' dri med gzi brjid kyi gsol pa/ bcom
140a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni bcug nas sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin cing yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nor bu
140a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags//
140a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams 'od zer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang dag pa'i smon lam gyis sems can rnams 'dren
140a5(dkon brtsegs): par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' dpal bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las gtan
140a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams
140a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che dag gis bde bar bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can
140a8(dkon brtsegs): dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par bgyid par spro lag so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom
140b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'od kyis gsol
140b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la shul bzang po nye bar ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gzugs stonapa
140b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro
140b4(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chos mngon par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par
140b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyang ba ston par spro legs so// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sgrib pa dag lnga
140b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'byung gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyis sems can
140b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' ci yang min gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can bdag
140b8(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad gzhig par spro lag so// byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
141a1(dkon brtsegs): dkon rtsegasa'adas bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyis phyogs rab tu ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis gsol
141a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa stsol bar spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
141a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems can rnams dman pa'i gnas nas yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis gsol pa/
141a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems shul bzang po ston pas sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gog par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od kyi gsol
141a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus ston pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal gyis
141a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can don bgyid pa rnams kyi don bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol
141a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba'i sgo 'gams par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi 'chang gis gsol
141a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar sme legs so// byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pas
141b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus na 'od bstan pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid par spro lags so// de nas
141b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i go cha la 'jug par bstan pa de lta bu de thos nas// ngo mtshar rmad
141b3(dkon brtsegs): du byung bla 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ma ji tsam du byang chub sems sed pa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag snying
141b4(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po dang / thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing / brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang / ji tsam du sems can thams cad kyis thub
141b5(dkon brtsegs): par dka' ba dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rdzi bar dka' ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/
141b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa rnams kyi drung du mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa
141b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mig slong ba dag mchis te/ dngos po thams cad slong bar bgyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun tu zhum par mi bgyid cing //
141b8(dkon brtsegs): sgyid 'ug par mi bgyid cing / rab tu spro bar mi bgying pa ni bdag ngo mtshan de 'tshar du 'dzin lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag 'di snyam du
142a1(dkon brtsegs): sems lags te/ sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gnod par bgyis te/ nang dang phyi'i
142a2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dge slong bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag du 'gyur bar sems so
142a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bus de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
142a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul ni de lta bu yin te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul de ni nyan thos
142a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no// sha ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
142a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun tu ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.yo'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems/
142a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can khyim bdag gis rgyags pas myos pa rnams la dbang phyug gis rgyags pa bskul ba'i phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston
142a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// sems can spro bas rgyags shing mos pa rnams la spro ba'i rgyags pa brtsal ba'i phyir chen po che chen po'i stobs dang sred med kyi bu'i spro ba'i stobs nye bar
142b1(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed do// sems can mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel
142b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos tha~Md
142b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed de/ sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs
142b4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu 'ged par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gsheg
142b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi rnam par thar pa gzhan med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
142b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di zugasu chud de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang //
142b7(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnam par rig par mdzad de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang
142b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can bcings pa rnams la thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas/
143a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can lam ngan par zhugs par rnams la lam bzang po nye bar ston par
143a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid gsung ba dang / stong pa nyid las nges par byung bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
143a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'i phyir ro// sha ri bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam par slong sa pa rnams la yang dag par
143a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par thar pa nye bar ston par byed kyang / byang
143a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.yo'o// rim gyis byang chub sems kyi snying po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la sgyu ma'i bkod pa sna chog
143a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang nye bar ston to// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par
143a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa la ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim
143a8(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pas ni rjes su chags pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myu gu sbyin pa dang / snag tsa sbyin pa dang / glegs bam sbyin
143b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // chos sbyin pa la ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par bya'o//
143b3(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pas na gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
143b4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po dang / shin tu gtong ba la'o// de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongasu gtong ba'o// gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo yongs
143b5(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba'o// shin tu gtong ba ni mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / rkang yongasu gtong ba ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub
143b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thobs ni yongasu gtong ba gsum po de dag la gnas par bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
143b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dod chags kyis mi 'jigs lags sam/ zhe sdang dang tig mu gis mi 'jigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
143b8(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang dang ldan
144a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dag ste/ sha ri'i bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i
144a2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa yin no// sha ri'i bu de la 'dod chags ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung la 'bral ba bul ba yin no// zhe sdang ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral ba
144a3(dkon brtsegs): myur ba yin no// gti mug ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral ba phul ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'dod chags ni 'khor ba'i khri shing kun tu
144a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i phyir/ nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang / zhe sdang ni myur du yongs su spong ba'i phyir ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu gyur pa yin pa dang / gti mug ni rnam
144a5(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar dka' ba'i phyir/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu lhung ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro// shi ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' nyes
144a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang po'i lci ba ni tshogs bcu la drang po bshags par bya'o// bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i nyes pa lci ba ni tshogs lnga la bshags par bya'o//
144a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mig gis bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang zag gcig gcig ma/ gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa
144a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang / bud med nyes pa dang / khye'u'i nyes pa dang / lag pa'i nyes pa dang / mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang / dge 'dum
144b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi nyes pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o// de la
144b2(dkon brtsegs): bshags pa ni 'di yin te// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos la skyabs su mchisa'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o//
144b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAg kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'jom pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
144b4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ klung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dge la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen me la phyag 'am
144b5(dkon brtsegs): lo// rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// mthong ba don yod la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpas sbriH
144b6(dkon brtsegs): kha phyag 'tshal lo// drim tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// nu lha la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal
144b7(dkon brtsegs): bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// mya ngan med
144b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dpal phyag 'tshal lo// sred kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon
145a1(dkon brtsegs): par khyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nor dpal la
145a2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// dran pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dpal shin tu yongs su bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'a
145a3(dkon brtsegs): lo// shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag
145a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen pad ma rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag
145a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma la rab bzhugs pa'i ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la stsogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham
145a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
145a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba
145a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag tu/ sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjesu yi rang ba 'am/ mchod kyi dkor ram/ dge 'dun gyi bkor ram/ phyog
145b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang / srog tu stsal ba dang / thog pa la rjesu yi rang ba 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i lasar gyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa
145b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba 'am/ mi dge ba bcu'i lam yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pa dang / 'jug tu stsal ba dang / 'jug pa la rje su yid rang ba'am
145b3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi sgribs pa gang gis bsgribs nas/ bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'chi ba 'am/ yi dwags kyi yul du mchi ba 'am/ yul
145b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' tha khong du skye ba 'am/ kla klor skye ba 'am/ lha tshe rings po rnams kyi nang du skye ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ lta ba log par 'dzin par 'gyur
145b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ sangs rgyas na 'das 'byung ba mnyes par mi bgyid 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa de dgang lags pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
145b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur par/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa gzigs pa/ de dag gi spyan sngar 'thol lo// 'chags so// mi 'chab bo// mi
145b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid do// slan cad kyang sdom par bgyid lag so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag sa la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi skye ba 'di dang skye ba thog ma dang /
145b8(dkon brtsegs): tha ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu/ sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la kham cig tsam stsal pa gang lags pa dang /
146a1(dkon brtsegs): @tshul khrims srung ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sems can
146a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang legs pa dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang // bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes
146a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdams te bsdoms nas/ bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mtshachis pa dang / gong
146a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i yang go ma'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar gyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
146a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis yongs bsngos pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs
146a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// sdigs pa thams cad 'chags so//
146a7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams thams cad kyi rjesu yi rangs so// sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so// bdag gi ye shes bla na med pa mchog tu gyur cig/
146a8(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dag dade/ de bzhin gang ma byon/ yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho 'dra
146b1(dkon brtsegs): kun la/ thal mo sbyar bar bgyis te skyabs su nye bar mchi/ sha ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das suM cu rtsa lnga po de dag la stsogs pa
146b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o// de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa de la/
146b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par thar pa kho na'i phyir zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khrul pa rnam
146b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par mdzad kyang / chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa
146b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams mos pa ji lta bzhin du// rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir/ smon 'am yongs su rdzogs par yang mdzad do// sha ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
146b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
146b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge/
146b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
147a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par 'jug pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston
147a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga zi brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la stoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par
147a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtse gcig pa'i gting nge 'dzin la snyom
147a4(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir// nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par bye // byang chub
147a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rang sangs
147a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyam par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongs su
147a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po chos thams cad la dbang
147b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// sha ri'i bu de ltar
147b2(dkon brtsegs): ni skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ la lar ni brgya byin gyis gzugs/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la par ni 'khor los
147b3(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni sems
147b4(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems se can rnams la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang de la
147b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu dmigs pa yang med/ sems can tu dmigs pa yang med la/ sems can rnams la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed pa'i phyiraro//
147b6(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skad gang yin pa de ji las bzod par nus snyam 'am/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
147b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ spos kyi glang po che'i khal gang yin pa de bong
147b8(dkon brtsegs): bus bzod pa'i nus snyam 'am/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me 'azod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra'i
148a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi bdag po gang yin pa de/ mi dbul pos bzod par nus snyam 'am/
148a2(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya'i rgyal
148a3(dkon brtsegs): bo na mkha' lding gi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de/ bya rgod kyi phrug gus bzod par nus snyam 'am/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lagaso//
148a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems dpa' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa las byung zhing
148a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa las nges par byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang / nyes pa 'gyod pa'i gnas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas rnam par
148a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bas gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis rnam par spong ba mi nus so// byang chub sem
148a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin cing yongs brjod pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
148a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas/ nyes pa 'gyod pa'i gnas las nges par 'byung zhing / ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor nang du yang
148b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ces tu
148b2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das la lan
148b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di na
148b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag bzhag pa na/ sems la yongs su yog pa di lta bu 'di skyes lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg
148b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi slab yongasu dag pa bcas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
148b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa yongasu mi gtongad ngo zhes gsungs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las
148b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das sam// bzhugs kyang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
148b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi so so sor thar pa'i sdoms pa ni ji ltar brjod par gyi/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa
148b9(dkon brtsegs): ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog lags par bka' stsal na/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan
149a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ 'das las 'dul ba mdul ba mkhas pa mngon gsum du thos shing / mngon sum du bzung nas mi 'jigs pa thob cing / 'khor rnam/
149a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan de gsol bar bgyi lag so/ snyam ste bcom ldan
149a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cig pu dben par mchis nas/ nang du yang dag bzhag pa na/ sems la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la
149a4(dkon brtsegs): dbab pa yongs su zhu'o// snyam pa de lta bu'i yongs rtogs pa skyes par 'gyur lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor
149a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa la/ 'dul ba rnams par gtan la dbab pa rgya cher legs par bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
149a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye bar 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni sbyor
149a7(dkon brtsegs): ba gzhan dang // lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongasu dag pa yin par smros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
149a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa yang sbyor ba gzhan dang / lhag pa'i bsam pA gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
149b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan/
149b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro// nye bar 'khor ba de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ theg pa chen po la yang
149b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag
149b4(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yong su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
149b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// nye bar 'khor 'di la nyan
149b6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa ba ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba len par mi byed do// de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yong su dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni theg
149b7(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin pa'i phyir/
149b8(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa nyid gang yin pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul
150a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen
150a2(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa tshad med grangs med par srid par skye ba len kyang / sems yongs su skyo zhing yid yong su mi
150a3(dkon brtsegs): kyo ba de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul
150a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang // shin tu 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims nyid yin no// nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyi theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhug
150a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rje srung ba dang bcas pa yin par smros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslabs pa ni rje su bsrung ba
150a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin par smros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslabs pa ni bcos su yod par yin par smros shig/
150a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcas su med pa yin par smros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
150a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa ni ring du rje su zhugs pa yin par smros shig/ nyan thos kyis theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags yin par smros shig/ nye bar 'a
150b1(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjesu bsrung ba dang / bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi/
150b2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa rjesu bsrung ba med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor de la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
150b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjesu 'jug par bya dgos la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni mi dgos te/ nye bar 'khor rnams
150b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg
150b5(dkon brtsegs): pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rje su bsrung ba med pa yin no// nye bar 'khor ci ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
150b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa bcos su yod pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis bslab pa bcos bu med pa yin zhe na// nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen
150b7(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ga te snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ gung tshig kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
150b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs ma
151a1(dkon brtsegs): gtug pa kho na yin no// gal te gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma thag
151a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na yin no// gal
151a3(dkon brtsegs): te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la mtshan mo'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang
151a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtug pa kho na yin no// gal mtshan me'i thun dang po la nyes pa bya la mtshas
151a5(dkon brtsegs): mo'i gung thun la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
151a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin no// gal te mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la/ mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la thams cad mkhyen
151a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs ma gtu
151a8(dkon brtsegs): ba kho na yin// nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpar rnams kyi bslab pa ni bco su yod yin te/ de la ni byang
151b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par mi bye zhing / ha cang yid la gcags par mi bya'o// nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa
151b2(dkon brtsegs): pa pa yang dang yang du nyes pa byung na ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rab tu nyams pa dang / yongasu gtugs pa ni yin par rig
151b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur bya dgos pa'i phyir ro// de ltar
151b4(dkon brtsegs): na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dod pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcosu med pa yin no// nye bar 'khor ji ltar na the
151b5(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ring du rje su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa
151b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar chags pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi
151b7(dkon brtsegs): byed ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' dgur spyad par byas kyang / byang chub kyi sems mi tong na/ theg pa chen po la
151b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems pa'i bslab pa yongs su ma gtags pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor theg
152a1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yongs su zin
152a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rmi lam na yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun tu reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod skabs kyang yod par 'gyur ba dang / nye bar 'khor yang theg pa chen po la yang
152a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni srid pa gcig gis zhon du mongs pa thams cad zad par mi bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa
152a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag ni rim gyis zad par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni//
152a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba bskyed par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
152a6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags yin no// nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen
152a7(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa dang / bcos su yod pa dang / ring du rjes zhugs pa yin
152a8(dkon brtsegs): par smros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rje su srung ba med pa dang / bcosu med pa dang / mthar chags yin par smros shi ga/ de ci'i
152b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni batshogs chen po dang ldan pa yin pas na/ theg pa chen la yang dag par zhugs
152b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyo bas ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de
152b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gnashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang po gzigs pas ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang
152b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu yid 'byung ba'i gtam mi
152b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung bar dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo // zab pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / phra ba dang / brtags
152b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'gyod pa dnga?/ kun nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo // thogs pa'i med pa dang / sgribs pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi gtam gsung ste/
152b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gtam de dag thos nas mngon par dga' zhing 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa yang
152b8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nongs pa gang lags
153a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor de la sems can sdung bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang 'jigs pa med la/ sems can yongasu
153a2(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa' sgyu bag dang 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro// nye bar 'khor yang de bzhin gshegs
153a3(dkon brtsegs): bas 'dod chags ni 'bral ba bul ba kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba dang / zhe sdang ni 'bral ba myur la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba dang / gtig mug
153a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'bral ba 'bul la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa cher gsungs pa de la nye bar 'khor 'bral ba 'bul lo kha na ma ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni byang
153a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ma yin par blta'o// 'bral ba myur sa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs
153a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pas rmi lam na yang 'dod par mi bya'o// nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan
153a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgra bag nang nyes pa med pas/ de dag thams cad ni nyes pa ma yin par smros shig/
153a8(dkon brtsegs): sdad dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyos pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang nyes pa yod pas// de dag thams cad ni nyes pa
153b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag las kha cig ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/ kha cig ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/ kha
153b2(dkon brtsegs): cig ni gtig mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag las ci 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/ 'on te zhe sdang dang mtshungs
153b3(dkon brtsegs): par ldan pa 'am/ 'on te gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/ gang zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nongs pa
153b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu lci bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye
153b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'khor gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa/ bskal pa gang gi
153b6(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed du 'byung bar 'gyur la/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa gcig cig byung bar gyur na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
153b7(dkon brtsegs): tshad mar byas na/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyed pa de dag pas ches nyes pa lci pa
153b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor zhe sdang ni sems can yong su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin la/ 'dod chags ni sems can sprad par 'gyu ba yin te/
154a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa yin par smros shig/ nye bar 'khor de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la mi khas pa de dag ni 'dod chags
154a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang dag gis 'jigs par byed la/ zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do// byang chub sems
154a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag gi thabs la mkhas pa de dag ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang dag gis 'jigs par byed la/ 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan
154a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te// 'dug pa de nas bcom ldan 'das la
154a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shin tu dul ba'i chos thams cad la 'dul ba ci zhig mchis/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
154a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos thams cad shin tu
154a7(dkon brtsegs): dul bar shes na ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang yang dang yang du 'dul ba 'cha' bar mi mdzad pa zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa de'i phyir de
154a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa yang chos thams cad shin tu dul brtogs par bya ba'i phyir rib gyis bya ba'i 'dul ba 'tshal bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
154b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa bshang
154b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di sa me yang mi ldan thagasas bcam ldan 'das de'i srad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'angs dngul gzhon du gyur pa 'di bstan pa 'gan nag chags pa
154b3(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal dge slong nye bar 'khor 'di
154b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyan par 'dod kyis/ shin tu 'dul ba las rtsoms te/ khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan
154b5(dkon brtsegs): banye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa nye bar 'khor chos thams cad ni shin tu 'dul ba ste rang gi sems gdul ba'i phyir shin tu dul ba kun tu ston te
154b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin te// bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'gyod pa gdul ba kun tu bston to// chos thams cad phyin cim la
154b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste// rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i phyir shin tu dul ba kun tu ston to// chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtha'i sgo yin te// bslab pa la rlom
154b8(dkon brtsegs): sems su med par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa yongasu dge ba kun tu ston to// chos thams ni rnam par mi rtog pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med da ste/
155a1(dkon brtsegs): @bsam kyis mi khyab pas chags rmeg pa nyid kun tu ston to// chos thams cad ni chags pa dang // gnas pa med pa ste yun ring du mi
155a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag pa kun tu ton to// chos thams cad ni na mkha'i la gnas pa te/ dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin med pa nyid
155a3(dkon brtsegs): du kun tu ston to// chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med par gyur pa ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dus
155a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum mnyam pa nyid kun tu ston to// chos thaMd ni gdags pa dang bral ba ste/ sems can mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa'i phyir/ the tsom spang ba kun tu ton to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor de ni sangs
155a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bco ldan 'das rnams kyi rje su rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu dul ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi mo gang dag chos nyid la ma mos pa de dag ni de
155a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las ring du gyur pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
155a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa ni gang dang gang ston pa de dag thaMd bsaM gyis mi khyab pa kho na las brtsams te/ ston lag so// den+des gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
155a8(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye bar 'khor 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bI chos ston pa ni rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la marten par rnam pa/
155b1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba med pas na/ de'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / sems pa la mos pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan
155b3(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i nga rgyal ba'i nga rgyal can lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye bar 'khor
155b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la dge slong gal te/ 'dod chags spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// gal te zhe sdang spang ba dang // gtig mug spang bar sems na/ lhag pa'i
155b5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal la spong bar yin no// gal te gdod chags kyi chos kyang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan dang / ti mug gi chos kyang gzhan la sangs
155b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan no// zhes de snyam sems na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod par yin no// gal te dga' ba la sems na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//
155b7(dkon brtsegs): bya la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal spyod pa yin no// rnam par grol ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// stong pa nyid la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la sbyong
155b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa la sems na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// smon pa med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal spyod pa yin no// mngon par 'ang/
156a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// skye ba med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal spyod pa yin no// dngos po med pa/
156a2(dkon brtsegs): la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// gal te chos rnams yod do// snyam du sems ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no no// chos thams cad mi rtog go// snyam du
156a3(dkon brtsegs): sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// chos thams cad stong pa la bya ba ci yod ces de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin te/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa
156a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lha pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na/ gal te bdag gis thams cad las khyab par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
156a5(dkon brtsegs): la sems bskyed do// zhes de snyam sos na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin// gal te pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad parwa zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// /
156a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par byung ba yin par sems te/ de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// gal te 'di ni zab pa ma yin zhes de snyam sem+ban/
156a7(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin/ gal te 'dis ni rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ 'dis ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyu ro zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spod pa
156a8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gal te 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi choso// 'di dag ni rang sangs kyi choso// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//
156b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'di ni rig so// 'di ni mi rigs so// zhes de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// gal te 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can yin no// 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa
156b2(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin no// zhes de snyam sems na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// gal te 'di ni lam yin no// 'di ni lam ma yin no// zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal
156b3(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa yin no// gal te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//
156b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ 'di la bsam par bya ba med do// zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no// gal te bla na med
156b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ bsam par bya ba ci yang med do// zhes de snyam sems na dmigs pa chen po yino// de ni byang chub
156b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
156b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
156b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye bar 'khor dge slong gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthun pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la mngon par zhen par
157a1(dkon brtsegs): byed na/ de ni shin tu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / de'i tshe/
157a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag bsam yas thams cad byung min pas// dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par shig/ byis pa gang dag
157a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang song ba de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal dge slong gang dag bsam yas yod min pa'i/ sangs rgyas mi mchog de sems tshul gzhan min/ rtog pa'i
157a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis sangs rgyas rnam par brtags/ rtog pa de yang nam yang byung ma yin/ gang dag chos rnams stong la sems med pa'i/ byis pa de dag lam ngan bzhus
157a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ chos rnams stong pa yi ges brjod pa ni de dag yi ge med par yi ges bstan/ gang dag zhi zhing rab zhi chos sems pa'i// sems pa de yang nam yang byung
157a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ spros kun sems kyi rnam par rtog yin te/ de phyir chos rnams bsam yas rtogs par gyis/ chos 'di thams cad sems med sems med pa//
157a7(dkon brtsegs): ji srid mi sems de srid stong pa ni/ mi gang stong sems par byed 'dod pa/ bsam yas kun la phyir zhing sems pa yin/ mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong
157a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ mig gis gzugs rnams mthong chur te/ ba gang yin pa 'ang mtshan mo'i rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur/ de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog
157b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ mig ni snang las bsten te yid 'ong dang / yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas/ de ltar ldan las brten te/ mthong bas na/ de phyir mig gis nam yang
157b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba med/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grags gang yin pa/ de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med/ der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams
157b3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba min/ chos rnams 'di dag yi ge sgra skad kyis/ grangs dang tha snyad gdags par bstan pa yin/ chos dang chos min nam yang yod min kyang / skye bo byis pa rnams
157b4(dkon brtsegs): la de mi snang / skye bo byis pa rnams la de mi snang / sbyin pa bsngags pa 'jig rten ngas brjod kyang / ser sna'i chos de yang dmigs su yod ma yin/ de ltar rgyal ba'i chos
157b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams bsam yas te/ de yang dmigs med de yang mthong ba med/ tshul khrims bya ba dag pa ngas bshad kyang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims mkha' la lag pa bzhin/ tshul
157b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims ngan pa thams cad mkha' 'dra ste/ gang dag tshul bzang de yang de dang 'dra/ bzod pa kya nom nga yis bshad byas kyang de'i rang bzhin nam yang mthong ba med//
157b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos 'ga' 'ja 'khrug pa yod min yang / bzod pa de yang rgyal bas rab tu bshad// nyin mtshan bag yod bya phyir nga yis ni// mi nyal dam pa bsngags
157b8(dkon brtsegs): ba brjod byas te/ bskal pa brgya snyed brtson 'grus bskyed byas kyang // 'phel bar mi 'gyur zad pa yod ma yin/ bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin gya nom pa'i/
158a1(dkon brtsegs): ci bzhin sgo dag 'gro la bstan byas te/ 'di la chos 'ga' nga zad pa yod min yang / de dag cha shas phye ste rab tu ston/ shes rab chos rnams
158a2(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyis shig ces/ shes rab lhag mthong blo gros blo bstan kyang / rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa rnam du yang / shes rab mi nus de yang nges par bstan/ rab
158a3(dkon brtsegs): dben chos shes spangs la dga' gyis shig/ dka' thub ngan pa 'jig rten ngas bshad kyang / chos shes yongs su mi mthong gang yin pa/ chos de 'di na dmigs su yod
158a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ sems dmyal ba 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te/ sems can stong phrag du ma skyo byas kyang / gang dge shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i 'gro ba de dag nas
158a5(dkon brtsegs): yang yod ma yin/ gang dag ral gyi mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i/ gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te/ rtog pa'i dbang gis pon song de dag na/ lus la 'bab mthong
158a6(dkon brtsegs): de na mtshon ca med/ sna tshogs yid dga' ba me tog kha byed zhing / gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba/ 'di ni de la'ang byed pa 'ga' med de// de dag
158a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa yin/ rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnams brtags te// 'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye/ 'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang byung min te/
158a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin/ 'gro don byang chub se phyir ni sems skyes ces/ spyod mchog khyad par 'phags pa bstan byas kyang / byang chub nam yang
158b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su yod min te// 'dod pa gang yin de yang yod ma yin/ sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal rna ba dag cing // rdul med rdul bral dri ma med par gsungs/ byis pa yod
158b2(dkon brtsegs): pa min la rnam rtog pa// chags 'gyur ldang bar 'gyur zhing rmongs par 'gyur/ mnyam bzhag gya nom chos ni 'thob 'gyur na// 'dod chags yod min sdud med rmongs
158b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med/ 'dod chags bral zhing rnam par grol ba'i chos/ kun gzhir ma gyur mya ngan 'das pa thob/ mkhar 'dra'i chos rnams 'di dag shes gyur na/ zhing brgya
158b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams su thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing / de dag yid kyang chags pa med 'gyur bas/ de phyir thogs med lam ni bskyed par gyis/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang por spyad byas
158b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / sems can brgya phrag mtha' yas grol byas kyang / nam yang sems can dmigs su yod min zhing / zad pa'ang yod min mtha' yas gyur pa 'ang med/ ci ltar sgyu
158b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i khan gyis 'jig rten na/ sems can brgya phrag mang po sprul byas te/ sprul pa de dag thams cad bsang gyur kyang // sgyu ma de dag bsad pa yod mi 'gyu// 'gro ba
158b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di kun sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ 'di la mtha' ni nam yang dmigasu med// gang dag de ltar mtha' yis mos byed pa/ de dag 'jig rten na ni tshor ba med/ gang dag
158b8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa/ dpa' bo 'di dag 'jig rten mya ngan las 'dod pa'i yon tan spyod kyang chags med cing / chags pa rnams spang sems can 'dul
159a1(dkon brtsegs): \u0f7f/ bar byed// 'di na sems 'ga' med srog kyang med/ mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mthong / sems can yod pa min yang don mdzad pa
159a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi de ni dka' ba che/ ci ltar chad pa bcangs te byis pa la/ ston cing la ta yod ces brjod byas nas/ de'i sa chad pa stong pa mthong nas ni/ byis pa de ni cho nges
159a3(dkon brtsegs): du ba ltar/ de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sems can tshul la mkhas shing mkhyen pa rnams/ chos rnams 'di dag gsog gsob mkhyen gyur nas/ 'jig
159a4(dkon brtsegs): rten dag la dngos po bstan paston/ shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni/ khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyis la// 'bras bu yod pal+lI tu gyur gyis shes// thugs
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad/ khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur na/ 'bras bu thams cad thob par byung 'gyur na/ 'bras bu thams can thob par 'gyur yang
159a6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas na/ 'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med/ 'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob gyur na/ kye ma mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yi
159a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces/ de dag ngo mtshar cha bskye bar 'gyur/ de ltar zhi ba'i chos rnams de dag la 'di dag dbang po bsam gtan rnams/
159a8(dkon brtsegs): thar dang / stobs dang byang chub yan lag zhi ba zhes/ ming dang tshig stong snyed kyis bstan pa mdzad// dbang po 'ga' yang ma skyes stongs kyang min/ byang chub
159b1(dkon brtsegs): yan lag zhi ba'ang ma skyes te/ chos 'di gzugs can ma yin gzugs med kyang / 'jig rten dag la shes pa'i stobs kyis bshad/ 'gro ba rnams la thob pa dus
159b2(dkon brtsegs): bshad ga de kun mtshan ma rnam par spangs pa yin/ 'di na gang dag bdag gis thob sos pa/ de ni ma thob thob par rlom sems med/ 'jig rten dag na gang la dngos med pa
159b3(dkon brtsegs): de la thob pa 'ga'ang yod ma yin/ thob dang thob med 'gro la bstan mdzad pa/ gang gis de ltar shes pa des thob yin/ kun la khyad zhugs 'bras bu thob pa yin/ sems
159b4(dkon brtsegs): can dengs sems can med par bstan/ de la sems can nam yang dmigs med de// sems can med na gang gis 'thob par 'gyur// zhing dngos gang la sa bon yod/
159b5(dkon brtsegs): min pa/ de la myu gu skye ba med pa ltar/ de bzhin sems can nam yang dmigs med na/ sems can med la thob pa ga la yod/ sems can 'di kun mya ngan 'das/
159b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ 'di la rtsa ba nas yang dmig su med/ gang zhig chos tshul 'di la mos gyur pa/ de ngas lhag med mya ngan 'das par stan/ sangs rgyas brgya mang yang dag 'das//
159b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ de dag gis kyang sems can ma btul ba/ gal te sems can 'ga' 'dir byung gyur na/ de dag nam yang mya ngan 'das mi 'gyur/ de ltar lam 'di sgrib
159b8(dkon brtsegs): bi yod min te/ de la nam yang chags pa yong ma yin/ gang dag chos nyid 'di lha mos gyur pa/ de dag yid ni sreg la chags mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
160a1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya len pa med/ par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
160a2(dkon brtsegs): par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'gyor gyis 'di skad
160a3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor de'i
160a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya bar zung
160a5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag
160a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
160a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la mngon par stong ngo // / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'dul ba rnam pa
160a8(dkon brtsegs): gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// / mkhan po su len tra bo de dang / lo tsA ba
160b1(dkon brtsegs): zhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ba hu pa ri phring nA na ma ma hA ya na su tra// bod skad du/
160b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag rgya pa las/ lag bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas
160b3(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan
160b4(dkon brtsegs): ta ka'i gnas na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhags te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags bzangs shes bya ba g.yog
160b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
160b6(dkon brtsegs): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bkor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'jug go// phyogs
160b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btad de/ bcom ldan 'das
160b8(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
161a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po lag bzangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myur du bla na mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
161a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun tu yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
161a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
161a5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa ste/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun tu yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// lags bzangs
161a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po ni chos
161a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis longs spyod rnams yongasu tshelta/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// mnyam pas yin gyi mi mnyam pas ma yin no// de srog chags gzhan dag dang // sems can gzhan
161a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga ba mi byed par sbyin pa sbyin te/ brjod pa dang sgra dang tshig su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ mdzes pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i
161b1(dkon brtsegs): chub mas
161b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin/ lan du phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos pa ma yin/ kha gas ga byed pa ma yin/ bskas pa ma yin no// sbyin gnas
161b3(dkon brtsegs): sam/ sbyin gnas ma yin pa 'am/ dngon par grags pa 'am/ mngon par grags pa ma yin pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ 'dris pa 'am/ ma 'dris pa la
161b4(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bo 'am mi mdza' ba rung ste/ bkar bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod pa byed cing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos de nyung
161b5(dkon brtsegs): du ba dog na yang nyung ngu sbyin/ mang du 'dog na yang mang du sbyin/ ngan po bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom pa bdog na yang gya nom pa sbyin no// lag bzangs ji ltar byang
161b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang / rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du/ ka kA ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems dang /
161b7(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no// des zas 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
161b8(dkon brtsegs): zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i skom pa thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no// gos
161b9(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la ni sems cad ngo tshar shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no// gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams ca
162a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med brdugs par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa na no// zlos 'dongs
162a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no// me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can
162a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin no// phye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
162a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad nyes par spyod pa'i dring ba'i dri ma gzhom pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin pa sbyin no// byug pa 'dod pa rnams ni sems can thams cad nyes pa med
162a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir phyug pa sbyin no// gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams
162a6(dkon brtsegs): cad nye bar zhi ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no// lha mo 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba'i mngon par shes pa thob pa
162a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir lha ma yin no// mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad lha dang tshangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob
162a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir mal ca sbyin no// stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams
162b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mi phyed pa dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir mal ca sbyin no// gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang /
162b2(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no// phru rtog dang / bum pa dang / 'chog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi
162b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzing lta bu'i lus par bya ba'i phyir/ phru rtog dang / bum pa dang / 'chog chas sbyin no// sems can thams cad zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
162b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dka ba thob nags tshal sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can skyes
162b5(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya cu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod rten rnams la ni rgyam+b+ha sbyin no/ semam can thams cad de bzhin gabye
162b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir// mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam lam rnams la mar me sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
162b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams sam/ dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la rol mo dbyangs sgra sbyin no// sems can
162b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad cha byad dang / tshul khrims dang spyod pa mdzes pa/ bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad /
162'a1(dkon brtsegs): dbugs 'byung ba sbyin pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir snod chags sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs/ yongasu/
162'a2(dkon brtsegs): bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ smi gu dang sdug tsa dang / glags bu dang chos tshe khri stan sbyin pa dang sbyin no// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad
162'a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhom pa'i phyir na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa sbyin no/ sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi sa dang / 'dud rtsi'i dbyings kyi sa thob par bya/
162'a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir sa gzhi sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod rten mngon po dang / sku gzugs
162'a5(dkon brtsegs): mthon po byed do// bdog b+ha thAms cad mngon par shes pa myur ba thob pa bya ba'i phyir/ myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma gyur par sbyin pa sbyin no// sems
162'a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bar du gcod par med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rung ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma yin pa ma yin no// sems can thams cad spobs pa
162'a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po yongs su mi'i 'chang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su mi gcod par sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad snying rje chen po mtshungs pa med thob pa
162'a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mnyams par sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed pa pa thams cad kyis tshar mi gcod
162'b1(dkon brtsegs): mi gcod pa dang / gnang bar ma nus pa'i chos ma ngan par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin no// lag bzangs gal te byang chub
162'b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing 'byor pa med par 'gyur na/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad po sbyin po mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa 'di
162'b3(dkon brtsegs): dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon lam 'debs te/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin po'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung ba nus pa dang
162'b4(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi bde bar sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag par ldan par gyur cing /
162'b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bad pa med pa dang ldand pa med par brnag pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa ma lus
162'b6(dkon brtsegs): par yongasasu rdzogs nas// bde ba la reg pa nas par 'gyur bar bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig/ bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing smon la
162'b7(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyin par 'dod cing smon lam 'deb so// dbyig gi
162'b8(dkon brtsegs): ri dang / gser gyi ri dang / gos kyi ri dang / yo byad thams cad nI dang / bza' ba rgya mtsho dang / btung rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs par byanas pa/ legs pa
163a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa dag kyang sbyin par 'dod cing / sngon la smon lam 'debs so// 'khor ba'i srid pa
163a2(dkon brtsegs): mthams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba
163a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa zang zing sbyin pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa sbyin pa 'am/ chos sbyin pa ma lus par de dag thams cad la zan dus gsum du yang mngon par dga' zhing rje su yid
163a4(dkon brtsegs): rang ngo // gal te de la bslangs na nor srin mi nus no yang rang gi zan skal sbyin pa 'am/ grogs su 'gyur ba 'am/ kun tu btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyuraro//
163a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do// de sbyin pa 'dod par gyur pa na yang smin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad
163a6(dkon brtsegs): dgrol ba dang / sems can thams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yo bas su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba
163a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo// sbyin pa byin nas kyang sbyin
163a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de sems can thams bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
163b1(dkon brtsegs): bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
163b2(dkon brtsegs): tu yongasu bsngo'o// gal te sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba de la bslob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur pa de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus
163b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'am/ chung zad chung zad du yang chags pa dang / ser sna dang / sbyin pa bas 'jigs pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bstsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/
163b4(dkon brtsegs): chud zad chung zad du sbyin pa'am/ gtong ba 'am rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang / mngon par bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid
163b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan du gyur pa ni yang / zhum par mi 'gyur zhing spyi lugs par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
163b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag/
163b7(dkon brtsegs): gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen dang / rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams su
163b8(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char rnams pa gto/
164a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni/ sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na
164a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang sdug bsngal chu dus myur
164a3(dkon brtsegs): skyen par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rnams kyis bslangs pa na/ yan lag dang nyin lag gcing
164a4(dkon brtsegs): dom bcad nas slong ba rnams la mi sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya che ba yongasu spang
164a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi tshed la de rang gi yan lag dang nying lag yongasu mi gtong ba ni ma yin no// lag bzangs byang chub
164a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na/ pha ma la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/ sdug bsngal bar byas nas/ bdog pa
164a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad li tshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/
164a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar pha ma la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong la/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho sha
164a9(dkon brtsegs): thug sngal pa phyag cu chu das dran po dang / zan po dang las zung zhogs 'tsha
164b1(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa yang sbyin pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gso bar byed do// de ni
164b2(dkon brtsegs): sems gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi mchod la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma yin no// lag bzangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
164b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ga la 'gyur/ lag bzang
164b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag zangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gi phyin yang srog chag
164b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag dang sems can gzhan dag la mi rdeg gsod cing gsod pa la rjes su yid rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang ma byin par mi len la/ ma byin par len
164b6(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'jug cing / ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log par g.yem par mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yes
164b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed du mi 'jug cing / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rje su yi rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang brdzun mi sA la/ brdzun zer du mi 'dug cing /
164b8(dkon brtsegs): brdzun sgrub sa rjes su kyi bar mabyed do// TIgag phyir 'du dang mi 'jung / rlung 'thung du mi lA gyu cing / rang mabyu la la rjes su ma rung bar mi byed /
164b9(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te/ mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub bo// de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang
165a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing rmed du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa dang / go rar 'jug pa dang / go rar gzhugs du zhug pa dang / rdeg pa dang /
165a2(dkon brtsegs): rdeg du 'jug pa dang / gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa dag spang ba dang / dor ba dang bskul par 'bad par byed do// de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la
165a3(dkon brtsegs): ring du gnas shing gartan por gnas la/ dam por gnas te/ mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub bo/ de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rnob po dang tshig kyal ba spang
165a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dor ba dang bskul bar 'bad par bya'o// de srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma ji ltar ba bzhin no// bu gcig
165a5(dkon brtsegs): pa phangs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig pa phangs pa dag la 'khu yang slar 'ag par mi bya la/ lag pa'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa ram/ ral
165a6(dkon brtsegs): gri'am/ mdangs bdegs sa kyang slar brdegs par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya zhing ci lta pha ma dang bu cig pa phangs pa 'khru yang slar 'khu bar mi bya
165a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ bdag srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis lag pa 'am/ bod pa 'am/ dbyig pa 'am/ ral gyi 'am/ mdas rdegs kyang slar
165a8(dkon brtsegs): brdegs par mi bya gsod kyang slar gsod par mi bya'o// zhes de ltar slob bo// dper na pa 'am ma 'am/ bu cig pa phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyu ste 'ongs pa
165b1(dkon brtsegs): sogs gcod pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir//
