165b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' yang srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad mthong
165b3(dkon brtsegs): na dga' ba dang / yid bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrim su ma byin par len pa spangs
165b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshungs par spyod pa la dgod
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro/ de'i rdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i chang
165b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chad 'thung ba spangs pa'i laM dgod pa'i phyir ro// zhi'i zhing med pa dang / zhing
165b7(dkon brtsegs): rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phying ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug
165b8(dkon brtsegs): ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad bcang ba'i phyir ro// de'i go rar 'jug pa dang / ko rar gzhug tu 'jun
165b9(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrim san+ni swenas can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang / bsal ba'i phyir ro// de rdeg pa dang de rdeg du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims na
166a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil kyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya/
166a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa dang gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kun tu bsrungs pa thob par
166a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyid pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i tshul
166a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni yan lag lnga'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i datshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni tshig gzung bar 'os pa
166a5(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba
166a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde dang / 'khrugs pa'i 'jig pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan
166a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi nor dang yod byed 'jigs cing chung za ba yongs su skyo ba'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi nor bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i
166a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang // gtong ba byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir//
166b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'gug pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyiraro// de'i cing ba 'grel ba dang /
166b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grol du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo stan/ byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro// de'i khyim nas
166b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam grol ba sgrib pa med par thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i rdeg tshugs pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis/ 'jigs
166b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag pa gzhon pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa bzlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun tu bsrung ba'i chos bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i mi slu ba'i tshig
166b5(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i tshul khrims dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i
166b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de'i bye ba rnams kyi sdums byed cing mdza' ba bstan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par
166b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig snyan pa dang 'jam por smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnams cad kyi rnar bre zhing snying du 'ong la bden pa'i tshig thob par bya ba'i bya ba'i phyir ro//
166b8(dkon brtsegs): de kun 'thun pa slu ba'i tshul khrims ni tshar mi gcod cing gzung bar 'os la/ 'bras yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir// de'i sangs rgyas kyi yan
167a1(dkon brtsegs): ts+yash+ya/ tan gyi sngags parjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//
167a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'das pa dang ma 'ong ba dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams cad du gtogs pa grangs med dpag
167a3(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal ba byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan/ byang chub kyi snying por mi
167a4(dkon brtsegs): phyed cing / sra la shin tu bstan pa'i dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir
167a5(dkon brtsegs): ro// de'i dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i
167a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de'i dus gsum chos kyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge
167a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi byed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dkon mtshas
167a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skabs bla na med pal+lI phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
167b1(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stong par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges pa'i rdzogs
167b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad la bskal par chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bcu pa chos kyi sgra
167b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad bshags pa dang / sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad la slod pa'i tshul khrim
167b4(dkon brtsegs): ni bag chags kyi mtshasas sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa
167b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan
167b6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i thams cad
167b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can 'gro ba'i thams cad na gnas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams
167b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad pa rje su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi mchog mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa bsags pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyira'o// /
168a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i rdul khrims na rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges par la 'jug par bya ba'i phyirar/
168a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob dang mi 'jig pa tho
168a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir// de'i pha dang ma dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid
168a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyiraro// de'i 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon med pa dbugs bya byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi sko bar
168a5(dkon brtsegs): lung ston pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i rgyal po dang / chom kun dang me dang / chu dang bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams
168a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu skyob cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yongasu bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas dang /
168a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni//
168a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang / 'thun pa'i lus kyi las
168b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims dang pha rol gyi sems dang pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi/
168b2(dkon brtsegs): sems rjes su srung ba dang / bathun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems na mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi
168b3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi tshul khrims ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi sems mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshe 'di'i don tshe rabs gzhan
168b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs kyi theg pa'i dom rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnam
168b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dran pa yang dag par skyed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i phyi chos mnyan
168b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chom goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig
168b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / pha rol tu phyir ba yongasu bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag par spyad par 'dod pa na yang / lus
168b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad
168b9(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//
169a1(dkon brtsegs): / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / lhag par spyod pa dang / yang dag par spangs pa dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad bsku
169a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen po nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
169a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig pa dang / ma ral ba dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob
169a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ chung zad chung zad du yang mi dge ba'i spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsdu
169a5(dkon brtsegs): bar rtsol lo 'bad pa dang / dus du su 'am/ cung zad chung zad du yang dge ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya
169a6(dkon brtsegs): bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams
169a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub
169a8(dkon brtsegs): tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa grangs
169b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa/
169b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par skyed par
169b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na
169b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
169b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems
169b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni gzhan dag gis rang gi lus kyi srog gcod dam/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam/ chung ma phrog gam/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ 'phra ma dang ngag rtsub po/ tshig
169b7(dkon brtsegs): kyal pa smra ba 'am/ gshed 'am gsod ma/ 'dzin tam/ rdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing / slar mi 'dra ste// shar gnyer shing khon du 'dzin par
169b8(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang / srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di dag kyang byas shing
170a1(dkon brtsegs): bstsags pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di yin/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang / rang gi las kyi
170a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa dag gi myong ba la/ ci'i phyir gzhan la slar gnod pa bya zhing slar khro ba dang / shar gnyen zhing khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so// lag bzang
170a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slong ste// gal te bdag gi srog gi gcod pa 'am/ bdeg pa thams cad 'phrog pa'am/ chung ma 'phrog
170a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'am// brdzun du smra ba 'am/ 'phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig kya la pa smra ba 'am/ gshe ga dang / gsod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa 'am/ rdeg pa'am/ gcod
170a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang rung ste/ gzhan dag la slar gnod par byas pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am// shar gnyer zhing khon da bzung na/ slar gnod pa byas pa dang / slar khros pa dang /
170a6(dkon brtsegs): shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa// mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'di bas/ bdag la las kyi rnam
170a7(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa dang / las kyi rgyun mthun pa brgya 'gyur tam/ stong gyur tam/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug
170a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// snyam mo// lags bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ srog yod pas srog
170b1(dkon brtsegs): gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ rna ba'i dbang po yong pos rdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur zhing // phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal bskos
170b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ lus yod pas 'dren pa dang / 'ching ba dang 'dzin pa dang // rdeg pa dang gcod par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi gzhi po srog gi
170b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang lus blangs par gyur na ci ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon tu gzung bar bya snyam me
170b4(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs gzhan byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste// de ni ngo bo nyid de ni rang bzhin no//
170b5(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba dang / me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste// de ni ngo bo nyid de ni chos
170b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid de ni rang bzhin no// de bzhin du srog thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos can no// dbang po thams cad skrag bsngal gyi chos can/ snga/
170b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'das te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can no// lus thams cad kying sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa
170b8(dkon brtsegs): chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni ngo bo nyid de ni chos nyid de ni rang bzhin yin nas/ srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos cam
171a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa'i chos can/ zad cing dengs la 'gog pa dang / dbang ba drug po sdug bsngal ba'i chos can/ sdug bsdus 'dus te reg pa'i
171a2(dkon brtsegs): chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pas ci ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing
171a3(dkon brtsegs): khon tu gzunges par bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid dang / 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni rang bzhin no// snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub
171a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag gi mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan
171a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin na mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang /
171a6(dkon brtsegs): skye dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa la/ mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pas/ ci ltar dag
171a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ rjes su chags pa 'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ skar gnod par byed pa 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ gra shar gnyer zhing /
171a8(dkon brtsegs): khong du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di lta ste mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal
171b1(dkon brtsegs): ni nyung zhing chung gi yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la/ ches bzod par dga' ba yin/ dud 'gro skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba
171b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin na/ bdag gis ci ltar sdug bsngal zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar
171b3(dkon brtsegs): khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon tu gzung bar bya snyam mo// lag bzang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang dag gcig
171b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu la phan 'dod pas gzhan dag la phyir gnod pa byed cing phyir khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon tu 'dzin pa rid pa de yang
171b5(dkon brtsegs): mi rigs te/ cha ma yin na bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa yi dam bcas pas chen
171b6(dkon brtsegs): bos yi dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/
171b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'azod pa dang / phyir gnod pa byed pa dang // phyir khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon tu 'dzin pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag phyogs pa dang / da
171b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi bzod pa dang phyir gnod mi byed pa dang // phyir mi 'khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon tu 'dzin par mi byed pas
172a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag stsogs shing 'phel te/ yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo// lag bzangs rigs kyi bu 'am/
172a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs bskang ba 'dod pas/ mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi reg pas reg kyang gzhan dag la slar gnod par mi bya/
172a3(dkon brtsegs): blar khro bar mi bya/ shar gnyer shing khon tu gzung bar mi bya na/ mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pas lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de spros sam brgyad bkag gam//
172a4(dkon brtsegs): smad dam/ mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dkar ba tha
172a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing / dang du len to// de drung ba shal ta ma/ bcings sam/ bzungs yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcing/
172a6(dkon brtsegs): la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang /
172a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ bzod cing dang du len to// de rna ba thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems
172a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la dad par bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing dad du len to// de sna bcad cad kyang
172b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing bla na med pa la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir
172b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len to// de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
172b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad
172b4(dkon brtsegs): la zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag pa bkyang pa/ sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// bzod cing dang du len to// de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams
172b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drag gi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to// de mig/
172b6(dkon brtsegs): phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi mig g.yung drug thob par bya'i phyir bzod cing dang du len
172b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ de mgo bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir
172b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len to// de bzod cing 'di dag dang ci mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon gsum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang sems
173a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen
173a2(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid thob par bya ba dang / sa sa kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo bar byed do// mngon gsum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang /
173a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang // sems can thams cad
173a4(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar
173a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do// gal te bzod pa 'di dag dang / cing mi snyam pa 'di dag ma ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan
173a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus du su 'am chung zad chung zad du yang mi bzod pa dang / ci mi snyam par ma byas pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang
173a7(dkon brtsegs): bstsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang bzod pa dang / ci mi snyam pa la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /
173a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do srid par gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgying lug par mi 'gyur ro// lags bzangs
173b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpar rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu sman pa dang /
173b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de gla gis bzod pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag bsgrub pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med
173b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad do sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi sla
173b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de
173b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu spyod par dge ba dang / bzod pa dang bzod pa yang dag par bskyob pa dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs
173b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshigs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chu dus myur du skyen par bzod pa'i pha rol
173b7(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lags bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ci ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed ce na/
173b8(dkon brtsegs): lags bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyog re re yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med de/
174a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sems can mtha' yas so// de ltar sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas mu med pa mtha' yod pa ma yin
174a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin te/ bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing / mtha' yas pa de la phan pa'i phyir go cha gos pa la/ sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing
174a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir/ go cha bgos na sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang / sems can thams cad
174a4(dkon brtsegs): la bde bar dmigs pa/ mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dag bag med par gyur na/ sems can gzhan tu gyur tam// gnyid kyi
174a5(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i nyin mtshan du sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang rgyas pa dang / yongs su rtogs par gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi
174a6(dkon brtsegs): skad cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs
174a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba mtha' yas shing / mtha' yas
174a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'gyur ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa yang / yang dag par rjesu mthong / gzhi dri las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dga' bar yang
174b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo// lags bzangs gzhan
174b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tsho gas mtha' yas shing / mtha' yas de'i rga ba'i sdug bsngal gcig
174b3(dkon brtsegs): bu bstsal ba dang / gzhom par 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
174b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mthaR+sha ba de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug
174b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bstsal bar 'dod pa dang // sdug pa dang dpral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'dod pa mi 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal
174b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dang 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grangs pa'i sems
174b7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang // tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang
174b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems ska
175a1(dkon brtsegs): cig gcig pa'i sems kyi skad cig tsam dang / 'brel pa bsal bar 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing /
175a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa 'phel la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ gang zhig ma 'ongs shing ma phyin pa'i skal ba mtha' yas dpag tu med
175a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams su sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang
175a4(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos nyam mo/ lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste// gang zhig rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nas/ nyan thos kyi yon
175a5(dkon brtsegs): tan 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing
175a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yon tan mtha' yas shing yon na mu med pa stobs mtha' yas
175a7(dkon brtsegs): shing stobs su med pa mtha' dag nub pa/ yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang smon pas lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bag med par gyur tam/ gnyi
175a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis log kyang / rgyu bzhi dang / rkyen bzhi dang / dmigs pa bzhi po de dag ni de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi
175b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bani/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ sems can gyi//
175b2(dkon brtsegs): skad cig sems kyi skad cig la// dge rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mahA ma yas pa bzhi skye ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha'
175b3(dkon brtsegs): yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' mi dka' na/ bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad
175b4(dkon brtsegs): cig la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas
175b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi yang dag par rjesu mthong la/ gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' ba yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba bzhin du rdzogs pa'i
175b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'gros srog gi phyir yod ci phyir nyams par bya snyam mo// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni shar phyogs kyi mtha' yang mngon
175b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing mra yang mngon la/ lho dang / nub dang byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgya mtsho chen po byad
175b8(dkon brtsegs): nub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po maHyas mu med pa bzhi po de dge lamatha' 'amu med na bdag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/
176a1(dkon brtsegs): s+ya// // dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag 'phel zhing rgyas na/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir
176a2(dkon brtsegs): yang brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang dag seng ge dang
176a3(dkon brtsegs): rta ga dang / khyi dang / ce dang / bya rgod dang / khrung khrung dang / byang rog dang / 'ug pa dang / srin bu dang / sbyang ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang du gyur pa de dag gi/
176a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sngas rgyas par 'gyur na/ bdag mir gyur bzhin du srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i
176a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lage bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ mi brgya 'am/ mi stong gis kyang
176a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid rtogs shing thob na bdag gis kyang 'dir ci'i phyir mi rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/ gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gsheg
176a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rtogs shing brnyes/ gang gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
176a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtogs shing skyes pa gyur na/ bang gi gis 'dir srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang
176b1(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/
176b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas stong pa'o zhes ston na sangs kyis gsungs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' bshad pa 'am/ tha na smon
176b3(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos gang yin pa dag dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
176b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur
176b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'gyur ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur baDU thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i chos
176b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag migo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun te/ nyan to// nges par byed do// rtog go// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ru
176b7(dkon brtsegs): shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas/ mdung thung dag gis be srog kyang / de mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun tu chos de
176b8(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dzin to// yongs su shes par byed do// 'chad do// klog go// rjes su sems so// gzhan dag la ston to// go bar byed do// mkhas
177a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba le lo med pa ni rung shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de bcol kyang rung / macol kyang rung
177a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ci bya ba chos can chos dang ldan pa 'jig rten 'di la bde ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba dag la/ rang gi lus nye bar
177a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / yong byed du gyur par byed do// 'di lta ste dper na 'byung ba chen po bsgribs pa med pa/ yongs su gzung ba med pa/ bzhi po 'di dag ni sems
177a4(dkon brtsegs): con thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa dang / yod byed du gyur pa rnams yin no// lags bzengs byang chub sems dpa' yang rag lus sems can thams cad kyi
177a5(dkon brtsegs): bar spyad pa dang yo byad du gyur par byed de// sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa
177a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nad pa dang / mgon med pa rnams la yongs su spyad pa bya ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas bye brag du 'gyur ro// de mgo dang gos la me
177a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba bzhin du// gzhan gyi snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig dang / rjes mthun pa dang / mthun par byed pa dang / yang dang po bged pa dang // thogs byed pa dang /
177a8(dkon brtsegs): grogs su 'gyur ba dang / dge ba mthun pa dang / don mthun pas rjes su zhugs nas mngon du dad par byas shing bsdus te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la
177a9(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi sems dang /
177b1(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do// 'dul lo 'god do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o// rdzogs pa'i
177b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi theg pa la 'dzud// 'dul lo 'god do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni/ mdung thun dag gis bzlog kyang mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du dam
177b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi rgyu dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshod dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi ched dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang / dge ba'i ched dang / grang
177b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang bkres pa dang / kom pa dang // sha sbrang dang / brang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis
177b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / ngal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gnyid dang / mi dga' ba dang / lus dang srog kyang khyad du/
177b6(dkon brtsegs): gsodo de/ mkhas pa lai lo med pa ni mdung zung dag gis bzlog kyang / de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched la lho'i
177b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang khyed du gsod do// lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du 'phagasod do// mi'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// yi dgas kyi sdug
177b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug sleng khyed tu gsod do// mkhas pa lI ni me
178a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni mthung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / de mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba thob par bya/
178a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus bstan zhing brtul ba bstan no//
178a3(dkon brtsegs): de brtson 'grus 'di dang rtul ba 'di mngon gsum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / brtsam par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bskul ba dang / sems
178a4(dkon brtsegs): cad dgro la ba dang / sems can thams cad dbu gos dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
178a5(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// mngon gsum du byas pa dang / brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad ngasgral
178a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen thob par bya ba dang // sangs
178a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang
178a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dren mo ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang / mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am cung zad chung zar
178b1(dkon brtsegs): du yang snyom las dang le lo spang ba dang / dor ba dang bstsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am chung zad chung zad du yang brtson 'grus dang rtul pa la
178b2(dkon brtsegs): slob dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing skyid rtsa
178b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /
178b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol
178b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med
178b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang // mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus 'dod pa
178b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba dge slongab thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam
178b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// lag bzangs de lta na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshogs cung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus
179a1(dkon brtsegs): myur du skyen par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
179a2(dkon brtsegs): bam po// // lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la
179a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mig gis gzugs rnams thong na/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdoms
179a4(dkon brtsegs): bas sdoms par gnas pas/ 'jig rten na brna ba sems dang mi bde ba dang / sdig mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdams pa'i
179a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/ mig gi dbang po sdoms par byed do// de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / sna dris rnams tshor ba dang / lces ro rnams myong
179a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg pa dang / yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/
179a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdoms bsam bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba dang / sdigs pa mi dge ba'i chos
179a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdams pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/ yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do// de
179b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'am 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam nyal lam cang mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas dang / zhi gnas kyi gnas mi 'dor ro// rnam par mi
179b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ro// de lag pa mi rgod pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig mi mang ba dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang / mi pa rgod pa dang /
179b3(dkon brtsegs): to ma col med pa dang / lus 'khrul pa med pa dang / ngag 'khrul pa med pa dang / sems can 'khrul pa med pa dang / dben yang rung mi dben yang rung / sprod
179b4(dkon brtsegs): lam mi nyams pa yin no// bza' ba dang / btung ba dang mal ca dang / stan dang / gnas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yod byed ji lta bu yang rung ba dag gis
179b5(dkon brtsegs): cho ga shes shing / gso sla ba dang / dgang slab dang / rim gro bya sla ba dang / cho ga dang spyod yul dge ba dang / 'du 'dzi las dben pa'i spyod yul yin// thog
179b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam shing 'gyur ba med de/ ma khengs mdud pa yin/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bstod pa dang / smang ba dang / grags pa
179b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma grags pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / 'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ ma khengs ma dud pa yin/ mdza' bo dang / dgra dang dge ba dang / mi dge
179b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mthun pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang / mi 'thun pa dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams
180a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dben pa dang lang long rnams yang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de// ma khengs mdud pa yin/ gzugs sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa/
180a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang 'thun pa dang mi 'thun pa med pa yin/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams la yang mthun pa dang mi mthun
180a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// de 'dod pa rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun tu bslang nas/ log par rnam par rtog pas ro myang ba yin pas keng rus lta bur yid la byed
180a4(dkon brtsegs): do// 'dod pa rnams ni dgra mang ba'i phyir sha sna gu lta bur yid byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni blangs na sdug bsngal la yongs su btang na bde ba rtswa me
180a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bur yid byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyir shing gi rtse mo'i shing rtog lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i
180a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ slong ba pa lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni skad cig tsam zhig nor pas dga' ba'i phyir rmi lam lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams
180a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni nyes par spyod pa zam cad kyi dngos
180a8(dkon brtsegs): po yin pa dang / ngan 'gro leg par ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchil ba lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni ngoms pa
180b1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang / skom pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir cha nu ltar yid la byed do// de 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa
180b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang //
180b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrub ste/ gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang / bral zhing nang yongs su
180b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
180b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/
180b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrub ste gnas so//
180b7(dkon brtsegs): de ba de bas yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid blang ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yi
180b8(dkon brtsegs): ba btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi sgrub te gnaso// de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams
181a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa tshad med pa bsgrub ste gnas so// sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa bsgrubs te gan so//
181a2(dkon brtsegs): de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa bsgrubs te/ gnas so// de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal yang med pa yid la byed
181a3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ btang snyoms tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas te// de gzugs la rags pas 'du shes yid la mi byed cing // na mkha' la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas//
181a4(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgribs te gnas so// de rnams par shes pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skyed mched bsgrubs
181a5(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so// de ci yang med pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rnam shes ci yang med skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// de 'du shes med 'du shese me
181a6(dkon brtsegs): min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gin so// de rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba ci
181a7(dkon brtsegs): spyir gnas shing ci ltar 'dug pa bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la yang rgyun thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rgyun ring ba rnams la yang rgyun ri ba'i 'du shes yid la
181a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung po bsgrubs te gan so// de sems can gyi lus rnams la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas/ mi sdug pa'i
181b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bsgrub te gnas so// de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas/ 'chi ba'i 'du shes bslabs te gnas so// de na pa dang dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ma yid
181b2(dkon brtsegs): yo byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bsgrub te gnas so// de kha zas yongs su tshol ba dang / 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang / gnod pa'i rgyud yid la byed pas/
181b3(dkon brtsegs): kha zas la mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes bsgrub te gnas so// de khyim dang grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jig rten thams cad la 'byor pa dang 'bral ba'i
181b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyir yid la byed pa dang / nags tshal rmang du byung ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba rmad du byung ba dang / bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas 'jig
181b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes bsgrub ste gnas so// de nang gzugs tshad 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung du kha dog bam
181b6(dkon brtsegs): bo dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil kyi gnon pa'i skye mched dang po bsgrubs te gnaso// de nang gzugasu 'du shes pas
181b7(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gyi gzugs chu ngu med pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid le byed pas zil kyis gnon pas pa'i skye mched gnyis
181b8(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ de shi ba'i lus bsreg pa de la rung ngam chus thal ba yang med par byed pa'i 'du shes dang / zhigs pa la phye ma yang
182a1(dkon brtsegs): / n+ya t+ya/ med pa dang / rdul du gyur pa la yang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jig pa bsgoms shing bsgrubs te/ nang gzugs med par 'du/
182a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan nyid yid la byed pas/ zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa bsgrub
182a3(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so// de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/ phyi rol gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzangs po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar
182a4(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas/ zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs/
182a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa bsgrub te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs//
182a6(dkon brtsegs): med par 'du shes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang // tshad med pa yid 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas//
182a7(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun pa dang brgyad pa bsgrubs te gnas so// des 'di mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas
182a8(dkon brtsegs): zad par sar bsgrubs te gnas so// de chu dang me dang klung dang / sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa ma
182b1(dkon brtsegs): yas so// zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pasazad par nu dang / zad par med nga zad par rlung dang / sngon po dang zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang /
182b2(dkon brtsegs): zad dkar po dang / zad par na mkha' dang / zad par rnam par shes par bsgrubs te gnaso// de snyoms par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmig
182b3(dkon brtsegs): bya la sems nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
182b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs mi chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi skra dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsungs tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa
182b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon gyi smon lam la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par byang ba bya ba la
182b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i dkar po la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams
182b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so// de bsam gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang ldan par bas
182b8(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed do// sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mi gnas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ na mkha'i khams
183a1(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do//
183a2(dkon brtsegs): de ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan dga' 'o// de bsam gtan de dang ting
183a3(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang / snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /
183a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbyugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
183a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa/ langs nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams
183a6(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol ba dang / sems can dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
183a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob
183a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dus su su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo 'bad do//
183b1(dkon brtsegs): dus dus su 'am cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / sems mnyam par gzhag par slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs
183b2(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do/ srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lags bzangs byang chub sem
183b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu/
183b4(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa de dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med yin no//
183b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems ma nyams par bzhag pa skyed par 'dod pa dang /
183b6(dkon brtsegs): bslob kyi sems mnyam par bzhag pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slobs pa'i
183b7(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par skyed par 'dod pa de ni/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba'i mtha'
183b8(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa yin no// lags bzangs de lta na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yin bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngam du
184a1(dkon brtsegs): dus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
184a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba thos pa
184a3(dkon brtsegs): mang ba thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bstsags pa/ don shes pa/ bshad pa shes pa/ dpyod pa can ci ltar thos pa'i don la yongasu rtog pa de dag la snyen cing sten te//
184a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed do// de thos pa'i ched dang / bshad pa'i ched dang / don gyi ched dang / don la yongasu brtag pa'i ched dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po la bsnyen
184a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba'i tshod la// grangs pa yang khyad du gsod/ tsha ba dang bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis
184a6(dkon brtsegs): reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan pa 'ongs pa'i tshig gi lam dang / lus kyi tsher ba drag pa'i rtsub pa mi bzad pa/ srog 'chad par 'char ba
184a7(dkon brtsegs): yang khyad du gsod do// de chos rnams la ni rin po cher 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos nyan pa rnams
184a8(dkon brtsegs): la ni dkon rnyed par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yong phyur srog par 'du shes/ chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du shes/
184b1(dkon brtsegs): chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rangs brgyar mig rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/
184b2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams kying rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang skye mchod rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bde ba rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dus dang
184b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bstsags pa yang rab tu shes so// khams rnams ci ltar rab tu shes she na// khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas dang
184b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ad shem byas shes bya ba ste// khams gnyis po de dag go// 'du shes kyi khams ni gang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rang ste/ ske ba
184b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gnas pa dang / 'gag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ skye ba med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang /
184b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa med pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba ste/ de ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes so// gzhan yang khams gsum
184b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so// dge ba'i khams dang / mi dge ba'i khams dang / lung ma snyan pa'i khams dang gsum pa de dag go// dge ba'i khams ni gang / mi dge
184b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khams rnying / lung du ma stan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci
185a1(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ste/ zhe sdang med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang ldan/
185a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa dang chags pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug dang ti mug dang ldan pa
185a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi dge ba'i khams zhes bya'o// de gnyis la ma gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams
185a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum rab tu shes te// gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i kham so de 'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/
185a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang lha ma yin dang / mi 'am rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i da
185a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rnams te// gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang zhe sdang
185a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug/ dang / yid kyis smon lham dang / smon lam 'bebs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams shes bya'o// gzugs kyi khams
185a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ tshangs ris kyis lha rnams dang // tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'ogs
185b1(dkon brtsegs): dge rlung dang mang meng dge dang dge rgyas dang / sprin meng dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu rtse dang / 'du shes rmed pa'i sems can dang / mis pa dang /
185b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug pa dang / yid
185b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis smon pa dang / smon lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams zhes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na// na mkha' mtha'
185b4(dkon brtsegs): yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye bar 'gro ba'i
185b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skyed mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te// gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang zhe sdang dang gtigs
185b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smon lami 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin de ni/ gzugs med pa'i khams shes bya ste/ de ltar
185b7(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / 'dus
185b8(dkon brtsegs): byas kyi khams shes bya ba khams bzhi po de dag ste/ de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes so// drug gang zhe na/ 'dod
185b9(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams dang /
186a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams dang / gnod sems kyi khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i dang / mngon par 'byung ba'i khams dang // gnod sems med
186a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams dang / rnam 'tshe ba med pa'i khams dang / khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ sa'i khan
186a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams te// khams drag po de dag rab tu shes so//
186a4(dkon brtsegs): de la so'i khams ni mi brtan pa 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o// de
186a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa 'gyur
186a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos can te// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de dag med pa ste/ de ltar khams drag rab tu shes so// de chos
186a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gnyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa ni/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang /
186a8(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga rab tu shes so// gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bu dang / ngan pa dang 'jigs pa dang ring
186b1(dkon brtsegs): du mi gnas pa dang / nor ba la ni nu'i chu bur dang / ngan pa dang 'jigs pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la ni mig rgyu lta bu dang / ngan pa dang 'jigs
186b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed rnams la ni rku shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang 'jigs pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang // rnam par shes pa la ni sgra ma
186b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dang / ngan pa dang 'jigs pa dang / ring du mi gnas par de ltar phung po lnga rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongasu
186b4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa na/ nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig ning gi skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang skye
186b5(dkon brtsegs): mched drug po de dag go// de la mig nang gi skye mched ni/ na ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can/ 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa
186b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi mau dang / gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba'i dang / mya ngan dang /
186b7(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'jug pa rnam kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar ta shes
186b8(dkon brtsegs): so// de bzhin rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched la yang na ba'i n+dan dang / rga ba'i chos can/ 'chi ba'i chos can dang kaM bdag
187a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang rga ba/
187a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / na pa dang 'che ba dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gtu drug gi me kun
187a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar ba dang // skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
187a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar dang / sa so// gzha
187a5(dkon brtsegs): yang phyi'i skye mched drug rab dag rab tu shes so// gzhan dmig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang / rna bas rnam par
187a6(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya bar bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
187a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya bar reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos phyi'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste// skye mched drag po de dag go// de la mig
187a8(dkon brtsegs): gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs kyi phyira'i skye mchod la skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang nyam chung ba ste// de la rtag pa 'a
187a9(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nang gi skye mched drug po dag rab tu shes so//
187b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'am/ zer zug pa'am de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid mA/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar
187b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de ni yod// sems rmongs par byed pa de ni/ yod de/ gang ci yang yod pa dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam pa
187b3(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes pa
187b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba che'i skye mched la yang skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyam chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ ther gzugs
187b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin ni gang yang med kyi sgyu ma de ni yod// sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par
187b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni yod do// gang ci yang rung yod par phyi'i skye mched drag po de ltar rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyin cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing
187b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so// bzhi gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
187b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i las 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag go// phung po lnga rnams dang / khams drug
188a1(dkon brtsegs): po dag dang / nang gi skye mched drug po dag dang / phyi'i skye mched drug po gang yin pa de ni/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ste/ sdug bsngal de ni mi/
188a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o// 'dod chags dang
188a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gtig mug dang / nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa dang / bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no// snyam du bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang
188a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur ro//
188a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / 'du shes can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'du shes can du ma yin par 'gyur ro// skam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa la 'du shes can ma
188a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'ang ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / phung po rnams bdag go// snyam pa dang / phung po rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / phung po rnams la
188a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag snyam pa dang / bdag la phung po rnams snyam pa dang / khams rnams dang skye mched rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams las bdag
188a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan no// snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag go// snyam pa dang / bdag la skye mched rnams so snyam pa dang / tshor po dag go snyam pa dang / tshor
188b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can mang yin pa chung ngu dag go// snyam pa dang gzugs can
188b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa dag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go// snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag go// snyam
188b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtag kyang rtag pa mi rtag kyang mi rtag go// snyam pa dang / rtag pa yang myi mchis nyal bar 'gyur ba na/ mi shes rab pa chal ba'i rang bzhin
188b4(dkon brtsegs): can phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas/ mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na/ mchis nyal ba de la/ kye skyes du kho bo'i
188b5(dkon brtsegs): gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu 'am/ lo nyi sha tsam ma na yul gzhan du phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir
188b6(dkon brtsegs): byin cig ces de'i sug par gter 'dems par bgyid cing / de ltar btams nas yul gzhan du mchis par gyur la/ mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis
188b7(dkon brtsegs): nyal ba de la yang bu yang ma mchis bu mo yang ma mchis/ 'khor kyang ma mchis la/ de nas mi de yul gzhan du mchis nas/ ring po ma lags par de yang/
188b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na/ nor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad tshab 'tshal bar gyur pa'i slad na/ mi de slar mchis nas/ sul ci skad bgyir
189a1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang zhig nyan thos nyi rtse bar spyod pa nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa/ zla bo ma mchis
189a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yun ring por mi gnas pa la dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'dems par bgyid na/ de yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags so//
189a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'od srung legs so legs so// ngas kyang de ltar shes te/ 'on kyang khyod las dpe spobs pa de lta bu thos na skyes bya
189a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa de dag kun tu skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur bas na/ ngas shes bzhin du khyod la dris pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'ad
189a5(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag dpe gnyis pa brjod par yang spobs lags te// bcom ldan 'das 'di
189a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper bgyi na/ mi brod nang ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can bro nad dang bral ba dgung lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tsho ba/ gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab
189a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa/ longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa/ rus phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs paM/ dge ba'i ngang tshul
189a8(dkon brtsegs): can byams pa dang ldan pa/ snying rje che ba/ yid dga' ba dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi skyon dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams la btang snyoms su 'dog ga
189b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa da can du mi la la mig 'chis nas/
189b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po la btang snyoms su 'jog pa skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams
189b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du zhugs pa dang / brtul ba bstan pa la la zhig chis 'gyul/ 'di skad ces kyi skyes
189b4(dkon brtsegs): bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis khyod kyis gter 'di legs par sba ba dang / legs par bsrung bar gyis shig/ kho bo gang gi tshe
189b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu'am/ nyi shu tsam na/ yu gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la byin rtag pa yang ma yin no// snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod
189b6(dkon brtsegs): do snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no// snyam pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med do// snyam pa dang // mtha' yod pa yang ma yin
189b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi ba'i 'og tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snyam pa dang / 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung
189b8(dkon brtsegs): ngo snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shinas 'byung ba yang ma yin/ mi 'byung ba sangs yin no// snyam pa dang / srog de lus de yin snyam pa dang / srog kyang gan
189b9(dkon brtsegs): galus kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang / sems can 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can yod
190a1(dkon brtsegs): pa las chad de/ 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang byed pa de myong ba de yin no snyam pa dang / byed pa yang gzhan myong ba yang gzhan no snyam
190a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / 'di na bdag de lta bu 'am/ bdag
190a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/ gzhan du 'gyur ba 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de ltar 'byung bar
190a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ram gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'dir bdag sngon byung ngam/ bdag da ltar byung ngam/ bdag gzhan du byung ngam snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen
190a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas dang / mngon par zhen pa dang / nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal dang snyoms pa dang /
190a6(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal byed pa dang / bdag tu smra ba'i len pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal gang yin pa thams cad dang / lus sam ngag gam/
190a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod par gtogs pa 'am/
190a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su gtogs pa 'am/ gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//
190b1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / nga rgyal zad pa dang / bdag tu mngon par zhen pa spangs pa de ni/ dug tu smra
190b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i len pa spangs pa de ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang sdug lnga yang sdig sngal dang / kun 'byung ba la yang kun 'byeng
190b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'gog pa la yang 'gog pa dang / lam la yang lam du yid la byed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la nyes dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang / mya ngan las
190b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la phan yon du lta zhing gnas dang / ci ltar mthong ba dang / byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag
190b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge/
190b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de 'phags pa'i
190b7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog la khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig pa na/ 'dus byas kyi khams la ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
190b8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa dang / bdag med par mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas kyi khams la ni/ skyabs dang gnas dang mgon dang / dpung gnyen yang mthong la/ 'dus ma byas
191a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams mngon gsum du yang mi byed do// de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag rab tu shes so// de chos de dag
191a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ rten cing cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed rnam
191a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyis ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyis skye mched drag dang
191a4(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug gi rkyen kyis reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen kyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen
191a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen kyi skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen kyis rga shi ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa dang / mi mthong ba gang yin pa
191a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// gang chung zad lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba
191a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba'am/ gzugs kyi khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams
191a8(dkon brtsegs): su nye bar 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed rnams shes bya'o// de las byung ba gang ci yang rung / sems shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa
191b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// de las byung ba gang ci yang rung / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa de ni ming zhes bya'o// gang ci yang rung lhan
191b2(dkon brtsegs): cig byung ba mer mer po'i gzugs dang / rdzus te byung ba'i gzugs dang / rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs shes bya'o ste/ de gnyis ni ming dang gzugs shes
191b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de las byung ba mig dang / rna ba dang sta dang / lce dang / lus dang yid de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// mig la rten cing gzugs la yang brten te/
191b4(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'das pa ni reg pa'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang chos rnams la brten te/ yid
191b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa ste/ de ni rig pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang
191b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin bden pa yang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsum zhes bya'o// de nas byung ba 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang / dga' ba de ni sred pa zhes bya'o//
191b7(dkon brtsegs): de las byung ba kun tu chags pa dang // lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang bdag tu smra ba'i de ni len pa zhes bya'o// de las byung ba gzug
191b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang mngon
192a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'grub pa de ni skye ba zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de 'gyur ba dang / 'jig pa dang / nye bar khrid pa de ni rga ba zhes bya'o// gang srid pa de
192a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho ba dang 'bral ba de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o// de de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la dpyod cing yongs su rtog la khong du chud par byed cing / rnam par
192a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa nas rlom sems su mi byed do// sa las mngon par dga' mi byed do// chu dang me dang rlung dang na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa la gcig pa dang /
192a4(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las
192a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa rloms sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi
192a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de rten cing 'brel blar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rje su mthong ba na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /
192a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam pa 'jog go// de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su
192a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba na/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags
192b1(dkon brtsegs): bas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gag pas tshor ba
192b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gags/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gas pas
192b3(dkon brtsegs): rga shi 'gags par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba khong du chud par byed cing / rnam par 'jig ste/ de de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byunga'i 'gog pa yang nga dag
192b4(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mthong yang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'gog pa rab tu shes so//
192b5(dkon brtsegs): de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ dus gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus dang / ma 'ongs
192b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus te/ de dag ni dus gsum rnams shes bya'o/ 'du byed gang la 'gag pa de ni 'das pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed
192b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la la ma 'ongs pa'i dus shes bya'o// 'du byed gang la la da ltar byung ba da ltar du gyur pa de ni da ltar byung ba'i du shes bya'o// de 'das pa'i dus
192b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtse ba rnams rjes su dran na/ smod cing bsrung ste nges par spong ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i kyi bdag mi dge ba rtsa ba rdul tsam la yang /
193a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong / yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par smin par mthong / 'jigs par mthong / zhing gnas so// da ltar byung ba'i dus
193a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/ lus sdoms pas bsdams/ dag sdoms pas bsdams/ yid sdoms pas bsdams/ dbang po drug po sngo
193a3(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdams so// de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub du sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la smon pa dang / byang chub
193a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la smon lam 'debs pa rjes su dran zhing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dod pa drag po dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /
193a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
193a6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskyed pa/
193a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub smon lam 'debs pa yang 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems sen thams cad bsgral
193a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs
193b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// ma 'ongs dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / byang chub tu sems
193b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / byang chub smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lAm 'debs pa yang 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems can
193b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
193b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod do// mos so/ yid kyis smon to// da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang / dge
193b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen
193b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtog par rgyun du mi 'dor ro// nyams par mi byed do// brjed par
193b7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// bag med par mi byed do// gang 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams skye mched de ni 'das pa dang / 'gags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa
193b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de ni 'di ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched de ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba yod
