194a1(dkon brtsegs): yong pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med pa'o// gang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched de ni mi
194a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mi 'dug pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// skad cig la de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan gnas pa'i
194a3(dkon brtsegs): dus kyang gzhan/ 'gags pa'i dus kyang gzhan gang yin pa'i skad cig de ni gnas med pa/ 'dag pa med pa'o// skad gcig gis dus gang yin pa de ni nang
194a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched do// nang dang phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so// da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang
194a5(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad cig tsam yang mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa ste/ mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa la ni bdag gam/ bdag gi med pa'o//
194a6(dkon brtsegs): de gang gi tshe ma 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe ma skyes pa ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin no// bdag tu ma gyur cing bdag gir ma gyur pa'o// gang gi tshe 'das te 'gas
194a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma byung ste yod pa ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa nyid 'gyur ro// gang dus gsum dag tu bdag med cing
194a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi med pa de ni ma byung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o// 'di ni nga'o// bdag gi 'di ni yod do zhes
194b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu lta bar 'os pa ma yin no// di srid pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la bdag me'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /
194b2(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes can du gnas te/ 'gog pa mngon gsum du byed pa yang ma yin no// gang de ltar dus su ma rngab tu shes
194b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni chos de nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i theg pa dang / tshangs
194b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pa dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa te/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /
194b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang da lha'i theg pa'o// byams pa ni tshangs pa'i theg pa ste/ snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang tshangs pa'i theg pa'o//
194b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang
194b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i rtsol ba dang // yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni
194b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o// de dus dus su lha'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/
195a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus su dus su 'phags pa'i theg pa sgom zhing / sems can rnams kyang de la 'god la rnam par grol
195a2(dkon brtsegs): ba 'phags pa mngon sum yang mi byed do// gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
195a3(dkon brtsegs): dang // theg pa chen po ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// mos pa dman pa dang / dbang po dman pa skad cig tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed/ sred par
195a4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed dang 'dor te skad de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phan yon mthong nas/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po
195a5(dkon brtsegs): dag khong du chud pa dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang / rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa 'bring dang / dbang po 'bring/
195a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dben par dga' ba dang / rang gi don lhar len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar
195a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon pa dang / rang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
195a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen
195b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bkang bar 'dod pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang / 'jig
195b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi don tu 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lta ba dang / 'khor ba'i bde ba la yang smon pa mang ba yin na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la smon pa mang ba lta smos kyi
195b3(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos te/ tshul khrims dang spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mdo sde rnams klog pa dang / kha
195b4(dkon brtsegs): ton du byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / yid la byed pa rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa de
195b5(dkon brtsegs): dag dregre bra'i bshes gnyen yin pa dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs po bden pa dang / gtong ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la slob pa dang / shes
195b6(dkon brtsegs): bya thams cad nyan pa dang / len pa dang 'dzin pa dang / dpyod par dga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yang dag par bskyed
195b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa dang / rang gi don la mi lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi don lhur len pa dang / stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsu
195b8(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dgod par 'dod pa dang / dgod par spro ba dang / bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / mi byed pa dang / mi skyod pa dang
196a1(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang / rtag par rgyun tu byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes
196a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ de lta theg pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so// de chos de dge nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/ dge ba'i thabs rab tu shes
196a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
196a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes dmigs par byed do// de
196a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag lan cig 'tshal ba na mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// snyam du sems sked do// de byang chub smon pa na/ sems can
196a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
196a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin du skyabs su 'gro ba na yang
196a8(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed do// de 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'khrus byed pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / zhing med pa dang / sa 'on
196b1(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa dang / las thams cad byed pa na yang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon las gdabs par bya'o// zhes sems bskyed do// mang du/
196b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa na sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can tham
196b3(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mtha' yas shing
196b4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab po zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang // 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog
196b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jig rten thas
196b6(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
196b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir smon lam gangadab bo zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// de dge ba'i ci spyod kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /
196b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro'i rgyud gcad pa dang / nye bar sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / mya ngan
197a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan
197a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs
197a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su skye bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi
197a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs
197a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams bskal bar bzhugs pa dang / bskal bar chos ston pa dang / bskal bar dge 'dun 'thun par
197a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yongs su sngo bar byed do// mtho ris kyi lam la dgod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam dgod pa
197a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ sbyin pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ snyan par skabs rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don spyod pas rjes su 'jug pa'am/ don 'thun pas rjes su 'jug
197a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ ci lta ci ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par skyid cing dge ba'i rdzogs par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu sheso// de chos kyi tshig 'di dge
197b1(dkon brtsegs): kha nyin cig bzhin du dus dus su 'jug go// yid la byed de// de 'di lta ste 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad na/ yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs
197b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la/ gan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag 'tshal/ 'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyim med cing / mi mnyam/
197b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas so// yon tan dpag med de dag thams cad la ka/ bdag ni mgo bos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas dang ni chos
197b4(dkon brtsegs): dang tshogs rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams// gang yang rgyal lam stongs par mi 'gyur bar/ de ltar gsol ba mtha' yas
197b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'debs/ zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston mdzad cing / bskal pa ma lus rnams su bzhugs par yang // 'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la// /
197b6(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs/ sngon dang 'di dang skad tsam yang rung / bdag gis sdig pa gang dang gang bgyis pa/ sdig pa de dag than
197b7(dkon brtsegs): cang smad par bgyi/ sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spangs par bgyi/ skad cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di/ ma lus par ni yang dag bzung bar bgyi/
197b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dis ci tsam thub kyi bar du ni// dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal/ sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub rtsa
198a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ 'jig rten 'dir ni byung dang byung gyur dang / 'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang / rgyal ba rnams dang
198a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa thams cad kyi/ tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang / rnam grol tshe dang chos rnams gang yin pa/ de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur
198a3(dkon brtsegs): cig/ 'gro ba lnga'i sems can ni dag/ byung dang byung 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi/ dge ba dag la bdag ni phyi phyir zhing / mgo bos mtha' yas
198a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su yid rang ngo // yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa/ de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas// sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid
198a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'ang / yod par dag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'debs/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar thams cad kyis/
198a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du// dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang
198a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams// bskal pa'i bzhugs pas 'phongs par ma gyur cig/ bar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang // pha rol phyin pa
198a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rdzogs par shog/ sems can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang // 'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad
198b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad cang rdzogs 'gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la rig par/ de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing / tshe ring
198b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang rnam par grol ba dang / khyad par can gyi don kun rdzogs par shog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam 'debs pa ni// mtha' yas dpag tu med par
198b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'debs/ sems can thams cad bdag gi sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs dag ni nye bar zhir gyur cig/ chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir/
198b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi/ rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ rang gi lus ni nges par dbul bar bgyi/ rdzogs byang
198b5(dkon brtsegs): nub thob par 'gyur bar du/ ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdab/ skye dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la/ bdag ni yongasu spyad par bgyid
198b6(dkon brtsegs): bar shog/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi/ dkon mchog gsuM dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ na mkha' mnyam pa'i lha'i spos
198b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang / 'phreng ba me tog chu bos mchod byes shog/ lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang de ngul dag dang / gos dang rin po che'i phung po dang / gzhal
198b8(dkon brtsegs): med khang bcas bzhon dang mal che dang / bza' btung mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing / skyabs
199a1(dkon brtsegs): dang lus dang pha 'drar gyur par shog/ bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang / 'gro la chos ni rab tu ston gyur cig/
199a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum phyir go ca sra ba bgo// pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing / sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs
199a3(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs byed shog/ sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus dag dang / yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig/ byang chub las ni mi ldog bdag 'gyur cing /
199a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob/ bdag gis tshe
199a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams de dag kun la yang // 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyi/ de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsregs pa rab tu shes so//
199a6(dkon brtsegs): de shes rab de dang ye shes de mngon gsum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can
199a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs kyi chos thams cad
199a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do dang // mngon sum du byed pa dang / yi lnga byed pa dang / mngon gsum du byas pa dang / yid la
199b1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas kyang / sems can thams cad bskal ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad
199b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// gal te shes rab dang ye
199b3(dkon brtsegs): shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ chung zad chung zad du'ang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang /
199b4(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa spangs pa dang / dor ba dang / bskyal bar rtsol lo 'bad do/ dus dus su 'am/ chung zad chung zad chud yang shes rab dang / ye shes la slob pa
199b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
199b6(dkon brtsegs): sgying lugs par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /
199b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid/ de dag gi shes rab tu dge ba dang /
199b8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rmad du sems can thams cadal
200a1(dkon brtsegs): zag med pa'i shes rab skyed par 'dod pa dang / zag med pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab
200a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni/ shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes pa thams cad kyi mchog yin/ de ni dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lag bzangs de ltar
200a3(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang zhing / tshegs chung ngu dang sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
200a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang nga rgya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med par dag theg
200a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum dang / mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
200a7(dkon brtsegs): po lag bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid
200a8(dkon brtsegs): rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
200b1(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las/ lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u shes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs s+ho//
200b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya su ra ta pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha' ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs/
200b3(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ nges pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
200b4(dkon brtsegs): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mtsho la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag
200b5(dkon brtsegs): ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
200b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas pa rim gror byas/ mchod
200b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas so// de'i tshe nyan thos kyi grong khyer na/ grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dad pa mi phye ba dang ldan pa/ chos la dad pa mi byed/
200b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa/ dge 'dun pa dad pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa byam pa
201a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ snying rje la gnas te/ yid yod da su skyo ba med pa/ dga' ba la gnas te/
201a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi kan dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi skyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
201a3(dkon brtsegs): chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngon gyi tshul/ phun sum tshogs pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / dbul por
201a4(dkon brtsegs): ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas grongs khyer gyi dbul po des pa shin tu 'dod
201a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid 'khrugs pa med pa/ rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa/ gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon
201a6(dkon brtsegs): du mi lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems bsrung ba bsgom pa med pa/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ tshig shes shing dgang sla la gse sla pa/ bsam pa
201a7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa/ g.yo med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ bka' blo bde ba/ 'thun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na
201a8(dkon brtsegs): lo'i snod thogs pa/ rtswa bting ba la nyal bgos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzangs yang rung ngan kyang rung bgo ba shal byas nas za ba//
201b1(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba chos nyan par 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mngon
201b2(dkon brtsegs): na dga' ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yid dam la bstan nam mi bstan bdag gis brtag go//
201b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la tshig ngan padag gis gshe zhing sbyor bar
201b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do// bong ba dang / dbyugs pa dang / mtshon ca dag kyang bstan/ na/ nges pa de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed/ de mi 'khrugs cing gnod
201b5(dkon brtsegs): sems mi skyed do// de nas lha'i dbang po ngargya byin gyi min gzhan dag cig tu sprul nas/ nges pa de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ nges pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gi
201b6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo cag ni khyod kyis don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ci ste khyod 'dod pa lta ni khyod la sdig pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gis char gcad par
201b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// zhes smras so// des pas smras pa/ grogs po dag thong de skad ma zer cig/ gal te mi 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bu dus du/
201b8(dkon brtsegs): gtubs su zin kyang / kho bo ri mi dag la sdig pa'i sems mi skyed do// grogs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang / mi dge bo'i phyogs gnyis la gan/
202a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o// mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o// de bas na kho bo ni sems
202a2(dkon brtsegs): can pha rol tshig bza bar byed par yang mi 'dod na/ gtse ba lta ci smos/ de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa bon tsha ba rnams kyi ni/ 'bras
202a3(dkon brtsegs): bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur// sa bon dang ra ba rnams kyi ni/ 'bras bu dang ra ba skye bar 'gyur/ dpe zlar bya ba 'di yis na// sdig pa'i rnams smin tsha ba dang // dkar
202a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'bras bu dang ra dwa yang // mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur/ rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid kyi/ sdig pa'i rnams gsum mi bya zhing // gzhan dag byed
202a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang mkhas pa yis/ rjes su dga' bar mi bya'o// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi/ dkar po rnams gsum tu bya// gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa/ gzhan
202a6(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang yirang bya/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na/ nges pa la dbyig dang / gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so//
202a7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa 'on 'di las khyer la sbyin pa dag byin cig/ bsod nams ngag gyis shig/ gos dang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig/ khyod ngan cing dbul bas ci zhig/
202a8(dkon brtsegs): bya/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po sngon sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pas 'dir dbul
202b1(dkon brtsegs): bo zhes bya bar gyur to// de bas na kho bo ni ma byin par len pa byed par mi 'dod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ nges pa khyod da ltar bde bar 'tsho bar gyis shig/ 'jig rten pa
202b2(dkon brtsegs): rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs po gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i yin gyi/ mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi mched tsher 'dzin
202b3(dkon brtsegs): to// 'dod pas zil kyis non pa dang / zhe sdang gis zil kyi non pa dang // gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / 'dod chags kyis zil kyis non pa dag ni ma byin
202b4(dkon brtsegs): par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no// sgyogs 'jogs ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni sngogs
202b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jogs mi byed do// bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / bcas shing yong su 'dzin pa dang / bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu
202b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin cing yongasu 'dzin par mi byed do// lus dang srog la lta ba dag ni/ ma byin len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o// ngoms
202b7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes shing tshogs mi shes pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes pa yin no// mtsho ba yongasu ma dag
202b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni mtsho ba yong su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas
203a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'tshal yongs su dag pa yin no// las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas bdag ni las mthong ba
203a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// rnam par 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to// byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni
203a3(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no// phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas
203a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no// gzhan yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon
203a5(dkon brtsegs): cig/ bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang // gang dag la ni gtod med pa/ de dag 'jig rten 'dir bul zhes/ thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad/ gang la
203a6(dkon brtsegs): zin cig med bzhin du/ de ni gtong la rab gnas na/ de ni 'jig rten nor che zhes/ yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad/ gang la sdig med 'phags
203a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ rnam pa kun gyi mdzes pa yin/ byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni/ shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin/ mkhas pa dag gis spyod bla'i/ byis pas bsngab
203a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta min/ byis pa sdig pa bsngags par byed/ mkhas pa dag ni sdig la smod/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dus gzhan zhig na mi gan
203b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig sprul to// de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te/ nges pa las 'di skad ces smras so// kye nges pa gser khyer la kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la
203b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod gcig pus che bzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyi der kho bo'i che bzhi gyis shis shig/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po thong khyod de skad ma zer cig/ kho bo na
203b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzun zer du mi 'dod do// kye grogs po rdzun du smra ba ni bdag la yang slu zhing / pha rol la yang slu la/ 'phags pa la yang slu ba yin te/ grogs po dmas
203b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / yid ni so pa dang / yid du mi 'dres par byed pa dang / bskus par byed pa dang / sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs
203b5(dkon brtsegs): po rdzan du sla ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po rdzun du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la ku ba dang / dran
203b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rmugs par byed pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib pa yin no// kye grogs po rdzun du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis brtsan par mi bya ba dang /
203b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang / mkhas pa rnams smad po dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongasu
203b8(dkon brtsegs): skong bya'i gcod pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras//
204a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni// rdul pa'i dri yang mnam par 'gyur/ dgon par ci ltar bcom pa bzhin/ sngon gyi dkar rnams spongs par
204a2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang // 'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed// mi ni gang zhig rdzun zer ba// de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur// rdzun
204a3(dkon brtsegs): du slu bar byed pa de// sdig pa kun gyi rtsa ba dang // dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod dang // ngan 'gro 'gro ba zhes kyang bya/ gal te 'dzam gling gang ba'i// gser
204a4(dkon brtsegs): dge khyod kyis byin na yang // kho bo chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ rtag tu rdzun na ni smra mi byed/ de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mis/ nges pa rdzun zer du gzhag
204a5(dkon brtsegs): ma nus sa song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo bde sgrogs la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed gnyis song ba la brtul zhugs dang dka'
204a6(dkon brtsegs): thub byed pa 'di ci/ 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam/ 'on te 'dod pa don tu mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo//
204a7(dkon brtsegs): bde stsogs dang / lha'i bu mo gnyis 'ad nam nangs nas/ phyogs gang na nges pa'i 'dug pa'i phyogs der slong nas/ nges pa la tshig snyan par smras te/ des
204a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhengs bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi bsnyer bkur bgyid pa lag so// nges pa bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/
204a9(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'od dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo
204b1(dkon brtsegs): sha tshugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / lus byug pa dang / rgyan dang chas dang / lhab lhub bdag la gzigs/ na tshod dang po'i lang tsho la bab pa la/
204b2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ des pa khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'di dra ba bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ nges pas bltas nas smras pa/ khyed
204b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni sems can thams dmyal ba dang / bdud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi snyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ lha dang
204b4(dkon brtsegs): mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin no// khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo // khyed gnyis gzugs ni dbug pa dang //
204b5(dkon brtsegs): chu bur dang / smig rgyu lta bur kho bos mthong ngo // khyed tsan dan gyi 'de gus byugs pa ni pags pa rlon ba shas yog pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi rgyan dang
204b6(dkon brtsegs): lba ba lbu ba ni mig slu ba'i sgyu ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi lang mtsho ni mi rtag pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong ngo // bsod nams ma yin par
204b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong de'i phyir khyed gnyis la kho bo ma chags so// khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ sem
204b8(dkon brtsegs): dran pas kun nas bsrungs pa dag gi ni ma yin// che ge dag 'dod pa la sten ni sdur pa'o// 'dod pa la ston pa ni dri nga ba'o// 'dod pa la sbyin pa ni rul ba'o//
205a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni bde ba thams cad yong su 'gri bar byed pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni
205a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la rten pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni 'as
205a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la ston pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni 'thun pa dang / go ra gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o// 'dod pa
205a4(dkon brtsegs): la sten pa ni sred pa'i bag la nyal gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs la kun tu mongs pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni nye bar
205a5(dkon brtsegs): gzer cing rnam par 'jig la kun tu gzir ba'o// 'dod pa la sbyin pa ni kun tu gdug shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa
205a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing dge ba yong su nyams par byed pa'i// 'dod pa la sbyin pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i sprin
205a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang / gzugs mi sdig pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang // sha za mo dang
205a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dris par byed pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni ba lang dang / bong bu dang / khyi dang / 'phags dang / rnga mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / lug dang / wa la sten pag/
205b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la sten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la sten pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / gtong ba yongs su 'dor ba la sten pa'o// /
205b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la sten pa ni rtul zhugs dang dka' thub 'dor ba'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o// 'dod
205b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la sten pa ni shin tu baM ga med pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu rab tu gcod par
205b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o/ de nas de'i tshe grong khyer dbul po nges pas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smos so// 'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu smod pa ste/ shin tu sdug bsngal bde
205b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig par byed/ rtag tu ngan song sa rnams khyim du gyur/ sems rmongs gyur pa dag gis rtag tu bsten// 'thab rtsod can mi bden tshangs du gyuraka/ rtag
205b6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'gyed cing mi 'thun go rar gnas// 'di dag nI log bzhi bskyed zhi yin/ 'dod sten sred pa 'phel byed bde ba med/ rnam rmongs rab rmo nges de bzhin
205b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rmongs// 'dod rten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa ste// 'di ni kun gdungs rnam gdungs yongs su gdungs// sdig par sbyor zhing dge ba nung zon/
205b8(dkon brtsegs): paM/ 'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ 'dod sten dper na sprin gyi dra bai 'dra/ 'dod sten sha za so dang srin mo dang // bud med gzugs mi sdug bai dang
206a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'dris byed bzhin/ 'di ni ba lang bung bu rta dag dang / phag dang khyi dang wa dang rnga mo dang // glang chen lug rnams kyis kyang sten pa ste/
206a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs/ 'dod sten tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang / dka' thub rtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste// 'di la rtag tu
206a3(dkon brtsegs): bag med nyes pa 'phel// de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bu med spongs/ gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra' ba'i/ mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang
206a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / yon tan gnas kho bo'i sems gcig kyang // 'dod chags la ni nams kyang rtog mi 'gyur// de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde stsogs pa dang //
206a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo gnyis 'od song nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ des ni 'di na bud med rnams kyi skyon yang dag/ gang lags pa dag shin
206a6(dkon brtsegs): tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis// ji ltar de'i sems ni yul las log gyur pa// de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis/ de nas lha'i
206a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa'i thad du song nas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer nges pa chos spyod pa// brtul zhugs de/
206a8(dkon brtsegs): ni spyod pa rnam dag smos/ 'di yid gnyi zla 'am yang na dbang po lam/ tshangs pa 'am lnga rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed/ nges pas smras pa/ nyi ma zla ba de
206b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du brgya byin dang / tshangs pa 'am rgyal po 'am 'di na gzhan kyang / 'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun gar byed lta bzhin mi rtag mi rtag mi brtan na/ mkhas pa
206b2(dkon brtsegs): su zhig de la dga' bar byed/ gang la skye med rga med 'chi ba med/ sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa 'ang med/ 'gro ba grol mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes// de thos
206b3(dkon brtsegs): bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa des// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjes su yid rangs ste/ khyod kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig/
206b4(dkon brtsegs): bdud rnams sder bcas myur du nges par bcom nas ni// shag kya seng ge rgyal ltar byang chub 'thob gyur cig/ de nas grong khyer gyi dbul pos nges pas des gzhan
206b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig na/ nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te// nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu gling na mchog tu gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod
206b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na thams cad kyi nang na/ dbul po gang yin pa de sbyin go ma chags go// snyam nas/ de grong bar du song ste/ thams cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin
206b7(dkon brtsegs): po che 'di sbyin no// zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang / dbul po mgon med pa phal po che der 'dus te/ bdag cag dbul po yin gyis bdag la/ byin cig ces 'dze
206b8(dkon brtsegs): to// nges pas smras pa/ khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi mnyan yod 'di na ches dbul po gzhan zhig yod gyis de la sbyin no// de dag gi smras pa gang yin/ des
206b9(dkon brtsegs): bas smras pa/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di yin no// de dag gis smras pa/ khyod de skad sa zer cig/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod
207a1(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin gyi/ bdag cag ni dbul zhing mgon med pa yin no// nges pas smras pa/ nor mang gis ni ci zhig bya/ rgya mtsho la ni klu rnams bzhin/
207a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag la ni mchog med pa/ ma bsdams de dag dbul po yin/ gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing / yang yid ni skye bar 'gyur ba/ mongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang // pha rol
207a3(dkon brtsegs): tu yang dbul por 'gyur ba// de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa skye bo phal po che dag gis yongs su bskor cing nor bu rin po chen de khyer nas rgyal po de khyer nas/
207a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang chod dpon dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam
207a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrogs so// grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas nor bu rin po che de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po chen po nor bu rin po
207a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe ring thad ma mchis pa 'dzam bu gling thams cad ri ba bdag gis rnyed pa 'di la/ bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na
207a7(dkon brtsegs): dbul po gang lags pa de la sprul to snyam mo// de la bdag gis 'di snyam da bsams te/ khyod ni 'ang na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags so// snyam bsam
207a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ khyod ni 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags so// snyam bgyid kyis/ kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul
207b1(dkon brtsegs): yul por gyur cing / ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po de mas pa la 'di skad ces smras so// des pa cing khyod pas kyang ches dbul 'am/ des
207b2(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ lha de lta lags te/ bdag pas khyod ches dbul ba lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis dbul// nges pas tshigs su
207b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de/ smras pa// gang gis 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing long spyod dag gis chog ma 'tshal/ gnod pa bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrug cing
207b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa// de ni 'di na 'jig rten mi srun yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu 'dzin// de phyir 'di na de la rtag tu chos 'dod rnams ni
207b5(dkon brtsegs): dbul po lags par rnams ni dbul po lags par sems gang zhig byams pa rab tu sgoms te sems can rnams la thab ma mchis shing / rtag
207b6(dkon brtsegs): par rgyun tu ngan don tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa mchis la/ nyam thag mthong ni rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis/ de ni phyug
207b7(dkon brtsegs): cing nor bzangs shin tu nor che dad pa la sgrogs longs spyod gnas/ gang zhig 'gro ba 'di ni dbade phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang / gang
207b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di na skye bo dman zhing sdug bsngal gzir ba bzung nas chad pas gcod/ gang zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta
208a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos srung ma'i bgyid shin tu dbul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes rigs par bgyi// dad pas bsam pa dri ma med cing rab brtan tshul khrims
208a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang dag gnas/ rtag tu ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te/ gtong la dga' ba dang / shes rab mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun la lta
208a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa/ de dag rtag tu mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags// gang dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags bde la dga' zhing
208a4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba ma mchis la/ lus dang srog la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying por don du mi gnyer dang / gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yid myos rnam par
208a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba dang / lhan cig gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dbul ba nyid ni thob pa lags/ gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang //
208a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa dag/ rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis/
208a7(dkon brtsegs): lha cig gang dag chos kyis brgyan pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags// lha cig mo nI rtag tu nags kyi sman sngun skam pa bsregs pas chog ma tsal/ lhan
208a8(dkon brtsegs): cig 'di na rgya mtsho chu rlung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas kyang chog ma tshal// 'di ni nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkhas la mthar kyis rgyu bas mchog ma tshal/ rgyal po brkam
208b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas brlag par 'gyur// zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtswa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yongs su mi bgyi/ de bzhin
208b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyi bur mi bgyid / chu'i thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rab phyogs na/ gnod pa'i
208b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas grong khyer gyis dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smras/
208b4(dkon brtsegs): nges pas de ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni phyag par khyod la dbang du yod// nges pas smras pa/ lha de bzhin gshegs pa bgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
208b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mnyan yod 'di nyid na/ bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa ngas mthong yang mthong ngo // nges pas smras pa/ lha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
208b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi mig tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/ de ni bdag gi dbang lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan drongs shig dang / de skad du
208b7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa de bzhin du ngas gzung bar bya'o// nges pas smras pa/ ston pa de la ngan bu 'am/ pho nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags 'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis
208b8(dkon brtsegs): na/ de mkhyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol la/ de ni mi mkhyen 'di 'am pha rol la/ de ni mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'/ thugs kyis bsam
209a1(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhyen nas kyang // 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur// sems can rnams la thugs rtse bas/ de la nga rgyal skyon mi mnga'/ sems can
209a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la legs dgongs pas// shin tu rab tu 'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis/ rgyal chen bdag gis gsol ba la/ de ni legs par thugs ches mdzod/ gang gis ston
209a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dir gshegs pa'i/ bden pa'i byin brlabs bgyi bar 'tshal/ me tog spos dang me tog 'phreng / rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byugs pa dang / sil snyan sta gon
209a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzod cig dang / 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur/ nges pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang / phrag pa gcig tu gos gzar nas pa// pus cho sa la btsugs byas nas//
209a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du ni tshig kyang smras/ kun mkhyen bden pa gang gis// bdag gis pa mkhyen ce na// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyis// thub pa bdag gis mdun du bzhugs// /
209a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang / sa ni rab tu g.yos par gyur// sa gzhi rnam par brtol nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur// rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa'i//
209a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos lnga brgyas yongs su bskor// brgya phrag bcu gnyis snyed dag gi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ skyed pa dang ni lha dang klu// brgya byin tshangs pas
209a8(dkon brtsegs): mdun gyis bltas/ de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin/ rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas// ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed
209b1(dkon brtsegs): der ni srog chags stong dag gis// ston pa la ni mchod pa byas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod byas nas// byang chub don du yid btad do// de nas grong khyer gyi dbus
209b2(dkon brtsegs): po des pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
209b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag nyan yod na 'khyam zhing mchis/ mchis pa las/ nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas/ de bdag 'di snyam du gyid do// mnyan
209b4(dkon brtsegs): yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to// snyam nas de dag la 'di snyam bgyid de/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang
209b5(dkon brtsegs): na ches dbul ba ste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas na/ ngoms ma 'tshal pa lags so// slar zhing dor du gnyer bar bgyid pas na cho ga ma tshal ba/
209b6(dkon brtsegs): lags so// gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms mtshal pa lags so// sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par 'tho 'tshams pa lags so// skyid pa rnams
209b7(dkon brtsegs): bal mar 'byin pa lagaso// dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar bgyid pa lags so// phyug po rnams tshar gcod pa lag so// shin tu rab tu myos pa lags/
209b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang / sred pas rnam par bcings pa lags so// snyam nas/ de la bdag gis stsal na len par mi 'gyid par 'di skad du de
210a1(dkon brtsegs): ts+ya d+ya// ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni 'byor khyod la dpang du su yod ces kyang mchi'o// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs
210a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa/ ngo zlog mi sprod pa mi mnga' ba phab dang / dri ma dang khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol// bcom
210a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang
210a4(dkon brtsegs): man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le smam dang / dngul dang / rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang dpung bu chung dang / gzhon pa dang / mdzod dang bang mdzod thob pa gang yin
210a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag gis bdag phyag go snyam du sems so// rgyal po chen po des pa ni smin pa dang / dal ba dang / legs par sdoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang /
210a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje
210a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thob dang / gtong ba dang /
210a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khyel yod pa dang / brtan pa dang / sdom pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so// rgyal po chen
210b1(dkon brtsegs): po khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ci snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag ni nges pas gom pa bdun bor ba'i bar
210b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod po'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas pe'i bar da/
210b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bzod do// gsal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag gnas pa ni/
210b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid lta bu
210b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag mang du gnas so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nges pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal nges bcom
210b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir// nges pa khyed ni kho bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste/ rgyal srid 'di kun khyod sbyin kho bo dpung dang bcas/ khyod kyi slob ma yin gyis khyod kyis bdag slobs
210b7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ kho bo yun rang dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bslus/ sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bskyor cing bzung ba las/ nges pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di
210b8(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ rab tu bsdams te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya/ khyim na gnas pas brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni// nor gyi cheng du kho bos gorar bcug pa
211a1(dkon brtsegs): kho bos thams cad gtang gis bde bar 'khod par gyis/ phyin cad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bo yod mi byed/ lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang yin
211a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang / nges pa la ni zhes legs par bskyed nas kyang // sems ni skyo bar gyur cing ci la 'ang mi lta bar/ bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam btab
211a3(dkon brtsegs): nga ni dbul po zhes/ des pa khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste/ nges pa la ni gang zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa// mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar
211a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo'o tshogs chen po 'das pa 'di ni bcom ldan
211a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lta bas chog ma 'tshar ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad da ci nas 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par 'gyur pa/
211a6(dkon brtsegs): de de lta de ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin/
211a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la legs par mthong ba yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / phangs par 'dzin pa dang / gus pa ste chos bzhi po de dang
211a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste de bzhin gshin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong na bdag kyang
211b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i
211b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su dag par sems skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad rton cing cher ni rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir yang sems de skyed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum
211b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzugs par yang sems de skyed pa ste// bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa
211b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste// gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dbes
211b5(dkon brtsegs): dben par mthong ba dang / khams bzhi na mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / skye mched grong stong pa lta bur mthong pa ste/ bzhi po de dang ldan na de bzhin gash+ye
211b6(dkon brtsegs): ba legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam
211b7(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir/ gang zag rnam par dag ste/ bzhi po de dag ldan na de bzhin ga
211b8(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ lha'i rig mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mi ga kun sprob pa dang / chos kyi mig
212a1(dkon brtsegs): / gis so sor rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjesu rtogs par byed pa ste/ bzhi de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs par legs par mtho
212a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste mig migs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dgu pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po
212a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / de'i rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i phyir rnam
212a4(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ nges pa rigs kyi chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//
212a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te/ bar
212a6(dkon brtsegs): snang la gshegs so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rigs kyi bu nges pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la
212a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho bo la yang sbron cig dang / kho bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa la wAr 'gro'o// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar bgyi'o// bdag ni khyod/
212a8(dkon brtsegs): bud med dang gzhon nu dang / blon po la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigasu gshegs par 'tshal lo// rgyal po byang chub sems
212b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i
212b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig phul bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor bal po chem sa mdzes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ des
212b3(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po yongs su smin pade bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i slad du sems can thams cad de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen
212b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can g.yon can 'du bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po phyir mi zlogs par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa dram
212b5(dkon brtsegs): bo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpe'i 'kho
212b6(dkon brtsegs): lag so// rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor legs so// rgyal po
212b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po sems can gnod sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sos dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can
212b8(dkon brtsegs): le lo can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor legs so// rgyal chen po sems can sems rnam par g.yeng ba
212b9(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can 'chal shes rab can yongasu smin par 'gyur
212b10(dkon brtsegs): rgyam po chen po gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dzang ba sa mchis pa'i srad du/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la
213a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgya po chen po sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa chen po ni byang
213a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems pa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po 'khor ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po chos kyi kun
213a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i
213a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lagasaso//
213a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgrogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal
213a6(dkon brtsegs): po chen po bdad kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems pa'i 'khor
213a7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// rgyal po chen po tshigs btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po spobs pa phun sun/
213a8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phya ba dang / zing slang mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ba'i thos
213b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yo byad stsogs pa'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du slob dpon dang mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub
213b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyu
213b3(dkon brtsegs): po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// /
213b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can
213b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dad pa dad par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongasu dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sgrub par 'gyur ba'i bka/
213b6(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mag la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
213b7(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dga' ba'i phyir nges pa la byin no// nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la/
213b8(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti dang mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal lo// gang gis bdag la 'tshal bar gyur pa gos ras rul pa'i dus bu rgya mtsho bcos pa bdag la mchis kyis/
214a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus na
214a2(dkon brtsegs): ras rus pa'i dus bu'i gos 'di shing gis yal ga la bskal te/ dgung cig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu'am/ dgrang brgyar mchis kyang de la su yang len pa
214a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shing / de la su yang chags pa'i sems skyed pa ma mchis te// bdag kyang de bor nas mi lta bar 'chi ba'i dus te mchis so// rgyal po chen po dag ni bdas
214a4(dkon brtsegs): gir 'dzin 'dzin pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gang lag bdag nyid 'dod pa spong
214a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems skyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcad par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ nges pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung
214a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag khyod mi len na/ kho bo la snyid btse ba'i phyir rkang pas rdzis shig/ nges pas lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ ras bcos bu zung de dag la rkang
214a7(dkon brtsegs): bas brdzis te song ngo // rgyas pos smras pa/ nges pa ras bcos du zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i sman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ci ltar bya/ nges pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen
214a8(dkon brtsegs): bo sems can dbul po gcer glos mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig/ rgyal po chen po nges pa la de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po'i mi
214b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsgo ste/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so// ras bcos bu bzung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems
214b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de dag cag gis nges pa la ci ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / nges pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ de dag gis bar
214b3(dkon brtsegs): snang las tshigs bcad pa 'di dag thos so// 'dod pa bzhin ldan ni zla bya ba// me tog dang ni spos dang bya dang // zas skom nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te/
214b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa zas dang gos 'dod ma yin te/ rnyed dang bskur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin// des pa byang chub sems
214b5(dkon brtsegs): las chos 'dod de// byang sems kyis nges pa dga' bskyed// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs rigs kyi bu nges pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal brtun mo'i 'kho
214b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags rgya phrag mang
214b7(dkon brtsegs): po dag/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir dong ngo // de nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis 'khor gyis khyams ches
214b8(dkon brtsegs): po bgrang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mtho la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'di lta ste/ dper na gsum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang
215a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/ dbus su shing yongs pa 'dus brtol sprul to// yongs dus brtol gyi drung du yang bcom
215a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug cing zhengs gab pa la/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
215a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi stan drug khri dag kyang mngon par sprul to// lA ma yin gyi bu mo bde sgrogs la stsogs pa lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / bdug pa spos dang / me tog dang
215a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer nas/ sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag byed cing / nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi seng
215a5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i khri brgyan par byed do// de bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshegs chen de dag 'ong bar thugasu chud nas gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang /
215a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan bshams pa la zhugs so// de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phung lnga pas lha'i bu gnyi 'od la smras pa bzang mo tshur shog/
215a7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya'o// de nas lha'i bu mo gnyi 'od kyis lha'i bu mo lnga brgya cas dang / 5
215a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu rgyud kyi sgrar sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bston pa// khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad chad dka' thub spyad/ khyod ni bsdu ba dag dang sprin la dges
215b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sku gsungs thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste// srid gsum 'jig rten bla ma la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ khyod ni thab mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes//
215b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi phol gshegs/ khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgyes/ dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal/
215b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gtig mug sel la dgyes/ khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjer ldan/ khyod ni yang dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyen
215b4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum po thar par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal la/ khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tsom sel bar mdzad/ khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel
215b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad/ bdag ni rgyal la srog gis skabs su mchi bar bgyi/ lha'i bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa/ gAng
215b6(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ dga' bas dran pa shin tu rgya chen thob 'gyur te// dga' bas sngag la 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur/
215b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi rgyan rnams kyis legs par brgyad pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mngara' po/ gsung mchog mi'i dam pa gsung ni rnam par
215b8(dkon brtsegs): dag/ mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ 'phags pa 'dzam bu nu bo'i gser mdog phyag mthal sdug/ thub pa'i ska stong ser
216a1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen stobs// smin tshugs legs shing shangs legs tshems snyoms mdzes// dpal gyi snying po shAg kya thub mchog
216a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod la 'dud/ rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa// bde gshegs shin tu dga' ba skyed mdzad ston pa'i// bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas
216a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa gang lags pa/ de'i sa 'dir ni 'jig rten sngas rgyas mnyam gyur cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu des pa skye bo'i rnon po de dag gis yongasu bskor nas
216a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gA la ba der song ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyog gcig tu 'dug go// de nas rgyal
216a5(dkon brtsegs): po gsal rgyal gyi rigs kyi bu nges pa la khri'u bstan bzang po dag nyid kyis byin te/ 'di la 'dug shig ces byas nas/ rigs kyi bu nges pa khri'u stan
216a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po de la 'dug go// rgyal gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rang rang gi bstan la 'khod/
216a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas rigs kyi bu gang dag gis nges pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du dngul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di dag la 'di lta bur mchod pa byed do// zhes
216a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzer to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de dag pa 'di skad ces smra so// grogs po dag 'di la bsnyas pas ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di
216b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi che ba nyid ci steng dang ldan pa de ni kho bo mngon sum du gyur cig/ grogs po dag khyed re shig sdod cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa
216b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi bu nges pas lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub
216b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thams dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
216b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des des pa'i lus la reg nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su 'grub
216b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra de las 'bum gyur pas kyang ches lhag par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de dag yan mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ des pa la me tog gis gtor te/
216b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa la bka' stsal pa/ nges pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthu la gnas pa'i
216b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ dben pa ston cing dmam pa'i mthu la gnas kyang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir mchog tu ston
216b8(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston cing shes par snang ba'i da ni de'i bkod pa yin no// shes ma thob pa
217a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang sas kyi spyod pa dang / snod las gyis dang pa bskyed par byed cing / segs ca pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cadas /
217a2(dkon brtsegs): bar ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul snyan par byed pa 'di na de'i bkod pa yin no// rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul par ston kyang rkangs pas kyang ma
217a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang kye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// sems can bsdu ba'i phyid ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston pa/
217a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung bya bskyed pa'i phyir longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung ba ston pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// de nas bcom
217a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des pas ci srid cig nas byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bgyis
217a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu nges pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa sngon gyi tshul phun sum
217a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa/ bzod pa gsum thob pa/ ba thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse byas pa// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/ nga
217a8(dkon brtsegs): dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ci snyed cig brtul lags//
217b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/
217b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci srid cig nas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzo
217b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces
217b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems can don la brtson dang brtul
217b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs brtan pa dang / grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang / byang chub yon tan gnas pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kun
217b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' khyod nyon cig/ 'di na rgyal lachod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu brtson byed pa/ nges pa yid ni spyod pa'i rnam pa
217b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni bgrangs par nus par mi 'gyur ro// pha rol byin 'di dag la ni legs par bslabs// mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan
217b8(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba byas/ tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyin par song ngo // thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs par bslabs/ 'dir ni de'i sa 'dus
218a1(dkon brtsegs): \u0f7f/ byas skyon rnams legs par mthong / sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon gsum gyur par byas/ 'di ni sems can ci ltar thar gyur/
218a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i// rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la/ yang legs par bslabs/ 'jigs pa med sing blo dang ldan/ spobs pa dang ni gzugs rnams dang yang ldan pa ste// bdud
218a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lcags nyon mongs rdzas las nges byung zhing / sangs rgyas spyod yul don chen la ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten chos rnams mang po dag gis mgos la/ chags/
218a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la sogs rnams kyis brag ltar mi g.yos// sa'i drung du mi 'gro ring bar byed pa'ang min/ namakha' lta bur bcings grol ba med pa yin/ snying rjer gnas shing
218a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang yongs su skyo ba med// shin tu bsdams shing nem nur can la byugs sems ldan/ sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par lta/ skyon
218a6(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta 'phrul pa dag dang ldan ma yin/ ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa rnams pa gnas/ 'di ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod par byed/ chos nyid la ni chos
218a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul gyis legs par bslabs/ stong pa nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol byed/ sangs rgyas kyi ni sres 'dir gang du gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs
218a8(dkon brtsegs): bas yul ni stong pa ma yin te// de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas/ ci ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis// nga ni mya ngan las 'das
218b1(dkon brtsegs): nas nyams byu tshe// nges pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang / sngon chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khams/ mi'i 'khrugs 'jig
218b2(dkon brtsegs): rten nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur// brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang // zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub tu ni
218b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin bya phyir/ bskal pa grangs med gsum rnga spyad pa spyod par byed// de'i 'og tu de ni skyob pa rgyal bar 'gyur// ming ni 'jig rten rgyal dbang phyug
218b4(dkon brtsegs): ces kyang bya// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i// zhing dang de'i 'jig rten du ni mtshungs ma yin/ 'jig rten khams de legs par sprul pa zhes
218b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ yon tan thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo khri thub par 'gyur// de'i dge 'dun shin tu mang ste bgrang las 'das nyan thos
218b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur/ phal che byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su/ de dag thams cad ye shes stob dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ rnam par thar pa
218b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ldan zhing 'jig rten pa med gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnams kyis/ 'jig rten khams rje rtag tu bsgra chen bsgrags par 'gyur/
218b8(dkon brtsegs): de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med/ de dag thams cad yang dag pa rig cing rnam par dag/ bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan 'das
218b9(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ lo ni bcu dag las bzhi lhag rnams su yang / de'i dam pa'i chos ni rab tu sbyad par 'gyur/ de'i tshe de'i chos kyi tshul ni 'khrug pa med/ des
219a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sa gang dag yongs su smin byas pa/ de dag byang chub bla na med pa'i du spong / zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/
219a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad skyon rnams dang ni bral ba yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i lung bstan pa bshad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong
219a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan kyi char yang mngon par bab po// thams cad dang ldan pa'i
219a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyis kyang / rang rang gi gos rnams rigs kyi bu nges pa la bkag go// tshod dpon dang khyim bdag dang / bram ze brgya phrag mang po dag kyang rab tu byung ngo//
219a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gsol// de nas bcom
219a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i mgo bo la phyag gis byugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa'i mgo bo la'i ga ma thag tu gos
219a7(dkon brtsegs): dur smrig bgos shing dge slong du snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kan dga' bo snyig
219a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lnga po dus kyi snyigs ma dang // sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / zhing gi snyigs ma dang / tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i dus su de byang chub mngon pa
219b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ der nges pas ci ltar 'dul ba las rnam pa gzhan gyis 'dra bar mi bya'o// kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mched du sangs rgyas
219b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dul bas sems can sems 'dul bar mi byed kyi/ kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dbul ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas sdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul
219b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// kun dga' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing sangs rgyas kyi yul nye bar bstan tu zin na/ sems can
219b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang 'du bar mi 'gyur/ la/ chos kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de ltar bas na/ nga dang nges pa ji ltar 'du bar byed pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems
219b5(dkon brtsegs): can gdul bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo sems can dad pa can dang / rtog pa med pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na dad pa rnyed de
219b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' nges pa dang / byang chub
219b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po gas la rgyal dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zas bcas pa'i 'jig
219b8(dkon brtsegs): rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam/
220a1(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ nges pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho//
220a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA bI ra dang te/ ba ri phred tsan ma ma hA ya na su t+ya/ bod skad du// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnams
220a3(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ dpas sbyin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i med// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dbang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dri
220a4(dkon brtsegs): skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi dga' ra ba na/ dge stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
220a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gis dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu
220a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba/ shis rab shin tu rnam par grol ba// cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/
220a7(dkon brtsegs): srid par kun tu sbyar ba// yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grul pa/ sems kyi rnam par thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu
220a8(dkon brtsegs): son pa/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa shag stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bor// byang chub sems dpa'
220b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin pab pashag stsag dang babras gcig tu bzhugs te/ de ma grong rgyar me pos nyan mong / khyis bdag dpas /
220b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba/ drug pa nor che ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ nor dang yod mang ga/ nor bu dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshigs mang ba glang po che dang / rta dang rje
220b3(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / ra lug dang / ba lang mang ba/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyigs dang / gser dang nor bu dang / su tig dang /
220b4(dkon brtsegs): de dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul mang ba zhig gnas pa de/ khyim bdag lnga rgya tsam dang / lhan cig 'dug ste/ 'dug par gyur/
220b5(dkon brtsegs): to// de dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe/ bar bskabs su 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod de/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ mir skye ba ni rnyed pa rnyed par dka
220b6(dkon brtsegs): dal ba phun sum tshogs brnyed pa dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'
220b7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan byed pa rnyed par dga'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la/ gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi zon na mang po lta ci smos te// de dag ces
220b8(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ces nas/ nan tan gyis bsgrub pa ches rnyed par dga'/ de bas kyang sems
221a1(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag / ches rnyed par dkal/ 'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka'// rtsi nga
221a2(dkon brtsegs): cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/ 'on te rang sngas rgyas kyi theg pas bsam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan
221a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par bya zhes 'thun par 'dus te 'khod de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dpyod pa skyes nas/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las
221a4(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar bya zhes 'thun pa ni mchog yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin// snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag dpas
221a5(dkon brtsegs): srin khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongasu bkor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig grong khyer chen po mnyan thod nas byung ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon/
221a6(dkon brtsegs): meng zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'a
221a7(dkon brtsegs): te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag dpas
221a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyed don gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
221b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zad du lcags de nas khyim bdag dpas sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
221b2(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda
221b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das dus gcig na/ bdag cig lnga brgya tsam gcig tu 'dus te/ mchis par gyur nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag 'dus te mchis pa thams cad bar skabasu 'di
221b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i bka' mchi brjod pa de byang ste/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed pa dga'/ mir ske ba rnyed pa rnyed par dka'/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa
221b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka' dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan
221b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa rnyed par dga'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la/ gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chung mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te de dag
221b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches na pa de dag ces snyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems
221b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ces nas nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag ches sbed par dka' de bas kyang sems can gdug de bzhin
222a1(dkon brtsegs): @bya/ gshegs pa'i snyan pa la mdzes pa de dag ces rnyed par dka'/ 'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan
222a2(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/ 'oti rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas
222a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan lus par bya zhes bka' mching bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe/ bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i rtog pa skyes te/
222a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni/ mchog lags kyi nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma lags/ rang
222a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags snyam bgyid de// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang chas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
222a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bang du mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
222a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal byas/ ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa de ltar/
222a8(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ de ltar bsgrub par 'gyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas sbyin dang / khyim pa /
222b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tsam de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag rnams legs so legs so// khyim bdag rnams khyed 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
