222b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhag pa khyed
222b3(dkon brtsegs): yang legs so// khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
222b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ci ltar bslab par bya ba dang / ci ltar gnas par bya
222b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyed la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsol to// khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam
222b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams 'di la
222b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/
222b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la snying chen po'i sems bskyed par byed/ kun tu bsten par bya/ nges par sten par bya/ bsgom par bya/ mang du/
223a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de ban
223a2(dkon brtsegs): du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo rnams la chags par mi byed/ bzang ba dang btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / zhon pa dang / mal tsa dang / me tog
223a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 'phreng ba rnam la chags par mi bya// yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag rnam
223a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni phal cher lus dang srog la chags par gyur nas sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags pa des ngan song ngan
223a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus dang srogs la rtags par byas
223a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ bde 'gro rnams su skye'o// khyim bdag rnams de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
223a7(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs/ 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de
223a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyims dang / chung ma dang bu dang / su mo dang rnams la chags par mi bya/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang /
223b1(dkon brtsegs): mal tsa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang 'greng ba dang / byug pa rnams dang chags par mi bya/ yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya/ bdog pa
223b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong bar yongs su gtang ba mang ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par tshul khrims kyi
223b3(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa la ci mi snyam par bzod pa dang / des pa phun sum par bya/ lus dang srogs la mi lta bar
223b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi go che chen po bgo bar bya/ rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis sems rtse gcig du bya/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes
223b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bur lta ba dang / bral bar shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par bya/ des sbyin pa sbyin pa na//
223b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ sems can thams cad
223b7(dkon brtsegs): yid la byas te/ tshul bzod pa bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// sems can thams cad yid la byas
223b8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ shes rab bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/
224a1(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa bslabs par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag dpas sbyin dang // khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
224a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni lus la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ srog la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ de bzhin du nor dang 'bru dang / khyim dang /
224a3(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ bza' ba dang btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / spos dang 'dug pa
224a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'phreng ba rnams/ byugs pa rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags// yo byad thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub sems
224a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' so sor rtog cing lus la mi lta ba lags/ bde bar gshegs pa ci ltar srog la mi lta ba lags/ de bzhin du nor dang 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu
224a6(dkon brtsegs): mo rnams la mi lta ba lags/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo dang / bzhon pa dang / mal ca dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams
224a7(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta ba lags/ yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas sbyin dang // khyim bdag lnga rgya tsam de dag la 'di skad ces bka'
224a8(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// khyim bdag rnams lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus 'di rnam pa du mar so sor brtag par bya'o// rnam pa du ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
224b1(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di mthar gyis sgrub pa dang / mthar kyis 'jig pa dang / rdul phra rab bstsags pa dang / khong stong dang / gye gu can dang / bu ga dag/ dang / spu'i khung du nas zag pa dang /
224b2(dkon brtsegs): grog mkhar nas ltar sbrul gdug pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / sbrul gdugs pa ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ma skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grogs la 'khu ba dang / bshes
224b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen ngan pa ltar 'drid pa'i bdag nyid can dang / lbu brdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang / chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jig cing 'ju dang / smig rgyu ltar
224b4(dkon brtsegs): slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang / chu shing ltar bshig na snying po med pa dang / sgyu ma ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang / rgyal po ltar bsgo blag mang ba dang / dgra ltar glags
224b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / rkun po ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / gshed ma ltar rje su chags pa med pa dang / mi 'dza' ba ltar mi phan pa 'dod pa dang / gsod pa ltar shes rab kyi
224b6(dkon brtsegs): srog gi bar chad byed pa dang / phyir rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang / grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang / rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mjig pa
224b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sbyang ltar mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / spang ma'i snod ltar mi gtsang ba zag pa dang / sbrul dang / myi dang / khyi'i ro ltar dri mi zhim pa dang /
224b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan skyugs kyi khung ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'byung gnas dang / rma ltar bskyod mi jo ba dang / zu rngu ltar gnod pa'i bdag nyid can dang / rje bo sdang ba ltar bsnyen par dka'
225a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khang snying ltar bcos legs byas shing bsten/ pa dang / gu rnying pa ltar bcos legs byas shing sprad pa dang / bum pa som btang ba lta
225a2(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyis bag bya dgos pa dang / grogs po mi srun bltar rtag tu rjes su srung dgos pa dang / chu 'gram gyi shing ltar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang / chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar
225a3(dkon brtsegs): mche ba'i rgya mtsho la thug pa dang / glo bur gyi khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang / mgon med pa'i gnas khang ltar yongasu gzung ba med pa dang /
225a4(dkon brtsegs): btson srungs ltar gsungs gis bsgrub par bya ba dang // mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / bye ba'i grong khyer ltar rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag
225a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid can dang / me ltar chog mi shes pa dang / rgya mtsho ltar dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gseb ltar nan tan gyis bag bya ba dang / byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongasu bskyang
225a6(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa dang / snod chags pa ltar rtag tu dag bya dgos pa dang / yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / zas dug can ltar rtag tu yongs su spang bar bya
225a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / re shig dgos pa'i phyir snod bstan ma lta bur dang / khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu yin pa 'ba' shig tu rlos gzung bar bya'o// khyim bdag rnams gzhan
225a8(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' lus 'di thog ma dang tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag par bya'o// pha ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/ 'di la khu rgu dang khrag ni
225b1(dkon brtsegs): lus ni thog ma'i rgyu yin no// tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba las sgrogs te/ kham gyis bza' ba'i zas thos ma thag tu bang kan gyi gnas su 'gro'o// bad kan gyi gnas su
225b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin nas bad kan gyis rkyang rgyang por byas por byas te// shin tu mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu mkhris pa'i gnas su 'gro ste// mkhris pa'i gnas su phyin nas/
225b3(dkon brtsegs): zhu shing skyur por 'gyur te/ rlung gi gnas su 'gro'o// zhu ste rlung gi gnas su phyin nas// rlung gis tshig ma logs shig/ dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de
225b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mi lags ni gcin dang ngan skyugs la sogs te// dri ma rnams 'byung / dang sa ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/ khrag las sha'o// sha las tshi lo chi la las rus
225b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// rus las rkang ngo // rkang las rmu lo// khu chu las lus 'di lta ste/ de ltar thog ma dang nga'i rgyu mi gtsang ba'i phyir lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems da
225b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam par bya'o// lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ lus shes bya ba 'di ni rus pa phun sum brgya drag nus khog pa bsla
225b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum brgyas sbyar ba/ rtsa'i dra ba bzhi brgyas glags pa/ sha sbar tshad lnga rgyas g.yogs pa/ sdom rtsa drug gis khebs pa/ rtsa 'dun
225b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyas gang ba/ rgyus pa bdun brgyas sbrel pa/ chub bcu drug gis brtan pa/ chu ba gnyis kyis khyab par dkris pa/ sgyu 'jos phye dang bzhis nang rol byas pa/ long ka
226a1(dkon brtsegs): dang pho ba dang 'brel ba'i gnye ma rim pa'i bcu drug du khyim pa/ rtsa bran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa/ gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis sno chag pa ltar
226a2(dkon brtsegs): shig shig por gyur pa/ spu'i khung bu bye ba brgya stong phrag brgya bcus rtswa ltar khebs pa/ dbang po lnga'i bu ga dgu yod pa/ gnas bdun dang ldan pa/ mi gtsang bas yongs
226a3(dkon brtsegs): su gang ba/ glad pa snyim pa gang dang / tshil snyim pa gang dang / zhag snyim pa gsum dang / bad kan snyim pa drug dang / mkhrid pa snyim pa drug dang / rlung gis mtha
226a4(dkon brtsegs): dag drangs pa dang / khrag bre gang dang / ngan skyugs phul gang dang / de dag thams cad kyis ba ba bar cad can ltar so sor yongasu gang dang / pags pa rim pa
226a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ro bro ba drug gis gso ba/ lus kyi me la ngan skyugs kyi sbyin bsregs byed pa rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag thams
226a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi blta na mi sdug pa/ dri nga ba/ rnag gi rang bzhin yin na/ 'di la su zhig gus par bye do// skad cig dgos pa'i phyir snod bstan ma tsam du zad pa dang / khur
226a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu 'bab shig yin par chos kyi blos gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang bro po'i lus la ni/ gzugs
226a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon nga rgyal can gang gus byed pa// byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du/ mi shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro/ de'i sna nas dri mi zhim brtag
226a9(dkon brtsegs): gigegi rnam pa 'dzas kha nas
226b1(dkon brtsegs): 'azung / mig rngu rtags shing skye ba srin busan/ de lasu zhag zugs shi dgus par byed/ dber dkyis gsol thog nas su// 'di ni dkar ba d+hA zhes pang byed krung /
226b2(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur zad par 'gyur/ byis blo phyin ci log gi nga rgyal can/ de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros can/ nga'i lus 'di gsang mar bya zhes te/
226b3(dkon brtsegs): bskus 'bab stegs brgyar ni 'khrus byas kyang // 'chi bdag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang khyim bdag lnga rgyu tsam
226b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bka' sprul pa/ khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems skems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
226b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'dod pas/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis lus la rtag par bya ste/ rnam pa bzhi ba nu su zhi gang zhe na/ 'di ste khyim bdag rnams
226b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang / rang bzhin gyis mi thun pa ste/ smad par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
226b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la lus rnag zag pa ste/ dri mi zhin pa brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar 'jig pa ste/ snying por med par brtag par bya/ byang chub
226b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus rgyus pa'i 'og res sbrel ba ste/ nyam chung bar rtog par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar rtag par bya/
226b9(dkon brtsegs): byir nga / khyim badran
227a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dang sa lus yang dag par ma yin pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus skye bo mi mkhas pa
227a2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam 'phrul bar byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus 'jig pa dang / bu ga dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag par brtag par bya/ byang
227a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus zhe sdang gi mes tshigs par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
227a4(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus gtig mug gi mis me lce gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi ldongs dar
227a5(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi dra bas khebs shing srid pa'i dra bas chud par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kun nas
227a6(dkon brtsegs): bu gas yongasu gang bas bu ga'i gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas sa lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gtses par rtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
227a7(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya/ byang chu sems dpa' lus 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
227a8(dkon brtsegs): lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus mthar kyis grub cing pha mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang du
227b1(dkon brtsegs): brtag pa/
227b2(dkon brtsegs): / sems dpas lus mya ngan gyi gnod pa mang pos gang bas nyam thag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas rton pa med par brtag par bya/ byang chub
227b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus g.yo dang / lus g.yo dang / sgyu'i nye bar spyod pa dag gis glags par rtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dgang dka' bas sa'i gting lta bur/
227b4(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang / bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas/ me lta bur brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus
227b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis/ chog mi shes par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpa' lus rjesu chags pa dang / khro ba dag gis 'dzom par rtag par bya/
227b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lus sti stang dang / gnod pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus chu klung gi rgyan bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan
227b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang / gzhan du brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpa' lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag
227b8(dkon brtsegs): gis yid kyi sems pa yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pas byas pa mi gzo bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
227b9(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus spyang ke dang / ce spyang dang / khyim rjen sha za ba gzhan gyi zasu rtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rul pa dang / rgyus pa'i bong res sbrel bas 'khrul
228a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag gis
228a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gang ba ste/ blta ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus zas skom las byung ba ste/ rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par brtag par bya//
228a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lus mi rtag pa ste/ shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas don med pa'i glags pas glags par btag pa'o// byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba
228a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po 'byung bar dgra lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus yang dang yang sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
228a5(dkon brtsegs): bsdu bsngal grwa sum gyis gtses te/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyi
228a6(dkon brtsegs): ste// sdug bsngal gyi snod yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga mngon par grub pas sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub
228a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lus gyen tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang / bdag po med par brtag par bya// byang chub sems dpas lus skyes pa dang bud med dang bral
228a8(dkon brtsegs): bas srog med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
228b1(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam lta bu ste/ gsog tu brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus smig rgyu lta bu/
228b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas brag ca lta bu ste// slu bar brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus mig g.yor lta bu ste/ slu ba'i bdag
228b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid du brtag par bya ste/ khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis lus la brtag par bya'o// de ltar rtog
228b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus su 'dun pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus bdag gir byed pa dang / lus la sred pa dang / lus la
228b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ngo // srog la srog tu 'dun pa dang / srog la dga' ba dang / srog bdag gir byed pa dang / srog
228b6(dkon brtsegs): la srid pa dang // srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo dang / bza ba dang btung ba dang / bgo ba dang
228b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhon pa dang / mal ca dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyi bar dag la 'dun pa dang / dga'
228b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag gir byed pa dang / sred pa dang gnas pa dang / zhen pa gang yin pa de thams cad spong ste/ de lus dang srog la mi lta'o// de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang /
229a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang / rlung ma dang / bu dang bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal tsa dang / me tog dang / 'dug pa dang /
229a2(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / phreng ba dang / thugs pa rnams la seMk+ka/ bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug zur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// khyis bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems
229a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drag yongs su rdzogs nas/ myur du bla na med pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
229a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis lus rgya cher yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mi rnyed shin tu rnyed dka' snyed pa la/ lus kyi phyir ni sdig pa me byed cig/
229a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dur khrod pa ste/ ce spyang zas// lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar ma 'jug shig/ g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed nas ni// byis pa rtag tu rna bar rmongs te 'khyam// lus 'di byas/
229a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi gzo dngos yin pas// nyin dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // rtag tu nang 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te/ lus 'di ngan skyugs rnams dang mchil mas gang
229a7(dkon brtsegs): bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon par gtse sa/ mkhas su zhig lus la sred pa skyed/ lus nis gting 'dra ste cog mi shes/ gshed ma mi 'dza' 'dra yang byis bas gso
229a8(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed/ de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba myong lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sra ma yin/ lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'chi bar rtogs
229b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bsod nams myur du byos/ de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa skyed// zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis// lus 'di srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te/ bsten par
229b2(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang 'jig par 'gyur ba yin na// 'di la 'bad pa med ci phyir bya// bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ thub pa byung 'di khyed kyis rnyed pa la/ sangs rgyas bstan pa
229b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dang bskyed/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro shig/ lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho gyur pa/ des kyang chags pa yongasu spang bya na/ su zhig lo brgya thub par
229b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba// de phyir dga' ba mi snyed smos ci dgos// ma snga mas mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du/ mi rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la// gzhon tse rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing /
229b5(dkon brtsegs): nor btsal bde ba myong bar bya zhes zer// nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod// bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs
229b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs la// ngan don tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos// longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs// 'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin/ skad cig 'byung
229b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur// mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa skyed/ sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar ma khan lha dang mtshungs// dri ba'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba/ long
229b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid/ de ltar log pa col zhing byis pa khyas/ sdug bsngal 'argya'i sa longs spyod btsal btsal ba/ lus la gnong pa ma tshungs med
230a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed byas kyang // rgyal po'i mthu'i de dag phrogs gyur pa// de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba skyed/ bu dang chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar/
230a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor 'phrogs pa/ nyes 'di 'dra de dag rigs nasu// mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed/ rtags tu brtan zhing long spyod tshol byed pa//
230a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni pha dang mi gus shing / bu dang chung ma la yang mi byams par/ de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed/ bdag gis longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes// brnam/
230a4(dkon brtsegs): byas rnams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/ g.yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams tshol byed pa/ brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton// sems can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'drid pa nyid/ yid
230a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan sems la tshig gis dga' byed byed/ yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rton/ 'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par byed// sems can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ga sman
230a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing / smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'dring byed la// khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin// brnab mo dag la mdza' bo rnams
230a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang med// nyed med cing snying slebs grogs kyang med// 'on kyang de dag nor phyir sten par byed// skye bo brnab la mkhas pa yid mi rton/ brnab mo longs spyod
230a8(dkon brtsegs): ched du bye min byed// shin tu mi bzad sems ni kun tu skyed// de phyir mkhas pas yang dag rtog byas la/ ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes gyis/ gser dang
230a9(dkon brtsegs): rmo na par
230b1(dkon brtsegs): mu tig nor bu byi ru dang / las dges de dag lbu ba las kyang 'byung / de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas// de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod pa byed/ byams pa/
230b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe// sa gzhi gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe na de ni ga las byung / 'dod pa'i
230b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan lnga dag 'byung ba ste/ brdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul med rmongs par byed// dper na sos ki'i nyi ma gung dus na// smig rgya chur snad 'dod pa de bzhin no// bskab
230b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig lon nas ni 'jig rten 'di/ na mkha'i rang bzhin na mkhar 'drar 'gyur 'ong / lhun po dag kyang tshig cing rnam pa 'jigs/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing /
230b5(dkon brtsegs): gang du 'gro// chu mig mche'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams// de dag med 'gyur skams 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med// mkhas
230b6(dkon brtsegs): pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed// mkhas pa gang dag blo'i stobs ldan pa// de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog/ 'di la ro myong byed pa su yod na/
230b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag phyir khyim ni spong mi byed// 'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing // bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed// shin tu sdug bsngal gyur
230b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de dus na/ bu dang chung ma skyabasu 'gyur ma yin/ ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin/ bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid gcig pus
231a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong // de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len/ mi ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag grangs// 'di na de dag pasdug bsngal myangs 'gyur/
231a2(dkon brtsegs): srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med/ de bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lags med// pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang / bran dang nor dang rtsa lag phyogs kyi rnams/ shi sha'i
231a3(dkon brtsegs): gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med// lhas rnams rjes su 'brang zhing byas pa 'gro/ las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong // las kyis gnas pa 'jig rten rnams su//
231a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu// skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid gnas su/ mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed/ mnar med song tshe de dag skyabs min pas/ pha ma spun dang snying sdug bu rnams
231a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtsa lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / de dag ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed// las de yongasu zad pa ma gtogs par rab tu mi zad 'jigs las mi 'grol la/
231a6(dkon brtsegs): de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis/ bsgris te sdig pa yongasu spang bar bya/ ci ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par/ gshin rje dang ni gshin rje/
231a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rta dang // mang 'a zhes dag dang rtsa lags tshogs dang sgris pa ma bu dang rung sa srung ma byed byed kyis ri'i lus ni bab 'azur la/ bob nas sdig pasrung bas
231a8(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ kyes nga ltar sdug bsngal mi 'ang myong / 'dzi ni mi dge las kyi rnam smin yin las kyi rnam par smin la yid mches/ khyod ni rang gi sems kyis dge rgyas
231b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes// de chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra/ rang gi las byas rang la rnam par smin/ rang gi las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyis/ ci ltar sngon cad
231b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod las byas pa/ sdug bsngal de na khyod kyis myong bar gyis// de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams sdug bsngal nyen pa yongasu thar mi byed// legs pa'i las byas ni bas
231b3(dkon brtsegs): su thar/ de ltar khyim ni yongasu spang bar bya/ khu sgo dbugs pa ltung gi chad pa rnams/ su zhig spong 'i dod zhi ba don gnyer bas/ khyims la 'jigs pa gyis te spang
231b4(dkon brtsegs): byos la/ 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos sbed cig/ khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa/ sems las byung ba rnams kyis tog tu 'bar/ me mur
231b5(dkon brtsegs): 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la// mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa skyed/ khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed/ khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan
231b6(dkon brtsegs): byed// nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de/ de ltar khyim ni yongasu spang bar bya/ 'dren pa rnams kyis bstan la dga' byed pa// ma btab ma rmongs bde dang
231b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ba de'i rgyu// sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim 'di la/ blun po dga'i mkhas pa gzhan mi dga'// pags pa nu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus// 'di ni nga'i chung
231b8(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'du shes skyed// byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags bskyed par byed/ bu med sgyu ma lta bur yongs ma shes// shes rab ldan pas khyim gyi nyes rig nas/ de'i/
232a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun spangs te// chos la sman gyi 'du shes gzhag byas nas// ma chags khyim nas myur du 'byung bar byed/ de nas khyim bad
232a2(dkon brtsegs): dpas sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga rgya tsam de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gyur to// de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu
232a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas la 'dod gyur nas/ gang gla gis ni sems bskyed pa/ kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che /
232a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni skrod pa kun gyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste// sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i// sems 'dir su dag dga' skyed pa/ de dag 'tsho ba
232a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par 'tshe// sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i// sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa// de dag sems can thams cad dga'/ de dag mthong nas dga' bar
232a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ byang chub sems la dga' ba/ de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhi / mtshan gyis shin tu spras pa dang / 'jig rten snang bar byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems ni
232a7(dkon brtsegs): sems che ste// sems kuni nang na dge ba mchog/ yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs// nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can bsod nams chu ngu rnams/
232a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid// 'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa// byang chub sems kyis sbyor bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyis bsod nams gang / de la gal te
232b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mchis na// namakha'i khams ni kun gang ste/ de ni de bas ldog par 'gyur/ gang gi bye ma'i grangs sbed kyi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis// rin chen
232b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rab bkang ste/ 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas// gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te// byang chub tu ni sems btud na// mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de la
232b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni ma mchis so// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba/ drang srong mchog gis bstan mdzad pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis// dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma
232b4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ sman gyi dam pa nad ma mchis// byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan/ nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid/ me gsum
232b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis gdungs pa'i/ sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod// mkhas rnams skyo bar yong mi 'gyur/ gang dag byang chub
232b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad spyod pa// dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra/ de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob/ skyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs// dpa' bos sangs rgyas chos 'tshal
232b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du// sems de 'dor bar mi bgyid cing // de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston/ sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba/ shag kya seng ge
232b8(dkon brtsegs): mi'i mchog// sangs rgyas ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur// bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe mdzum pa ba mdzad do// 'di ni sangs
233a1(dkon brtsegs): @#rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi ci mdzum pa ma dad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chas nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nas gyi
233a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha
233a3(dkon brtsegs): dog lta bu dag ste// 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag khyad par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste// gnyi zla rnams
233a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan
233a5(dkon brtsegs): ba kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo
233a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis brkyen mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
233a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ mdzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to
233a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal po mchog/ sas rgyas skyob pa 'dzum pa mi ston na// ci slad bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis mdzum pa mdzad pa// 'jig rten phan
233b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs su thugs rtse bdag la gsungs/ khyod kyis ci slad de ring mdzum bstan gsungs/ bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa// dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par
233b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzod// 'jig rten ljongs la myur du mig kyang stsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba// kun dga' bo khyod
233b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga rgya tsom 'di dag mthong ma/
233b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag lnga rgya rtsam
233b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dag na thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par
233b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkar byas pa dag te/ khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas//
233b7(dkon brtsegs): nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams su bde ba myong nas/ mthar kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
233b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed de/ sti steng byed par 'gyur/ brdzun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/
234a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed de/
234a2(dkon brtsegs): sti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan
234a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa
234a4(dkon brtsegs): lda na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
234a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan/
234a6(dkon brtsegs): ba kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// 'di lta rgya che ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//
234a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam
234a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ dpas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
234b1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag dang /
234b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
234b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ khyim bdag dpas sbyin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi sha
234b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya u da yA na/ bad sa ra dza pa ri brid tsa na ma pa ri bar rta/
234b5(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog rtseg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes pa'i le'u
234b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bi na/ dbyangs
234b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig
234b8(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe nam du'i bu mo btsun mo'i dpe' med phrag dog dang ser snas zin pas btsun mo sngo bsangs can la lhag par dmigs nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po/
235a1(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed la/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// btsun mo sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni/ dge slong go'u ta ma dang / lhan cig/
235a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu skyon chags par bgyid de/ de'i slad du bdag gis lha lagasal ba lags kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol/ 9/ zhes brdzun gyi tshig
235a3(dkon brtsegs): gis dbyen byas par gyur to// de nas bad sla'i rgyal po 'char byed/ ma du ba'i bu mo btsun mo dpe med kyis dbyen byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi
235a4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun rnams la zab dang / 'khrug pa dang / khro ba skyes par gyur to// de yid ma rangs shing khro ba dang / rngam pas zil gyis non pas/ btsun mo sngo bsangs
235a5(dkon brtsegs): can gsad pa'i phyir gzhu brdungs nas// mnga' ste'u ka nya rnga ma blangs te 'phangs so// de nas de'i mod la btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das de
235a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi
235a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngags brjod nas/ byams pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mnga' ste'u ka nya rnga ma de de nas phyir log ste/
235a8(dkon brtsegs): bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de nyid kyi 'go'i drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur te/ phar 'gro
235b1(dkon brtsegs): tshud 'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song nas/ sna'i rgyal po 'char kyi g.yon rol log su 'dug par gyur to// de'i lus la ni ma/
235b2(dkon brtsegs): phog go// lan gnyis lan gsum du de ltar gyur pa dang / de nas btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po
235b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de ltar lags pas/ gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal na/ khyod la yang bde legs su 'gyur lags so// de nas bde sa'i rgyal po 'char byed
235b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing sngangs la/ sgyid lugs cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ sa la 'gyel nas btsun mo sngo bsangs can la tshigs bcad de smras pa// khyod ni lha mo
235b5(dkon brtsegs): za mo// sha za mo 'am srin mo 'am// ngas ni ji ltar gzung bar bya/ nga yis dris pa de skyes shig/ gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i/ bud med 'ga' yang yon
235b6(dkon brtsegs): min te/ ngas ni 'di la gang du yang / thos sam mthong ngam shes pa 'ang med/ nga ni stob ldan btsan 'gras can/ 'phong gi shes pa legs bslabs pas/
235b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i mda' ni gdon mi za/ nam yang mi phog yod min te/ spreru 'am yang na bya dang ni/ mi 'am yang na 'ben yang rung / gang la nga'i mnga' 'phangs pa// nam
235b8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi phog yod min na/ de ring mtha' 'di 'phangs pa ni/ bzlog pa'i tshul du phyir 'ongs te/ lus la gnod pa med par ni/ nga'i mdun du 'dug par gyur//
236a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi tshig ni mnyan nas kyang / da ni khyod la gsod 'dod pa/ da ni khyed la skyabs su 'gros// sdug bsngal gyur pa dal skyobs/ phyin cad
236a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra mi byed kyis// sdug bsngal ba la deng bzod kyis/ khyod sngon dga' ba dran byos la/ dang bar gyis shig khro thul cig/ de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can
236a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ bang sa'i rgyal po 'cher byed la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni lha min dri za min// sha za mo min srin mo min// bdag ni btsun mo sngo sangs can/
236a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma// lha khyod la ni snying brtse bas/ bdag gis sems ni mnyam zhag gis/ khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab
236a5(dkon brtsegs): tu dang bar mdzod/ bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ gang gis byams pa legs bsgom te/ byams la gnas pa'i skyes bu dang / bud med dag ni mi gsod gsungs//
236a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig lo tog smin pa la/ ser ltar yang dag ci bzhin mkhyen/ bud med rnams kyis gnod byed pa// de'i bstan la bdag dga' lags/ 'jig rten mgon
236a7(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad kyis/ bud med rnams ni smad par gsungs/ bud med rnams mi lta ba/ 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags// sangs rgyas rnams dang /
236a8(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams/ bud med sten par mi mdzad de/ de ni byis pa'i spyod yul lags/ bud med rnams la sten pa ni//
236b1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bdud kyi zhags par gsungs// sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni/ rga mchom dkrugs pa'i shul dang 'dra/ mi mkhas bu med chags pa dang / sdig pa'i/
236b2(dkon brtsegs): las ni bgyid pa dang / ye shes spong bar 'tshal ba'i// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid/ mkhas pa thar par 'tshal ba yis/ bud med sten par mi bgyi ste//
236b3(dkon brtsegs): zhags pa snyam du ba ma mchis pa'i/ dong du mchongs pa mi 'dod lags/ yid du 'ong bka' mchid bgyis pa dang / bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid cing
236b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bas na/ khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan/ bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te/ bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang / khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po/
236b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod/ rgyal po chen po bzhud mdzod do// khyod kyis kying gnyis mchog gzigs la// de'is chos ni gang bstan pa// g.yel ma
236b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis par khyod kyi gson/ de nas bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bskul bas/ rgyal po'i man chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa/
236b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches yongasu bskor cing mdun du mngar nas/ brtad cing myur ba myur bur bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / de nas
236b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dang shar gyur pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ dul ba zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon nas/ bsam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pharol
238a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du gshegs pa gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lam me/ lhan ne lhang nge ste/ skyes bu chen/
238a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/ sku legs par brgyan pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge slon ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
238a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi 'am myi
238a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas pa mthong bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
238a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i mad du byung ba zhig mthong bka bcom
238a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gsol par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bad
238a7(dkon brtsegs): sa'i gyol po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ci ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig zlos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
238a8(dkon brtsegs): bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pas// deng
238a9(dkon brtsegs): ma du'i bu mo dpe med kyi tshig gis khros shing rngam pas zil gyis non nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la thab dang ne sdang gi sems cang
238b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can dgum pa'i slad du mda' ste 'u ka nya rnga ma zhig 'phangs na/ de bar snang la 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kunatu
238b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur nas/ bzlog pa'i tshul du slar log ste/ bdag gi g.yon rol logs su mchis par gyur cing / lus ni ma phog nas
238b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can gyis sug pa/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ mchis brang sngo sangs can la 'di skad du/ khyod lha po zhig gas
238b4(dkon brtsegs): 'on te klu mo 'am/ dri za 'am sha za mo 'am/ srin mo 'am su zhig lags shes bgyis pa dang / de dag la 'di skad du rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha mo yang ma pags/
238b5(dkon brtsegs): kla ma yang ma lags// dri za mo yang ma lags sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
238b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i blos lpags te/ khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i slad du// sems mnyam par bzhag pa lags so// zhes mchi nas/ de
238b7(dkon brtsegs): nas mchis brang sngon sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa rnam grangs du mas brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de la bdag pa di snyam du bcom ldan
238b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma 'di yang de lta bu'i snying rje'i bsam pa yang / de lta bu'i
239a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa thob pa dang / de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar dbang che bar grags pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
239a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam du/ sems par 'gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
239a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di ltar byis pa lnga bu dang / 'di ltar rmongs pa dang / 'di ltar mi gsal ba dang / 'di ltar mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
239a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa la bdag gis thab pa dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol zhing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du ya ngoni spros pa/
239a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chags shing mchis na/ thugs rtse ba'i slad du bdag gis nongs par bshags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rjes su bzung bar gsol/ sprin
239a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po khyod longs la rang gi bstan gang yin pa la 'dug gshig ces bad sa'i rgyal po
239a7(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed kyis nyes pa bshags pa rjes su gzung bar gnang ngo // de nas bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
239a8(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol
239b1(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gtum zhing gzu lums che la drag shul can lags pas/ bdag bud med kyi tshig gis sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'dus
239b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa des bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can dmyal bar 'chi bar bdag gis yang dag par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la zhugs brtse ba'i slad du
239b3(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang bdag slan cad bud med kyi dbang du mchis nas/ sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang /
239b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang sems can thams cad la yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyis skyon de dag legs
239b5(dkon brtsegs): par yang dag par rab tu bshad cing bud med kyis spyod pa rnams dang / bud med kyis mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rgyu rnams dang / bud med kyi g.yo rnams dang
239b6(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi gya gyu rnams dang / bud med kyi mi brtan pa rnams dang / bud med kyi 'gyur log rnams dang / bud med kyi sten pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshig rje rlung
239b7(dkon brtsegs): dngams dang bud med kyi 'khrul pa rnams yang dag par bya shad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad si'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces pas
239b8(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// rgyal po chen po gnas 'di lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi yang 'di skad ces gso
240a1(dkon brtsegs): to/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bud med kyi dbang du mchis par gyur na/ bud med kyi ma rungs ma/ khon can/ gtum mo// drag shul
240a2(dkon brtsegs): can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bud med de ni bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bgyid 'tshal ba lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag don de nyid
240a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'tshal lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po
240a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis je rang gi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs shig dang / de nas phyis bud med kyis skyon rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
240a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// skyes pa skyon ji lta bu dang ldan na/
240a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gso
240a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen pa de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
240a8(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// bad sa'i rgyal po char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar slar nyan pa dang //
240b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po skyes pa skyon gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes pa bud med kyis dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes
240b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skyes bu'i skyon ni/ bzhi po 'di dag yin no// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod pa rnams la chags par gyur cing / de 'dod pa rnams
240b3(dkon brtsegs): la bag med par gyur nas phyir zhing bud med la lta 'dod de/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / bram ze dag la lta
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'dod cing des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag mthong na/ spen par mi byed/ ldan par mi byed/
240b5(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur mi byed pas/ de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis yongs su spangs pas/
240b6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa las yongs su nyams/ tshul khrims las yongs su nyams/ gtong ba las yongs su nyams/ shes rab las yongs su nyams shing / dad pa dang bral zhing
240b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa/ thos pa nyung ba ser sna can du gyur pa yi dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun du spyod pa/ shes rab 'chal pa/ rmal chags ga rtsog
240b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod yul can bshul bar mnam pa la mngon par dga' ba/ bud med la dang che ba/ zhi ba yongs su mi tshol ba/ chags pa'i spyod yul can/ 'gro bar bya ba ma
242a1(dkon brtsegs): yin par song ga smad par 'os pa/ mi gtsang ba'i srin bu dang 'dra ba/ snyigs ma len pa/ 'dod pa la rkam pa/ khrel dang ngo tsha bor ba/ lha dang /
242a2(dkon brtsegs): mi'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par smad pa'i mcho ga/ mkhas pas spad pa byis pa'i skye bo la sten pa sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po la
242a3(dkon brtsegs): sten pa/ sdig pa la kun tu 'jug pa/ sdig pa la gzhol ba/ bud med kyi thul 'og tu tshud pa/ bud med kyi 'khor ba/ bud med kyi dbang du song ba/ bud med la gzhol
242a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bud med dang gnas pa/ rma'i sgo'i spyod yul can/ rma'i sgo la rten pa/ rma'i sgo la gnas pa/ kha chu dang / snabs dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag
242a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / she'u ru la dang / glang rgyas dang / mi gtsang ba'i spyod yul can/ lug dang / ba langs dang / bya gag dang / khyi dang / phag dang / wa dang / bong bu'i chos spyod pa/
242a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod pas 'tsho ba/ pha ma la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / sbyin gnas la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa
242a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa las yongs su nyams pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la zhugs zhing gzhol/
242a8(dkon brtsegs): kha seng gi dang / nam mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lcags kyi gi gal ma yi mngon po dang ma ma mung la gzhos pa dang sems can 'ayul
242b1(dkon brtsegs): sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs ni/
242b2(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu dag thos kyang / bud med la chags shing bud med dang sten pas/ bgad pa dang / 'dus pa dang / ca co 'don 'dod pa dang / bro brdungs pa dang / gru
242b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa dang / rol mo byas pa dag rjes su dran par byed cing / skyo ba mi skyed yid byung bar mi byed de rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun spyod cing / kun tu spyod pa de dag
242b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni/ ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la sten cing / don 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa
242b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa dri nga mi gtsang smad par
242b6(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa dang / mi 'thun 'jigs byed mi rtag las byung sdug bsngal byed// don med phung bar byed cing dman pa yin pas na/ mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la
242b7(dkon brtsegs): sten par byed// rtsog pas gang ba'i chab khung dri nga lta bu dang // mnam par gyur cing rul pa'i khyi rnams ci bzhin dang // shi ba dur khrod sa na shin du smad pa m+WAr/
242b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad ba yin// sbrang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang // phag ni ngan skyugs mthong na skyug pa ci 'dra dang // khyi ni sha'i/
243a1(dkon brtsegs): don du shen sar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed// grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'bri ba dang //
243a2(dkon brtsegs): de las tshul khrims dam pa nyams par 'gyur bsaM dang / mtho ris nyams nas dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la sten par byed//
243a3(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na// lus dag rmya zhing rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin 'di na byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus// rang gi lus kyi dbyibs
243a4(dkon brtsegs): ni dug du mi rig go/ ci ltar sgyu ma bzhin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig gis// rnam par 'phrul pas sems can brgya dag dga' byed ltar// de bzhin byis pa dag la
243a5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'dod pa rnams// 'dod pa dga' ba'i rgyu las ngan 'gror rab tu ltung // zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang // glu bro sil snyan bzang po tha dad
243a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis// khang pa mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni// gnod pa sten pa yin sdug bsngal stsogs pa yin// 'dod pa'i dga' la skam pa dag ni gnod yin
243a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ mi gtsang mtshon 'dra rmongs gyur dag la bsngags pa brjod// 'dod pa'i dman pa dag la bsngags shing bstan nas ni// dman pa de dag ngan 'grong rab tu lhung
243a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// gnod pa 'dod pa dag gis yul rnams rab bsngags shing // 'dod pa gnod pa yin la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams// de dag don med 'tsho ba rnam
243b1(dkon brtsegs): par spangs nas ni// mi bzad ga sangs sa chen por rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skye dgu 'di dag ni// rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba'i bya bzhin
243b2(dkon brtsegs): du// lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur pas// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam par 'gyur// 'di ni byis pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams/
243b3(dkon brtsegs): shel du mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems pa ltar// lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir// rtag tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin zhes 'dzer/
243b4(dkon brtsegs): gang phyir snum pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas// 'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gus par yod min pas// pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag la ni khos// don gyis/
243b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa mi byed gnad pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin/ de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa brjod byed cing // de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed// de dag
243b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dra ba sdig pa rab stsogs shing // ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang sgrogs par byed// mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes shing // pha ma
243b7(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su rab tu spongs par byed// de dag mchod 'os rnams la rab tu mchod pa mi byed cing // smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni tshol bar byed// phan tshun
243b8(dkon brtsegs): gdung bar 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing // rnam rtog mu yI nges bcom mi rnams nyon mongs pa// bkur sti yongs su tshol ba dga' zhing ma phags rnams// chos ma
244a1(dkon brtsegs): yin par 'jig rten rab tu 'dzud par byed// gzhi de las na mtshon cha dgas dang lcags rnams dang // de bzhin bcing ba dang ni 'thab cing brtsod pa
244a2(dkon brtsegs): dang // nges par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro/ tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur
244a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing // nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu 'jigs 'gyur la// mtho ris nyams shing dmyal bar rab tu lhung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyed par
244a4(dkon brtsegs): byed// lcags las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i khrod dag tu// mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu bor ba de blangs zhing // 'dzangs pa spu gri'i so'i bcad pa byas bla la//
244a5(dkon brtsegs): ral gyi dag gi khrod du mal yang bcas bla'i// rab tu me 'bar thu lum bzung ba de bla la// de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za bla zhing / me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams
244a6(dkon brtsegs): la reg bla yi/ lag pa gnyis kyis nam yang bud med reg mi bya// mis ni ci ltar 'dod pa rnams bsten pa// de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing // 'di
244a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'dod rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas// 'dod pa sdug bsngal mi gtsang ba dag rnamasaM par spongs// 'dad pa sdug bsngal kun gyi gzhi por gyur pa dang /
244a8(dkon brtsegs): gang phyir nor ni chung zad 'gyur bar byed pa dag/ yid 'ong skye bo rnams kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas// bud med nges par spen pa gnod pa thob pa yin// skyes pa gang
244b1(dkon brtsegs): gis de 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni// bud med rnams la rab tu bag med mi 'gyur ba/ des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnams sbyangs shing / des ni byang chub
244b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnyed par dka' ma yin// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ma'i pha ma dag pa byed pa yin te// zla ba dgu 'am/ zla ba bcur mngal na gzung ste// shin tu
244b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar gsos shing / gcin dang phyi sa yang phyi bar byed/ dbang du blangs nas nu zho ldad par byed/ phung po rnams skyed par byed/ khams rnams/
244b4(dkon brtsegs): gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed/ don du 'dod/ phan par 'dod/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod/ 'jig
244b5(dkon brtsegs): rten la yang phan par 'dod pa ste/ sbyin pa'i gnas yin la bu la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pas/ de dag gis rang gi nor gyi tshogs kyis gzhan gyi khyim nas/
244b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa dang / de de la chags shing myos la/ chums shing brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhan cing 'dug par gyur nas/ gzhan//
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing myos pas/ sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma rgas khog pa/ gdug la lus nyams chung zhing mig mi mthong ba dag la
244b8(dkon brtsegs): brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas nas rang gi khyim nas phyung ste skrod par byed do// rgyal ba chen po 'di ltar pha ma dka' ba byed byed pa/
245a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i gnas la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag pa'i bde bas sti stang du bya/ bla mar bya/ brjed par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs
245a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ des de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung ste bskrad nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams kyis
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed cing / sti stang du byed/ gces su byed/ rim gro byed la mchod pa byed cing / yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ pha ma la ni mi byed
245a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi snying brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po des bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la
245a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi la yang ltos/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa rnams la sten
245a6(dkon brtsegs): cing pha ma la brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gnyis pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
245a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag pa ma rgas pa zhes par byed pa ni/ de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bder 'gyur la/ 'di la lnga dang bcas pa dang po dang /
245a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 'gyur/ gang dag pa ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ de dag song na phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho
245b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste/ de ltar byed pa dang ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin/ gang dag pha ma rgas par byed pa yi/ tshong pa de dag yon tan kun gyi gtsor
245b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / de bzhin zhing las 'bras bu phun sum mchog 'byung ste/ bsod nams bgrangs pa'i don du brjod par mi nus so// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed
245b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yang / yang na glang dang bong bu dag tu mi 'gyur te/ mi rnams de dag spu gri'i so la rdzi mi 'gyur/ gang dag pha ma
245b4(dkon brtsegs): rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang / spu gri'i so dang ldan pa la yang mi rgal te/ de dag zangs khu bskol pa de dag 'thung bar yongs
245b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/ de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung ba dag dang / chung ma bu dang bu mo dam pa gang dang yang / bai dur+ya dang rin chen sa le
245b6(dkon brtsegs): sbra ma yang rnyed/ gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag rab 'phrul lha'i pho brang dag dang ni/ rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal yang mthong 'gyur te//
245b7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/ mi'i gtso bor gyur cing lha'i lhar gyur pa/ thub pa chen po'i 'di 'dri'i gsung ni thos gyur na/ rgas shing dbang po
245b8(dkon brtsegs): shin du zhams chung gyur pa yi// pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/ rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin/
246a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las byed cing / log par lta ba mngon par zhen pa yin te/ do ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin nes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi brtan pa yin
246a2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing / byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag gis rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /
246a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang / khro bas zil gyis non cing sdig pa'i las byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa
246a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / longs spyod kyis rgyags pas myos pa dang / ser sna can du gyur pa dang / gzhan la gnon par mngon par dga' zhing chos sgom pas mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po
246a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las mngon par dga' zhing / skyes bu dam pa'i las mi dga' ba de la ltos/ rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams
246a6(dkon brtsegs): pa sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
246a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyi gnyis ni skyes bu rna nyams shing / gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab tu byed/ log par lta bas rmongs nas 'di ni 'khyams 'gyur zhing // de na
246a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'thong 'gro bar 'gyur/ log dang ldan pas yon tan kun gyis rnam sangs shing / de ni rtog pa med cing thom no pa yin/ gang dag tu
246b1(dkon brtsegs): krung dag tu ud pal rtsa tshol ltar/ log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin/ bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su skyong byed cing / chos ma yin la chag
246b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi rnams mang po dag/ de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba/ de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi
246b3(dkon brtsegs): don du rtag tu ni// de bzhin sems las gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang // 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang // 'du shes log pa dag la bde ba ga
246b4(dkon brtsegs): la yod// mi rnams de dag byas pa mi gzo sdig bcas shing // dad pa rnams nyams tshul chos gus pa med pa dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam
246b5(dkon brtsegs): par spangs pas na// dmyal ba bzang rlag shin tu 'jigs su rung bar ltung // gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
246b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing // log par lta bas chos kyang nyan par mi byed la// lan 'ga'ang dge 'dun legs par mi byed pas// 'phags pa rnams kyis rnam
246b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs ngan song ltung bas na// de phyir mi'i srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la// sbyin dul yang dag sdom la nges par sten cig dang // de la byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par
246b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes pa ni gzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/ rgyal po chen po 'di yi ge 'am/
247a1(dkon brtsegs): ta/ rtsis sam/ grangs sam/ lag rtsis sam/ mtshon cha'am/ rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba 'am/ zhing las sam/ tshong byed pa 'am/
247a2(dkon brtsegs): ba glang 'tsho ba 'am/ de lta bu'i gzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing / 'di lta ste nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par
247a3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/ cong rong can dang / chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon ca'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshod
247a4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jug par byed/ grang ba'i dus na yang lhags pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing / bkres pa dang / skom pa dag gis gnod
247a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/ ladzes spyod yongs su tshol ba na/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ba dag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang rang ga
247a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis byed/ skye bar sgrub par byed pas/ dge sdang dang / zab nga / 'dren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong zab dag sa sbyin pa sbyin
247a7(dkon brtsegs): / nga mas kyi nga du rgya pa dang / kyi co chud pa sa phreng da nams kyi la dang 'a
247b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / bud med kyi sdig pa dang / bltas pa dang / brgyad pa dag kyang bzod par byed de/ de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyi bsdig pa dang du len cing /
247b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dga' ba med par de'i dur lta bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin te rgyal po chen po bud med la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug
247b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med la brkam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la gdu ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang / shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gzhi
247b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni/ 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
247b5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba na// rab tu myos pa ga la bde// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sten pa// de ni gang gis bde
247b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i// las rnams byed cing mi sdom la// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa// de dag rab nyams chud kyang za//
247b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa// rnga mo bong bu'i chos spyod cing // bud med mthong na rab snyegs pa// ngan lcags gnas la phags rnams bzhin// gang la
247b8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa gus bcas pa'i// 'dod rnams dri nga mi gtsang yang // 'dod pa'i skyon rnams mi 'thong yar// sa'i steng na dbus long bzhin// gzugs kyi
248a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ching bas bcing ba rnams// 'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/ byis pa 'dod pa rnams sten pa dag/ khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no//
248a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra dri ro dang reg rnams kyis// gang la so so'i skye bo rnams// bying ba 'khor bar yongs 'khor ba// spre'u rnams phur pa gtab pa bzhin// byis pa ma rig khe ba pa rnams// /
248a3(dkon brtsegs): mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing / bud med rnams la chags pa ni// mi gtsang gnas la khwa bzhin no// gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod yul
248a4(dkon brtsegs): yin// ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa// ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin// gsad pa'i gshed ma rnams kyis ni// ci ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar// shes na thar
248a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob 'gyur zhing / bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bud med lta byed pa'i// kun tu sbyor las 'jigs pa skye// byis mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams// 'dod
248a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sred pa rab tu 'phel// soso ka'i dus na ma zhig ni/ dgon pa chen por song byur nas// byis pas lan cha'i chu 'thung nas// skom pa phyi shing rab skye sa/
248a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i// byis pa rmongs pas mtsho ba rnams// 'di na phyir zhing bud med la// 'dod pa'i sred pa rtan par 'gyur// ci ltar mi lus mngon can la/
248a8(dkon brtsegs): thos chags rnades ni ma 'asrur // 'ad 'arnam sa ma'i skye bo rnams// de bzhin zung med rnams kyi ros// migacang bus gan tho ni// ma dog ldan par snang thod kyis
248b1(dkon brtsegs): nang na ha la ha la'i dug/ drag po chen po yod pa ltar// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag/ gang dang gang du snang ba yang // gcin dang phyi sa gang ba'i// rgyal ba rlung gis bkang
248b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin// 'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon// gos kyis bkris pa ci bzhin du// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang // ral gyi gling pa g.yogs pa bzhin// ji ltar me
248b3(dkon brtsegs): dong gang gyur pa// du ba me ltar cing 'bar ldan ltar// bud med de bzhin me 'dra bzhin// srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo// bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'dir byung na//
248b4(dkon brtsegs): sa ni kun tu 'bar 'gyur la// rtswa dang gel ba 'jig 'gyur zhing // chu klung dag kyang bskams par 'gyur// 'byung po chen po'i gnas gyur pa// rgya mtsho yang na skems
248b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // ri bo chen po rnams sreg sa la// de bzhin lhun po 'ang 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal chen 'byung po 'dzin pa'i// sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur
248b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing // brag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur yang // skyob par byed pa yod ma yin// ci ltar me'i rir bcas dang // rgya mtshor bcas pa sreg pa ltar/ de bzhin
248b7(dkon brtsegs): bud med me 'dra ste// gtum zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed// snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang // glad rgyas rul pa'i glad pa dang // lus la dri nga 'dzag de la// bus pa
248b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni spa rtsi bzhin// kha sgo rus pas gang ba dang // sha dang lpags la stsogs bstsogs shing // de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste// dring smad par bya ba yin/
249a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang sna tshogs gang ba dang // 'bras ni smin par gyur pa ltar// de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba// sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no//
249a2(dkon brtsegs): lto na mnye ma cher pa dang // glo bas gang zhing mkhal ma dang // khrag dang 'khris pas gang gyur la// glad rgyas kyis ni glad pa gang // khong pa'i nang na srin bu'i
249a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs// brgyad khri po dag gnas gyur kyang // gti mug dra bas bsgribs pa'i// byis pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo // rma sgo dgu nas rtag tu ni// mi gtsang rul pa
249a4(dkon brtsegs): zag gyur kyang // smra ba ngag dang lta ba la// bus pa rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin// gang zhig kun gyis smad pa'i yul// chags pa rnams kyis tshis mi shes//
249a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams// snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed// smad par 'os la chags byed pa// sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin// mchen
249a6(dkon brtsegs): khung dag nas rdul 'dzag cing // smad pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa// de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo// des ni myur du
249a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas gyur te// nya rnams chu nas bton pa bzhin// 'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis// ci ltar mi zhig gtses pa ltar// mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyi//
249a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no// rnam rgyal lag na mtshon thogs pas// ji ltar rgyal po gtses pa ltar// 'dod chags med dang 'dra ba yis// 'dod
249b1(dkon brtsegs): chags rnams de bzhin sreg/ shen pa'i gnas la khyi rnams ltar// myang bar 'du shes byis pa rnams// ci ltar sgra'i sreg pa ltar// myur du sdug bsngal myong bar
249b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rang gis las kyis nyes pa yis// de la skyob pa med pa ltar// de bzhin bdag gi nyes pa yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ de dag sangs
249b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos spangs nas// bud med rnams ni rmag la ston// sems ni rol chags gyur pa// de yi ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// ci ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni//
249b4(dkon brtsegs): shing gzhan du ni glo ba'i tshe// de ni gnas der gtses pa gyur na// de nyid du ni sdug bsngal 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod la rkam pa dang // sdug bsngal 'dod chags
249b5(dkon brtsegs): sten pa dang // gti mug rgya la thogs pa rnams// dus ni yang dang yang du 'da'// mi bkren rnams ni gsal shing la// rab tu bcug nas phyung ba sti /
249b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams// shal ma li ni mtho la 'phyang // ci ltar mon sran sde'u dang gre'u// lcags zangs rnams su blugs byas nas// mes ni
249b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sreg pa na/ dbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar// de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing // 'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams// shi nas ngan song 'gro 'gyur zhing //
249b8(dkon brtsegs): lcags zangs rnams su gtso bar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas/ zangs kyi bye ba drug bcu dang / gzhan yang
250a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhi po dag yin no// zangs ni so so re re la// tshad ni dmigs su yod min zhing // me'i phung por ldan rnams su// bskal pa du mar gtso bar
250a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// kha gcig zangs rnams de dag tu// rang gi las kyi bskal brgya 'am// nyis brgya sum brgya tshang ba mchod// yang na bzhi brgyar gtso bar 'gyur// phra skam
250a3(dkon brtsegs): rnon po rnams kyis ni// bzung zhing yang dang yang skyugs pas// de dag shi ni yod min zhing // dung ltar dkar ba rnams su 'gyur// lcags kyi gzhong bar 'dug nas
250a4(dkon brtsegs): ni// rab tu tsha zhing 'dren pa med// shi zhing shi zhing skye 'gyur te// rang gi las kyi gnas par 'gyur// gang tshe dmyal ba'i bsrung rnams kyis// ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag
250a5(dkon brtsegs): ni// gtun la stsogs pas brdungs pa na/ sha rkang rus pa phye mar 'gyur// de'i tshe na de dag la// shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang ldang // des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnam
250a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyur pas de las 'tsho// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// gtun tu drag po rnams kyis 'joms// rta re rnams kyis gshegs pa dang // de bzhin gsal
250a7(dkon brtsegs): shing gzugs par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pI// sems can rnams kyi lus la ni// lcags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang // rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab/
250a8(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ral gyi mchu can khwa rnams kyis// mgo dang klang ba gtog 'gyur zhing // wa dang sbyang kis zos 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/
250b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan thugs rdul pa dring zhing // kun gyis spang bar srung 'gyur la// spu gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung // mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// rab tu tsha bar 'asreg 'gyur zhing/
250b2(dkon brtsegs): ngu 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod che// thig nag tu yang sreg par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang // yang dang yang du me mur dang /
250b3(dkon brtsegs): spu gro'i chu klung rnams su lhung // gang che lcags kyi zangs po na// mi rnams de dag 'tshod pa na// khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur na// de dag bde ba 'chol bar byed/
250b4(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// dmyal ba drag po chen por ni// lhung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing // lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur// mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag/
250b5(dkon brtsegs): lcags las grub pa'i grags chen dang // mi sdug ri bo rnams gyis ni// de tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed// des ni rang gis las byas pa'i// 'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur
250b6(dkon brtsegs): cing / de'is tshor ba myong ba nar// de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med// ci ste 'jig rten thams cad ni// bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med// der ni mgon med bdag gcig
250b7(dkon brtsegs): // sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed// gang dag pade phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyang byas kyang // pha ma de dag daring ni// rnam par dgrol ba'i mthu 'ang
250b8(dkon brtsegs): med// gang dag 'de phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // pha ma de dag de ring ni// rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med// gang dag pade phyir don min par//
251a1(dkon brtsegs): sngan cad nyes pa spyad byas kyang // bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams// da ring bdag la dgrol mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan cad nyes
251a2(dkon brtsegs): bsrung byas nas// 'ja' shes nye du de dag kun// rnam par 'grel par yongs mi nus// gang dag pa dpyir don min par// sran cad nyes par spyad byas kyang / bdas
251a3(dkon brtsegs): gi rtsa lag de dag kun// de ring 'grel bar mi nus so// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sten cing // dman pa'i chos rnams sten rgyas ni// nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa
251a4(dkon brtsegs): dag/ de yi ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab 'chal pa mnar med par// song nas sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag/ phyi sa'i
251a5(dkon brtsegs): dri ltar snams par grags// de phyir mnam pa rnams dang ni// dman pa'i bud med rnams rten pa// byis pa de ni phyi sa'i// rgyal pa gzung nas gnas pa yin//
251a6(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar// de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob gyur te// rgyal po'i yi ni chad pa dang // sdug bsngal bcings pa'ang myong bar 'gyur// bud med gzhi las skyes pa
251a7(dkon brtsegs): yang // gsad dang bcing ba myong 'gyur zhing // dmyal bsrungs rnams kyis bsregs pa dang // nges par 'chi ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur// bud med rnams la bskams pa'i/
251a8(dkon brtsegs): blong na de dag bde mi 'gyur// gsal shing mthon po rnams su ni// btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur// sa'i seng gar bcug nas ni// de bzhin ral gyi ga sa
251b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni// de bdag yi chad bde mi 'gyur// rmongs pa bud med lhan gcig tu// yang dang yang du 'du 'dzi byed// sdug bsngal 'dod pa
251b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams bsten cing // smad pa rnams kyang smra bar byed// rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas// dge bar gsungs shes brjod byas kyang // de sems bud med
251b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi bzhin song // byi ba la ni byi la bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa zos gyur nas// yud tsam zhig ni yod byung yang // ha la ha la'i dug 'dra ba'i// 'dod chags kyis
251b4(dkon brtsegs): ni de yang 'khrug/ ci ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig/ sngangs shing lkug pa byung gyur kyang // des ni phyi sa mthong ba na// chags pa skyed par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byis
251b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bde 'dod rnams// rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni// 'dod pa dman pa rnams sten pas// des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags
251b6(dkon brtsegs): myos nas// shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing // tshul khrims can dag bslus byas nas// phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab can gyi dal rnyed cing // /
251b7(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i chos ni zos gyur nas// 'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni// mkhas pa sngon byung rab byung shig/ rgyal po chen po skyes pa 'dod pa la bsten pa rnams kyis
251b8(dkon brtsegs): skyon na de dag yin te// 'dod pa'i gni ngong // 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa la lhag par 'an pa rnams mi sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis tshor ba myong bar 'dzu/
252a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do// /
252a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa
252a3(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ma ti dA ri prid tsa/ na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon
252a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
252a5(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung
252a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
252a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po khyab kyi grong khyer chen po ni/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas/ lo brgyad lon pa
