252a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
252b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rtag par rgyun tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyod kyis lus su btogs pa'i
252b2(dkon brtsegs): sems rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la de lta de ltar chos bstan par mdzad de// chos bstan pa
252b3(dkon brtsegs): des bad sa'i rgyal po cher byed de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
252b4(dkon brtsegs): bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
252b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing / legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar
252b6(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchis te/ mtshon ca spangs zhing dbyug pa spangs
252b7(dkon brtsegs): / ngo cha 'chis shing srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snyid rtsi bar zhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol//
252b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang /
253a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba phrag khrig
253a2(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig 'dug pa der 'khor dang bcas par bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
253a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom
253a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gal te skabs phye bdag gi ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten snang bar bye mdzad pa la//
253a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni// bu mo khyod kyis dri bar bgyi// byang chub sems dang
253a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa kun// ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gang gis su ni mdzes par gyur//
253a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis nor ni che ba dang // mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni// gang gis rdzus te skye
253a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // mdab ma stong ldan pad+ma la// mchis par yang ni gda' ba dang // zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas pa// sangs rgyas phyag phyir mchi ba'i// rdzu 'phrul
253b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin gyur pa'i// spyod pa rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur// tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang // las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis
253b2(dkon brtsegs): dang // 'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pa dang // mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // de las chos kyang nyan pa dang // sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur// de skad ces gsol
253b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs
253b4(dkon brtsegs): so lags so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes
253b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/
253b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par 'gyur te gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tha na dgra la yang khro bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
253b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs byed du 'jud pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phes
253b8(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ byams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ku gzugs byas na ni// mdzes par 'gyur te blta bar 'os pa yin// bu mo byang chub sem
254a1(dkon brtsegs): u swA / ngas na / lu gyu #
254a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa la re ba med par sbyin pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ nor che bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
254a3(dkon brtsegs): dus su sbyin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang // yid 'ong byin dang rnam smin mi reg/ dpa' bo rnams ni las 'di byas pas na// rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin/
254a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor mi byed par 'gyur te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang / sems can log par lta ba
254a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / sems can rnams sangs
254a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di
254a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ 'gram de bzhin log par lta ba spangs// dam chos 'jig pa'i chan srung bar byed// sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na// 'khod /
254a8(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos gzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thad du rin po che chen po'i pa
254b1(dkon brtsegs): las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ste/ bzhi gang zhen 'di lta ste/ phye ma 'am/ me tog u pA le 'am/ pad ma 'am/ ku mu ta 'am/ pad ma dkar pos lag pa bka
254b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bsam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'bul ba dang / gzhan dag la yang gnod sems mi skyed pa dang /
254b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos ba
254b4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phye ma me tog
254b5(dkon brtsegs): bkang te 'bul ba dang // gnod sems spangs zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang // mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na// rgyal ba dag gi zad du rdzus de skye// bu mo byang
254b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gis
254b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos nyan byal bar chad mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang / ting nge la
254b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la
255a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dag ni bar chad mi byed dang // gzhan gyi chos gtam dag la mi dmod dang // rgyal ba'i mchod brten rnams la mar me
255a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bul// ting 'dzin bsgom pas de ni zhing du 'gro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di ste ste/
255a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la sten pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
255a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba dang / gnas pa thams cad la khong khro bar mi byed cing / mi snyan par mi sgrogs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgra zla
255a5(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa dga' zhing ser sna byed// byang chub sems dpa'i
255a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod la mi smod na// rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di
255a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi chub pa dang / glan ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra ba dag la
255a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phya bsgyur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin
255b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / 'dza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cing // glan ka mi 'chol chos ni nyan byed na// 'jigs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub
255b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing / yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i
255b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa bsgrub pas sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang / mdo sde zab mo rnams mi spong ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/
255b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi
255b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing / yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum ka gnas/
255b6(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu mos// sangs rgyas sras pa thams cad mkhyen ltar lta// sems can rnams la byams pas las dag 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems
255b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ste/ gzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus tsam pa dang /
255b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro/
256a1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs la/ brtson 'grus gnas shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran// yongs su bsngo zhing
256a2(dkon brtsegs): bshags dang phyag 'tshal ba// de la bdud kyi glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs
256a3(dkon brtsegs): shing de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang //
256a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
256a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing de las chos kyang nyan la/ sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa
256a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs byed cing // mos pa dang ni sbyin pa rgya chen po// mkhas pa de ni rtag tu byin par byed// de phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
256a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji skad bcas pa la bdag gis bslab
256a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bzhi pa bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa 'di dag las chos gcig cig ma spyad na yang / bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
256b1(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig/ de nas gnas rten mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyam 'og/
256b2(dkon brtsegs): tu chud par dka' na/ khyod 'di lta bu yang dag par len par byed na/ ci khyod kyi sems la dbang thob bam de skad ces smras nas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
256b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i
256b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen pos 'jig rten gyis khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol bar
256b5(dkon brtsegs): yang sil sbyin gyi sgra byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis brlab byas ma thag tu/ de'i modo la stong gsum gyi stong
256b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab cing / ma dkrol bar lha'i bsil snyan gyi sgra g.yang byung bar gyur to// btsun pa mo'u
256b7(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bus bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ci lta ba de bzhin du ma
256b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i dus nas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med pa
257a1(dkon brtsegs): / dang 'bud med kyi skyon rnams med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gsar gyi kha dog can du gyur cig bum
257a2(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag du/ de'i modo la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi chu
257a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po bstan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
257a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyar bar btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
257a5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te/ bden
257a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/ de la gnas par mi nus te/ 'di la dri ba ma
257a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub
257a8(dkon brtsegs): ces bgyi ba ni/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi
257a9(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zhes gyi ba ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshig bla dag so//
257b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo ci de bzhin gshegs pa yang byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa mdzad dam/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal
257b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na smig rgyu ba dang brag bcas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros
257b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang mo khyod kyis ci las bsam te/ 'di skad ces smras/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' yang bsam pa 'am/ bsam pa ma
257b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo bsam pa de lta bu yin du zin na/ byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo gros
257b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/ byang chub kyang gzhan pa de ltar gzigs sam//
257b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/ blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa ma mchis
257b7(dkon brtsegs): so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal
257b8(dkon brtsegs): kha ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba ji snyed mchis pa de snyed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo sprul pa nyid kyang me na/ de'i ses
258a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sems las byung ba'i lha ga la yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni mchis pa yang ma lags/ de
258a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'dra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
258a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
258a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal de de bzhin no// ci skad smras pa bzhin te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa sum cu lon
258a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di nyid kyis/ mi bskye ba'i chos la zhug
258a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byas so// de nas 'arje dpal gzho nur gyur pa stan las langs ste/ bu ma blo gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring po zhig na mthong /
258a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa// thams pas ma sa skas ga la ma pal pa cags phyir zhes sa bya ba'i chos la babad pa ni rnam pa mdzag pa'i thong / 'angam dpas kyim
258a8(dkon brtsegs): ga ci'i phyir slob dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las dadung ma bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni bud med do// 'di ni skyes pa'o// zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/
258a9(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang khyod kyi the tshom med par bya'o// bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa
258b1(dkon brtsegs): das/ bdag skyes par gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de'i bud med kyis dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes par red de/ chos/
258b2(dkon brtsegs): gos ngur smrig gyon nas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis bdag gi byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs/
258b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnam kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig nges bdag
258b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong bsnyen pa rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig/ ces byas so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces
258b5(dkon brtsegs): smras ma thag du de'i modo la/ dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas/ lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to// 'jam dpal bden pa'i tshig gis bdag
258b6(dkon brtsegs): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang / bsams bza' ba dang btung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul
258b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba dang /
258b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyis shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i dra bas yongs su bskor cing rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma dag gis rgyas la/ steng rin po che'i bla res
258b9(dkon brtsegs): bres te/ 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba kho na dang / mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden
259a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom lnga sems dpa' blo gros byang chubazang pos tshig de skad smras
259a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag tude'i mang la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dag ser gyi kha dag pan du gyur to// de nas sapa'i rna rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra spags shing srud kyim ga'ing
259a3(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni/ de ltar 'gyur ro// zhes
259a4(dkon brtsegs): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
259a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
259a6(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'jig
259a7(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ga// srag chags bye bzag sum su tha med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
259a8(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gdas par gyur to// ga bye ba zag brgyad du ni chos rnams 'acas kyi mig rngus med cing dris dang bral ba rnam par dgas/
259b1(dkon brtsegs): chags brgya stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtog par gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems rnams phyir mi ldog par
259b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs cing dge ba'i tsha ba'i che ba nyid mthong nas/ de dag rang gi bla gos phrag
259b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos nas/ tshig 'di skad du bcom
259b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa
259b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos ma thag tu/ bskal pa bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te khor nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
259b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gnas par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni bskal pa dri ma med
259b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer can du bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag dag par rdzo
259b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyad ces bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par bajig rten du 'byung bar duso
260a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no//
260a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis bskal pa stong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad la gang
260a3(dkon brtsegs): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas zla ba phye kyi bar du len re blags na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod//
260a4(dkon brtsegs): stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrangs pa dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal de bas na/ chos kyi rnam
260a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di khyod la btad kyi/ khyed mthun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ zung zhig dang /
260a6(dkon brtsegs): kun nub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ shod cig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 'jam dpal dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
260a7(dkon brtsegs): bai ci srid gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna bdun med par mi 'gyur la/ 'khor skur ba'i rgyal po shi na rin po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos
260a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyis tshul
260b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di med par gyur na/ dam pa'i chos med par 'gyur ro// 'jam pa la de lta bas na mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu 'di yi ger bri ba
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lung 'bog pa dang / bcang ba dang / blag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus btsam
260b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// 'di ni de'i rjesu bstan pa yin no// phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa la ngas bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das
260b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi
260b5(dkon brtsegs): dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen
260b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag rgya pa las/ bu mo blo gros bzangs mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu pa rdzogs sgo//
260b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su ren tu po de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dang ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa lags// rgya gar skad du/
260b8(dkon brtsegs): ar+ya gang god ta ra na ma su tA// bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtseg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang gi'i mchog ces bya ba'i/
261a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sdad bdag gis thos pa'i thos gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
261a2(dkon brtsegs): yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba
261a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gnas so// de nas dge snyen ma gang gi'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba naM ga la ba der song
261a4(dkon brtsegs): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
261a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma gang gi'i mchog la gang gis mchog khyod de gzod gang nas 'ongs zhes smras so// gang gi'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad
261a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sprul pa la rmas te/ khyod gzod gad nas 'ongs shes de skad bgyis na/ ci skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
261a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi mchog sprul pa la ni 'greng ba med/ 'dug pa med/ nyal ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ 'chi 'pho med/ skye ba med na/ 'di nas 'ongs so zhes de ci zhig
261a8(dkon brtsegs): ston par 'gyur/ gang gi'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad sbrul lta bu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa gang gi'i cho ga de bzhin no// gsol
261b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ gang gi'i mchog khyod gzod dgang nas 'ongs shes ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/
261b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi'i mchog sprul pa mi ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho ris su mi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro na/ ci gang gi'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro// mtho ris
261b3(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'gro/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro 'am/ gang gi'i mchog gis gsol po// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang gi'i mchog sprul
261b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par mthong na ni/ dge bsnyem ma gang gi'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags so zhes bdag
261b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang basman tu yang rung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge bsnyen ma gang gi'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par mthong ste/ bcom
261b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ma mthong na/ dge snyen ma gang rmachog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba 'a/
261b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de lha lags kyis kyang / g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang / bskyod pa dang / spros pa mchis na/ 'di snyam du bdag ngan song
261b8(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba 'am/ mthong ris su 'gro ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o// snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
262a1(dkon brtsegs): ni nams kyang ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris su ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen
262a2(dkon brtsegs): ma gang ga'i mchog de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi'i mchog khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par
262a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis/ mi skye ba la rmas te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam/ zhes de skad ces bgyis na/ ji skad
262a4(dkon brtsegs): lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi'i mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshigs bla dgas yin na/ de ci zhig
262a5(dkon brtsegs): lan 'debs par 'gyur/ gang gi'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa ma lags sam/ bka' skal pa/
262a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi'i mchog de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs
262a7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ gang gi'i mchog khyod yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam/ zhes nga ci zhig rma ste/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis sprul pa la rma ste/ khyod yongasu
262a8(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ zhes de skad ces bgyis na/ ci skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
262b1(dkon brtsegs): bang gi'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o// gsol ba ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i rma bas smras lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi
262b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/ de dag gi don chen por 'gyur bas dris so// de ci'i
262b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na// gang gi'i mchog rje de zhin gshegs pas ni chos nyid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na yang de las byung ba'i chos yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa
262b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa/ lta ga la yod/ gsol pa gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid cis bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de las byung ba'i chos lta
262b5(dkon brtsegs): ga la zhig mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi slad du ci ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/ bcom ldan 'akyis bka' stsal pa/ gang
262b6(dkon brtsegs): ga'i mchog gang dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub sem de ni gang gi tshe yang dag par
262b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa de'i tshe yang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor/ gang tshe yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro// gsol pa
262b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
263a1(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i mchog chos 'di ni sems pas thob par bya bar mi nus so// sems pas thob par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ni sems
263a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod/ gang gi'i mchog sems mi dmigs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// bsam gyis
263a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon gsum du byas pa ma yin te/ de ni thob par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon
263a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa rnam min/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ga'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad na mkha' ltar nges par thug su
263a5(dkon brtsegs): chud de/ gang gi'i mchog chos thams cad ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs
263a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyen po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes btags pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
263a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes btabs pa dang phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa
263a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang // 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
263b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi mchog 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ gang gi'i mchog ngas gzugs shes
263b2(dkon brtsegs): btags te/ gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btabs te// rnam par
263b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
263b4(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa'i dang // kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba yang sa ngas btags te/ mya dan 'aradas
263b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yang mi dmigs so// gang gi'i mchog 'di lta ste/ dper na smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yod med de mi dmigaso// gang ga'i mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs shes
263b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba btags kyang / gzugs gang yang mi dmig so// ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba btags kyang / rnam
263b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas
263b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar ngas btags kyang / don dam
264a1(dkon brtsegs): par na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so// gang gi'i mchog gang la mchog tu 'dzin pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni legs par
264a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas gnas pa yin no// gang gi'i cho ga mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnas la dmigs nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de
264a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni yongs su ma dag pa'o// zhes nga mi smra'o// gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo chud chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos na/ sngangs skrag
264a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang // 'khrugs pa rnams las
264a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi 'grol te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro// zhes nga smra'o// gang ga'i mchog da ltar ram/ nga 'das pa'i phyi na yang rung ste/ gang dag
264a6(dkon brtsegs): zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag la mi gti mug dag gsod pa pa'i 'du shes skyed par gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag leg par zin
264a7(dkon brtsegs): bas/ gsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud ci pa zhes bgyi ba bci'i slang /
264a8(dkon brtsegs): du na rgyud pa zhe bgyi ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po// gang ga'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyud bcad pa 'am/ dbye ba 'am/ rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/
264b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir rgyud chad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe mdzum pa mdzad do//
264b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs// kha dog du ma 'di lta ste// sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul
264b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha dog lta bu dag kyang byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su med pa dag snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
264b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du mngon par byung ste/ slar logs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sgor nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus
264b5(dkon brtsegs): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la baM de logs su thal mo sbyad pa btad de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
264b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ mdzum pa medad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
264b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge snyen ma sha stag las @
264b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/ phung po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas btso/
265a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 2
265a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal ba/ kan dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste// 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gzung shi
265a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na// dge slong brgya dang / dge slong ma bzhi rgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol po// de nas 'dod pa na
265a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang // gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyiswA/ me tog rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams mngon par sprul te// bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/
265a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig smra yang de'i lus ngal bar ya
265a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang / ci ltar yang gang ga'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang /
265a7(dkon brtsegs): rnying po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu rme
265a8(dkon brtsegs): de na no// rin rdzo rgyal pa gzhug par bya byas pas go pa rgya ba babyed pa/ sun nga sa par byung ba gas ga ma dzan tshas kyim
265b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge snyen ma gang gi'i mchog dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dung dri zar bcas pa'i yid ga rten yid rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
265b2(dkon brtsegs): mngo thar stod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag rgya pa las// gang gi'i mchog gis zhus pa'i
265b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste// 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a sho ka dang ta bya kan+da/ nams ma hA sAn su tra/ bod skad du/
265b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyin rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mad
265b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi
265b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brtsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thog
265b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa
265b8(dkon brtsegs): nas gaming gas pa lags pa migs pacas das su ma la yang dang gra gsan pa las
266a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lhun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
266a2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang // byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub seMs
266a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
266a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin cen thogs dang // byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkra' ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur dang / byang chub sems dpa'
266a5(dkon brtsegs): kha lo sgyur chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur
266a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / skyes bu ngas pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' babang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / chub sems dpa'
266a7(dkon brtsegs): phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lU'i zhwa dang // byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs paM dang / byang chub se
266a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//
266b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gnas shing bzhugs pa la/ rgyal po ma skyed dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon na
266b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon gyi bu tsa dang / zhabs drang na 'khod pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / ri la rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis
266b3(dkon brtsegs): sti stang byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgyad stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos
266b4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'o/ tshig 'a bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/
266b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od sru sa chen po dang / tshe/
266b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa ldams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin dang / tshe dang ldan
266b7(dkon brtsegs): kha nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnaMs snga dro'i dus kyi tshe// chos gos dang /
266b8(dkon brtsegs): shas thabs bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi
267a1(dkon brtsegs): / grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod kyi phyir rgyu zhing // mthar kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas phyogs gcig tu
267a2(dkon brtsegs): cang mi smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bong brang na bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang 'dra ba/ gzugs brda
267a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong
267a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / de rang gi pha'i khangs bzangs na/ khri gser gyi rkang pa lhod pa la 'dug par gyur to//
267a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong na/ khri de nas langs te sur yang mi 'gro// phyag kyang mi byed// gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang
267a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dir / bsod snyoms kyang mi dbul por kha rog te 'dug go// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas
267a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi khang b.rangs kyi snga khang gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos can po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas/ gdon par dga' ning stan yang bcing /
267a8(dkon brtsegs): ngo // rgyal po sa skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du khe rog ste 'dug pa mthong nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'a
267b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// num 'di dan namam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA kya thub pa da na rdzas chen zas/
267b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid par kun tu spyor ba/ yongasu zad pa/ yang
267b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying rtse ba can yin te// 'jig rten la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar
267b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi mi shes sam ci na/ khyod kyi de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / sur bar mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms
267b5(dkon brtsegs): la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dad pa dang gus pa yang mi skye bar/ ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog te 'dug/ khyod kyis don kyi dbang ci zhig mthong // de skad ces smras pa dang /
267b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgya lA ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ci snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la lda
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ sur mchi 'a nam yang gsan tan/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mo smras pa/ yab ci lha'i dbang po brgya byid lha gsan ngag
267b8(dkon brtsegs): nga ngas ra rgyam las rgyam gyis smras pa/ bumadzan na pa 'a 'o/ thams spang ga 'ang bad sams nas sa
268a1(dkon brtsegs): mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan la ldang ngan/ sur 'chi 'cha/ rgyal pos smras
268a2(dkon brtsegs): pata ta bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / mtsho bran dang / steng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal bar gsan tam/
268a3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// pus mos smras pa yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gnag po gzhan grwa la 'dud pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba gsan
268a4(dkon brtsegs): tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa// bu mo do ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar mi'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'o dang dod pa gas
268a5(dkon brtsegs): tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge wa la lgang ba 'am/ sur mchi ba gsan tam/
268a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos spras pa/ yab de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chub tu sems skyed nas/ byams pa
268a7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la/ dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos was bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la
268a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing ldang ba'ag/ su mche ba'ig/ byag 'tshal ba 'ag dgur sti babyed/ yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su nag chos kyi 'khor la blan med pa ban ma/
268b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid pa na/ nyan thos dman pa gzhan pa zhum pa nyid rtse ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud par bgyid/ yab lha'i bdag po/
268b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang ba 'am/
268b3(dkon brtsegs): sur mchi bar bgyi/ yab mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga khang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba tshangs pa'i
268b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ skur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa mi mnyam pa dang
268b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rje su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ sbur mchi ba 'am/
268b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi skra don du gnyer pa na/ yungs 'bru lta
268b7(dkon brtsegs): bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stongs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la ldang ba 'am/ su mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'du da pa'am/ 'dod par bskyed par bgyid/
268b8(dkon brtsegs): yang su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang ga/ yon tan nyi ma dang / zla ba'i snang ma dpa
269a1(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu ma ched gyi 'od lta bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sbrugs so ba nyan thos dag gi rnam par gros pa
269a2(dkon brtsegs): pa skyedani ri na gags pa rnams seMs rgya las rangs kyang zas rnam la gyin malan/ mas bzhin du kyi sa
269a3(dkon brtsegs): smad du non/ mu zhig blang dang / kau mau dkyi' 'khor btang ste// srin bu me khyer la phrag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang can thos la sten pa ni nyan thos kyi
269a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang gnas par 'gyuraro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang ster na/ thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang / gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal
269a5(dkon brtsegs): po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du mi ldang zhing sur mi 'gro la/ phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen
269a6(dkon brtsegs): bkur mi byed do// 'di dag stan+da dang bsod snyoms pa spyan mi 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go// de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin hA
269a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi ba rgyal po ma skyes dgu la 'di skad ces smra so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod nyid grong khyer dbul po rnams la
269a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs// sur mi bzhud myi gding ba lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal bcwa lags pa/ sum bgyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa min/
269b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dba' dang po sems bskyed pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so// rgyal pos
269b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dreg pa spangs te/ sems can thams la/ 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam// bu mos smras pa/ yab byang chub
269b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni kho na 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang khro ba dang / gnod sems dang nyes po spang ba drang // dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad
269b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni mkhon du 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba dang /
269b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs 'bum gyis nyan thos kyi tshul khris ci snyed
269b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos btan du lags kyang yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang gau las rmi/ ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las michi
269b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyang ga las mchi// rnam par grol ba yang galas mag rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ga las mchi/ yang 'di lta ste dper na/ bum pa chab kyis bltas pa'i
269b8(dkon brtsegs): nang du rang baban de mam gyi rigapa cig mi len pa der gnas par yang 'gror// yang de shin du na pos rnams lags gsas rgyas 'asum rgyas cas bshang du nag
270a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrim dang ting tidzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang
270a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur la/ rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yang 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der
270a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// yab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin
270a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po/
270a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa ni/ mya ngan med sbyin
270a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gzig rjid brgyan// nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lhags gyur kyang / de la phyag bya'i phyir ni dem lags/ ma skyes dgra'is de la smras pa ni/ bu mo don 'di nga las
270a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyan par gyis/ khyod kyisku lnga brgya mthong bzhin du/ phyag bya'i phyir ni ji ltar ldang mi byed// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin ra/ nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ban/
270a8(dkon brtsegs): sa
270b1(dkon brtsegs): mching bu blangs// de bzhi bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang / ye shes byings nas nyan thos blangs skam bgyid/ dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug go//
270b2(dkon brtsegs): sa bdag 'khror lo sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ kar shra pa ni gcig tsam gsol na ni/ de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis/ gang gis 'khor lo sgyur ba mnyes
270b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis na// bye ba phrag stong gsol pa bgyis ni ni/ des ni dbul po mang nor dang ldan par bgyi// des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa la/ kar sha pa ni slong ba'i
270b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bzhin du/ gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mthatha yas rnams/ thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bad gi de snyam bgyid/ nor rnams
270b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub bgyid mi ni ci lta ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/ rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing // byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid
270b6(dkon brtsegs): dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzer rnams sman pa yis/ grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba'i// nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang //
270b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid/ sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa gtang nas ni// spos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/
270b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smar par gnyer ba na/ sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ ci ltar nad pa sos par gyur pa thams cad la/ sman pa dag gis
271a1(dkon brtsegs): gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba/ de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do// 'di ni sman pa gang
271a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la/ gso bar sems kyis sems can gzhan la ma lags te/ de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i dargyal gyi// sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i se
271a3(dkon brtsegs): mi skyed/ sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyi ji lta bar// de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nang las grol bgyid pa/ de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi
271a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyis gdud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags// gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtog gyur nas/ bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan
271a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgrod pa ltar// mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags// gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/
271a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa// de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste/ de 'jig rten kun gyis sngags bgyi ba lags/ ma ran
271a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la/ de dag rnams kyi grib ma 'das yangs pa ma lags te// e ran da'i shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi/ rnam par grol ba'i/
271a8(dkon brtsegs): rmib sa nyi pa bsnyen ma lams/ can nam cigag sdang can dganam pa mes// gdus pa'i skye bo rnams kyi par sbyin pa lags// de bzhin bdag na byang chu
271b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la yang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid snyam/ ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags/ tsha bas gdungs pa zhi bar mi bgyid la/
271b2(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong / tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi/ ba lang rmig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun/ sems can kun gyi tshe bzhi mi bgyid//
271b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi'i klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ci ltar rin chen car ni 'bab na/ dbul po dag ni mgron bu
271b4(dkon brtsegs): len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs// nyan thos rnams
271b5(dkon brtsegs): ni dam chos rin chen las/ chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don slad mang du len par bgyid/ ci ltar sems can deg ni ri rab kyi/ drang du
271b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis nas gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na/ gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin
271b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag thu sa ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur/ nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid/ yang jig ji ltar rtswa bran
271b8(dkon brtsegs): me'i/ zil thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid/ rab tu khyabs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di/ tshim par bgyid lo tog 'phel bar bgyid/ nyan thos thams cad la
272a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pa bzhin/ byang chub sems dpa' rang khebs sprin dang 'dra/ snying rje mngon byang gang dag brten ni// stong gsum dam chos nu'is tshim pa
272a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// ka ra bai ra'i me tog dri mchog min/ des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi 'gyur// tsam pa ka'i me tog dri la dga'/ ud bral bar shi ka yang de bzhin no// nyan thos
272a3(dkon brtsegs): ka ra bi ra'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skyes pa dga' mi 'gyur/ kun khyen drin byang chub sems dpa' la/ lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar
272a4(dkon brtsegs): ci mchis/ gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad// nyan thos mi reng gcig pu mchi ba bzhin// byang chub sem dpa' dag ni ded dpon/ 'dra// 'gron zhig gzhan gyis stsal pa 'tshal
272a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin/ sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun la bgron bgyid bzhin// gzings las brten
272a6(dkon brtsegs): pas chu blo chen po las/ gzhan dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// bstan bgyis gru'i nang du zhugs na ni// sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid/ nyan thos
272a7(dkon brtsegs): gzings la bsten pa lta bu ste/ sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ci ltar nus// rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems/ sdug bsngal mtsho las sems
272a8(dkon brtsegs): can grol 'ang bgyid// ji ltar g.yul ngor bong bu zho na ni/ dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/ glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon na ni// ge yul yu lhags pa'i dgra rnam
272b1(dkon brtsegs): chom par nus/ nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin/ byang chub sems dpa' grang chen zhon 'dra ste// sems can kun pa phan dang bde skad du/ de dag shing dbang
272b2(dkon brtsegs): drung du bdud kyang 'joms/ ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang / de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur/ zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar pas ni/ mtshan mo mkha
272b3(dkon brtsegs): la thig le bzhin du mdzes/ yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman slad du/ ye
272b4(dkon brtsegs): shes shar pas skye bo sbyang bar byed/ yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs kyis/ 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma 'od rnams kyi/ 6/ 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma 'od rnams kyis/ bye ba sna
272b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs bdag bgyid par 'gyur/ nyan thos 'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dre/ de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi/ shes rab
272b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grel/ yab cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang / ri dgas chos rnams 'brog par mi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i skad kyis glang chen
272b7(dkon brtsegs): ri dgas dang / byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs su 'byed bar 'gyur/ yab cig de ltar nyan thos pa 'drar gzigs// de skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur/
272b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyad pas/ bdud dang de bzhin bdud ris skrag par 'gyur/ yab cig rgyu 'dag gis mthong bas na/ theg pa dman pa
272b9(dkon brtsegs): las rnams la ba ni 'jug par mi nus kyi/
273a1(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'dod mi skyed/ su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni/ theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// gang zhig byang chub ngas pa yongs spangs nas/
273a2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ de dag 'tsho ngar rnyed pa thob ma gyur// de dag mir ni skyes pa ni nyes par mchis/ gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du/ byang chub mchon/
273a3(dkon brtsegs): la bdun pa skyed par bgyid// de dag legs rnyed pa legs par rnyed// de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang / 'jig rten
273a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan la sang mas bkyid yid kyang tan/ gang dag cag tu sems can ldan srang bcom de dag srang du pa'i 'i me tog bzhin/ shes rgyal pos skyes dan+ta bumo ma pa myed kyi
273a5(dkon brtsegs): byin pas tshigasu bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag zos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs
273a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob 'am ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par bya des so// snyam mo// bu mo mya ngan med kyis sha ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la
273a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smra so// ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam
273a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa ma yin no// bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na/ 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed// bu mos smras pa// btsun pa sha ri'i bu/ gal te bdag chos dga' zhig
273b1(dkon brtsegs): don du gte ni bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sdug bzhig na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bus 'di ltar chos 'gar yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra smranas sa
273b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci bu me khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ zhes ze ba ni/ btsun pa shi ri'i bus chos gang mngon sum du byas pa'i chos de la
273b3(dkon brtsegs): ci nyan thos shes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnams rnam par gzhag pa yod dam/ gnas
273b4(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la theg pa rnam par gzhag ma med de// chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// myos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i
273b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni don du gnyer ba ci yang med de// gnas rten sha ri'i bus
273b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyi sbyin pa la gzhan 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la ni bye brag ni tsa yod/ tha dad
273b7(dkon brtsegs): du bye ba ni ci yod/ dri mes smras pa/ bdun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dpon pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod// shari'i bus smras pa/ rnas
273b8(dkon brtsegs): rdzing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med// bu mos smras pa/ 'dun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid lta bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med pa de bzhin du/
274a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba med do// btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste/
274a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i rnams la yab
274a3(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// gnas brtan sha'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la
274a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig du mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu ngas na
274a5(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ngam ci na// khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ sur yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer bstan dang bsod snyoms la/
274a6(dkon brtsegs): yang sngan 'dren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo ru dag la
274a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chem po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ci snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/
274a8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni/ kho bos grangs shes kyi/ snyom par ma zhugs ni mi sheso// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshe bas ni len cig mnyam
274b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad
274b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
274b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po phyog bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs
274b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'jigs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sems// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa btsun
274b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mu mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla n+de ji snyed cig yod/ ma byon pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi dus
274b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi smin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ci snyed
274b7(dkon brtsegs): cig yod/ gti mug la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa ni ji snyed yod shes sam// mo'u dgal gyi dus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu
274b8(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa// btsun pa mau bug la gyi chen po nyan thos kyi thog babazhi ni ci snyed cig yod// rang sangs rgyas theg pa pa ni ci srid gcig yod/ theg pa chen po la
274b9(dkon brtsegs): seson/
275a1(dkon brtsegs): sa yang dag par zhugs pa ji gad rtsog mdanasas pa/ mdzu dgal kyi bus smras pa/ bu ma dan mishes so// bu mas smram pa
275a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzu dgam kyi than pos nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed cig yod/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul
275a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa
275a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ shes saM//
275a5(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni dag dang gzhan de'i gong du gang nyan
275a6(dkon brtsegs): zos dang rang rgyas kyi sa ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
275a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas/ khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis mchog tu bstan gyis/
275a8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
275b1(dkon brtsegs): spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ shing ljon pa
275b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las tsan sbrul gyi snying pos spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas brtan mo'u dgal
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang kho bo dag gdod thos na/ sangs rgyas lta ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ ci ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas
275b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri las ma langs bzhin du/ tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu
275b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa'i 'od zer zer de'i bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig/ tsan dan gyi dri dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyis
275b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs te/
275b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed bya'i 'od zer gyis de nyid kyi che/ 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od /
276a1(dkon brtsegs): dang dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbas rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong
276a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las kye'o// chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos dri des kyang / 'jig
276a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'di khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des kyang gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di skad ces patu
276a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu/ nyan thos dang rang
276a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri
276a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'di ga las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
276a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan thos chen po rnams kyis mdun du seng
276a8(dkon brtsegs): go'i sgra spags te/ des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i
276b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od do'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po des
276b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyi byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u
276b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu
276b4(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong ngam thos na/ nyan thos dman pa zhon pa/ zhum pa nyi tse pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba 'am/ sur 'gro ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa mo'u dgal
276b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa morunganas gyi
276b6(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po/ gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbar na/ buram zhing gi 'tshal las/ 'ad ma mam man/
276b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bu rtsal las 'bras sa su'i gang bzhin du rnams med par gang bar byung nas de dag thams cad kyis brnas par bgyis kyang 'dzi rten gyi mas thas pa'o
276b8(dkon brtsegs): tshan ma ma ma ma ga na na
277a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos//
277a2(dkon brtsegs): mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
277a3(dkon brtsegs): de sngon mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong / gang dag
277a4(dkon brtsegs): nga la sgrar shes pa// log par spong bas zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnam ni chos nyid blta// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par
277a5(dkon brtsegs): bya min pas// de ni rnam par shes mi nus// shes ma gsung sam/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po// gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang
277a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa sngon mthong ngam/ zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
277a7(dkon brtsegs): tsham kyin/ na'i mig gis ma yin te/ gzugs sum yin no// sgra'i mig gis ma yin teto tshor bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du shes su ma yin no//
277a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te rnam par shes pa ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdan zhes rje
277b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
277b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang /
277b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no// chos gang med pa de ni ltar mi nus so// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas
277b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te// de dag ni blta bar mi nus so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs
277b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su
277b6(dkon brtsegs): grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta
277b7(dkon brtsegs): ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ tsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos
277b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na/ chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do// med pa gang yin pa de dag
278a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni sa pa rnam par sbyangs par bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par spang ba
278a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas ni/ bdag la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lnga ba ci ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od
278a3(dkon brtsegs): srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
278a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin
278a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben no// rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo
278a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis su las chos thos na/ 'di ltar khyod kyis yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur bu mo yang dag pa'i lta bal+la ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang
278a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las byung ngo zhes de skad gsung so// bu mos smras pa btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gnan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab can de
278a8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab ca
278b1(dkon brtsegs): du ni gzhan gyi sgra ma tshal pa/ btsun pa 'od srung na pa// ji na dge slang tshul bzhin du grags pa yin/ 'od srung can pas smras pa/ bu mo gang na cha dge slong ngan
278b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na/ dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub
278b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la dang lhan gcig
278b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya/
278b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de
278b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du
278b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ci ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang
278b8(dkon brtsegs): med/ mi sbyor ba yang med par mthong ba de bzhin du/ chos thams thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong
279a1(dkon brtsegs): yin bu sos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med par mthong la/ kyi byed cing / mi 'jig par yang mi byed ma/ ngas
279a2(dkon brtsegs): na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po mthong zhes bya ba de ni/ mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag ci
279a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar lta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos/ ci ltar mthong ba bzhin du lta bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni bdag dang bdag gi
279a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ngo // bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ci ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o// gtam de skad brjod pa'i
279a5(dkon brtsegs): skabasu gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis spob pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//
279a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyi byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gi ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing / gang gis nang ngam
279a7(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs te// spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed pa na slob pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis
279a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin// kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa
279b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba
