279b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos mi dmigs shing / 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang mi dmig
279b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na/ gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ci ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
279b4(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor kyis ci ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu
279b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing smrar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa de dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci spobs pa ci yong yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras
279b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa 'am/ brjod par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis
279b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs
279b8(dkon brtsegs): bas ston to// bu mos sbas pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor chos thams cad la thag ca lta bur mas sam/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ zhu mams so// bums smras pa/ gan
280a1(dkon brtsegs): brtan rab 'byor ci brag cal mos pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni med de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra
280a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar zad do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang
280a3(dkon brtsegs): brten nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ du mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung ba'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
280a4(dkon brtsegs): de bas na/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das
280a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das de gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
280a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so zhes ci'i phyir bstan/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
280a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba 'am nub par 'gyur ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa dam pa'i
280a8(dkon brtsegs): tshig ston to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bstan pa thams cad ni stan du med pa'o// de ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/ de ni bstan kyang rung /
280b1(dkon brtsegs): ma bstan kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po ma yin dang / brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di
280b2(dkon brtsegs): lta bus chos la gnas shing 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dag ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa 'am/
280b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis phye ba yin/ ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa rab
280b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bshod cig dang / kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
280b5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis kyang kha na ma tho ba med
280b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i
280b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro// sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin
280b8(dkon brtsegs): / 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir gtang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no// /
281a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ yongs su bsngo ba mkhas pa shin du rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
281a2(dkon brtsegs): pa las nges par 'byung ba yang yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsam pa yang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir
281a3(dkon brtsegs): ma bstan pa shes pa yang yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes
281a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyi bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la
281a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod mal khri gser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing bstan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas nyan thos chen po dag dang gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma
281a6(dkon brtsegs): yin par gnas pa yin no// bu mo mi na bar bstan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya bar ci khyod kyis ma thos so//
281a7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun po sgra gcan zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung
281a8(dkon brtsegs): ni/ 'jig rten na gang dag rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu ma la bas shes te gang dag ci ltar bdas pa'i bsum pal /
281b1(dkon brtsegs): cing slab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa 'di las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o// bu mo mya ngan
281b2(dkon brtsegs): med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin mthong de skad ma zer cig/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag ci ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin
281b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag na rung zhes bya'o// /
281b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do// /
281b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pas de
281b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rung ba yin no// de dag ni khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag bslab pa la yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na de dag gis
281b7(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni mi dmigs te/ khams gsum pa rtag pa tsam du shes so// de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// sba gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang rung ba ma
281b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste dper na/ gser rdul brgyan du byas pa dang / rgyan tu ma byas pa la tha dad du
282a1(dkon brtsegs): cas slams tsha gyis rnas pa/ zus ma ma dang/ rnams smras pa/ bcu pa skag da na du ba
282a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la yang mi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du bya ba ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon
282a3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin du mtho ba la 'dug te/ chos nyan tam zhes zer ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtsa bting ba la
282a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di ji snyam
282a5(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la 'dug ste byang chub thob par 'gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtsa bting ba la zhugs nas byang chub thob po// bu mos smras
282a6(dkon brtsegs): ga btsun pa sgra gcan zin ci byang chub sems dpa' rtsa bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig
282a7(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong dam/ de las gzhan pa 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la btugs
282a8(dkon brtsegs): par byed dpa/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan min de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang /
282b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyapa sman shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni
282b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni bcom ldan
282b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das le shakya thub pa de nyid kyi sras yin no// bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin na/ ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ yab
282b4(dkon brtsegs): thong shig thong shig/ 'di ltar btsun pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsung shig/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod
282b5(dkon brtsegs): pan btags pa lta bu wa skyed par 'gyur ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du de
282b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zham ring ba ni nyan thos mdzes pa ma lags so// yang de bzhin gshegs
282b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smra na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o// yab de lta bas na de bzhin
282b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs
283a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
283a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu brgya thams pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad du/
283a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so// lha'i
283a4(dkon brtsegs): bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog gis mngon par gtor to//
283a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te nyan thos chen po de dag gis rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bza' ba dang / bca'
283a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kha ldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / myang bar bya ba gsod pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byas te/ dad pa dang gus pas rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim
283a7(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar srad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar mtshal lo zhes kyang smras so//
283a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa pha ma la stsogs pa 'khor mang po dang se bo phal po ches yongs su skor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
283b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// rgyal po btsun mos 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos
283b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag
283b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin
283b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thogs ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyer ba na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
283b5(dkon brtsegs): khrig zag dgu cu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das
283b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems
283b7(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to// de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byas
283b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas ste/ bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med yang ma yin pa lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des
284a1(dkon brtsegs): / bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bud med kyi mtshan ma mi snga
284a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur nas steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka'
284a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ sha ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis steng gis bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
284a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med
284a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar gyur te/
284a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bdun bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig tu 'gyur te/ phyir mi
284a7(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra
284a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byas shing / mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa/ ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang
284b1(dkon brtsegs): khyad bar med de/ sha ri'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ci lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
284b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
284b3(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung sra bcur rum na bzung ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
284b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du 'di'i 'og
284b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/
284b6(dkon brtsegs): shi ri'i bu sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyi mthong ngam/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ she ri'i bu rgyal po'i
284b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa sum pa'i lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/
284b8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba des tshe rgyal po dung zhes bya ba'i bu rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas/ deng
285a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i chos thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i bar du
285a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro// de mthar
285a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa
285a4(dkon brtsegs): dag byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'ong
285a5(dkon brtsegs): zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid la lung bstan/ pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid rang nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya
285a6(dkon brtsegs): stong ri ba phul te/ tshangs par spyod par rgyal pos gnang nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi dag gzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ lhas
285a7(dkon brtsegs): phul ba'i me tog man 'da' ra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor to// de nas bar snang la babs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bden pa
285a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bded pa'i tshi ga gang gis bdag gi byang chub thob pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te skye zhing chos gos ngur smrig gyon la rin po che'i 'dra
285b1(dkon brtsegs): dag la dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te/ skye bar 'gyur ba lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ dper na dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgyad lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta ba bzhin
285b2(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod
285b3(dkon brtsegs): lam dang ldan par snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyi byin pas pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ltar
285b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni bcos ma ste/ rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su btags pa las langs pa med bzhin du phyin ci log pa dang / mtshungs par
285b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang / de ring kho na'i gzugs cig la bu mo'i gzugs su yang gzigs/ khye'u yi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs/ de ni bdag
285b6(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong gi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs na/ 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/ rgyal po chen po de ltar ya ma brla'i chos thams cad la 'di na kha cig lta ba'i
285b7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas dkri bas kun nas bklags shing mchis te rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su sreg go// yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ma
285b8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ 'gyod pa ma lags pa la 'gyod par sems so// rgyal po chen po de ltar na/ khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la/ rgyal srid nyams pa bzhugs bzhin du/ rtag tu bcom
286a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis thad du bzhud cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod pa/ ma yin pa'i phyin ci log las byung ba'i mgyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro//
286a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po khyod ni/ bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba lugs kyis bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / btsun mo zla ba can dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan
286a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
286a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis bdag mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po da de'i dus la bab par shes na
286a5(dkon brtsegs): song shig ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo zla ba can la stsogs pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal
286a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig
286a7(dkon brtsegs): chongs shig/ lhog shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam
286a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
286b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ gzhan dag la
286b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ston cig/ kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bas gang gis
286b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na rna lam du thos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
286b4(dkon brtsegs): rjod pa dang / lungs ci ltar phog pa bzhin du nan tan du bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
286b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba
286b6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod do// 'phags dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus
286b7(dkon brtsegs): ba sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs sos+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su ren tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye
286b8(dkon brtsegs): shes sdes bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la dang ta/ ba ri brid tsan ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
287a1(dkon brtsegs): ga tshan 'thags pa can ma chos kyi rnam grangs sa spong zan 'ad+hab las/ drim zad kyis byin pam nus pa nas bya bathes pachen pa
287a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ad mangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'jas lo// 'di smad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das macan med na/ rgyal bcul
287a3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi chal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad
287a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/
287a5(dkon brtsegs): glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin
287a6(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma rtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// byang
287a7(dkon brtsegs): chung sems dpa' stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang /
287a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa
287b1(dkon brtsegs): dag spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / byams pa dang / mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gos pa dor ba don yod
287b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan med kyis mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis rtag tu brgyan dang / gser gyi
287b3(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal can dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems thog pa med pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa
287b4(dkon brtsegs): khri dang / yang thabs gcig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang
287b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyen
287b6(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang / rin po che tog dang / mdzong ba don yod dang /
287b7(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod
287b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe shams thabs dang / chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/ bsod snyoms
288a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bzhugs nas/ de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs
288a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes
288a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes rab thogs
288a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/ de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun gnag med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//
288a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'brang bar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i
288a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par bzhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod
288a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshob pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na 'khod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan par
288a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang blo
288b1(dkon brtsegs): byar na skyes pa dang bung med dang / khye'u dang bra mo gang dag bdag cag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa 'khod pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
288b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la thug gi bar du longs zad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//
288b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gi grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med par thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
288b4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam grus smras pa/ gang gi grong khyer du skye bo'i tsho gas thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob
288b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ gang gi grong khyer du
288b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs ste grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
288b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i cho gas thams cad la sngon ma zos pa'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo
288b8(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ ci nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na sgo dang skar khung dang / rtsig pa dang /
289a1(dkon brtsegs): snod pa can dang / shing dang / mas dang / matog dang / 'bras bu dang / gas rnams las stong pa nyid kyis lha 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
289a2(dkon brtsegs): ma ma pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa/
289a3(dkon brtsegs): kho bos bsams par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang
289a4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de/ tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnams de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don ljon kyis
289a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
289a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams
289a7(dkon brtsegs): cad du rin po che gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
289a8(dkon brtsegs): par sel bas smras pa/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i
289b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang /
289b2(dkon brtsegs): gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o//
289b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams
289b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa
289b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
289b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems
289b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gtam 'di brjod cing / mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin to// yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med
289b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ sngon gyis rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa
290a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa zhig yod de/ bu ma de'i lha'i mig dag pa mi'i las 'das pas// byang chub sems dpa'
290a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so// bu mo de yang gzugs bzang ba/
290a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ pha me dang / nang gi mi la byams pa/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ de dpyid
290a4(dkon brtsegs): zla tha chung tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par pha mas dge mtshan dang / bkra shis byed du gnang nas/ bram ze dang zho dang / rtsa ku sha dang / me tog dang / yam sreg
290a5(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / mar dang / bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ khrus bya bar khrid pa las bram ze de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po
290a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / bkra mi shis so snyam pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas par gyur to// de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze ches 'gras tshangs pa'i lha zhes
290a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba des/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi shis te de dag mthong na dgos pa 'am/ nor ram/ rtags
290a8(dkon brtsegs): sam/ mchod sbyin nam/ bkra shis kyang rung te/ mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bzhud do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su
290b1(dkon brtsegs): yad de smras pa/ 'di dag chags med mchog tu dag shes pa/ skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed// 'di dag rnam par dag cing bden bzhi mthong // dul la grol bar gyur
290b2(dkon brtsegs): cing mnyam par bzhag/ 'di dag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing // 'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yon phul 'bras bu 'chi med thob// sbyin gnas
290b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin// 'dod las rgal cing sdig med re ba med// 'di dag sman pa mchog te 'jig rten rgyu//
290b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thar bar byed/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// de sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems
290b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gzhan yang mang // shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ci ltar spang // 'di dag rtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi// bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char phab/
290b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rnams la bkur sti chung byas kyang // mi rnams chos dang de bzhin nor dang 'grub// 'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs bkra shis ldan// 'di dag zhing mchog
290b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su zhig dang byed pa// de ni bsod nams mang po bskyed par 'gyur// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bu mo dri ma med kyis
290b8(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la tshigs su bcad de sngar smras pa/ byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du ma bzhud cig/ mchod sbyin dus 'dir dge slong ma gzigs shig/ ngur smrig gos can de bzhin
291a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo grags pa// de dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyi// yab dang lum yang dgyes par mi 'gyur zhing / bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis
291a2(dkon brtsegs): spang bar 'gyur// khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur bgyis// de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu spongs// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bram ze
291a3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs bcad de slar smras pa/ yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma btogs par// pha dang ma yang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin// gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor
291a4(dkon brtsegs): dang lang tsho min// 'di dag 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skyabs// bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lus gtang zhing // de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang
291a5(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par// kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'di na med// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu me dri med kyis byin pa
291a6(dkon brtsegs): la'adi skad ces smras so// bu mo btsas nas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs// sngon chos kyang ma gsan/ sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur yang ma mdzadan
291a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci'i slang du sangs rgyas la dad par 'gyur/ bu me dri ma med kyis byin pas sbas pa/ bram ze khom bcas nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ tsan dan gyi langs pa
291a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na gser gyi khri la bzhag pa'i tshe/ lga bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'jos pa kho mos mthong te/ de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa brjod/ chos
291b1(dkon brtsegs): rang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod pa thams thos so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis nang nas byang nas sngan de bzhin gshegs par mthong ba gcig pu de la/ lha'i bu
291b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis dris pa grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'dra zhig/ de ni ci ltar shes par bya/ de nas lha'i bu nges kho mos bsam pa shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag
291b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang dad pa skyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de'i dbu skra dri med snum zhing mdzes// gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil pa'i lcang can/ zhal mdog
291b4(dkon brtsegs): pad ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra// zla ba mtshan mo nams mkhar mdzes pa bzhin// de'i mdzad bu kha bshel mdog bzang // smin 'tshams bar nas 'khyil cing shin tu
291b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes// de'is 'khor rnams zil kyis gnan te 'dug/ rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed// mi dbang spyan 'dzes 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// sems stobs
291b6(dkon brtsegs): mi zhum tshem mnyam thag kyang bzang // de'i ljags che zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs/ de'i zhal ni dri med rnam par mdzes// de'i gsung ni phan zhing snyan la ran//
291b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig rtsubs spangs zhing mi 'byed sdig pa med// skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing / 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba gsung dbyangs sgrogs// de'i mgur ni dung dang
291b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing 'dra// de'i mi dbang phyug gi sor mo ring // de'i phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra// brang yang dri med lte ba gzhol zhing zab// rta mchog lta bur 'doms kyi
292a1(dkon brtsegs): 'a dag sa sa tham mi bA #
292a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam ra/ lba ba nub// de bzhin spu'i khung bugaserare dang 'dra// brla'i dbyibs ni glang pos lag dang mtshungs// zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa
292a3(dkon brtsegs): a ni'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden gsung rgyas pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan ltas bcom pa rnams ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba 'jig/ 'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang /
292a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul med skyon dang bral bas sems can kun tshim mdzad// gya gyu med dang tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi//
292a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing // mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston// de ni rang gi sangs rgyas gyur pa te// bdag nyid rgal cing
292a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol rnams kyang sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang skyobs dang dge shis dang // 'jig rten kun la thugs rtse phan par mdzad// ston pa de'i yon tan 'di dag dang // gzhan
292a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mtha' yas kho thos de ma brjod// zas nas skye rnams yid dgal dang gyur nas// rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang skom// de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pas tshi/
292a8(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa
292a9(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu dag thos so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog/
292b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gnangs pas kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang
292b2(dkon brtsegs): thal dga' ba 'am/ mal dga' ba 'am/ ming po la dga' ba 'am/ spun la dga' ba 'am/ nye du la dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba 'am// rgyan la dga' ba 'am/
292b3(dkon brtsegs): gos la dga' ba 'am/ lus la dga' ba 'am/ srog la dga' ba 'am/ grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du sangs rgyas
292b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid rnam pas rjes su dran no// bram ze kho mos ni gsum sems la yid la bya ba yid la byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin
292b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing / kho mos don tam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang / tshig gcig kyang chud zos
292b6(dkon brtsegs): par ma byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to// kho mos nyin mtshan gang du
292b7(dkon brtsegs): yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos ma thos pa dang / dge 'dun la snyen bkur ma byas par mgyur to// bram ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos mnyan
292b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med do// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod mangs lo rgyas
293a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de ring ba'i tshul du song ste/ ci ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad
293a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol to// bu mo dra ma med kyis byin pas kyang / ci ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang
293a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do// de nas bu mo dri ma sed
293a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa shing rta la babs nas/ bram ze de dag lhan gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de dag
293a5(dkon brtsegs): gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ga la
293a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de lags su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sha ri'i bu bud med ni shes rab sor gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa drag pa/
293a7(dkon brtsegs): bag med pa mang ba/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du 'chi ba lags na/ bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/ ci nas
293a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
293b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyis gtam byung ba 'di dang / bram ze'i tshig thos nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de
293b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la phyag byas nas/ rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod na re kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par gyur to// nam yang dga' ba
293b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang / yid bde ba la brtson nam/ 'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis smra/ de nas rgyal po
293b4(dkon brtsegs): gsal rgyal gyis rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byad lha'i bu mo mtshung zhing 'dra// rgyan rnams kyis ni chas pa cha byed 'dzin// ci ltar
293b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis ma non pa// ci ltar bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dri'i yid byung gyur// khyad kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor// ma ni rtag tu khyod kyis
293b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang du gyur pa yin// bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na// de'i sa khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma gyur/ sdug cings phangs la yid du 'ong ba ste/ skye ba kun la
293b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyed yin na// yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod// ci'i phyir na khyim 'dir dga' ba med/ bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cig/ ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar
293b8(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde// yongs su nyams shing yid byung sems su gyur// khyod ni 'dod pa ci 'dra nga la smos// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas// rang gi pha rgyal po gsal rgya
294a1(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig phung po nyes mig snod rnams pa/ khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chung ngam/ 'khor ba'i gnas ni sa
294a2(dkon brtsegs): yang la lta dang mtshungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig pa na// brul dug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la// gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa gang la mchis// khams
294a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sprul bzhi ste// srid pa sems dpa' bde ba ga la mchis// mi 'dza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing // dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la
294a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis// kun nas nyon mongs dgra' yongs bskor ba// ci ltar bde thob rgyal po bka' stsol cig/ dug 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis// gsad par khrid la bde
294a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ga la mchis// g.yangs sa che 'dir su zhig yid ston gyis// rgyal po 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten de dang mtshungs// blo ngan dag gi lus rnams bor ba ni// ri rab tsam gyi phung por
294a6(dkon brtsegs): rab gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na// 'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton// pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang // bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshegs
294a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun// 'dus byas thams cad me longs gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di 'dri'i mi sdug gang la su yid rton// gang tshe bdag gi rang byung rgyal ba mthong // de tshe bsas kyi rgyas
294a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye/ byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni// yab gcig bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so// bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba lta 'tshal gyur//
294b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal po'i sras po 'di dag mthong // yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bstan par bgyid// de nas rgyal po gsal
294b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu mos tshig thos nas/ cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha cang mi smra bar 'gyur bar rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di
294b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus thugs brtse bar dgongs ste lan gdab tu gsol/ 'di ltar btsun pa sha ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes
294b4(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags// de gal te 'dus byas lags na de
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can no zhes bka' stsal to// ci te 'dus ma byas lags na 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis/
294b6(dkon brtsegs): so// gang lta skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni phrad pa ma mchis pa na/ phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ci ltar btsun pa sha ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi/ de nas tshe
294b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// shi ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ni
294b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas mi 'dri'i bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di
295a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan
295a2(dkon brtsegs): ba lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston/ gal te sems
295a3(dkon brtsegs): can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na/ sems can ni ma mchis pa ste de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ste chos su 'du shes pa
295a4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas te ston na/ chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na/ rnam par mi rtog pas
295a5(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor par 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos/ cha
295a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mo chu dgal kyi bus smras pa/ bu mos 'chung
295a7(dkon brtsegs): ma sgris thams 'gyung ba srid 'dzim pa/ 'byung pa me pa / dam pa ma rtag pani gag pa sal pas
295a8(dkon brtsegs): ma ma pa/ pa su ma jims kyi sarkyen pas/ byams pa'i thag pal dig kyis rnam pa/ sa nga nas dang brnam
295b1(dkon brtsegs): sa tshas bla ba rnams kyi mchab tu bstan pa lags na/ sa rba dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam/ 'on te dpags pa ma mchis pa'i chos stan/
295b2(dkon brtsegs): gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni/ khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni//
295b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slad du te/ de lta bas na btsun pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so// ci te dmigs pa ma
295b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos ston na ni/ chos smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par gyur te mi 'thad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od
295b5(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// gang po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri/ bu mos ni
295b6(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa dris te/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun
295b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'od srung chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas/ langs te gzhan dag la ston cing / gang dag las tha na gzar bu gang tsam gyis bsod snyoms
295b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ de ci btsun pas lus sbyin pa sbyong ngam 'on te sems kyi sbyin pa sbyong / gal te lus kyi
296a1(dkon brtsegs): sbya na/ lus ni bas thogs ma mchis pa/ byed pa la mchis pa ste/ rtswa rang shing dang / rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yong dang mtshungs pa
296a2(dkon brtsegs): des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ci ste sems kyi sbyong na/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ci ste lus dang sems
296a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyi rol gyis sbyong na de ni ma mchis pa ste/ ma mchis pas ci ltar sbyong bar bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// rab 'byor/
296a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'/ bu mos ni len pa med pa
296a5(dkon brtsegs): dris shing yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di bas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
296a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos
296a7(dkon brtsegs): pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyi rab tu phye ba lags/ gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags na ni/ 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// ci te chos nyid
296a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rab tu phye ba legs na/ chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa
296b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// nyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gyur ba mid pa'o//
296b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags
296b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni ma byung ba'o// ma byung ba gang
296b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
296b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di la brjod du ci yang med// cang mi smra ba bde thob byed//
296b6(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'bri ba byed// ci srid dngos po skye yod pa// de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med//
296b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan
296b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyis mchog du bstan pa lags na/ ci sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/ 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas ste/
297a1(dkon brtsegs): sa[।] sa than pa
297a2(dkon brtsegs): bkun brtags pa lags na/ ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pa lags so// bsam gtan mdzad dag/ ci sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsas
297a3(dkon brtsegs): gtan mdzad na ni/ rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang rdo la sogs pa byung ba dang / zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni
297a4(dkon brtsegs): sems ma mchis pa'i srang du'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so
297a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa nam gru bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ nam grus smras pa/ bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dri ste/ de ni nyan thos rnams kyi bstan par mi
297a6(dkon brtsegs): nus so// bu mos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam grus chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan la/ nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan lags sam/ gal te
297a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gyi ni gnyis su ma mchis te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye zam ma mchis na/ pa'i srang du rtse da
297a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nam grwa de skad gsung / nas grwa yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'dis
297b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci lnga'i mig gis dngos po gzigs sam/ 'on te dngos pom
297b2(dkon brtsegs): ba gzigs/ gal te dngos po gzigs na ni/ rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// ci te dngos po ma mchis par gzigs na ni/ chad par lta bar 'gyur te/ de yang mi rigs so// ma 'gags pa
297b3(dkon brtsegs): yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa/ bu mos dris pa'i lan thob
297b4(dkon brtsegs): shig/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bu mo ni shes rab kun tu 'joms pa dri bas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
297b5(dkon brtsegs): bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci mang du thos pa nyid de don du blta
297b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'on te tshig 'byung ba lta/ gal te don du blta na don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rna
297b7(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa'i ma kyi shes par bgyi pa sa lags pa ste/ rnam pa de la zhu gang lags pa don bstan du ma mchim man sa ga tshig 'thung ba stan na ni/ bcom ldan las kyi sangon
297b8(dkon brtsegs): nal ya kyi gyi phru sta pa ma yin no nas bsang bas/ depasan ma rdzun padun pa' las sa pa tho bam marnapa pa das cas
298a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
298a2(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ bu mo ni yi ge dang bral ba 'bri te/ des ni sgras tshim par byed pa mi nus so// bu mo ni ses
298a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste/ slob pa rnams kyis ma yin na/ de ci ltar bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos pa'o//
298a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni de bzhin gshegs papA laM zab mo la mos pa'i byang
298a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab pa 'am/ 'on te ngo bo nyid zab pas zag/ gal te rten cing
298a6(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab pa ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par
298a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags/ 'ong ba ma lags te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas/ yid ci rnam par na/
298a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar gyi shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing / gnyis su ma mchis la kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// ci ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab pa yin na ni/ ngo bo nyid gang
298b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ga sumo pa dgapa ma ya ma pa// dum khrim ma tsun pas rnam pa 'a
298b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtha' nimatha' ma lags te/ de'i srang du rnam par shes pas 'jal pa ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs
298b3(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyi byin pas sbas pa/ 'jam dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa gang gis tshig bla dgas kyang ma lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ni/
298b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas las yang bar 'das pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
298b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis
298b6(dkon brtsegs): byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khrod 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am bu mo gang
298b7(dkon brtsegs): dag kho bo'i mig las na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i byas ma pa ma thos bsam par bya'o nas gsul
298b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad dam/ 'on te chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad/ gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na/ de ni sangs rgyas/
299a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bka' ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/ gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong // gang dag nga la slar shes pa// 'dun pa 'dod chags
299a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong zhes gsungs so// ci te de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur bar mdzad na/ chos kyi sku ni bstan du mi nus pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de
299a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar
299a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen tog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mos ni dngos po med pa
299a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dri te/ de ni bstan par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po 'am dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o// bstan pa bslob la de nas ston cig/
299a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med pas byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
299a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams byung bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsung
299a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ ci zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad dam/ 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad/ gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni
299b1(dkon brtsegs): na 'an pa la pa ya sa/ 8// rgyas mamam bya rnams kyi dpa tsha ma tshang nga
299b2(dkon brtsegs): slang dugs pang dngas mchis pas pan 'dogs pa mdzangan pang zang ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so// na pa che tog kyang rgyang mi smra bar gyur to//
299b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer 'di na sa
299b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnams pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes
299b5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pas de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du bstan te/ de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do// gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'ag
299b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// ci te bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba'i ji ltar mdzad de/ bdag po ma
299b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ngan song slong gis smras pa/
299b8(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni smon lam gyi dbang gis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur ron byed do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam
300a1(dkon brtsegs): byadang gas bsdud du sa nus lags so// gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yangs su mya ngan las 'ang ma rnam nga bzhin gnas
300a2(dkon brtsegs): pa re ri'i dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ci ltar mi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'dis na smon lam gyi dbang gi bsgyur bar mi nus par rig par bya'o// ngan song spong yang
300a3(dkon brtsegs): cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ba thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di
300a4(dkon brtsegs): skad du gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos \u0f7fsam
300a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// zhes gsung ba de/ ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa lags sam/ 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/ gal te bdag la rag las pa lags na ni mi
300a6(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/ ci ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gis sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ ci ste gzhan la rag las pa lag na ni ting nge
300a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de khyod kyi ma lags so// gang khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas spras
300a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// bu mo dri ma med kyi byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas
300b1(dkon brtsegs): mas na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can dgal sgrub pa rnams kyis gnod pa sang ma tsham sa// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa thams cad po pa sa
300b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
300b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang / gsad par smai ba 'di dag thar pa dang 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa
300b4(dkon brtsegs): med par thob par 'gyur ba rnams pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci khyod kyis sbyor ba 'di len pa dang bcas pa lags sam/
300b5(dkon brtsegs): 'on te len pa ma mchis pa lags/ gal te sbyor ba de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te/
300b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de yang mi rigs so// ci te sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis pa lags na ni mngon par 'dus ma byas
300b7(dkon brtsegs): bas na nyes par bsgrubs pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang thug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' na
300b8(dkon brtsegs): pa brtsegs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/
301a1(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu ma ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri te/ don lan gdab par mi nus sa/
301a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis so// byang chub sems
301a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni yi ge 'jug pa med do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa
301a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te/ yi ge rnams la mi chags so// chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings
301a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ de la ni rtogs par bgyid pa'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri
301a6(dkon brtsegs): ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i
301a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar gyur pa dang / spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par
301a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes gsung ba'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar sgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam/ 'on te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par rtog pas
301b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa lags nani/ 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par ni bar mi 'gyur ro// ci te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni mthung
301b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la sgro gdogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spob pa thob par
301b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas gzung te btab po// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam
301b4(dkon brtsegs): btab pa'i sems bskyed pa de mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/ gal te mchis na ni rtag par blta ba lags so// ci ste ma mchis na chad par lta ba lags te/ de gsung na ni khyod kyi gsung ba
301b5(dkon brtsegs): log pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad
301b6(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
301b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsung ba de/ ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma mchis pa zhes
301b8(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bgyi/ gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste/ yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// ci ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gom
302a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dor ba dor yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ci ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba
302a2(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ 'on ste zhi bas phye ba lags/ gal te skye bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa
302a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lags so// ci zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i zhes 'am/ nyan thos so zhes 'am/ rang sangs
302a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas so zhes 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'o zhes 'am/ sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam
302a5(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/ mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis byang
302a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i slar 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deng bu mo dri med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang
302a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa 'di ni mkhas pa'i zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ste/ chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu mo dri me med kyis byin pas/ gnas rten rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
302a8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor gang na gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa de la khyod kyis ci zhig gzhag par sems/ btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi/ spros pa la
302b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba ni ma lags so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi bgyid pa lags te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi dmigs pa lags so//
302b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de dag dang / bram ze lnga brgya tsam po dag dang / bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / de las
302b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa skye bo phal po che rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
302b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sdong bskor ba byas te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu dgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
302b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas mnga'// 'jig rten mgon po
302b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi dga' rtsol pa// mtshungs med ye shes bde gshegs khyod la zhu// byang chub sems dpa' ci lta spyad pa spyod// ci ltar shing dbang drung mchis bdud rnams 'joms// ci ltar ring bcas sa
302b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams g.yo bar bgyid// grags pa mtha' yas ci ltar 'od zor gtong // byang chub spyod tshul legs par bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas nor gyi gzugs ni ci ltar thob/ ting 'dzin zhi ba
302b8(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ji ltar bsgoms// mi'i rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob// sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyod pa gsung // gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros 'gyur// spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par
303a1(dkon brtsegs): / gang gis 'gyur// gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor nang du// sman ci mashin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid// gang gis ming ni tshe rab dran par 'gyur// dri ma ma mchis
303a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig kyang thob// lha rna 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul rig/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyar yang mchis// ci ltar sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu tshul
303a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims dag cing bzod la dga'// ci ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab la yang ci ltar shin tu brtson// mngal gyi gnas ni ci ltar rnams
303a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas// pad ma las ni rtag tu rdzus te skye// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyi// bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang rjod// ci ltar de yid dga' dang
303a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dga' mtshungs// sred pa spang shing za ba zhe sdang spongs// mthong bar mi sems 'da' bar sems ma mchis// sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis ri rabs mtshungs// rnyed dang
303a6(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang // btod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal dang // ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan nas// 'jig rten kun na zla ba lta bur spyod//
303a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i ma mchis tshul chos g.yo ma mchis// ci ltar rdul bral rang rgyal rgyags pa spongs// zhi dang rab tu zhi dang ni gnas brtson// blo ldan ci ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur//
303a8(dkon brtsegs): chung ma bu nor 'dza' la dga' ma mchis// ci ltar bas mtha'i lam la mngon par dga'// rtag tu bya dang mtshungs zhing zla ba 'dra// ci ltar chos kyi nor la dga' zhing mos/
303b1(dkon brtsegs): chu dang mtshungs shing sa 'dra drung dang mtshungs// mkhas pa ci ltar me dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag tu ci mchis ma mchis mi rtog lags// mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam
303b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' mtshungs// ci ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid// bdag 'dor bgyid kyis chos mchog yongs mi gtong // 'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas// ci ltar
303b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyi// zhing gi bkod pa ci ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ci ltar 'gyur ba lags// ci ltar dus gsum du yang chos zos shing /
303b4(dkon brtsegs): ci ltar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur// rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ci ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub
303b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jog bgyid par// spyod cing rtag tu dga' mos ci ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// rdzus te skye bar gang gis 'gyur// longs spyod che dang shes rab
303b6(dkon brtsegs): che// kun mkhyen rtogs pa khong du chud// gang gis gsum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob// bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags// spobs pa gang
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gis skye bar 'gyur// zhing na ji ltar dga' 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang du de'i smon btab pa// der ni ci ltar skye 'gyur lags// tshe rabs dran
303b8(dkon brtsegs): par ci ltar 'gyur// ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur lags// rnam par 'dren pa ji ltar na/ mdog dang gzi
304a1(dkon brtsegs): brjid snyan grags 'thob// skabs dang sabu dang brtson 'grus rnams// ci star thub par mi 'gyur lags/ ji skar sangs rgyas chos dang yang / dge 'dun pa ni spya
304a2(dkon brtsegs): su mchi// lus dang srog ni gtong bgyid kyi// de dag chos ni 'dor mi bgyid// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing // the tsom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyod pa thams cad spangs nas su/
304a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// khyod la mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang lags// go rims bzhin tu bstan du
304a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo legs so legs so// bu ma de bzhin gshegs pa
304a5(dkon brtsegs): la don 'di lta bu 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / bshad do// dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das
304a6(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud
304a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi nad pa la phrag dog med pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / skye bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrib pa med pa
304a8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa sgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phrag dog mi byed za ma smra mi bya/ skye bo mang po
304b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rnams la sbyar/ brags bcu rnams su thams pa bsgoms byas na/ bdud 'dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
304b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ gzhi gang zhe na/ ci skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa dang / yid dam la brtan pa dang / skye bo
304b3(dkon brtsegs): mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed do// /
304b4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod// yi dam la yang shin tu brtan// dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed/
304b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med la// skye bo mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis// zhing rnams bye ba g.yo bar byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos dang
304b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mare me sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang
304b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can bag med par gyur cing mi khom par gyur pa rnams kyis gan du song ste chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra ba 'gebs pa ste/ bu mo
304b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnam su 'od zer dag gtong ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam
305a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dag zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin/ bag med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyin byed// mchod rten dag la rin chen dra ba 'bul/ des na bye ba bsam yas
305a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gro zhing / byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed// reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par gyur// mkhas pa bla med byang chub don du gnyer// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
305a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na/ gzung thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyan sna tshogs gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang / bu mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad
305a4(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzung 'thob
305a5(dkon brtsegs): po// de la 'di skad ces byas ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzung ni 'thob par 'gyur/ spong ba rnams la bu mo brgyan te sbyin// rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod// rgyal
305a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes don du shes rab bsgoms// chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzung 'thob 'gyur// bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa chud mi za// phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa ga
305a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chad pa// de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la yid byung ba mang
305a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgu la mos pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / las kyi mtha' shin tu yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos
305b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang byung // bse ru lta bur gcig pur spyod la dga'// rtag tu shin tu brtson
305b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams pa yin/ de'i lus rtag tu shin tu mthar yang phyin// rtag tu chos bzhi dag la zhugs nas su// byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur tshol byed// byang chub sems dpa' ting
305b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la gor 'tho// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang /
305b4(dkon brtsegs): sems yang ba dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhi nam mkha'i khams dang / mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlobs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
305b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// lus yang ba dang sems kyang bde zhing yang // chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid na mkha'i kham
305b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du// khams bzhi po dag byin gyis rlob par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// blo ldan de yi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas 'thob// skad cig gcig
305b7(dkon brtsegs): la zhing rnams stong du 'gro/ sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong // bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khro ba med de
305b8(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa dang tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten phyag par mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdoms pas bsdams shing / tshur shog legs par 'ong
306a1(dkon brtsegs): so zhes rtag tu smra ba dang / chos smra ba rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'bras pa'i sems med pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag
306a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la khro dang mngon du 'dzin mi byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra// /
306a3(dkon brtsegs): gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed// de ni tshul khrims rnam dag rtag tu srung // de ni rtag tu legs par 'ongs smra// chos smra rnams la de ni tha ba med// de'i sems ni rngo
306a4(dkon brtsegs): rje ri rab mtshungs// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed
