306a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa dang / me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor
306a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po mang zhing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang / gzhan dag gi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa
306a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
306a8(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas su gzugs pad+ma mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug/ chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste 'bul bar byed// pha rol dag la dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshig kyang smra// dga'
306b1(dkon brtsegs): sa lan pa can gyi spyan pa mam/ sems can bunas pan byeng bas rnams yang du bsngon/ grub mtshog rnams kyis sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub panas/ sangs rgyas gas
306b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan 'di bani bsnyen na de// rgyal ba mchog rnams drung du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ mangs spyod chen por 'gyur to// ba ni gang
306b3(dkon brtsegs): nen/ 'arnas pa med par sbyin pa'i chus can dang // chags pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang / mos pa mang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral pa yin te/ bu ma byang chub
306b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos pani po de dag dang ldan na// longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nges pa brnyas pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu
306b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa skyed byed na// de ni phyir zhing longs spyod chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ dang dang ldan par 'gyur zhing g.yo meng rgyu yang med// pha rol dag gi skyor
306b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dzin par yong mi byed// lhag pa'i bsam pas rang gi lha ba drang gyur pa// des na de 'dir longs spyod chen po rnams dang ldan// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab
306b7(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la ser na mi byed pa dang / mi 'thun par mi 'jug pas mgyod pa sel ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa
306b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / stong pa nyid bsgoms pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa nam yang
307a1(dkon brtsegs): ser sna yongs mi byed// mi 'thun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sel// yang dag rab ldan gdams ngag ston par byed// rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid
307a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgom// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob/ sangs rgyas rjes su bstan la slab byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs
307a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas de 'gyur ro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lung gnod pa dang / kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung mnos pa
307a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gdams ngag rjed nas yun ring du lon te/ gsol ba 'debs pa la lung 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang // 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la dang ba nye bar
307a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mngon
307a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gron zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pase/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldanan/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lung
307a7(dkon brtsegs): mnos kha ton brjod la dran par byed// gnan la yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra yang sgrogs// skyo ba med par chos kyang brjod par byed// ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mtshan ma legs par 'dzin/
307a8(dkon brtsegs): chos pa ni 'di dag nges par bstan byas na// mthu chen ldan pa tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag bsam las rjes su dran// rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog nyid myur du 'tsha
307b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas rnams dang 'thad pa 'thob ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spongs pa dang / srog gi phyir
307b2(dkon brtsegs): yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang mi bsten pa dang / srog gi phyir chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ bu mo byang
307b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub gya tsom spong mi byed// chos smra ba
307b4(dkon brtsegs): laskur ba yong mi 'debs/ nges pa sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong // g.yel ba med par rtag tu sangs rgyas dran// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/ bde
307b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams dang phrad pa nges 'thob po// bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang // 'dren pa ga la bzhugs pa der de skye// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ skyes bu
307b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che sbar gyis 'dor ba dang / 'bru mar gyi
307b7(dkon brtsegs): dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyi mkhan po dang
307b8(dkon brtsegs): slabar yo la snyan 'gyur bya bas rims mo byed ba ste/ bum byang chub sems dpa' chos pan po de dag dang sngar na/ skyes bu can po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag 'tsha' go/
308a1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mchod rten la ni sbar gyis dbyig rnams 'thor// dri zhim 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru// spos dang me tog sil bstan
308a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs 'bul// yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slob dpon brten/ de'i lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang ldan// gang gis shes rab
308a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa// chos de dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob ste/ bzhi
308a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang / gzhan la sti stang byed pas mi skyo ba dang / chos smra ba la zab mo mi rgol ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub yang
308a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
308a6(dkon brtsegs): sman ste sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul// gzhan la ste snang byed pas skyo ba med// chos smra ba la 'thab mo yang mi rgol/ sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin tu 'jug
308a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di bzhis lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams// 'di na de'i rnyed pas dka' ba med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na// byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan par 'gyur//
308a8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang / nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos
308b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu
308b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang / lus dang srog dang / yo byad rnams la mi lta ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa 'thob bo//
308b3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed// 'jig rten kun dang mi 'thun pa// skye ba med pa rab tu sgrogs// mchog tu
308b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba rnyed gyur nas// sangs rgyas bstan la 'dzin par byed// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// de ni byang chub lta bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na// de'i spobs pa
308b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// sna tshogs 'phreng 'dras tshim par byed/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
308b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor ba dang 'dre ba med pa ste/
308b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag 'thob po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi snyed la nam yang phrag
308b8(dkon brtsegs): dog med/ mthong nas dga' bar gyur te ser sna med// sems can kun la de'i sems kyang snyoms 'khor dang 'dre bar de ni yong mi byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni zhing gi
309a1(dkon brtsegs): bdang 'thab cing // myur du byang chub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// bu ma byang chub sems dpa'i chos bani dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs
309a2(dkon brtsegs): pathong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / mi 'thun pa rnams kyi sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed du gzhugs pas phan 'dogs pa dang /
309a3(dkon brtsegs): phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
309a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang yong mi 'byed// skye bo mi 'thun pa dag 'dum par byed// lung nod kha ton byed la yang dag 'dzud// pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra/
309a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/ dge 'dun rgya che rnam dag 'thob par 'gyur// de bas dge 'dun rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ mkhas pas chos 'di rtag tu sten par
309a6(dkon brtsegs): bya/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// sangs rgyas zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan dag gi shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa la phrag
309a7(dkon brtsegs): dog mi skye ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed de/
309a8(dkon brtsegs): tha na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang sti snang byed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po
309b1(dkon brtsegs): das pas rnas kyi nang gang dumams 'azung ba ba'o// das di sna byas ste// gnanal mchod pa mthongan ldan dag med// bangom byin pa
309b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu tshol// byang chub sems dpa'i ston par rtag tu sems// shes ke bde ba'i don du tshul 'chos med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na// de bzhin
309b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams dang de 'brang 'gyur// zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa// 'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo tra
309b4(dkon brtsegs): ma med kyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dge par blangs
309b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ gnas par ma mchis na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ chos kyang ston pa de
309b6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod
309b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgrub dka' bar mi shes sam/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyi
309b8(dkon brtsegs): byin pas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag
310a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
310a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar btags pa chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
310a3(dkon brtsegs): des stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnams pa drug tu g.yos te bar gyur te/ sems can gang la yang gnod pa med par gyur cig/ bden pa
310a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me
310a5(dkon brtsegs): tog gi char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las gyur te
310a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i lus su red cing lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur cig/ smon lam de ltar btab cing bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'di byas ma thag tu de nas de'i ma la
310a7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gi sgra yang byung / lha'i
310a8(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi char yang mngon par phab po// bu mo dri ma med kyi byin pa yang bud med kyi lus mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon
310b1(dkon brtsegs): nu 'dra bar snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams
310b2(dkon brtsegs): ni ngo mtshar che te lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag
310b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ni/ 'a
310b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu de de bzhin no//
310b5(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ dang po sems bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
310b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi mchod rten dang sbyin gnas yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa
310b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid te/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal sgo nas 'od zer kha dog tu
310b8(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs 'di lta te/ sngon po dang / seng po dang / dmang po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shes dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rag byung ste/ 'ong des 'jig rten gyi/
311a1(dkon brtsegs): mas mapa' mas su me 'dug snang sa rgyas nas ngas sbyi sa
311a2(dkon brtsegs): sa sa la sa
311a3(dkon brtsegs): smra
311a4(dkon brtsegs): pa spya snas sa nga rna pa khye du gi smra
311a5(dkon brtsegs): na dga' ba bzang po gnas yas skyed mdzad pa// skabs bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gidon du 'od btang bstan dumasol/ ri chas nan
311a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yas// lha rnams namakhar gnas shing lha'i me tog med du 'ong ba'i char pa 'a bebs// seng ges ma pam
311a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad// dpa' bo gang gi don du 'od kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol// nyi tha bye
311a8(dkon brtsegs): gangams 'ang kyi ba dang krung nga tha sa 'ad sa la nga krung brib nang gyu das 'i 'o ma ya pa yang lags pa/ zab pa ma
311b1(dkon brtsegs): dmas shing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mdza' gyur nas/ 'od rnams thams cad mog mog gyis te sangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes// khyod kyi smin mtshams
311b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi mdzod spu rab mdzes dkar zhing dri ma ma mchis bzang // 'bar zhing pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung dang me tog kun da 'dra bas phyogs gsal bgyid// thams cad mog mog bgyis nas
311b3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs kyi srin bu me khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes// mi'i seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por der 'gyur bstan tu gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
311b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med pas byin pa 'di byin gyis rlabs gang gis bud med kyi dngos pa/
311b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po 'thob par gyur pa 'thong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med
311b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyad de/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyad na
311b7(dkon brtsegs): phyis bu mo 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chu
311b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brgyad khri dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yon tan gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
312a1(dkon brtsegs): 'do na padang pas cu 'gyur ro// denas dang ldan pa rjo dgal kyi bu chen pos byung rgya sems dpa' drim med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras pa/
312a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yun ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod na/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud med kyi dngos po ma gyur/ byang chub sems
312a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ gnas rten mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ btsun pa khyod ci'i phyir skyes pa'i lus
312a4(dkon brtsegs): las mi sbyar/ gnas brten mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po cang mi skyes par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis byin pas mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
312a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma yin/ skyes pa'i lus kyis byang chub mngon par
312a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni ma skyes pa ste/ de ni lus sam sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mi nus pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom
312a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di zab mo la mos pa ni ngo mtshar
312a8(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'dis/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu'i thad na tshangs par spyod pa spyad
312b1(dkon brtsegs): da// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms so// bskal pa brgyad cur mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bsgom so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i tshul dang ldan pa
312b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lang su la dris so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la/ na bza' dang zhal zas kyis bkur sti byas so// spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i bstan pa'i chos
312b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yongs su dris so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis
312b4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi chos
312b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di nyen tam/ len tam/ 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gnan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//
312b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub thob par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
312b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par bgyi shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad
312b8(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spobs
313a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ gzung kyi rdo rjes tshig ces bya bar yang zung shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig/
313a2(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las srog chags khrag khrig brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par
313a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis 'di skad gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa ji
313a4(dkon brtsegs): srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med
313a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag grangs med pa/ bgrangs pa la 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med pa/ tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems
313a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i longs spyod pas shin tu lhag pa dang ldan pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par bkod pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
313a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhad cing 'dzum pa dri ma med pa'i rtog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum
313a8(dkon brtsegs): du lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des/ ta la byed pa phrag brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/
313b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs chang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa byin gyis rlabs/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi sdong chen po 'jig rten
313b2(dkon brtsegs): byi khams 'di khobs so// de nas yang na mkha' de nyid na rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/
313b3(dkon brtsegs): stang byas nas nam mkha' de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan spong bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag
313b4(dkon brtsegs): gis/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong / lung bstan pa de yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ bde ba dang yid bde
313b5(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sgra skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas gus mchis pa/
313b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sangs rgyas chos srang du/ blo ni shin tu nges gyur pa// de dag rnyed pa chen po rnyeng/ sngon chad sdig pa'i las bgyis pas// bdag cag bram ze'i khyim du skyes// ston pa'i nyen thos mthong
313b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na// bkra mi shis shes tshig tu brjod// sangs rgyas sras ngag mthong gyur na// bkra mi shes shes bgyis pa'i// tshig tu brjod pa gang mchis pa// btsun pa nong pa bshags par bgyid// tshogs kyi
313b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong ba// mi de dag gis nongs pa rnyed// de dag kha zas ngan pa 'tshal// dri med sbyin pas mchod sbyin spang // bdag cag 'gron du bos par gyur//
314a1(dkon brtsegs): @#// ston pa'i nyan thos rnams mthong nas// ma gus pas ni sdod cing mchis// de la 'dag cag rnams kyis dris// khyod kyis 'dren pa gang na mchis// des spras bcas nas lo 'dun na/
314a2(dkon brtsegs): kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas// de yis sangs rgyas bsngags med pa// de bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur brjod// de'i tshig thos bdag cag kun// byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs// bdag cag
314a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi bsod nams dang // sangs rgyas zhes bgyi sgras bskul pas// shAkya seng ge'i zhabs la ni/ phyag bgyis slad du lhag pa lags// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis// chos
314a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dam pa thos par 'gyur// rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong bas// bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// chos gang bshad pa mdzad pa rnams// sangs rgyas chos
314a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don spad du// bdag cag de la bslob par bgyid// sangs rgyas chos thob bgyi slad du// byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas// bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis// spyod pa de la slab par bgyis
314a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang gis// lam dang sgo yang bstan pa la// nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis mchod rten 'gyur// de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas
314a7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de che 'dzum pa mdzad// thub chen lung bstan mdzad gso'o zhes// sangs rgyas la ni kun dgas zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze lnga brgya 'di dag dang /
314a8(dkon brtsegs): bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang // de kun bskal pa gcig gi tshe// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga brgya thams pa la// tshe rabs snga mar mchod byas pa// de nas phyin chad
314b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod tshe yang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcur ni// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// de dag bskal pa re re la'ang / sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// de dag
314b2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gcig de la// rkang gnyis rnams mchog 'gyur te// 'od byed ces bya'i bskal gcig la// tshangs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur// de dag tshe tshad mtshungs 'gyur te// bskal pa bye ba brgyad
314b3(dkon brtsegs): cu zug/ zhing mtshungs dge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur te// dge slong bye ba brgyad cu yod// sems can rnams kyi don spyad cing // chos 'di la yang spyad byas nas// de dag thams cad mthar kyis
314b4(dkon brtsegs): su// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin
314b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bram ze de dag dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / nyen thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
314b6(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
314b7(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa gsum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tA dang / su ren tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de
314b8(dkon brtsegs): migs sdes bskur cing nus te gtan la 'a' baM/ rgya ga sang du/ Ad+ya gun rang na sang susu mri ta zad can ma me ga ya na su traM/ bed skad du/
315a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya/
315a2(dkon brtsegs): ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
315a3(dkon brtsegs): khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po rnams dang / thabs gcis
315a4(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong khyer yang ba'i li tsa byi'i gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba

315b8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems drab ni/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir yon tan rin chen me tog kum

316a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can ni bskal pa stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor ba snyil bar byed do// che rjes nas kyang sgrib pa med par
316a8(dkon brtsegs): ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par mdzad
316b1(dkon brtsegs): do// chos ston pa na bag tsha ba yang med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan brjod byed pa// de la yon tan 'di rnams myur du 'byung // de la de bas

316b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhis pa zhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni yon tan rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
316b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can tshe rjes ma thag tu/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
316b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes ma thag
316b7(dkon brtsegs): tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro//
316b8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gcig gis thogs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par yang 'thob
317a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces b+ha ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod byed pa// de la ting 'dzin pasam las de skye zhing / sum cu rtsa gcis
