317a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya
317a4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni shakya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
317a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni
317a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshon gyi 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dug gis ma yin/ chus ma yin te/ mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro//
317a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe rjes ma thag tu yang shugs brgya ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod byed pa// 'di la mi
317a8(dkon brtsegs): des lus mes mi 'chi zhing // tshon gyis min la chus min dug gis min/ de ni brdzus te skye ba kho nar 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ byang phyogs na
317b1(dkon brtsegs): mun pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyad
317b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
317b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyad pa'i blo de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni
317b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// zad mi shes pa za ma tog ces bya ba'i
317b5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po rnam su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
317b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar par byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
317b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod byed pa// de'i yon tan bgrangs par mi nus shing // de ni byang chub 'thob par the tsom
317b8(dkon brtsegs): med// de la the tshoms med par gzungs skye'o// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ shar lho'i phyogs kyi mtshams na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
318a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra 'acom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra gang kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes pa yod do/ bskal pa
318a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin
318a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
318a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro//
318a5(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi tshe rjes nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang nig rgyal ba'i mtshan ni 'dzin byed pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dang gzhan/ bsam gyis mi
318a6(dkon brtsegs): byab rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mang po mthong / yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho nub kyi phyogs na/ bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
318a7(dkon brtsegs): nga dzin gagags par dang com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pasang mchos 'od dpal zhes bya ba zhis dkyang btsugs te/ 'tsho nang bzhes pa yod/ bskam bden ma
318a8(dkon brtsegs): zad pang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchos 'ad pas do mtshan badzin pa'i chos kyi
318b1(dkon brtsegs): sa na lugs / ma na ma ma mam
318b2(dkon brtsegs): ma pa gyur // rgyug gas rnasemasacan mas cadas sa tu 'gro bar byed ces canan/ rigs kyi tha 'ag rigs kyi bum 'angs la gi 'dzi nga
318b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ chos ston par 'gyur zhing de chos ston pa na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa
318b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sems can
318b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ de dag de nas yongs su grol nas/ lha dang mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing
318b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyis ni mtshan 'dzin pa// de la gzi brjid dpal
318b7(dkon brtsegs): mdog stongs dbang po// tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin// de la blo thogs med pa mtha' yas 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu byas pa// nub byang 'tshams kyi phyogs
318b8(dkon brtsegs): na// sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang zhes
319a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal ba de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang
319a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can de ni tshe rjes ma zag tu spobs
319a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med
319a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i chos ston pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal
319a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i mtshan 'dzin pa// tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas zhing du de// de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur// skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'tshangs rgya// yon tan rin
319a6(dkon brtsegs): chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cad las rgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
319a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni spongs pa bkod
319a8(dkon brtsegs): pa staM zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs
319b1(dkon brtsegs): b+ha de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa
319b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgra dbyangs yan lag drug cu phun tshogs ldan/ de ni kun
319b3(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa 'ang pha rol phyin// rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'i// bsod nams gang yin bsam yas nges 'thob 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/
319b4(dkon brtsegs): steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang na mkha' nges pare sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni tshad med len ces bya'o// bcom ldan
319b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i
319b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / shes
319b8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bu'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong
320a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sa nams yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshig bzang bar 'om pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// skabs pa thul pa med paphun sum tshogs pa
320a2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yi ge dang sgra'i brda' yang thob par 'gyur ro//
320a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs mthon po dang rigs chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
320a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bcwo brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa// de ni yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum 'thob// de ni sangs
320a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bral bar yong mi skye// mi de mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa// 'og gi phyogs na tha dad pa med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig
320a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig
320a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
320a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu
320b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mongasu grub pa nas bya ba bzung 'thal par 'gyur ro// sku ba gcig gis chags pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
320b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu cu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces
320b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rnams kyis chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing // skye ba gcig thogs bla na med pa'i// byang chub mngon par
320b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
320b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs 'thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
320b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob po// lha dang mi'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
320b7(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lham
320b8(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog
321a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa
321a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// kargya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / brang nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/
321a3(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsid t+ya bu ta bi sha ya nir te sha/ na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
321a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal
321a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/
321a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
321a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnas gtsang ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun gyis ltas nas chos ston na
321a8(dkon brtsegs): sang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// zhwa'i bu dpal bzang kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan
321b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam las rtsoms te/ lha'i 'khor 'di du
321b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las rtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/
321b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las brtsom te spobs par bgyi shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
321b4(dkon brtsegs): gang mig gi yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang / rna ba'i yul ma lags pa dang / sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang / sna'i yul ma lags pa dang / dri'i
321b5(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul ma lags pa dang / lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang / reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma
321b6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa ste/ de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma mchis pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom
321b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas khong du chud par ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul de ltar khong du chud par
321b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa'i yul ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal lta bar gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa ni ngas byed
322a1(dkon brtsegs): chub zab pa'i stsal lo// mtha pa bas pazhir byabyar mtshan ma med pa ni phul lo// khabs bsam pa sa ma thug tu byan gyun pa meng las
322a2(dkon brtsegs): sul lo// 'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo// 'dus byas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 'du byed
322a3(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa ni yul lo// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yulo// /
322a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/ de la brjod pa ma mchis lagaso// brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis
322a5(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bstan pa ma mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul
322a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad
322a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yong su btsal bar bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs
322a8(dkon brtsegs): su rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyis/ gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtags pa rdo nas
322b1(dkon brtsegs): sa mas pa rnams pas yangs / gamal pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ma ni 'jun pa pa mtshas/ ldan pa sa
322b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing ldog pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ci ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
322b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams las yongs su shes/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag gi
322b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin du gang legs pa de yang 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci lta bu/
322b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhini gang lags pa de nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang
322b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang gzhan du 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin yang gzhan gcig lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par
322b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin ma
323a1(dkon brtsegs): / de'i srad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa cing du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ston lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod
323a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas pa shes sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa
323a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang gi gnas/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun du 'byung ba'i mnyam pa
323a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid de'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byis pa so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas te 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun
323a5(dkon brtsegs): rku 'byung / gsol pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid des/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags
323a6(dkon brtsegs): so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci stong pa nyid la/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid mchis pa'i
323a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa des/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid yod cing / yod pa gang gis 'dod chags
323a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yod/ gsol pa yi ge dang / skad dang sgra dang / brjod pa mchis pas stong pa nyid mchis lags so// yi ge dang / skad dang / sgra dang / brjod pa mi mchis
323b1(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mchis lags sodo/ gagasal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / mabyung ba dang / ma byas pa dang /
323b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi
323b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni mi byed pa ma yin no// dge slong dag gal te ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin kyang skyes pa dang /
323b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba
323b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/ de'i phyir skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par
323b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags so zhes bka' stsal pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong pa nyid ma mchis su lags na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
323b7(dkon brtsegs): gi nyon mongs pa 'di las byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis te/ de'i slang du 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mdza
323b8(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams las 'byung bar gdags lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khrod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zin na/ gang su dag spong ba nyidas gnas pa
324a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag gams pa 'ad chags dang / zhelang dag gnyi mug la gnas par 'gyur pa/ gnas pa com ldan 'das rnal pabyod srung ba gang 'dod chags dang
324a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gud du stong pa nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi sbyong ba lags te/ rnal 'byor ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod
324a3(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las gung du stong pa nyid btsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyid stong pa
324a4(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba/
324a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag
324a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam ste/ gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags te/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags
324a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sdang dang bral ba yang ma lags/ gti mug dang bcas pa yang ma lags/ gti mug dang bral ba'ang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dang bram ze gang ngan pad/
324a8(dkon brtsegs): kha tsams dang pa ga she sdang dang rnal pa pa'i zug dang thas pa yang dag pa sa sus zhig pa ro la 'dod gas dang bcas pa dag ga sdang dang sa ba
324b1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag ni/ lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so// gnyis gang lags shes na/ chang bar lta ba dang / rtag par
324b2(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba ni de dag gi chang par
324b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba lags so// gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par lta ba lags so//
324b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang / bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/
324b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de gang du zhugs pa yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa de ni gang du yang zhugs pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/
324b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de lam la zhugs pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang lam la zhugs pa da ni/ 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/ gang
324b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du ga la 'gyur lags/ de ci'i sang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus bgyis ni skyes pa dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang ldan pa'i srad
324b8(dkon brtsegs): du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang ma mchis lags so// @
325a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la grangs mi mchis par gyur na/ de 'dus bgyis nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'dus ma bgyis ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/
325a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpa' gang 'dus ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grang gang yang yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams la
325a3(dkon brtsegs): grang gang yang ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams ni grangs ma mchis pa/ grangs dang bral ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags pa'i
325a4(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags//
325a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so// ci la gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ 'phags pa ma lags
325a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'im yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin no//
325a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de lta'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos pa
325a8(dkon brtsegs): yang sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags pas/ bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/ de srad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ 'phags
325b1(dkon brtsegs): pam lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so// bka' stsam pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnam pa nyid dang /
325b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gal ba dang ldan lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed ngam/ gsal pa gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na/ bdag gis kyang
325b3(dkon brtsegs): brnyed lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul
325b4(dkon brtsegs): ma bsnyes sam/ smos pa gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul gang brnyed dam smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul rnyed pa yang med do//
325b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/ yul brnyes pa yang med do// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba
325b6(dkon brtsegs): med par chos ston de/ khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su srung ngo // smras pa de bas na gnas rten nyid la yongs su dris/ khyod kyi ci ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ btsun
325b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongs su srung ning kha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / tsha ba'i sman ma sbyin na/ ci nges nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba byin
325b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin nam/ sbas pa 'jam dpal doni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang chos smra bas/ las dang po bas yongs su bsrung zhing zab mo'i gtam bca te//
326a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ das mang dang ya tsas khams pa pa byas pa sa ma can tu ba ba rgya sa ma pa par btu nag pa #
326a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa l+las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam
326a3(dkon brtsegs): bar dag go// lha'i bu bdun brgya 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thob nas 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
326a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can rnams 'dul na/
326a5(dkon brtsegs): ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi
326a6(dkon brtsegs): rdeg pas rnam par grol ba 'ang yin/ kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba yang yin no/
326a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ni nyan thos sam/ 'on the sangs rgyas sam/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin te/
326a8(dkon brtsegs): pha rol las nyen pa'i sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no// kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yan te/ snying rje chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / bral ba ni ma yin no// kho bo ni yang dag par
326b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin ta/ bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa nam yin no// smras pa/ lajam dpal khyod ji ltar can thos yin/ sbas pa/ chos mdzes pa nyan pa sems can 'ams
326b2(dkon brtsegs): kha thos par byed te/ des na kho bo nyan thos yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci ltar rang sangs rgyas son/ smras pa/ kho bos chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mangs
326b3(dkon brtsegs): par khong du chud de/ des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ 'on te yang dag
326b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gang la nges pa yin par bzung bar bya/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par gzung shig/ smras pa/
326b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya 'am/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos tha
326b6(dkon brtsegs): cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa'o// nges pa derang sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/ kho bo yang nges pa der nges pa nyid do// des na kho bo so so'i skye bo'i sa la
326b7(dkon brtsegs): yang nges par bzung bar bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yin na/ 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi
326b8(dkon brtsegs): sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// zhes rnam par bzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur/ smras pa/
327a1(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa rab 'byung 'dus te/ dbyang na phyogs bcu'i mamakha' ba/ 'dzin par thugs kyi rnam pa'o// 'dzin phyogs kyi nas 'o// 'di ni mu
327a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni shar lho'i 'o// 'di ni lho nub kyi'o// 'di ni nub byang gi'o// 'di ni byang shar gyi'o// 'di ni 'og gi'o// 'di ni steng gi
327a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi nam mkha' zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la dad pa yod kyis nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag
327a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges par nges pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//
327a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang / sa rnam pa bzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi yang dag pa nyid du nges pa
327a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni tha dad pa med do// spras pa 'jam dpal sang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smras pa/ zhugs pa yang yin la byung ba yang yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
327a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la byung ba yang yin/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab dang /
327a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes lta bar bya ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/ de'i phyir khyod la dpe snyan par bya'o//
327b1(dkon brtsegs): shA na/ ngas tha pan can bgags sdug thams padang 'angag pan sug pa dzugs pa
327b2(dkon brtsegs): de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las/ des bu cig pa de thag ring po lam gol ba'i phyog zhig na 'dug pa de mthong nas/
327b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no// snyam du sems bskyed de/ des de gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas/ 'phangs ma thag tu bu cig pa
327b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i 'du shes skye ste/ de sngon gom par byas pas/ shin tu brgyugs te/ mnga' de bu cig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam
327b5(dkon brtsegs): bar shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o// de la don du blta ba gang zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phongs gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
327b6(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor bu cig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu cig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no//
327b7(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa'i phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor mnga' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab
327b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ma 'phong gi slob dpon gyi mnga' 'phangs la bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu
328a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ 'du byed thams cad
328a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med par so sor rtog go// yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas/ snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs skyed pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum
328a3(dkon brtsegs): du byed kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dzud do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di
328a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na yang spyod la/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams
328a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang mi gos shing / 'jig rten na yang snang la/ chos thams cad la snang bar byed pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di
328a6(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad la yang snang la/ sa ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can tham
328a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir yang brtson la/ chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
328a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la/ 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la'ang skyed mos tshal dang /
328b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes la/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du gnyer zhing bsam pa yong su rdzogs pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med
328b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa yang thob la/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam
328b3(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad
328b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang 'thob la/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyun kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de
328b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi yul lo// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang
328b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang / 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// /
328b7(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'das pa la bcom sde spobs par bgyis shig/ tsaM ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos
328b8(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'da'/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
329a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i phung ba'o// del gzugs ni dbu 'angos pa lta bu'o/ tshong ban rtswa'i chu bur lta bu'o// 'dugs ni mig byu ga tha'o// 'du byed na
329a2(dkon brtsegs): shing lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// dbu pa dang / chu'i chung bur dang / smig slu ba dang / chu shing dang sgyu ma gang yin pa de la/ 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten
329a3(dkon brtsegs): du gdags pa yang med/ phung po rnams kyang med/ phung por gdags pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o// gang yang dag
329a4(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o// gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de/ 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'anga'o// btsun pa ra
329a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do// gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med/ ngir 'dzin pa med do// /
329a6(dkon brtsegs): gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang / dir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de/ chags pa med pa rnyed pa ni/ 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang
329a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o// gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o// gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag bdag po med pa'o// gang dag bdag po med
329a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdag gi ba mod pa'o// gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med do// gang la 'thab pa med pa
329b1(dkon brtsegs): de la brjod pa med do// gang la 'thong ba meng pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos brjod pa med pa'o// gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsong pa de dag nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/ chos
329b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang na mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas/ 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang /
329b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med pa ste/ gang dbyings med pa de la mig gi khams me do// gzugs kyi khams med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//
329b4(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i khams med do// sgra'i khams med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// sna'i khams med do// dri'i khams med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// /
329b5(dkon brtsegs): lce'i khams med do// ro'i khams med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lus kyi khams med do// reg bya'i khams med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/
329b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi khams med do// chos kyi khams med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// me'i khams
329b7(dkon brtsegs): med do// rlung gi khams med do// na mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// 'dod pa'i khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med dog/ gzugs med pa'i khams
329b8(dkon brtsegs): med do// 'dus byas kyi khams med do// 'dus ma byas kyi khams med do// gang khams med pa de la bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ gang zag med/ shed
330a1(dkon brtsegs): las skyes med/ gshed bu med de/ gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa mede pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o//
330a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong stong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas rang rang gi bla
330a3(dkon brtsegs): gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' ste/ tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang med/
330a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig
330a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa
330a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do// mngon par rtogs pa/ zhes bya ba de ni rloms sems nyid do// g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so// lhag pa'i nga rgyal
330a7(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni bdag gis tho po// bdag gis mngon par rtogs ma/ nas 'di lcebu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtog par 'byung ngo // smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa de dag gis
330a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mtshan te/ bdag cag ni ci ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag ni
330b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yongs su shes so// nas smra ba/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhing kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid ma
330b2(dkon brtsegs): shes par bdag gis lam bsgoms so// zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung ba'i
330b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skyes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o//
330b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o// chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so//
330b5(dkon brtsegs): gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo // gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do// gang lam bsgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa
330b6(dkon brtsegs): de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/
330b7(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no// rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la/ 'jam dpal gnon
330b8(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu thos te/ chos zab mo mnyan pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to// zab mo'i chos bsta
331a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la yang rjes su mthun par gyur te/ mi 'thun pa ma yin no// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
331a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rtogs par gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
331a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o// gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bzod pa gang yang rung
331a4(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod rgyun tu 'jam bu gling
331a5(dkon brtsegs): na chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan kyi lha'i gnas su bzhud do// der dga' ldan gyi rigs kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol// de na lha'i bu sngon gyi
331a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dag yod de/ de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas/ bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang khyod la
331a7(dkon brtsegs): chas nyan tu mi 'ong bas na/ de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par gyur te/ de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas
331a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang gis lnga'i bu dpal bzangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis
331b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba na/ nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang / nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang / nyams dpa' ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / rim pa 'dun
331b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / brgyad dang / bcu dang / nyi shu'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ bsil khang dang / ba gam dang / stegs bu dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba nga
331b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo rka lag 'jam zhing mnyen pa/ gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa smin ma legs pa/ 'phral ba legs pa/ bzhin legs pa/ mig pad+ma 'dab ma
331b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa sngon po lta bur 'dzes shing / dri ma med pa shin tu yangs pa/ 'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa/ zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dga' ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa
331b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag rgyud cig pa dang / pi wang dang / sgra snyan pa dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / rnga zlum dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol me'i
331b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs sgra dang / gar dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo ba dang / dga' ba dang / rtse bas rgyags shing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
331b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de 'dra ba'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs so// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis/ rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
331b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong / rang gi g.yogs 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di ltar
332a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ bdag cag myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su byin te/ nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas/ dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod
332a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag rang gi gnas 'di dang / rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du/ sbyar te de dag snang ba ngo mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal bzangs la 'di skad
332a3(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma phyin te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i
332a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyi shes pa dang / lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni/ 'jam
332a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs
332a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin bgyi byin gyis rlabs kyis stobs
332a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyabs ste/ 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis/ phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos par 'di snyam du bdag cag dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin
332a8(dkon brtsegs): to snyam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa la/ khyed kyi
332b1(dkon brtsegs): tsatsam shig shes te/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa ni/ 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa gang gis klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing cig
332b2(dkon brtsegs): tu yang dag par ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gis klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag btsug phud kyis phugs te/ steng gi bar snang gi na mkha' la 'jog go// sangs rgyas kyi
332b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing de dag na rgya mtsho chen por gyur pa'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs kyang / chu'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang
332b4(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyi shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlab
332b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ ri de dag yung dkar gyi 'bru'i nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de dag la gnod pa yang med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis
332b6(dkon brtsegs): shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/ 'jig rten gyi
332b7(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag de dag la sgrub po// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i
332b8(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed sreg par byed pa'i me de dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gi me lce tsam gyi mer byin gyis rlobs ste/ des bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de byed do// sangs rgyas
333a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi ning gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis ril du drang/
333a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul brtsams nas/ nga bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par
333a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no// de nas bdud sdig
333a4(dkon brtsegs): can 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug ste/ des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
333a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o// bcom
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das tshig tsam du gsungs pas/ ci sman gyis bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can mkhyen bzhin du/
333a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpa
333a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod la ngas bskul gyis/ khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul ston cig dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis
333b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ chos thams cad sems
333b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems kyis
333b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang sgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ 'jam dpal gzhon
333b4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos 'phrul bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang / ma lhag pa dang / mi mang bar
333b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba leg so legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni
333b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la don chen por nyer bar gnas so// de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin no// chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab
333b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di yang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no zhes ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho 'phrul de mthong te/ ngo mtshar du gyur nas thal mo
333b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis
334a1(dkon brtsegs): // ma khyab ste ngo mtshar to// sems can gang dag cho 'phrul bshad pa 'di thos nas/ mos pa de dag ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis bsam so// bcom ldan 'das gal te
334a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rdo mi thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag ni
334a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la glags blta zhing skabs tshol ba dang / sems can rnams la yang brtse bar sems pa dang / brtson pa'i gang zag rnams
334a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad kyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das deng sngan cang grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang sdong dang / yul 'khor dang / pho zang
334a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa der / kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi bcol bar bgyi ba'i srang du bdag mi 'chi bar bdag
334a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dings de lta bu blang bar bgyi'o// gang dag 'chang ba dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / ma sor rtog pa dang / sgrub pa de la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar bus pa skyed par bgyi'o//
334a7(dkon brtsegs): bam ldan 'das 'an tu lags kyang bdag gis 'khor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman pa'i bar bang 'gyi ba dang / brtson pa rnams g.yengs par brtse ba'i slang du zhugs
334a8(dkon brtsegs): rag sa kyis te/ de ga can pas dbus pa'i mang du/ rigs kyi bu 'ang rigs kyi bu ma de dag gas gsang sngags kyis tshig 'di dag dran par bco'o// tshams batha
334b1(dkon brtsegs): s+thi ta twe/ a ka la pa ni rdzi ta sha tu/ dza se dza ma pa ti/ b+hu tra ma ti/ sha me/ shan ti a pu me/ pu pu mye/ d+hi re/ a ge mkhe khe ge mi si le oM ga me/ phru ge pu la/ phul le/
334b2(dkon brtsegs): shu me/ shu shu mye/ d+hi d+hi re/ a na ba na te/ s+thi ta te/ kr-i tar te/ krid ta bid ta/ bo ro tsa tan/ sad tarma b+hA na ko s+tha/ su ru tra s+ye d+ha raka/ a b+h+ra mug ta i b+he su'u r+ya swA hA/ bcom
334b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos smra ba gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma legs shing / skabs
334b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng du de la gos dang / zas dang / mal ca dang / na ba'i smos sman dang / yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs pa dang / spro bar bgyi ba dang / spobs par
334b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bur spro bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod nas// g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i rgyud kyis
334b6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs mtshan 'das par bgyid pa de dag lha rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye/
334b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur te/ de dag slar rgol ba 'am/ mi 'dza' ba gang gis bklags bltas kyang baglags snyed par mi 'gyur lags so//
334b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sdig can legs so legs so// 'di ltar khyod kyis ge sang sngags kyi tshig brjod pas/ 'jig rten
335a1(dkon brtsegs): mas klung ga/ na rnan tu/ bya shA ma pa tshan rnas na
335a2(dkon brtsegs): lam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang / byin gyi rlabs 'di sman pa dang / bdud kyi gseng sngags kyi tshig dang / rig sngags kyi stobs bstan
335a3(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ srog chags nyi khri bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas/ lha'i phra
335a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song le/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams bsdus shig dang / kho bo yang der 'ong ngo // de nas
335a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
335a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas nas/ 'khor dang brgyas mar 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to// de nas lha'i bu dpal
335a7(dkon brtsegs): bzangs la kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris kyi bu rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par bgyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yu bu cag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong
335a8(dkon brtsegs): gis de la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha khyed dga' ba dang / rtse ba la bag med pa 'or te/ bag yod par gyis la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos nyan du gshegs shig/ de nas lha'i
335b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su lnga'i yid las byung ba rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor
335b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'khyams/ chung shar nub tu dpag tshad gsum brgya drug cu nyis stong yod la zheng lho byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod pa byas/ der seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa lha'i
335b3(dkon brtsegs): ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ stong phrag du ma byas so// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyi rnam par grol ba'i 'khor gyi 'khyams bkod pa de dag dang / seng ge'i khri rnams kyang
335b4(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'khor gyi 'khyams bkod paM dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa bgyis lags na/ da de'i
335b5(dkon brtsegs): lus la bab par mkhyen na gshegs su gsol// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang / nyan thos kyi mchog lnga brgya dang / lha dang klu dang /
335b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang ldan gcig tu yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
335b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad gcig thang cig yud tsam de la dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to// de nas 'jam
335b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der rang gi khri ji ltar bshams pa la 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams
336a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ci rigs pa la 'khod do// rgyal chen bzhis ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab thal dang / 'phrul das
336a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi ris rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa tshangs ris kyi lha gnas gzungs ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis gcig nas
336a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu sgra thos pa/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga' ldan gyi lha gnas su 'brel pa'i chos kyi gtam chen po smra bar 'gyur gyis bdag cag kyang chos
336a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa'i phyir nges par der 'dong bar bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong ba ni legs par mthong ba'o// de dag las chos thos pa ni legs par thos pa'o zhes sgra
336a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu chad med grangs med pa dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur to//
336a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ldan rgya gnas su byin to// de nas 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ den bu'i byin gyi rlangs kyi byin gyi rlabs pas/ des lnga'i 'khod de tsam du cad med pa dang
336a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che bkod pa'i khyams kyi 'tshad de nyid du go skabs yangs par gnas par gyur te/ de nas lhang bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sa 'di
336a8(dkon brtsegs): gad ces smras so// 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus lags na/ chos kyi bka' mchid las brtsams te/ spongs par mdzad du gsapa/ bai skad ces smras pa nga
336b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gnan dur gyur pas/ sgra'i chu dpal dazangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag chos bzhi po 'di dag
336b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdud par 'gyur ba dag/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang
336b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la gnas pa'i shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa la gnas pa'i ye shes dang / thabs la gnas pa'i bag yod pa ste/ grogs po dag chos bzhi po de
336b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnams pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims la
336b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis ci ltar 'jug ces na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / ngag dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /
336b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / bsam pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / 'tshe ba dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo
336b7(dkon brtsegs): byed bsnyungs pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang kha sag dang / gzhog slong dang / thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad rnam par spong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa
336b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub kyi sems mi rjed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug go// grogs po dag de la yongasu
336b9(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yong su dag pa ste/ rnam pa brgyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tha ma la gus pas yongasu dag pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pas yongasu dag pa dang /
337a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bshad pas yongs su dag
337a2(dkon brtsegs): sa
337a3(dkon brtsegs): ngas pa dang / da pa dag byangs
337a4(dkon brtsegs): 9 rgyu pas yongs su dag ste/ legs 'das des rnam pa brgyad kyis zas pa yongs su nas
337a5(dkon brtsegs): thags po gdus pam pa brgyad kyis khams gtan yongs su dag / 'jig pa / dgon pa la gnas shing dben pa
337a6(dkon brtsegs): ngana' zas mdzes su dab pa dang / 'du 'ardza spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang / yul dang mi 'dre bas yongs su dag
337a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sems las su rungs pas yongs su dag pa dang / kha zas bsnyungs ste lus 'tsho bas
337a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jog pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra dang mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pas
337b1(dkon brtsegs): spya / mags pa 'du dang / 'angs meng bar ma mar yang dag ba
337b2(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su dag pa ste/ thogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag go//
337b3(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa
337b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / khams la mkhas pa'i
337b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs rgya su dag pa dang / rten cing
337b6(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang // bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas
337b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /
338a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dag pa dang / bag la nyam pa dang /
338a2(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bkris pa dang / lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs pa
338a3(dkon brtsegs): dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go// grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su
338a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa med par gzugs thams cad mthong bas lha'i mig yongs
338a5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med par sgra thams cad thos pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod ba la rnam par lta
338a6(dkon brtsegs): bas pha rol gyi sems shes pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med cing chags pa med par mngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran pas/
338a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'grobs rgya 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang /
338b1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa thams cad zad ba shes pas bstsal cing dus ma yin pa yongs su spangs pas/ zag pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo ba dang rlom sems
338b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang bral bas/ dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / ci ltar sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas bshes pa
338b3(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag go// grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis
338b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga yongs su shes pas sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sred pa shin tu
338b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas/ kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / brten nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rtogs pas 'gog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa
338b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bas rgyu shes pas
338b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pas rkyen shes na yong su dag pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su
339a1(dkon brtsegs): / gcod pas dum gsum shes pa yongasu dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes thams cad la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su
339a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/ grog po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongasu dag go// grog po drag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad kyis yongs su dag pa gang
339a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi bas yongs su dag pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang / khams gsum la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang / rten cing
339a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yongs su/ dang / skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang /
339a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pas yong su dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'khrug pas yongs su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa
339a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o// grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dag ste// rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul khrims mchog
339a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam gtan de la chags pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab dang gsung rab kyis yongs su pa dang / mngon par shes pa la
339a8(dkon brtsegs): ma nyams pas yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi rlom sems med pas yongs su dag pa dang / nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yong su dag dang / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas
339b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ grog po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongasu dag go// grogs po dag de lta bas na/ khyed bag yod par gyis shig/ bag yod pa la rton
339b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / mya
339b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o// ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
339b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten te gsum po de dag go// sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i
339b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal te gsum po de dag go// 'jig pa gsum las yang dag par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i
339b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba la bag tsha ba med pa'i 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag go/ srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa
339b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o// dri ma gsum sbyong ste/ 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi dri ma 'o// bslab pa sum
339b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed de// lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo// yongasu dag pa gsum thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang /
339b9(dkon brtsegs): ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yong su dag pa'o// bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sbyin pa las
339b10(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom par byed de/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
339b11(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs gsum
339b12(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spong ste/ ser sna'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrim las ldog pa dang /
339b13(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa las zlog pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams lnga sdang ba dang / le lo dang brtson 'grus las ldog pa dang / brtson
339b14(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par ga yed ba dang / bsam gtan las zlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang /
339b15(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la zlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rtogs pa gsum gyi nye bar rton te/ gsuMg suM gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdo
339b16(dkon brtsegs): pa thaMd yongasu gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin
339b17(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ grog po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongasu dag go// grogs po dag de lta bas na/ byed bag yod par gyis shig/ bag yod pa la rton
339b18(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang / mya

339b22(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba la bag tsha ba med pa'i 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag go/ srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'dar bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa
339b23(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o// dri ma gsum sbyong ste/ 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi dri ma dang / gti mug gi dri ma'o// bslab pa suH

340a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam par ga yed pa dang / bsam gtan las zlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang //
340a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la zlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rtogs pa gsum gyi nye bar rton te/ gsuMgasuM gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdo/
340a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thaMd yongasu gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin
340b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / bzod pa cing nges pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjesu srung ba dang // byang chub yongs su sngo ba dang / brtson 'grus gces pa
340b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dor ba dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / byang chub yongs su sngo ba dang / bsam gtan nye bar len pa dang / mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang
340b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / spros pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ste/ grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpal
340b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni pha rol du phyin pa rnams kyi rtog pa 'di gsum gyis nye bar rton to// thogs dag de lta bas na/ khyed cag bag yod par gyis shig// sangs rgyas
340b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnas kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob po// grogs po dag
340b6(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa
340b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang la lus kyi gnas med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa dang / chos kyi gnas med pa ste/ chos thams cad
340b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// tshegs chung ngus yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par
341a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma
341a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thon pa dang / mngon par ma grub par yang so sor rtog cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bod la/ brtson 'grus com zhing
341a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang
341a4(dkon brtsegs): zag gzhan rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la/ bcom 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa
341a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ bdun pa skrod cing 'bang la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa
341a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du yang mos la/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab
341a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam par grol bar yang yid ches la dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnam gnas par bya ba dang / nyams
341a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bang la brtson 'grus zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog la/
341b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad brtson pa med cing rtul pa med par yang mthong ba ste/ yang mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba yang med/ 'gog pa yang med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i
341b2(dkon brtsegs): spong ba sgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus dang sems las su rung ba
341b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de sems las su rung bas/ dge ba'i chos la bdun pa yang mi 'dod la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad
341b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtso mo la/ brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang // sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
341b5(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor la/ sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes pa dang // ci ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du yang slong la/
341b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing mngon par zhen pa yang med pa'o// de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbang po drug la rten par mi byed
341b7(dkon brtsegs): cing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin bya ba'i phyir shes pa yang gtong la/ gcig tu gnas pa yang thob par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyi dad pas kyang mi
341b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / thams cad kyang yongs su thong la/ thang ba yang med cing dor ba yang med pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la yang rmongs pa med la/ dran pa yang med
342a1(dkon brtsegs): / cing yid la byed pa yang med pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur cing / chos thams cad kyi
342a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang thob par 'gyur la spros pa dang lta ba yang yang dag par chad pa 'di ni de'i dbang po
342a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de stobs lnga bsgom pa yang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas phas kyi rgol ba tha~Md kyi mi rdzi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stob
342a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad du mi 'phrogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
342a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pa rnams kyi zil kyis mi non pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de ltar stobs lnga yong su rdzogs pa 'gyur/
342a6(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub kyi yag lag bdun bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya
342a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom
342a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / zang zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myong bar bya/
342b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lags bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems kyi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /
342b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / mthon dman med pa'i btang
342b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o// rdzogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
342b4(dkon brtsegs): tshegs chu dus 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam sgom pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang / chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag
342b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang / bdag dang gas
342b6(dkon brtsegs): la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog spongs dang / thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i
342b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' sgom pa dang // bdag la stod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba'i ya/
342b8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rtsol ba bsgom pa dang / gti mug dang rmongs dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang
343a1(dkon brtsegs): dgon 'tshogasadag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa zhes bya'o// des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
343a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dang de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag byang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o// grogs po ngag de ltar bag yod pa'i byang chub sem dpa'
343a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go// zhags nas 'du byed thams cad kyi 'dam las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/ rnam par
343a4(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas mi mthong ngo // mi 'bar ro// shin tu nye bar zhi ste/ rnam par 'khrug par byed do// shin tu nye bar zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang nye bar ma sgrubs pa de ma byas pa'o//
343a5(dkon brtsegs): gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o// gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med pa'o// gdags pa med pa de ni shin tu nye bar zhi ba'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/
343a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lhang bu dpal bzangs kyis/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon
343a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di rjes smra'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' lam ji ltar sgom/ smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba yang mi spong la/ 'khor ba'i nyes
343a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so// 'dus ma byas su la pa mi ltung la/ 'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang sgom la/
343b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang snang ngo // lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa yang yin pa lta bar gyur pa
343b2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas shing / lta bar gyur pa la mngon par zhes pa yang medado// mtshan ma med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ mtshan ma la yang mkhas shing / mtshan ma la mngon par
343b3(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa yang ngo // smon pa med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la// khams sum pa la yang mkhas shing / kham gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa yang medo// skye ba med pa dang / 'byung
343b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/ skye ba dang 'jigs pa la yang mkhas shing / skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
343b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa rnams ni sems can chos tha~Md stong pa'o// snyas pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa/ lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnam
343b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi lta bar gyur pa spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong // de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pani//
343b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos tha~Md la 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa'i rjesu mthun pa 'dis
343b8(dkon brtsegs): babage lanyal bar byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ 'byung ba dang 'dzag pa de yang 'byung ba dang / 'dzag pa med pa dri mdzong rten can
344a1(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnams/ de cing
