344a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o// 'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ni snyom
344a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa skyed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i las du'o// 'ong ba ni 'dab
344a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa'i sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni bzod pa de sems can gyi khong du chud par byed/
344a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa la'o// 'ong ba ni 'byung ba ma yin par 'byung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni mya ngas Sh+Tangs
344a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni gang du yang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro/
344a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ong ba ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa'i
344a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// 'ong ba rnam par rtog pa gsum spong bar chos ston pa'i phyi'o// 'gro ba ni dam bcas par brtan par byed pa'i phyi'o// 'ong ba ni dam bcas pacam chog tu chung tsA
344b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i phyiraro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i phyir te/ lha
344b2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga rgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes
344b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal bdag gi 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan tha~Md 'od ces brtse
344b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig thos na/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ci skad ces bya ba zhig chos ston/
344b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu steng gi phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kham
344b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to// smras pa
344b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po
344b8(dkon brtsegs): de blta bar bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhug so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
345a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dazugs ma rag tu thas las de nga 'dun pa'i yang byung ste/ 'dings sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma sbed po deng/
345a2(dkon brtsegs): masnang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de yang sdang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang
345a3(dkon brtsegs): po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
345a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dge gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
345a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
345a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kyang thub pa zhes bya ba 'gug so// 'tsho'o gnas so/ chos kyang ston to// den byer mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
345a7(dkon brtsegs): dab byang ba dpal gzhon du gyur ba zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i 'ad ces bya ba'i tshi nge 'dzin pa rnams pa zhugs te/ ngang rdzas kyi 'od kyi phyogs gA
345a8(dkon brtsegs): kye zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab bo// des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyaba'o// gsos pabacom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jig rten
345b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de dang 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gabye pa
345b2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi 'thil gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong byung ba ste/ 'od zer de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das /
345b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir snang ba chen po khyab par byaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing / bcom ldan
345b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
345b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
345b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kan ta bzang po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gabye ba kun tu bzang sa
345b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag der chos kyi gtas chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na/ khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de 'gro
345b8(dkon brtsegs): bar spro ba su yod// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin ces pa der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
346a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi byed der mchi bar spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/
346a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sgron ma 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu'i yongasu skor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
346a3(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lags pa bskum pa las bgying ba dang / brkyang ba
346a4(dkon brtsegs): las bskam pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su
346a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyun pa'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin to// de'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs
346a6(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa rnams su phyin to// de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas phal mo sbyar te 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang smraso//
346a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa la bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas kun tu bzed po des khyod la blta ba dang / phyag
346a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bsnyen bkun bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo // khyod kyis 'od dkye ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
346a9(dkon brtsegs): gzugs na spyod pa'i lho'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te kye ma ci tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zer 'di/ 'jig rten gyi
346b1(dkon brtsegs): der phyin pa dang / 'di ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par
346b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas/ lha'i
346b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor chen po de ltar 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
346b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa de lta de ltar chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa ci srid du dga' ldan gyi gnasu lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du de byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye
346b5(dkon brtsegs): brag bcu po de dang lhan cig rang gi 'khor dang lhan cig/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas
346b6(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar gyur te// sems kyi 'gyur tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ de dag gos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
346b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron mdzin dang / lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
346b8(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbar phal mo sbyar te/ tsha/
346b9(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bab po gnod brdung ngas/ sa de rung dang/ bskyed pa yang smo
346b10(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das la lan bdun dkor ba byas nas/
347a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a
347a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs ston/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// yang dag par dag
347a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad cing / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la// yang dag par gzengs bstod/ de/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
347a4(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shesam mngon gyi mngon par shes
347a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / sems can sdud pa dang / yongasu smin par byed pa dang / thabs dang / rigs pa dang / ye shes dang shes
347a6(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / spobs pa la ltos/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ sangs su kyi mdzad pa/
347a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dag go// sems can gang dag gi dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyis bdud
347a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron mi 'dzin dang lhan cig tu
347b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mad 'dir phyin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa las chos thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas
347b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
347b3(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par byas te/ ba
347b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
347b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig
347b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzungs lags na/ 'di'i ming ci skad bgyi
347b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gzung bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi chos kyi rdzam kun dga' bo de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpa'
347b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi le'u dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
348a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dpal bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid/
348a2(dkon brtsegs): rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags dkon mchogs brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las
348a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa lnga'i bu dpal bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum bcu lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// /
348a4(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya s+thi ta ma ti/ de ba pud tra ba ri brid ce na nam ma ma hA ya na sutra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
348a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thaMd la phyag
348a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi brgod phung po'i ri la// dge slong drug khri nyes stong gi dge 'dun chen po
348a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes mngon par shes pa/ dgra bcom pa sha stag dang / 'jam dpal dang / seng ge'i rtog las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stod la/ byang
348a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dang / mthu chen thob dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug
348b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rab tu mi gul dang / don rab sems dang / legs bsams pa sems dang // sems dpa' ba dang / sem
348b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi blo gros dang / sems bzang po dang / no bu brtsegs dang / ri 'joms rgyal po dang / lag na ri na rkyen dang sems pa rin po che dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /
348b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu lag brgyad dang / rtag tu brtson dang / sems can sgrol dang / brtson 'grus mos dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed la gnas par
348b4(dkon brtsegs): smom lam 'phags dang / lag na sgron ma dang / sems mnyam dang / song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang /
348b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i snying po dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon
348b6(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' mdod dang / blo gros dam pa dang / khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro grub dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog dang
348b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi rtog dang / 'od dpal dang / snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang / seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / slos
348b8(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs med dang / spobs pa bzhan pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam par gnon dang / ge nyi zla'i 'od zer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang /
349a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs med dang / blo gros dpe med dang / rtag tu bzhad dgyes dbang po dang / nor bu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bud med rnams sbyar/
349a2(dkon brtsegs): go tsa dang / rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par snang 'byed dang / mes byin dang / tshogs can rab cho ga rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra skad bzab
349a3(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po/
349a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs gcig go// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la yang dag pa
349a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshams zangs dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang
349a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri gsum stong dang yang thabs gcig go// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po lhun po dang / de dag la sog
349a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal
349a8(dkon brtsegs): po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rgyal drug khri dang yang thibs
349a9(dkon brtsegs): gcig go// de dang gzhan yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / namakhar lding dang / mi 'am ni dang / lto 'phyi chen po dang / 'bum phrag du ma dang /
349b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyem ma dag dang yang thabs gcig ti/ de na bcom bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis
349b2(dkon brtsegs): bltas te chos ston no// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dug pa gcig pu dben pa na 'dug pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med
349b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de la
349b4(dkon brtsegs): langs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas 'jam dpa
349b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
349b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten tu 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/ 'di lta ste dper na u dum pa rib me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du
349b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de bzhin du/ gang dag skyes pa'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba gsal ba/ brtag tu med gtog ge dang bral ba/ zab pa shes par dka' ba'i
349b8(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba
349b9(dkon brtsegs): med na ni chos mnyan pa yang med do// chos mnyan pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad po yang med pas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
350a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhu ba zhus pa ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su 'grub par 'gyur
350a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pheg pa'i gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tsom med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
350a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni/ 'dod chags che ba/ zhe sdang che ba/ gti mug ce ga/ dkar po'i chos dang bral
350a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa glen pa blun pa mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang bral ba sha stag yin pas/ ci nas kyang seMs can 'a
350a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis chos thos nas/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa 'di snyam du sos te
350a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon tu byed
350a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur pa/ 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o// snyamo// de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la snyom/
350a8(dkon brtsegs): par zhug so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang badri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhug ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mdo la shar phyogs
350b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dag mnyen pa 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od gsal ga dri ma med pa yongasu dag pa'i 'od chen po
350b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// 'od de dang snang ba des/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag dang / ri'i rtse mo dang / shi
350b3(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa dang / ri dang 'khor yug dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang ri rab dang / lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thaMd snang ba chen po gsal
350b4(dkon brtsegs): blar gyur to// de nas phyog bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dge bzhugs te/ 2tsho zhing gnyis pa de dag la rang rang gi ste/
350b5(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i 'od 'di ltar yid du mchi ba/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten
350b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba/ 'di/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bcug sems dang ba dang / lus chub pa chen po dang
350b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing / sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dpa' zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang kun tu mi 'byung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'od 'di lta ru
350b8(dkon brtsegs): bkye ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba chen de
351a1(dkon brtsegs): dag la cang mi gsungs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin dang / lnga ma yin gyi sgra dang /
351a2(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang // mi 'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po sgra dang / mi'i sgra dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang / bya'i sgra dang / ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag yod pa
351a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad klags pa gyur to// klung gi sgra dang / chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i zhugs kyi sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag
351a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang mi grags par gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi bar gyur to// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen pa kun
351a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman
351a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bde ba'i mang du sa su 'das kyis gang zhes 'od 'dis thA li zhingag/ des sangs rgyas kyi gang 'di dag thams ca byu byu
351a7(dkon brtsegs): phyung du sa pa ris / las rgya tha~M ba sa skyed / dug shes pa sa rgyas du dag pas ba
351a8(dkon brtsegs): sa mi ga/ 'as ga sa
351b1(dkon brtsegs): m+b+ha m+b+haH sa mags tu rdzus padag padas na bku ba de dag paka' gyul to// sangs rgyas mas ldan 'a dag gi gsungam bad ba dag sa
351b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi gardzing mi ca kun tu gang bar gyur te/ b+ha dang marnams pa'i sem ldan 'thas drag sang bdag kyang na mngan par 'byin cig/ ral mo'i sgra blangs dkyil bar su grags pa
351b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// rnam po'i sgo dag las martag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i rtswa thung zhing / stong banyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan sa med pa'i sgradang / smon pa med
351b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra
351b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / phan pa'i dngos por
351b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dag dang / de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra byung ba
351b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / nyan thos nyid dang / rang sangs
351b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los skur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
352a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig bya thong shig/ 'od 'di ni
352a2(dkon brtsegs): ci tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba dang / ci tsam du bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i mchogs dang / tshul khrim sa dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
352a3(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas 'od
352a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ lha dang bus pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dri la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'od 'di ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang /
352a5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms thams cad kyis yongasu bsgos pas yongasu chis par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di yi sngags pa brjod par gyur na/ bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngag
352a6(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod pa'i mthar phyin par sba ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs par nyon la sgyid la zung shig dang // khyed la bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas
352a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsten kur pa de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// kye skye bo mang po pa ldan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
352a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su 'grub par gyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas
352b1(dkon brtsegs): bam ldan 'das dang ga kyis dbang gi bsnyen bgrang bar dag pa 'di sa kyis bka' rgyal // dgas kyi bu dag 'ag rten gyi / khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ den dacan
352b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bder gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
352b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i lo sgyur gtan bdag/ lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyid pa sangs rgyal lam ldan 'das bzhugs te/ tsho zhing shes pa de sregs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig /
352b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'dod chags dang zhe sdang / gti mug gis gzer ba'i sems can mi gus pa dang / dbang po rtul ba// ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i dang bral ba/ nyan
352b5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa can gyi las spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te
352b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
352b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi mjed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mthu che ba/ shes pa che ba/ brtson 'grus che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang
352b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag dag par gzeng bstod pa/ byang chub sems
353a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa'i go byed pa/ chos
353a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa las mkhas pa/ chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs
353a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su 'grub par bya ba dang /
353a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ban
353a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la chos zhu ba zhu bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
353a6(dkon brtsegs): pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos ston pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyog bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyi
353a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'di skye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yi ni/ rkyen ni de yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas
353a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bskur ba de dag gis 'dzin kyis gsal te/ sam ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'das dpal gnon nung thur ba'o/
353b1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de gang la gnas nas 'di lta bu 'gyed lags/ bka' stsal ba ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon
353b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/ 'di ltar rnam pa
353b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ 'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba mchog tu dga' ba/ mchog tu dga' bar gyid nga'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzang lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
353b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu mi mched pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
353b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang gi'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba
353b6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
353b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon mthong ma thos pa yon tan du/
353b8(dkon brtsegs): ma dang ldan pa 'di lta bu dang snang ba dri lta bu dang / 'brar ba 'di lta bu 'di ga las mchis/ su'i 'od lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / sangs rgyas bco
354a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/
354a2(dkon brtsegs): de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de na
354a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'ong ba 'ab
354a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di lta bu 'di bkre'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
354a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de la
354a6(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / zhu blag bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gsonar gyur pa de dang / de las
354a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang / blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dab de'i dus la bab
354a8(dkon brtsegs): yang shes ga deng shig/ de nas de'i mdol phyag 'acu byang chub sems dpa' daglegs zag bye ba thag thig 'dun dpas tu me rdzangs meng bas bkyis
354b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag srang cig pang cag yung sas de cing la 'di lta ste/ dper na mi stongs po che'i lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bslus pa bcas la/
354b2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi spang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' dag ni me tog
354b3(dkon brtsegs): gi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la ba der
354b4(dkon brtsegs): lhags so// la la dag ni phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po
354b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug tA dang / skya sAr dang d+ha nu ska ri dang / sna ma'i me tog bA ra shi ka dang / ba ra shi ka chen po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po/
354b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / zla mdog dang / zla mdog chen po dang / zla la zlog rab marjes la sog pa me tog gi rig rnams pa sna tshogs kyi char
354b7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang rtsi 'phreng ba'i char dag dang phye ma'i cher dge mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
354b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shug tu rda gal ba der lpag so// byang chub sems dpa' la ladag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag dra ma dag rab tu gsal zhing / bcom ldan 'das/
354b9(dkon brtsegs): slopa char dag dang /
355a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la ba der lhag so// byang chub sems dpa'
355a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skad kyis go bar byed cing
355a3(dkon brtsegs): lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga
355a4(dkon brtsegs): la ba der lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags ma thag tu de nas de'i mdo la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
355a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
355a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi sems can gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to// sems can gang la la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med ka zhe sdang
355a7(dkon brtsegs): gris ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma sbyin// ser snas ma yin/ 'chab pas ma yin/ 'khro bas ma yin
355a8(dkon brtsegs): yong su gdung bas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
355b1(dkon brtsegs): dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/
355b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
355b3(dkon brtsegs): shag kya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te// lus
355b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad ma kha dog sna tshogs mdab ma 'bum phrag du
355b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par gyur te/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad
355b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba de dang me tog gi char dang / spos kyi char dang / phye ma'i char de dag dang / sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de yang mthong
355b7(dkon brtsegs): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur pa yang mthong / 'khor phal po che'i lha dang klu dang /
355b8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / nga dge slong ma
356a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag mthong ngo // de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan
356a2(dkon brtsegs): las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
356a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal/ mi'i dam pa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dag des bstsags pa/
356a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas gzhal du mchis yid gnyis mun sel po// sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma yin// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba leg pa
356a5(dkon brtsegs): spyad/ de gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa/ yon tan mnga'
356a6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tsom bskul du gsol/ sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang / skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal
356a7(dkon brtsegs): dum mchis brnyes/ sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang / sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol/ khyod kyis
356a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon cad chibs dang glang po shing rta dbu chung srul// gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang / thub pas zhal zas gsang nan de bzhin po
356b1(dkon brtsegs): brang dkor yang stsal/ sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyod la zhu/ stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten cing thugs legs dgongs pas/ rdul
356b2(dkon brtsegs): bral skra lus gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing / gsungs shes zhus na bzod pa gsungs pa'i stobs la brtson pa yi/ yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang brag sa
356b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod laM zhu bar 'tshal// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la/ bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs
356b4(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa/ brgyad dag srid pa 'dir spyad pa/ dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ bde gshegs legs pa
356b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'/ sprod pa legs par spyod pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyes/ bdag dang sems can rnam par bshig cing stong
356b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i chos la btson/ shin tu dri ma mchis bsam bsgom bdag gi the tsom zhum/ khyod kyis sngon ni sprin dang tshul khrims bzod pa btson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
356b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten/ khyod kyis yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin/ 'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag
356b8(dkon brtsegs): ge skyabs/ gyur cig/ rdul bral khyod kyis sku lus dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni/ srang la gtsal ba mdzad cing ngas dum lhag grol ma lus par sku kun ril gyen
357a1(dkon brtsegs): @#btang ste/ phug ron phrug gu gcig ma gtang / rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mthang ba the tsom gcad du gsol/ lha tshogs gnas pa'i ro la
357a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cing / mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang / rgyal ba
357a3(dkon brtsegs): grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshigs mi gsungs/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par stod
357a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing ngo mtshar mang du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda'
357a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/
357a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta bu'i tam dris pas khyod la ci zhig bya thong shig/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yino// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
357a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di bstan par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs shing bslang bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo
357a8(dkon brtsegs): mang po lA byede ba'i slad du skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsob/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la/
357b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la thung shig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das legs
357b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung 'di ni 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa kun
357b3(dkon brtsegs): tu snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stom par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag
357b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis snang bar byas nas// 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa
357b5(dkon brtsegs): dag yang dag par bskul te// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'jir lhags nas/ de dag gis da bzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ nga la lan gsum
357b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar snang la nya la bdun srid tsam na/ pad ma dag la 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
357b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus/ me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu ba cing / spos kyi char dang // bye ma'i che 'di dag kyang
357b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin te/ byang chub
358a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems dpa' de dag gi mthus/ me tog gi cher 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing / spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag nang rab tu 'bar la/ sil snyan 'dum
358a2(dkon brtsegs): zag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od
358a3(dkon brtsegs): srung de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems
358a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po gang dang / phan par 'dod pa gang dang / spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sbyin pa dang tshul khris
358a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / btson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i
358a6(dkon brtsegs): bas pa de la yang mi phyir ro// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ti de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ de dag
358a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs pa kho nar zad do// 'od srung rigs kyi bu de dag
358a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re shig mi mthong na/ nyan thos dang rang
358b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas medo// theg pa la sar du zhugs pa'i di skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od
358b2(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang / spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ci lta bu dag dang ldan na/ byang chub seMs
358b3(dkon brtsegs): ngaba'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan
358b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin lus thaMd rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sems can thaMd
358b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu mi gtong ba dang / snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan me pad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tha~Md la lhag par dmigs shing / de la
358b6(dkon brtsegs): rlom sas med pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang srog kyang gtong na
358b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa yongasu 'dzin cing chog des rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa
358b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa yongasu rdzogs par byed cing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rten
358b9(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bkod nas/ phyis byang chub kyi zhing drung du 'gro bar bya'o// snyam yang sems can rnams dang /
359a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus
359a2(dkon brtsegs): lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
359a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang ma skyed pa'i legs pa gsungs
359a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyi
359a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams lha la smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis lus thams cad
359a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug mi nus te/ ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na skyom par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med
359a7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'
359a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das bka' sprul pa/ 'ong
359a9(dkon brtsegs): srung de 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyod re shi go sdod cig dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las lding de'i 'og tu mthong bar
359b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'od srung de lha mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig/ de nas
359b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ byang chub sems dpang de dag spyod lam ci lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu
359b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin ni// khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang /
359b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba yang ma shes/ de dge nas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes/ ci byed pa dang ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad du ma shes ma mthong ngo // de nas
359b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par
359b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni/ bcom ldan lnga 'das ngo mtshang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ni shin tu
359b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge
359b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen 'a'i ye shes thob pa dag lha spos kyang ci 'dul te/ bcom ldan 'a
360a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sa zhig blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mang gyid/ bcom ldan 'das ga
360a2(dkon brtsegs): tebyang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'chal bar bgyid pa de ni gom legs par 'jal pa lags pas/
360a3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin 'din slad kyis kyang yongasu btang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//
360a4(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin na// sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan sha ri'i bus
360a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te// bdag gzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus/
360a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o// snyam mo// de nas gnas rtan sha ri'i dus byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms
360a7(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma yang shes rabang ma nus so// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang
360a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs
360b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pas/ ting nge 'dzin bzhin khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag gi 'ong ba dag/ 'gro ba yang ma shes/ 'greng ba yang mthong / 'chags pa
360b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong / 'dug pa lnga 'ong / nyal ba yang ma mthong ste// de dag lta bar mi nuso// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
360b3(dkon brtsegs): gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnams kyi mchog tu bsdu
360b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ bdag zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gyur cing /
360b5(dkon brtsegs): gling chen po zhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig shos kyang rnga bo che sbags gcig tu gyur la/ der mi la la zhig skes nas/ des ri rab tsam gyi rdo shing thogs te/
360b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdun du mchis nas/ sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par rnga bo che de
360b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang // bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams
360b8(dkon brtsegs): thob pa la re shig bskal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi snga de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par shes ba tsam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na/
361a1(dkon brtsegs): / des ting nge 'dzin de las slong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te// de ni gnas ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis
361a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mdzad
361a3(dkon brtsegs): ste// de dag gi gnas kyang ma 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes de lta bu yongasu tshol ba na/ sems can
361a4(dkon brtsegs): re re'i slad du bskal pa gang gir klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg kyang spro bar bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi ye shes
361a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su btang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam pa 'grol ba
361a6(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur na ni/ bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing / de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongs su spongs par mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
361a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so rab 'byor
361a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur du zin na/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gi'i rlung gi bye da
361b1(dkon brtsegs): snongad du 'jug cing thar zang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'amar rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig te/
361b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/
361b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor nan gyis dper byas te/ gal te sems can de dag thams dge slong rab 'byor dang / sha ri'i bu dang / 'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa
361b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur la/ rab 'byor nyan thos chen po de lta bu'i de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar
361b5(dkon brtsegs): btags kyang mthong bar mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de
361b6(dkon brtsegs): dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te// rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang ma'i skyo dgur
361b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams pas srog chags brgyad khri bzhini stong blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas
361b8(dkon brtsegs): din 'dag pa 'digs du sems te// byang nub sems dpa' bye 'khrag khrig 'dum thag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyis/ bdag nas lha 'dum than sa zi
362a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i ji lta ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par du bya ba mngon par 'du byas na 'di lta ba'i
362a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas pad ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam/ mda' ma ni gser/ sdong bu ni dngul/ snying po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po/
362a3(dkon brtsegs): ze ba ni bye durar+ya las byas pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul cing / pad ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha
362a4(dkon brtsegs): dog lta bu/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum nu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpal dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'od gsal ba/ dag pa
362a5(dkon brtsegs): pad mi'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo krung gi 'dag po'i lus gzugs dag kyang mngon par sprul to// de nas pad mo de dag rgyal chen bzhir lha'i nas bsung ste/
362a6(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs pa
362a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun na 'dod dang / tshangs pa chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rlung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin me r+d+ha dang /
362a8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyis dang 'bras bu che dang / mi che bo dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya noms snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i ri kye bar da
362b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris zer 'bras nas/ 'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi 'dod pas spyod pa dang/
362b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams cad du 'dong zhing sgra sgrogs par byed// dbyangs rjod par byed yang dag par skul bar byed do// byang
362b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na thams cad rgyu ba'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad de 'di dag smraso//
362b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i tsa lag rnams/ 'jig rten du ni lan 'gag 'byung // u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// sangs rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon/ shag kya seng ge
362b5(dkon brtsegs): mi'i mchog/ de ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'i// chos ni yang dag der ston mdzod/ lha'i 'dod pa yid dga' la// ji srid yu
362b6(dkon brtsegs): rings spyad byas pa// gang du zor ba myong gyur pa'i ngan song rnamasu myong bar gyur// de srid 'dod pa rnams sten pa/ srid pa'i phyin zhing rab tu 'phel/ khams
362b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum la 'khor ba'i srogs chags la/ bde ba yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon pa'i// gom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni// gang dag bag med mi rtog ge
362b8(dkon brtsegs): de dgra sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas lta phyir deng la ni/ chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis/ 'jig rten de na 'das 'og tu/ byi dus 'gyod par ma byed cig/
363a1(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag rtag mos shing / 'jig chen bdud kyi chags pa yi// bag med spyod par byed rnams la/ thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur/ de ni 'di skad
363a2(dkon brtsegs): smra bar bya/ bsod nams bya ba'i sems can gang / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos// gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i/
363a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par/ sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med// dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin/ skyeb pa shag kya seng ge yis// chad
363a4(dkon brtsegs): med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye bar spyad mdzad nas/ ye shes dam pa bsnyes nas ni/ gang la sems can mi dmigs shing / srog dang gang zag yod min
363a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i// chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang / blta bar dka' ba rab tu ston/ rtog pa spangs par gyur cing ni// chad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ mtshan ma thams cad spang
363a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos/ srog chags rnams la ston pa mdzad/ gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i/ stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / smon par byed pa ma yin pa'i/ yang dag
363a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni rab tu ston// rtag med mtshan ma yod min zhing / skye min 'byung ba med pa dang / 'od med cing 'gro med pa'i/ chos mkhas pa ston par mdzad/ zad med
363a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yod min zhing // rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med dang / bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa/ ston kyang rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'/ sems can gang yang skye med cing //
363b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang 'chi ba yod ma yin// mya ngan 'das pa 'ang gang yang med/ sems can 'byung ba yod ma yin/ skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang / skad la rten pa yod
363b2(dkon brtsegs): min zhing / yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i chos/ mi'i 'dren pa ston pa mdzad/ ga la rlung ni mi gnas shing / chu dang me dang mi dmigs la/ sar yang rtog pa med pa'i chos/
363b3(dkon brtsegs): spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad/ gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni/ stong zhing phung po lnga po dag/ dngos po med pa ston par
363b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang / stong pa de yang dmigs su med/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnam
363b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ro dang reg rnams bya yid 'ong ba/ de dag rnam par rtog pas bskyed/ rtog pa 'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin// de lta sangs rgyas skyob pa ni// srog chags rnams la chos
363b6(dkon brtsegs): ston gyis/ gang dag sdug bsngal bar 'dod pa// de dag rnam 'dren drung du sheg/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
363b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'dir tshig su bcad de dag gi chos bstan pas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dag cu rtsa drug ni/ chos
363b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rje su thong po// lha'i bus ya brag gsum dang nyis
364a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bum ni byang chub du sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
364a2(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur tog/ ga de'i tshen byang chub sems de pa'i lus gzugs de dag gi/ lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag las lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag byeng grangs
364a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag skad cig mthang cig yud tsam gcig gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga
364a4(dkon brtsegs): ba der dong ste/ lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/
364a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog ud pal la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / phye ma dang / spos dang byug pa dag gis de bzhin
364a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mngon par gtor ro// steng gi bar snang la yang lnga'i glu dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to// de'i tshe na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
364a7(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba dag khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs/ khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med pa de snyed kyi lha
364a8(dkon brtsegs): bu dag 'dus par gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu
364b1(dkon brtsegs): rje gros rabu gnas dang / wA marnams pa'angs dang / wa'i bu dri me dang / lca bu rnas shes pazan can zhes bya ba da bye ba zag dgun cu drug pa thams cad kyang
364b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thegs pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba'ar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur gnas ga la ba de
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dong te lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ me tog man dar ba'i char bdag mngon par rab tu
364b4(dkon brtsegs): phab po// me tog man dar ba'i chos de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su me tog gi phung po 'bang du dpag tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par
364b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs ji lta bu byin gyis brlabs na/ 'di lta bur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyi rlabs pas/
364b6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la/ me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to// me tog gi 'od des stong gsung
364b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ sngon lam las byung ba'i snyan
364b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la btugs so// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang /
365a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la btugs so// 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong zag du
365a2(dkon brtsegs): pa// bam po gnyis pa// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba/
365a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bshad par bya// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ni rnams dang / shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang / gnas med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spras pa med pa'i gzhi rnams
365a4(dkon brtsegs): spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi rnams dang / brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / bstan du med pa'i gni rnams dang / zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang / bden pa'i gzhi
365a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / mi phye ba'i gzhi rnams dang / stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / smon pa med/
365a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzhi rnams dang / de bzhin nyid bsta pa'i gzhi rnams dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang / 'tshungs pa med pa
365a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / dor ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi gzhi rnams dang / dge 'dun gyi
365a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnam pa dang / leshes yangs su rdzogs pa mem pa'i gzhi nams dang / mas gsus sams banyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / sa thams cad 'dag
365b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang / seng ge'i gzhi rnams dang / dpa' ba' gzhi rnam pa dang / gan meng pa'i gzhi dag bdun
365b2(dkon brtsegs): pan snod du 'gyur ba 'an su med snyam so// de nas yang 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sams te/ kwa'i bum gros rab gnas 'dzin ldan gyi rgyal ba la
365b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba byas pa// zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu bstan pa
365b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad par bya'o// snyam mo de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod
365b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thogs pa me ba'i spob dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan gcig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
365b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa po 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te khyod gsungs par mi dzad/ brjod par mi mdzad
365b7(dkon brtsegs): 'on par mi mdzad cing / yi ge yang mi brjod/ sgra yang mi gnas pa lta na/ bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lnga'i bu gal te khyod
365b8(dkon brtsegs): nyan par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed// 'chang bar mi byed// kun chub par mi byed// sems par mi byed/ rigs par mi byed/ rnam par rig par mi byed/ len par mi
366a1(dkon brtsegs): @byed/ gtong bar mi byed/ cing / zos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed/ ltan// kho bos kyang de bzhin bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
366a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste// gang gis ming brjod cing ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i
366a3(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lha'i bu 'di dag ni khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyis/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag la chos kyi bka' ni
366a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de// 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la yang ma yin no//
366a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na// lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur lo/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag du 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur
366a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'i 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o// bdag ni nyan pa'o// 'di ni bshad par bya'o snyam
366a7(dkon brtsegs): du sems pas/ de ni chags pa gsum gyi chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na bdag tu dmigs pa dang / sems can du dmig pa dang / chos su dmigs pa'o// lhan
366a8(dkon brtsegs): bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yong su dag pas chos ston par byed de/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rlom
366b1(dkon brtsegs): sems su mi byed do// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed// rlom sem su mi byed/ sems par mi
366b2(dkon brtsegs): byed/ chos smra bar dmigs pa med cing / rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa dang / cho su dmigs med cing rnam par rtogs par
366b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems pa mi byed pa ste// lu'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam par nyan pa yin te/ mi mnyam par nyan pa ma yin no//
366b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis glon/ 'jam dpal ci nas kyang mi ldog pA kyi slad du bstan pa bshad pa legs so// legs so 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lga
366b5(dkon brtsegs): du ci rung rnam par ma rtog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste// byang chub kyang dmigasu med do// lha'i bus/
366b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags las ldog go// zhe sdar las ldog go// ti mug las ldog go// sred pa las
366b7(dkon brtsegs): ldog go// ma rig pa las ldog go// 'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ngar las ldog go// rgyu las ldog go// lta ba las ldog go// ming las ldog go//
366b8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs las ldog go// 'dod pa'i khams las ldog go// gzugs kyi khams las ldog go// gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go// nyan thos kyi spyod pa
367a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ las mi ldog go// rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las mi ldog go// rtog pa las ldog go// 'dzin pa las ldog go// mtshan ma las ldog go// dngos por 'dzin pa
367a2(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go// chad par lta ba las ldog go// rtag par lta ba las ldog go// blang ba las ldog go// dor ba las ldog go// bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go//
367a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go// srog tu 'du shes pa lus ldog go// gang zag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go// yid la byed pa dag las ldog go// chags
367a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag las ldog go// phyin ci log dag las ldog go// 'jigs tshogs las ldog go// 'jigs tshegs la lta ba las ldog go// 'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i
367a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go// sgrib pa dag las ldog go// phung po lngar 'dzin pa dag las ldog go// phyi dang nang gi skye mched thams cad
367a6(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go// khams rnams las ldog go// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa las ldog go// chosu 'du shes pa las ldog go// dge 'dun du 'du shes pa dag
367a7(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go// bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag chos ston par 'gyuraro// bdag sems can sgrol bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag bdud 'dul bar
367a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuro// bdag ye shes thob par 'gyur snyam pa'i 'du shes de dag las ldogo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
367b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa bcad brgyang la rtog par ma byed do// dbang po rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams rtog par mi byed do// mtshan ma med pa rnams la rtog par byed na/
367b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog par mi byed cing / rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/
367b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las mi ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
367b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog go// stong pa nyid las mi ldog/ mtshan ma med pa las mi ldo go// smon pa med pa las mi ldog go// de bzhin nyid
367b5(dkon brtsegs): las mi ldog go// chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go// yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go// mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de
367b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / yong su rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa'i chos de lngas ldog pa de ni des na ldog pa zhes bya'o/
367b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs pa de ni lus ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma mchis pa zhig gam// 'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig/ 'on te mchis pa
367b8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa yang lags/ pa zhig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med
367'a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa dang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
367'a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'o na gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / legs pas yin par 'dzin pa dang / log par
367'a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed/ yongasu gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni yod par yang bstan par mi
367'a4(dkon brtsegs): bya/ med par yang bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na/ de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
367'a5(dkon brtsegs): gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na/ rtag par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog par gyur na chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad kyi
367'a6(dkon brtsegs): byer chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin nyid
367'a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o// zhes 'du shes kyi yod pa ma yin par yongasu shes par bzad kyi// de la chad pa sbed rtag pa yang med de// lha'i bu de
367'a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros
367'b1(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas kyi 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'das dpal de bzhin gshes pa la blta ba dang // phyag bsngo ba dang / bsnyen bkur
367'b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zhu ba gu blag bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa las spyod
367'b3(dkon brtsegs): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/
367'b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhug so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi ganga'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na
367'b5(dkon brtsegs): des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar min 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to//
367'b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so// zhes gsungs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bos mdun zhes bya ba ji zhig yin snyam/
367'b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus mos pa/ 'jam dpal na mkha'i khams lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/ na mkha'i khams
367'b8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma mkha' dang mnyam pa'i byer na mkha' ji lta bu yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa/ de lta bu yin pas/ na mkha' dang /
368a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod na mtha' 'di
368a2(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya zhing chud kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi pa/ cha mnyam pa
368a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'bebs pa/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ sum khri nyi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag sems shing las byu
368a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing / khri stan re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan macu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to/
368a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji lta bu'i byin gyi rlobs byin gyis brlabs nas 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis rlabs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po
368a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rnam par spyod pa'i pad ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags na//
368a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bas pa la// lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang
368a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing // phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// de nas pad ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang /
368b1(dkon brtsegs): pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs 'thun par tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis
368b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par stod do// / gang gi'i bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod/ byang chub mchog gi spyad pa btsal mdzad pas/ de slang mi
368b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog khyod ni mnges pa lags// thub pa mtshan gyis yongasu spras gyur pa/ sku mchog srid pa gsum na lha de ste/ 'dren pa gang la mi dang srog dang ni/ gang zag ma/
368b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis chos la ston/ rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/ bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten/ khyod kyi shes rab srid sum thogs
368b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'/ ye shes mngar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i/ 'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dun gyur zhing // stong pa nyid la mos
368b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa'i/ mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur/ gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag/
368b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi ni mtshan med stong pa'i chos/ rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgom/ 'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni// skye dang 'chim pa dmigasu
368b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shing / 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba mchis te// chos rnams thams cad na mkha' ji bzhin no// ci ltar mi yis sgyu ma bstan gyur pa/ snang yang ngo bzhin gyi
369a1(dkon brtsegs): @ma mchis ltar// de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang / rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ gang zag la las gang gi'i bye rnyed kyi/ 'jig rten
369a2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byin pas/ 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa/ bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags// byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
369a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yis/ bskal pa bye ba gang gi'i'abye snyed du/ me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag/ phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas/ gang gis gang la mi dang sro
369a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ni/ gang zag ma chis de 'dri' chos 'di dag/ thos nas de la 'od bsal bzod thob pa// de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags/ gang la mi dang gang zag 'du
369a5(dkon brtsegs): shes mchis// bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang // shing rta dpung chud khri stan sprin bgyis kyang / des ni 'gro la grol ba mi 'thob bo// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan
369a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / de dgas kying sems can mang bkrol ba// mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'ong bsal stong pa'i chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol/ sangs
369a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang / de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob par dka'/ mi'i srid pa'ang rnyed par dka' ba nas/ rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs btsun
369a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis// mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing / khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' 'thob 'gyur la/ de bzhegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i// mkhas pa rnam
369b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rig pa'i rnal 'byor spyod/ sgra la 'chal cing 'dug par ma byed par// chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis/ khyed kyis rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas rten la/ des ni mi rnam ngas
369b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bar byos/ chos spu'i dge ba shes gang yin rten gyis la/ sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'ga'ang ma sten cig/ sems can kun la sems ni mnyam bgyis la/
369b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de la nam yang ma rloms shig/ tshul khrims dang mang du thos gyis la// rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod/ g.yeng ba med par shing drang rten gyis la/
369b4(dkon brtsegs): bkus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig/ 'das byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min// mtshan nyid cig cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yis/ dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes
369b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis la// myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par bgyis/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos/ nang gi skye mched drag dang phyi'i skye mched drag/ de dag grong 'dra bar
369b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pas na// de la nam yang rten par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ gtig mug nga rgyal yongasu rtog pas bskyed/ rtog pa de yang
369b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byung 'byung med par/ de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnamasu 'gyur/ de nas sprul pa de dag gis/ rigs su bcad de dag smras pa na/ 'khor de nas srog chags nyi
369b8(dkon brtsegs): khri nyi stong bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag po rnams las sems rnam par grog/ dge slong
370a1(dkon brtsegs): sum brgya ni chos rnams las chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos
370a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge snyen bdun stong dang / lha'i bu nyi khri bdun stong yang chos rnam la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral
370a3(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam
370a4(dkon brtsegs): ba drug du rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu rab tu
370a5(dkon brtsegs): ldeg// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
370a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnam pa drag tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs pad ma dag dang khang pa rtsegs pa 'di dag na 'chis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di ltar/
