370a7(dkon brtsegs): sten par bgyi ba dang / 'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu bye ba khrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag mang
370a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rtan sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu
370b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu snang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar dang de bzhin
370b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang ldan gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyi mi khyab pa yong su bsgrub pa'i phyir
370b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs na zhing nu thag byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bkar stsal ba
370b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'di
370b5(dkon brtsegs): na mi gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha ri'i bu khyod re shig sdod cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de// de'u re bdud kyi dkyil
370b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang // bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la ba der 'ong bar
370b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de nas 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugaso/
370b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dris dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'dzag par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas
370b9(dkon brtsegs): de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham san bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag de snyed pa de dag thams cad mag mig por gyur to// du
371a1(dkon brtsegs): / sdig can dag kyang rang gi lus rgas shing gtags la 'khobs par gyur nas/ lag pa 'khar ba la rten cing 'gro bar gyur to// de dag gi lha'i
371a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gtugs la 'khobs par gyur pa dang / rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang rnyings shing rab tu 'jig la mun pa mun nag tu gyur par mthong
371a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo // de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing sngangs pa yi chad cing sgyid lug ste/ spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du rnam par rtog te/ gang gis
371a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di'i rgyuni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bdag cag 'di nis shi 'pho zhing med pa 'am/
371a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo// bdud de dag gi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de skyes ma thag tu de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu sprul pa zer 'brum
371a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/ bdud de dag gi mdun du bkod do// de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dge 'di ni byang /
371a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba de da ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
371a8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i mthu yin te/ khyod la 'tsho ba 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis ma 'jigs shig/ lha'i bu sbrul po de dag go chog
371b1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdig can de dag gi sgra de yang zos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas/ yang rgya cher sngangs shing skrag ste/
371b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smos so// grogs po dag yongasu
371b3(dkon brtsegs): skyebs shig/ grogs po dag yongasu skyobs shig/ de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gi bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grog po dag ma 'jig
371b4(dkon brtsegs): shig/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ khyed cag deng la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub
371b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ga la ba der song shig dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jig pa stsol bar mdzad do//
371b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces smras nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'khor bdud sdig cin 'bum phrag zer
371b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bum dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs pa nas lag pa khar ba la rten bzhin du 'dong zhing skad cig zang gcig yud tsam gcig
371b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAg kya thub pa ga la ba der dong te lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das
372a1(dkon brtsegs): / la thams cad kyi sgra skad mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag las/
372a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskyab tu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongasu bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongasu bsgrags pa ni lags kyi
372a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de lta ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam pa la gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming zos na/ bdag cag 'jigs shing
372a4(dkon brtsegs): sngangs skrag ska bar gyur te/ 'pho 'pho bar snyam du 'tshal shing / ma mchis par 'gyur ba snyam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud sdig can
372a5(dkon brtsegs): de gla la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ sdig can de de bzhin no// ci skad smras pa de bzhin te/ ci ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su sman pa dang
372a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang / dbyed par 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang / sems can rnams kyi
372a7(dkon brtsegs): rin ma mdzad mi mdad pas/ de'i phyir ci ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig du'i ming yongasu bsgrogs pa de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bus kyi mas
372a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bsgrags pas ni// khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnams par 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can de gra gis 'di
372b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di ltar lus 'khogs pa 'dis nyam zag cing ngo mtshan lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sngon
372b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gi kha dog rgyas par gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nar gyur pa/ ma 'o//
372b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du re shig 'di nyid du sdod cig dang / de khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yong su thar par byed par 'gyuraro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa ting nge
372b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de las langs te/ stan las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor ci mdun du bdar / lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma
372b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam kha' lding dang / mi 'am tse dang / lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan 'bum phrag mang por
372b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bsil zhing / me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po'i char bdag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stag gis yongasu bskor cing mang
372b7(dkon brtsegs): du bdar te/ bkod pa chen po dang / rnam par rtse ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya
372b8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsus bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dun go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu
373a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
373a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
373a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ni ci srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal
373a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing / bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i tshe na/ bcom
373a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu thugasu bskyed par yang ma gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyed kyis gang las ting nge
373a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin bgrub pa de zos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci/ 'dam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa

373b1(dkon brtsegs): lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/ de ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa de gsung bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las
373b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jigs par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos lag so// bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa// 'dun dpa

380a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ par byed do// rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang ba dag tu rtogs par byed do// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag tu rtogs par byed do// sgyu ma lta bu rtag tu rton/
380a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// rmi lam lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do// mig yor lta bur dag tu rtogs par byed// brag cha lta bur dag tu rtogs par byed// chu zhing gi snying po lta bu dag tu
380a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par byed do// ring du mi gnas pa dag dang / snying po med pa dag dang / gsog dag dang / gsob dag tu rtogs par byed// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sos
380a4(dkon brtsegs): dpas 'dod chags rtogs par byed do// zhe sdang rtogs par byed// gti mug rtogs par byed// ci ltar rtogs par byed// ce na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / ga tIg+h+ra/
380a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni yong su rtogs pas kun nas bslang ba yin par rtogs par byed do// yong su rtogs pa de dag kyang stong pa dag dang med pa dag dang / dngos po med pa dag dag dang /
380a6(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa dag dang / rnam par rig pa med par dag tu rtogs par byed// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i khams rtogs par bye'o//
380a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rtags kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rtogs par byed do// ci ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ bdag med pa stod pa dang dben par rnam par rtog par
380a8(dkon brtsegs): byed do// 'jam pa la gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa rtog par byed do// ci ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags
380b1(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa'o// sems can 'di dag ni zhe sdang spyod pa'o// sems can 'di dag ni gti mug spyod pa'o// sems can 'di dag ni cha mnyam pa spyod pa'o// zhes bya ba togs nas/
380b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la mkhas pa rtog par byed de// gang gi shes pa'i rnam par rig pa bstan pa gang yin pa de yang rtog par byed cing / rtogs nas kyang ci ltar ci ltar rnam par grol ba
380b3(dkon brtsegs): de lta de ltar chos ston to// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rtog par byed do// ci ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ sems can thams
380b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni ming tsam te/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa dang / sems can 'di dag thams cad ni/ sems can gcig pa ste/ sems can de yang sems rmed pa dang / de ltar yang
380b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub rtogs par byed pa
380b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mig dang rna ba de dag ni/ rang bzhin stong par rtogs byed kyang / rtogs snyam rtogs par mi byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang
380b7(dkon brtsegs): bya/ sna dang lce dang rang bzhin gyis/ dngos po med par rtogs byas kyang // rtogs snyam rtog par mi byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// shes rab can gyis
380b8(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ni// yid ni stong par rtogs byed cing // rtogs nas yang dag ston byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag dang // ro dang
381a1(dkon brtsegs): reg bya yid 'ong rnams// thams cad stong par rtogs byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// gzugs dang tshor ba rtogs byed cing //
381a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyang ni de bzhin te// 'du shes kyang ni byed rnams dang rnam shes ni// sgyu ma lta bur rtog par byed// lnga phung rmi lam lta bu dang / mtshan nyid med par mtshan gcig
381a3(dkon brtsegs): pa// rtogs kyang rtogs snyam mi rtog pa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// nang ni 'byung ba ma yin te/ spros pa med cing 'dus ma byas// de dag ming gis bstan pa
381a4(dkon brtsegs): ste tata ming de dngos po yod ma yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang kun rtogs gis/ kun nas bslang ba rtogs par byed/ rtogs pa de yang byang min te/ gtan du dngos po
381a5(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin// gti mug rnam par rtogs las byung // rnam par rtog pa rgyu las skyes// rgyu yang lta bas bskyed pa ste// lta ba de yang dmigasu med/ khams gsum zad
381a6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ste// de ni med par rtog par byed// 'di ni 'pho ba 'ga' med pa// byang chub sems dpal zhes kyang bya// 'dod khams grub pa ma yin te/ rnam par rtogs
381a7(dkon brtsegs): pas kun nas bslang / gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin te/ de dag thams cad yod ma yin/ 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang spyod// de bzhin gti mug spyod pa dang /
381a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can spyod pa gang yin pa/ thams cad mkhas pas rtogs par byed/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig/ sems can de yang yod min par/ shes rab can gyi de
381a9(dkon brtsegs): rtogs kyang // sems can de la rlom sems med// chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba ni// phyin ci log las skye ba te// gang dag phyin ci log rtog pa/ de ni log pa'i mtshan
381b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims pha rol phyin ku ru k+Sha
381b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid do// shes pa kun las mkhas pa ni// gang gis sgra la'ang chags med pa/ chags pa med par rtog gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// rang gi sha rnam
381b3(dkon brtsegs): gtong byed kyang // de la gnas pa yod min zhing // ci bzhin rjes su rtogs myur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// tshul khrims la ni rlom sems med// sangs
381b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas tshul don gang yin pa/ skye med 'byung ba med pa yin// byams pas sems can khyab byed kyang / sems can dmis su yod ma yin// sems can don ni rjes rtos/
381b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de ni ming gis bstan pa yin// 'dus byes kun la rnam sems pa// brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas gyur cing // 'jig rten stong par rig nas ni// byang chub dam pa rtog/
381b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed// 'dus byas de ni bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // de la rten pa yod min zhing / gnas sed dmigs pa yod yin pa// de ltar mkhas pa sgom par byed/
381b7(dkon brtsegs): bag chags lta ba'i nyon mongs rnams// shes rab mtshon gyis gcod byed kyang // chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba med// gcad pa'i rlo sems yod ma yin// de nas bcom ldan
381b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed dang ldan pa/ sems dang po
381b9(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed dang ldan pa zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das
381b10(dkon brtsegs): kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis// khams gsum pa thams cad las 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa bskyed pa de ni sems
382a1(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba
382a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gi 'dod chags bskyed pa dang / zhes du skyed pa dang / gti mug bskyed pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//
382a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
382a4(dkon brtsegs): mug dag bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa lags na/ de ltar na bye ba so so'i skye bo rnams kyang sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa
382a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar de dag ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag skyed par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal
382a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ sgra'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag bskyed par mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dod chags
382a7(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis
382a8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal 'khor 'dis khyod kyi ldem po dag mi rtog shing mtshal na/ se co 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/ rnam par bye
382b1(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dab chags bya steng gi bar snang la rgyu ba de 'phur te/ song ngam/ 'og te 'dug snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/
382b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal 'phur te mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas/ de skad ces gang dag 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
382b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug byed par byed pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / rang rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams shes
382b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes bstan te/ lha'i bu gang la rten med pa de ni skye ba yin no// gang la lhag par chags pa med pa de ni skye ba yin no// gang mngon par zhen pa med pa de ni
382b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba yin no// lha'i bu gang la rten med pa dang / lhag par chags pa med pa dang // mngon par zhen pa med pa de ni skye ba yin te// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhi
382b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni brtag tu med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni 'byung ba med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni ngo bo
382b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni 'ong ba med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de
382b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med pa'i gzhi yin// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni skye ba med pa'i bzhi yin// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa'i gzhi yin// skye ba zhes bya ba de
383a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba zhes bya ba de ni blang ba med pa'i bzhi
383a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni rdul med pa'i gzhi min no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni rlom sems med pa'i bzhi yin no//
383a3(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni spyod pa med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni bdong du med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni mi phyed pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes
383a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni yi ge med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzung 'a med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gnas pa med pa'i gzhi yin no// skye ba zhes bya
383a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni dor ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin no// gzhi ni las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni dor ba med pa'i bzhin no// skye ba zhes bya ba de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gzhi yin te/
383a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de la chos rlom sems su mi byed// mngon par zhen par mi byed// sems par mi byed/ shes par mi byed/ lta bar mi byed/ nyan par mi byed/ rnam par shes par
383a7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed// len par mi byed// gtong bar mi byed/ 'grog blarar+ya mi byed kha gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yin no// lha'i bu de lta bas na/
383a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sa tshul de dang / chos kyi dbyings de dang / mnyam pa nyid de dang / mtha' de dang / thabs la mkhas pa des 'dod chags bskyed par bya'o//
383a9(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang gti mug skyed par bya'o// mig gi rten skyed par bya'o// yid kyi rten gyi bar du skyed par bya'o// gzugs la lhag par nags pa bskyed par bya'o// rnam par shes
383b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la zhag par chags pa'i bar du bskyed par bya'o// ming bskyed par bya'o// gzugs bskyed par bya'o// rgyu bskyed par bya'o// lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad bskyed par bya'o//
383b2(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa bskyed par bya'o// srid pa'i sred pa bskyed par bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'jug pa'i bar du bskyed par bya'o// 'dod par
383b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan lnga bskyed par bya'o// khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa bskyed par bya'o// ngar 'dzin paH// nga yir 'dzin pa bskyed par bya'o// 'jig tshogs bskyed par bya'o//
383b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba bskyed par bya'o// lta ba'i rnam pa drug bcu rtsa gnyis bskyed par bya'o// sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa dang / cho su 'du shes pa dang / dge 'dun du 'du
383b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa bskyed par bya'o// bdag du 'du shes pa dang // gzhan du 'du shes pa bskyed par bya'o// sar 'du shes pa bskyed par bya'o// nur 'du shes pa dang / med du shes
383b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rlung du 'du shes pa dang / rnam khar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa bskyed par bya'o// phyin ci log pa ni bskyed par bya'o// sgrib pa lnga dang /
383b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes paM gnas pa bzhi dang // log pa nyid brgyad dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams bskyed par bya'o// lha'i bu mdor na byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa
383b8(dkon brtsegs): cad dang yong su rtogs pa 'ad dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang / spros pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang / 'dzin pa thaMd dang
384a1(dkon brtsegs): chos de la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / lhags par chags pa med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba zhes bya ba yin par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
384a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// 'jam dpal gang gis phyir khyod kyi 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang klung gi bye ma snyed
384a3(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems dang po bskyed pa 'di bstan pa legs log so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri
384a4(dkon brtsegs): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur pas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa 'di bstan pa'i sems skye ba 'di
384a5(dkon brtsegs): ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang tshungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ci skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu gang
384a6(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi nga la bram ze'u khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skal pa grangs med pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
384a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro zhes bya bar lung bstan pa'i de'i tshe/ sha ri'i bung sems skye ba 'di dang bral bar ma
384a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ sha ri'i bu de na ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skye ba de ni 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pas ci skad
384b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems skye
384b2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad ni sems dang po skye ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sems skye ba thams cad ni/ sems dang po skye ba lag so// de ci
384b3(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sems skye ba thams cad ni/ skye ba ma mchis pa lags/ skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
384b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po skye ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri sum stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la zod pa thob po// dge slong
384b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu dud phyur phrag drug gi chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
384b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
384b7(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pas/ sems can 'di snyed kyi don gyis pa ni 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa bka' ba bgyid pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ brdzun
384b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po kho bo ni dka' 'byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad byed pa med pa/ ma byas pa bya ba med
385a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pas/ kho bo ni chos 'ga' yang mi byed/ 'jigs par mi byed pa'i phyir ro// kho bo ni sems can 'ga' yang grol bar mi byed/ 'ching bar mi byed/
385a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang de skad ces bka' ba byed pa yin no// zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po kho bo//
385a3(dkon brtsegs): ni dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang ma yin// dgra bcom pa rnams kyang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po
385a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dka' ba byed pa yin no// zhes yang dag par smra brjod par gyur na/ de dag ni yang dag par smra brjod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
385a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma rnyed mi rnyes brnyed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
385a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis ma rnyed mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis rnyed pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas thams
385a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ci zhig ma brnyes/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de dag ma brnyes so// sems can ma rnyes so// srog ma brnyes so// gang zag ma brnyes/
385a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa ma brnyes so// chad pa ma rnyes so// phung po rnams marnye so// khams rnams ma rnye so// skye mched rnams ma brnyes so// ming ma n+te so// gzugs ma brnyeso// 'dod gi
385b1(dkon brtsegs): khams ma rnyes so// gzugs kyi khams ma rnye so// gzugs med pa'i khams ma brnyes so// rtog pa dang yong su rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rgyu dang skye ba rnams ma brnyes//
385b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log rnams ma rnyes so// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug mya brnyes so// 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol ma rnyeso// ngar 'dzin pa dang nga'ir 'dzin pa
385b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ma brnyes te/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po mdor na chos thams cad ma brnyes/ ma bshig ma dkrol ma bzung ma gtang / ma sbyar ma phye'o// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rnams
385b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs des na/ khyod kyi 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma rnyes pa gang yin pa de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis/ rnyed par rig par bya ste/
385b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma mdzad pa gang yin pa/ nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas pa gang
385b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams byed do// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po rtog/
385b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// chad pa byed do// kun tu sbyor ba byed do// mngon par gnas pa byed do// rlom sems byed do// sems pa byed do// skye ba byed do// 'jig pa byed
385b8(dkon brtsegs): len pa byed do// 'dor ba byed do// 'phro ba byed de// rtog pa byed// rje su chags pa byed do// khang khro ba byed do// khengs pa byed do// 'dud par byed do// btsun pa
386a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ma mdzad mi mdzad par mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag byis
386a2(dkon brtsegs): ba so so'i skye bo rnams byed pas na/ de'i phyir de dag ni bka' ba byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol
386a3(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mi skye ba'i bzod pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod zhes bgyi ba
386a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni gang lags/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni ci zhig 'thob// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal thob pa
386a5(dkon brtsegs): ci yang med pa'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa de ni 'thob pa med pa ste/ thob pa med pa/ thob pa dang bral
386a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mthob pa/ ma bsheg pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya ba de ni chos thams skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang /
386a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa med pa zhes
386a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad bdag po med pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thaMd blang ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
386b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad 'dre
386b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad rdul med cing namakha' mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad dbyer med cing gcad du
386b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par byang ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
386b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad 'dod tshogs dang bral ba dang /
386b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas
386b6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa dang // chos thams cad ma brtag pa dang / rnam par ma rtag pa dang / ma brloms pa dang / ma spros pa dang / ma bsam pa dang / ma byas
386b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / stob med pa dang / nyam rung ba dang / gsog dang gsob dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / zag cha lta bu dang / mig yod lta bu dang / chu shing gi stong po lta bu dang /
386b8(dkon brtsegs): chu bur lta bu dang / dbu ba rdos pa lta bu zhes bya ba bzod cing de dag ni chos rnams kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa rnams kyang ma yin te/ ming gis brjod pa kho na
386b9(dkon brtsegs): N+ya smig rgyu lta bu dang /
387a1(dkon brtsegs): @#yin zhing ming de yang g.yo ba med pa/ rang bzhin me gyis dben pa yin no// zhes bya ba de ltar bzod par byed/ mos par byed/ yid ches par byed/
387a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par byed/ rtogs par byed cing // nem nur mi byed/ the tsom mi za la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur bar lus kyis reg par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing
387a3(dkon brtsegs): lugs kyang mi dmigs/ gnas pa yang mi dmigs pa de ni 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad rab tu mi rgyu ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i chos la
387a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ chos gang gis kyang smras par bgyir ma mchis pa de ni
387a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa zhes bya'o// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal chos gang zhig smra bar bgyid/
387a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mig ni gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dag gis smras par byed do// rna ba ni sgra bdag gis so// sna ni/
387a7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis so// lce ni ro dag gis so// lus ni reg bya dag gis so// lha'i bu yid ni chos yid du 'ong ba dag gis smras par byed//
387a8(dkon brtsegs): nga mi 'ong ba
387b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mig gis gzugs mthong ba yang mtshan mar 'dzin pad+ma byed/ mngon rtags su 'dzin par mi byed/ rtogs par mi byed/
387b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtogs par mi byed/ rjes su chags par mi byed// khong khro bar mi byed/ gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong par shes par byed cing rlom sems su mi byed/
387b3(dkon brtsegs): smras par mi byed// de bzhin rna bas sgra thos pa dang / snas dri rnams pa dang / lces ro myang ba dang // lus kyis reg bya reg pa dang / yid kyis chos shes
387b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mtshan mar 'dzin par byed/ mngon rtags su 'dzin par mi byed/ rtogs par mi byed/ rnam par rtogs par mi byed/ rjes su chags par mi byed// khong khro bar mi bye/
387b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rang bzhin gyis stong par shes par byed cing rloms sems su mi byed/ smras par mi byed do// lha'i bu de ltar skye mched drug po dag la chags par mi byed/ smras
387b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed de/ smras par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos rnams la skye ba 'am/
387b7(dkon brtsegs): mi skye bar mi rtog go// chos rnams la zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am// kha ma ma tho ba med pa 'am/
387b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas su mi rtog ste// gang gi tshe mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/
388a1(dkon brtsegs): grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar srog chags drug khri nyis stong bla med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes// byang chub sems khri nyis stong gis
388a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
388a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal sa nas sar 'phar bas nas sar 'phar ba zhesmra bya'o// ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa nas sad 'bar bar bgyid/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sa
388a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sar 'bar ba byed pa gang yin pa de la dris shig/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sa nas sa 'phar zhing sa bcu pa'i bar du gnod
388a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed dam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o// zhes gsungs pa la mos san/
388a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal mos so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ci sgyu ma dang sprul pa sa nas sar 'bar zhing / sa bcu pa'i bar du gnon tam// lpa
388a7(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lag so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgyu ma dang sprul pas nas sar 'phar bar gyur pa de'i tshe// kho bo yang nus
388a8(dkon brtsegs): sar 'pher bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta mod kyi sa nas
388b1(dkon brtsegs): sar 'bar ba bstan par bya'i// 'phar ba ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas chos rnams ni chos rnams su mi 'pho ba'i phyin te/ gzugs ni tshe
388b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'pho// tshor ba yang gzugs su mi 'pho// gzugs ni 'du shes su mi 'pho// 'du shes kyang gzugs su mi 'pho/ gzugs ni 'du byed rnams su mi 'pho// 'du byed
388b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang gzugs su mi 'jo// gzugs ni rnam par shes par mi 'gro// rnam par shes pa yang gzugs su mi 'pho/ tshor ba ni 'du shes mi 'pho// 'du shes kyang
388b4(dkon brtsegs): tshor bar mi 'pho/ tshor ba ni 'du byed rnams su mi 'pho/ 'du byed rnams kyang tshor bar mi 'pho/ tshor ba ni rnam par shes par mi 'pho/ rnam par shes pa yang tshor bar mi 'ong//
388b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ni 'du byed rnamasu mi 'pho// 'du byed rnams kyang 'du shes su mi 'pho// 'du shes ni rnam par shes par mi 'pho/ 'du byed rnams kyang rnam par shes par mi 'gro/
388b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa yang ra du byed rnams su mi 'pho// mig ni rna bar mi 'pho/ rna ba yang mig tu mi 'pho/ mig ni snar mi 'pho/ rnar yang mig tu mi 'pho/ mig ni lcer mi 'pho/
388b7(dkon brtsegs): skye yang mig tu mi 'pho// mig ni lus su mi 'pho/ lus kyang mig tu mi 'pho// mig ni yid du mi 'pho// yid kyang mig tu mi 'pho// rna ba ni sna mi 'pho/ sna yang
388b8(dkon brtsegs): rna bar mi 'pho/ rna ba ni lcer mi 'pho// lce yang rna bar mi 'pho// rna ba ni lu su mi 'a'o// lus kyang rna bar mi 'pho/ rna ba ni yid du mi 'pho// yid kyang rna bar mi 'gro/
388b9(dkon brtsegs): sna ri lcer mi 'phro// lce yang snar mi 'pho// sna ni lus su mi 'pho/ lus kyang snar mi 'pho// sna ni yid du mi 'pho/ yid kyang snar mi 'phon/ lce ni lus su mi 'gro/ lus
389a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang lder mi 'pho// lceni yid du mi 'pho// yid kyang lcer mi 'pho// lus ni yid du mi 'gro/ yid kyang lcer mi 'gro// lus ni yid du mi 'jo/
389a2(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang lus su mi 'pho zhing / chos de dag gi spyod yul tha dad pa bems po sems pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtswa dang rtsig pa lta bu snang ba/ sgyu ma
389a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu rnam par rig pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ de dag ni 'pho bar mi byed/ 'ong bar mi byed/ 'gro bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu byad
389a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang de ltar shes par byed pa de ni chos gang la yang 'pho bar mi byed cing / sar yang rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sar 'phar bar yang mi mthong / sa yod
389a5(dkon brtsegs): su spong bar mi byed de/ 'pho ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub las ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad bzod ma nas rnam
389a6(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni 'pho ba med cing 'jig pa med cing 'jig pa med pa'i phyir te// lha'i bu de ni byang
389a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i rnams kyis nas sar 'phar ba yin no// lga'i bu 'di sa ste dper na// sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig mngon par sgrub
389a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ der sgyu ma'i mi zhig mngon par sprul nas// der sgyu ma'i mi zhig zhugs par gyur na/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ der zhugs pa 'ga' yang yod sum/
389b1(dkon brtsegs): 'am// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu byang chub sems pa'i sa bcu 'bar ba yang de bzhin du blta bar
389b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal la la shig rab tu byung ba'i slad du khyod
389b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bang du mchos na/ rab tu 'byung ba de la khyod ci skad gsungs shing de rab tu ni ji ltar 'byin// rdzogs par brten par ni ji ltar mdzad/ tshul khrims kyi phung
389b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni ji ltar sbyor/ bslab pa'i lung ni ji ltar 'bog par mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir kho bo'i thad du 'ongs na
389b5(dkon brtsegs): de la kho bos 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod rab tu byung ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pa/ de lta na kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo ngo zhes smra'o// de ci'i
389b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu gang rab tu 'byung ba de ni 'dod pa'i khams su gnas pa 'am/ gzugs kyi kham su gnas pa 'am/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gnas pa la
389b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gnas pa yin la/ gnas dgu la sbyong ba'i rigs kyi bu ni chos mngon gsum du byed pa'i phyir te/ lhang bu dgu gang zhe na/ gang
389b8(dkon brtsegs): la yang mi gnas pa de ni sems nye bar dmigs par mi byed pa dang / gang sems nye bar dmigs par mi byed pa de ni rab tu byung bar mi 'dod pa dang / gang
390a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ni/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pa dang / gang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pa de ni
390a2(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba dang / gang mi skye ba de ni skye bsngal zad pa dang / gang sdug bsngal 'bad pa de ni gtan bzad pa dang / gang gtan gzad pa de ni mi zad pa dang / gang mi zad pa
390a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni zad par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang zad par mi 'gyur ba de ni mamakha' yin pa ste/ lnga'i bu kho bo ni rigs kyi bu de la de srung sla'o// rtswa'i bu gzhan yang la la zhig rab
390a4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba'i phyir kho bo'i zad du 'ongs na// de la kho bo 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod rab tu 'byung ba'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni
390a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ de rnams par me dkrugs shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod skra 'dreg pa ci byed pa de lta na/ khyod legs par rab tu byung ba yin no// zhes smra'o//
390a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal khyod ci la dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni gcad du med pa dang / dbyer
390a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir chos ston par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig gcod par mi bgyid cing ci zhig 'byed par mi byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha
390a8(dkon brtsegs): bu gzugs ni gcod par mi byed cing 'byed par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni gcod par mi byed cing 'byed
390b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do// lha'i bu gang 'di snyam du bdag gi skra breg go// snyam du sems de ni/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa de la gnas pa yin pas/ ngar 'dzin pa dang /
390b2(dkon brtsegs): da'ir 'dzin pa la spyod pa dag gis ni mnyam pa nyid mi thong ste/ bdag tu dmigs pa yod na skar dmigs par 'gyur la/ skar dmigs pa yod na sems can du dmigs
390b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yod/ sems can du dmigs par 'gyur zhing / sems can du dmigs pa yod na 'dreg pa'i 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gang la bdag tu dmigs
390b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la gzhan du dmigs pa med do// gang la gzhan du dmigs pa med pa de la dar 'dzin pa med do// gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa des nga'ir 'dzin pa spangs so//
390b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis dnga'ir 'dzin pa spangs pa de rnam par mi rtog go/ gang la rnam par mi rtog pa de mi 'gyur ro// gang mi 'gyur ba de ni spros pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa
390b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni len mi 'dor mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed/ mi gcod mi 'byed mi sbyor/ mi 'bral mi nur/ mi spong zhing / 'bri bar mi byed/ gang bar mi byed/ sdud par mi byed/
390b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phro bar mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ smra bar mi byed/ rjod par mi byed/ rab tu brjod par mi byed do// de ni yang dag pa la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus
390b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni namakha' ste/ na mkha' ni
391a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ 'jigs par mi 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir na mkha' de ni yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa ni stong pa nyid do// yang
391a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ni de bzhin nyid do// yang dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings so// yang dag pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o// yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni ma byung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ma byung
391a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir de ni ma byung ba yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir kho bo'i thad du 'ongs na/ de la kho bo 'di skad ces
391a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gal te khyod dur smig 'dzin par mi byed cing gyon par mi byed pa de ltar na/ khyod rab tu 'byung ngo // zhes smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal spyod
391a5(dkon brtsegs): las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir chos ston pa mdzad kyi/ 'dzin pa'i phyir ni ma yin//
391a6(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig mi 'dzin/ 'das dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gzugs rtag ces pa 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi 'dzin to// tshor pa dang /
391a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi 'dzin to// mig mi 'dzin to// gzugs mi 'dzin to// rna ba mi 'dzin /
391a8(dkon brtsegs): sgra mi 'dzin to// sna mi 'dzin to// dri mi 'dzin to// lce mi 'dzin to// ro mi 'dzin to// lus mi 'dzin to// reg bya mi 'dzin to// yid mi 'dzin to// chos mi 'dzin to//
391b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags mi 'dzin to// zhe sdang mi 'dzin to// gti mug mi 'dzin to// phyin ci log mi 'dzin te/ lha'i bu mdor na chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi gtong mi spong mi 'dor//
391b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang dur smrig dag la 'dzin pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de ni lta ba'i rnam pa can yin par kho bo smra ste/ lha'i bu ngur smig 'dzin pas ni rnam par dag pa 'am/ rnam
391b3(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni snyigs ma med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
391b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal snyigs ma zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras paka/ lha'i bu 'dod chags ni snyig ma'o// zhe sdang ni snyim+ba'o// gti mug ni smig ma'o// rgyu ni sdig
391b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'o// lta ba ni snyigs ma'o// ming ni snyigs ma'o// gzugs ni snyigs ma'o// 'du shes ni snyig ma'o// lhag par 'dzin pa ni sgeg ma'o// mtshan ma nid snyigs
391b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'o// spros pa ni snyigs ma'o// lha'i bu gang mi dge ba'i chos de dag yid pa mi byed pa de ni snyigs ma med pa'o// gang snyigs ma med pa de ni ci yang med pa'o//
391b7(dkon brtsegs): gang ci yang med pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// gang nyom mongs pa med pa de ni mamakha' yin no// lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par bya ba med pa/ lhag pa
391b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med pa zhes bgyin 'jam lhag par bya ba med pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par mi bya lhag par mi bya zhes bya ba ni/
392a1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ga' yang lhag par mi bya ba de ni lhag par mi bya ba zhes bya ste// lha'i bu gang dag lhag par byed pa de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par mi bya ba
392a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs te/ de na lhag par mi bya ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par bgyid/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid las
392a3(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar byed cing / mnyam pa nyid las 'das nas/ chos gang ma rnyed mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing / ma byung mi byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos de la log par gnas shing
392a4(dkon brtsegs): lhag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ces bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang // sems can dang srog dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang /
392a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang / chad pa zhes bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams shes bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang /
392a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang // 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o zhes bya bar
392a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba de 'thob pa dang / 'bras bu dang mngon sum du bya ba zhes bya bar rtog cing lhag par byed pa dang /
392a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang // lan cig phreng 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / byin mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pacad dang / rang sangs rgyas drang / sangs
392b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nyid ces bya bar rtag cang lhag par byed pa dang / 'de stong ba nyid dang / mtshanas med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par thal pa dang / 'dod chags dang
392b2(dkon brtsegs): bral bar// ne sdang bya bar rtog cig cing skrag par byed de// lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo zos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams ni lhag par bya ba de lta bu de dag la rtags cing
392b3(dkon brtsegs): lhag par byed do// gti mug can de dag rtogs par bya ba'i chos la sgro 'dogs shing yongs su rtogs par byed de/ de dag gi blo 'dogs pa la 'dun pa bzlog pa'i phyir
392b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la lhag par bya ba med pa ston pa mdzad do// de nas lha'i blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'ja
392b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis lhag par bya ba med par bstan pa 'di bshad pa legs so// legs so// bcom ldan 'das
392b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal leg so legs so// gal te bstan par bya na de skad bstan par bya'o//
392b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu la la zhig rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir kho bo'i thang
392b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la// des rgya 'dzin tsas dgas kyi thu gis ge khyod bsnyen pa rdzogs par bgyid pa ldan khyong ba tu byung badzin no// sa slag
393a1(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyo ci las dgongs te/ de skad ston// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzogs par bsnyen
393a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'di gnyis yin par gsungs te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyen pa dang / mi mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyen pa'o// de la mI mnyam pa rdzogs par
393a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa gang zhe na// gang mi mnyam par ltung ba'o// de la mi mnyam pa gang zhe na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag
393a4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin pa dang / rtag pa dang chad pa dang / nga rgyal dang / log par lta ba dang / chags pa dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug tu lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
393a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ltung ba dang / lhag par 'dzin pa dang / rlom sems dang / nye bar len pa ltung ba ste// lha'i bu mdor na mi dge ba'i
393a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad du ltung ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyi lag tu ltung ba dang / nges par 'byung bar mi shes shing / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongasu
393a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni// lha'i bu mi mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin no// de la mnyam par bya sten pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid du bab pa'o//
393a8(dkon brtsegs): de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lha'i bu rnam par thar pa'i
393b1(dkon brtsegs): sgo gsum po de dag mngon gsum du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin sgrub cing rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / kun tu rtog pa med pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa gang
393b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni lha'i bu mnyam par rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang 'dod chags sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang sel bar byed pa dang / gti mug sel bar byed pa dang /
393b3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / 'jig tshogs dang / 'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug bcu rtsa gnyis sel byed pa dang / phyin ci log rnams sel bar
393b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / nyes par spyod pa gsum dang / log pa nyid brgyad dang / kun nas mna' sems kyi dngos po dgu dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sel bar byed pa gang
393b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ yang dag par bsnyen pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na// sa bzhi la brten nas sa bon thams cad skye zhing / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang
393b6(dkon brtsegs): nags 'tshal rnams kyang skye la/ de dag 'phel ba na/ rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu de bzhin du gang dag bstan pa 'di la rdzogs par byed pa de dag kyang / rdzogs par/
393b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sa bon thams cad kyi rten yin te// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang de ni bzhin du lta bar
393b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims la brten nas/ chos mngon par rtog pa 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// ci ltar si sa sa bon rnams dang / ci ltar sman rnams rnam par 'phel
394a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la rdzogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du/ tshul khrims dang / dad pa la rten pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad skye zhing rdzogs par 'gyur te/
394a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag rtogs shing / spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
394a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos thams cad kyi rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin no// lha'i bu gang de ltar rdzogs bsnyen par byed pa ni yang dag par rdzogs par bsnyen par byed pa
394a4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ mi mnyam par mi yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la kho bos 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod bslab pa len
394a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa de lta na/ khyod bslab pa 'dod pa yin no// zhes rjes su bstan pa sbyin par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston
394a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mi blangs pa yin pas/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims len pa de ni khams gsum len pa yin no// snying bu 'di ji snyam du
394a7(dkon brtsegs): sems/ bsgrub pa de gang yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa// 'das dpal so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gang lags pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu so sor thar pa
394a8(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa gang yin/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sdom pa zhes bgyi ba ni lus sdoms pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang // yid sdom pa ste// de so sor thar pa'i sdos pa
394b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi'o// 'jams dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas mi byed byed par mi 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de la sngon po'am/
394b2(dkon brtsegs): ser po 'am/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka 'am/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes gdags par nus skam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa' de ni mal so//
394b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'o na ji skad brjod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam pal mngon par du bgyid pa mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi ste/ de ni lus
394b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi las sam/ ngag gis las sam/ yid kyi las shes gdags par rngo mi thog go// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems// gang mngon
394b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du byed pa med pa de blang bar nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal de ni ma lag so/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni de las
394b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam nas/ de skad ces gang bslab pa len par mi byed pa de bslab pa 'dod pa yin no// zhes ston to// lha'i bu lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i
394b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi de skad pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang mtha' de gnyis kyis rtogs par bya ste/ tshul khrims mi dmigs pas lhag
394b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o// sems mi dmigs pas lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o// shes rab mi dmigs pas/ lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab
395a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// sems rtog pa med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa zhes
395a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// tshul khrims rtog pa med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o// shes rab
395a3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gang gis sems ma rnyed pade
395a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims su rlom sems mi byed do// gang tshul khrims su rlom sems mi byed do// gang tshul khrims su rlom sems su mi byed pa des ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs so// gang gis
395a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa des shes rab mi dmigs so// gang gis shes rab mi dmigs pa de la the tsom thams cad mi 'byung ngo // gang la the tsom thams cad mi 'byung ba
395a6(dkon brtsegs): de bslab po// mi len to// gang la bslab pa mi len pa de bslab pa 'dod pa zhes bya'o// gang bslab pa de'i phyir mi 'ong ba'o// gang phyir mi 'ong ba de rnam par dag pa'o//
395a7(dkon brtsegs): gang rnam par dag pa de bral ba'o// gang bral ba de zag pa med pa'o// gang zag pa med pa de yang dag par zhugs pa'o// gang yang dag par zhugs pa de la bcos pa med/
395a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gtses pa med pa de na mkha'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ni bcos pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang de ltar slob de ni slob par mi byed// gang slob par mi byed
395b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni slob par byed do// gang la slob ce na/ ci la yang mi slob ste/ gang gi tshe ci la yang mi slob pa de ni yang dag pa'i bslab pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang
395b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu de ltar rab tu zhing de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen pa de la kho bos 'di skad
395b3(dkon brtsegs): ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dad pas byin pa yongasu longs spyod par byed cing / yongasu sbyong bar mi
395b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de lta na/ khyod tshul khrims yongasu dag pa yin no// zhes sla'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
395b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang len par byed pa dang / bde bar byed pa de ni sbyong bar byed do// gang dmigs par byed pa de ni sbyong bar byed do// gang rlom sems su byed pa de ni sbyong bar
395b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// gang rtogs pa byed pa de ni sbyong bar byed do// lha'i bu gang len par mi byed pa dang / bden par mi byed pa dang / dmigs par mi byed pa dang / rlom
395b7(dkon brtsegs): sems su mi byed pa dang / rtog par mi byed po de ni ci yang sbyor bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni gtan dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na/
395b8(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo rnams ni dad pas byin pa sbyong bar byed kyi/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so'i skye bo rnams ni len par byed/ bde bar byed dmig pa
396a1(dkon brtsegs): rdomasem su byed/ @bdag ni len pa yin na// sgyur du rtogs par byed/
396a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sbyin par byed pa yin no// skam du rtog par byed pas// de dag ni stong bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir te/
396a3(dkon brtsegs): thar spyong par byed ce na/ srid pa la glo bar skye 'grub par byed cing / der spyod par byed do//
396a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dag 'acom pa dag ni sred pa gzhan du gtogs lus gzhan 'ga' yang 'grub par mi
396a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ de dag ni ci yang sbyong bar mi byed do// // de dag bsod snyoms de len pa na yang /
396a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khar gsum yongasu dag pas len to// lnga'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa de
396a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ len par byed pa'i bdag gang yin pa yang mi dmigs// sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa po gang
396b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa yang mi dmigs blang bar bya ba'i bsod snyoms gang yin pa yang mi dmigs te//
396b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ni'akhor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// lnga'i bu gang de ltar dag pa
396b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni yang sbyor bar mi byed pas na kho bo ni de las bsam nas 'di skad ces stong gsum gyi
396b4(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dad pas byin pa yongasu longs spyod par byed cing // yongs su
396b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bar byed pa de ni// 'jig rten na sbyin gnas 'os yin te/ de ni legs par rab tu
396b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yin no// / zhes ston to// gzhan yang 'ongam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
396b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// // lha'i bu de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar rdzogs par
397a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de la/ kho bo 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu gal te khyod dgon par mi gnas shing grong du ma yin/ zag nye bar ma yin/ thag ring
397a2(dkon brtsegs): bar ma yin lam gol bar ma yin/ skye bo mang po'i dbus su ma yin/ 'du 'dzi'i nang du ma yin yo dben par ma yin la/ bsod snyoms spyod par yang mi byed/
397a3(dkon brtsegs): mgron du yang mi 'gro/ phyag dar khrod par yang mi byed/ spang ba'i lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang mi 'chang / bla gab med pa yang mi byed/ 'dod pas chung bar mi byed/
397a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chen che bar yang mi byed/ chog shes par mi byed/ chog mi shes par yang mi byed/ rab tu dben par mi byed/ rab tu mi dben par yang mi byed/ shing drung pa yang
397a5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ gnas khang du yang mi gnas/ sman bkus te bor ba yang mi sten/ mar sar dang sbrang rtsi yang mi sten cing / rigs kyi bu gal te khyod sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi chos de
397a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu thams cad yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug pa mi byed pa dang ltan khyod sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu gang 'di snyam du bdag ni phyag dar
397a7(dkon brtsegs): khrod pa'o// bsod snyoms pa'o// shing drung ba'o// bdag ni sman bkus ste// bor pas chog go shes pa'o// bdag ni 'dod pa chung ba'o// bdag ni chog shes pa'o// bdag ni bzhon pa
397a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// bdag ni bla gab med pa'o// bdag ni sbyang pa dang ldan pa'o// snyam du sems pa de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi rnam par g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu yang dag par
397b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral na po
397b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa lhag par g.yo ba de dag mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la rnam par rtog pa med pas bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs na sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams su dmigs pa lta ci smos
397b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na gang sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug cing rloms sems su mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed pa de ni sbyangs
397b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa yin no// zhes smra bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge slong gang 'dod chags sbyong ba dang / zhe sdang sbyong ba dang \u0f7fgti mug sbyong ba dang \u0f7fkhams gsum sbyong ba dang / nang gi skye
397b5(dkon brtsegs): mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dag sbyong bar byed cing / ci nas kyang mi len mi 'dor/ mi sgom mi se dang / rnam par mi sel ba de ltar sbyong bas byed pa de ni spangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/
397b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes khos smras pa'i phyir ro// lha'i gzhan yang de ltar rab tu byung zhing de ltar rdzogs par bsnyen pa bsnyen pa de la kho bo 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi
397b7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yang mi bsgom/ yang dag par spongs pa bzhi yang ma yinaHrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yang ma yinaHdbang po lnga yang ma yin/ stobs lnga yang ma yin/
397b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag lags lnga bdun yang ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang mi bsgoms zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang mi bsgom/
397b9(dkon brtsegs): mngon gsum du mi byed/ rnams par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang mi bsgom/ mngon gsum du byed pa de lta na/ khyod byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chog kyi chos rnams bsgoms pa yin no zhes smra'o//
399a1(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon gsum du byar med
399a2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhes na/ lha'i bu na mi skye ba'i chos shing rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ni bsgoms par byang med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir nas na/ mi skye ba ni
399a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon gsum du byar mi mu pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba ni chos thams cad dran pa med pa'i yid la byed pa med pas de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
399a4(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// lha'i bu dge slong gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i la yang mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi gnas pa'i ni/ gnad med pa la
399a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i dge slong dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa zhes bya'o// ci ltar bsgom zhe na/ ci nas sgom par mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed pa de ltar sgom par byed pas/ de'i phyir
399a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par byed pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// / lha'i bu gang gis tshe dge slong rnal 'byor pa rnal
399a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor spyod pas myi dmigs pa de'i tshe na/ rlom sems su mi byed do// gang gi tshe rloms sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe sgom par mi byed do// gang gi tshe bsgoms par mi byed pa de'i tshe/
399a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon gsum du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i byang chub kyi mchog dang mthun pa'i chos gsum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa/
399a9(dkon brtsegs): rkyen las skyes pa/ mtshan ma nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/ brjod kyang rung mi brjod kyang ming gis yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ byang chub kyi
399a10(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni bden pa mthong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bgyis
399b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ ci ltar na dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis che rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis tshul gcig
399b2(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyor bar byed na/ de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe ci la yang mi spyod na/ de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o// ci la mi spyod ces na 'di lta ste/ chos thams
399b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ 'jigs rten 'di la mi sbyong / 'jig rten pha rol la mi spyod/ khams gsum la mi spyod de/ de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gang gi
399b4(dkon brtsegs): che rnal 'byor spyod pa chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/ 'byed par mi byed na/ de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'khor de las dge slong stong phrag mang po dag 'di skams
399b5(dkon brtsegs): du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas rnams par thar pa'i sgo gsum rtogs pas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun
399b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon gsum du byas pas/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 'di'i bkags par gyur na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
399b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di ji ltar rung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di 'gal ba 'am/ cig du ma gyur grangs mnyams ste the tsom gyis sems skye bar 'gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
399b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag gis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ gnas rten sha re bu la smras pa/ btsun pa sha bu khyong ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid ces pa dang pa dang ldan pa/
400a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin no// btsun pa sha ri bu gang gi tshe khyod kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe
400a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bden pa bzhi po dag dmigs pa'am/ mngon sum du byas pa 'am/ bsgom pa'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / rnams par thar
400a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo gsum po dag dmigs pa 'am/ mngon sum du byas pa 'am/ bsgom pa gcig yod dam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal do ni med de/ gang mngon sum
400a4(dkon brtsegs): du bya ba 'amaHbsgom par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya ba'i chos 'di ni 'ga' yang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ chos thams cad ni bla du med pa/ ma skyes pa
400a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa med pa stong pa yin pas stong pas stong pa nyid mngon gsum mi byed pa'i phyir ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i na dge slong sum stong len pa med par zag pa rnams
400a6(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnams par grol lo// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal de ni 'di lta ste
400a7(dkon brtsegs): bye bas go ba zab mo lnga stong pa nyid la gnas pas bstan pa lags te/ legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 2lha'i bu kho bo ni bye bas go ba ma yin gyis/
400a8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni phye bas go ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ 'di ltar de dag ni 'byed pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// ci zhig 'byed pa byed ce na/ sems can
400b1(dkon brtsegs): dpral ba 'byed par byed do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'byed par byed do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'byed bar byed do// khams gsum pa byed par byed de/ de ltar 'byed pa rnams
400b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun tu 'byed pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no// lha'i bu byis pa rnams ni 'dod chags kun tu 'byed par byed do// zhe sdang kun tu 'byed do// gti mug kun tu
400b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byed par byed do// lta ba kun tu 'byed par byed do// ming dang gzugs kun tu 'byed par byed do// lha'i bu sangs rgyas rnams ni phye bas go ba ma yin no// nyan thos rnams kyang ma yin/
400b4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams kyang ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu byis pa rnams ni phye bas go ba yin no// lha'i bu'i smras pa/ 'jam
400b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'o na ci khyod rnam par spros na go ba lags sam/ 'jam dpel gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na kri ba lags sam/
400b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na tshig lhur len pa lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de
400b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshigs lhur len pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las ngogongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub
400b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni yi ge gcig dang / tshig gcig las kyang mi g.yo la/ yi ge de nyid dang / tshig de nyid don dang tshul dang sgo dang / lam yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
401a1(dkon brtsegs): shes par byed de/ 'di ni stong pa'o// zhes bya bar shes par byed/ 'di ni dben pa'o zhes bya bar shes par byed/ 'di ni dngos po med pa
401a2(dkon brtsegs): 'o zhes bya bar shes par byed/ 'di ni skye ba med pa'o zhes bya bar shes par byed cing / ci nas kyang rnam par shes par mi byed/ rig par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed pa
401a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shes par byed pas/ de'i phyir tshig lhur len pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin
401a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'jam dpal deng ni lha te/ gzungs thob pas bstan pa yin te/ legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzungs
401a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ma lagaso// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams ni gzungs thob pa lagaso kyi/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
401a6(dkon brtsegs): ni bzungs ma thob pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams ni 'dzin par bgyid pa'i slad du ste/ ci zhig 'dzin par
401a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i slad du ste/ ci zhig 'dzin par bgyid ce na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa 'dzin par bgyid do// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu/
401a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par bgyid do// chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtags par 'dzin pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / gti mug 'dzin par bgyid do// ma rig pa dang /
401b1(dkon brtsegs): dang phyi'i skye mched drug
401b2(dkon brtsegs): srid 'a dang / phung po lnga dang / 'jig tshogs dang // khams bco brgyad dang / nang gi skye mched drug 'dzin par bgyid de// rtog pa dang rnams pa rtog pa dang / yongs/
401b3(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dag pa 'dzin par bgyid de// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ byis pa rnams ni gzungs thob pa lags so// rtog ge rnams
401b4(dkon brtsegs): ni rtags pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dag 'dzin par bgying bas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slang du byas pa rnams ni// gzungs
401b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa rnams chos gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das dro'i slang du byis pa rnams ni/ gzungs thob ze 'ams//
401b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du shes na/ byis pa rnams chos gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rnams 'dzin par mi mdzad/ nyan thos rnams kyang mi bgyid/ rang sangs
401b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang mi bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mi bgyid pas/ de'i srad du byis pa rnams ni gzungs thob pa lags so// ngo ci'i srang du ne na/ 'di ltar
401b8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams ni legs par 'dzin pa la gas pa 'dzin par bgyid kyi/ sangs rgyas rnams nami mdzad/ nyan thos rnams ci mi bgyid/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang
401b9(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mi bgyid pa'i slad du'o// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces/
402a1(dkon brtsegs): smras so// 'jam dpal gal te khyod gzungs thob pa ma lags na/ 'o na ci khyod rtogs pa phul ba lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
402a2(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni rtogs pa phul ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ lha'i bu khyod rtogs pa gang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyam thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang
402a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / mi mkhyen pa de tsam du phul ba'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo gang dag yin pa de dag ni rtogs
402a4(dkon brtsegs): ba phul ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni mngon par chags pa'i rtogs pa can yin la/ mkhas pa rnams ni rtogs pa phul ba dang ldan pa'i
402a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang re shig mngon par chags pa'i rtogs pa can du ston na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos ste/ lha'i bu de lta bas na/
402a6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni rtogs pa phul ba yin gyi/ gzungs thob pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bos ni gang zung bar bya ba chung zad kyang ma rnyed pa'i phyir ro// bstan pa'i nga bshad pa na//
402a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de las dge slong lnga brgya tsam chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ma rtogs te/ spangs shing 'gal bar byas nas/ rang rang gi lus dri dag nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po
402a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams su lhung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag chos
402a9(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnams grang 'di ma rtogs te/ spangs shing 'gal bar byas nas rang rang gis lus 'di dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su lhung bar gyur kyis/ de lta bu gnas
402b1(dkon brtsegs): dun pa ga'i'i du khyong sa rtog shig/ gang sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba cos de lta bu 'ga' yang dmib du med da de ci'i phyir shes chos thams cad skye bamed pa byar/
402b2(dkon brtsegs): zab mo dag ma ston par so sor rtogs te ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun po sha ri'i bu gzhan yang de skad ces so sor rtogs te/ ston cig ces zer ba ni/
402b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bdag tu lta ba la brten pa 'am/ sems can du lta ba lnga brtan pa'am/ srog tu lta ba la brtan pa 'am/
402b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu lta ba la brten pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i gang ga'i klung
402b5(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yod byed thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas la/ gang rtags chos zab mo shes par dka' ba 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa 'di/
402b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu 'di thos shing / chos stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med
402b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa 'di lta bu'i da thos nas spangs te sems can dmyal ba rnams su lhung bar gyur pa ni/ btsun pa
402b8(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo 'di thos nas spangs te/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su lhung ba de ches myur bar de dag nas ldang zhing rnams par thar par 'gyur
402b9(dkon brtsegs): gyi rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bdag tu lta ba la brten pa chos 'di ma thos par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi'i klang gyi bye ma
402b10(dkon brtsegs): snyed la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ni de lta ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jam dpal blon nur dpral la legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ thos pa 'di ni sangs
402b11(dkon brtsegs): 'jam legaso log so
403a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// thos pa 'di ni rgyun tu bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// zos pa 'di ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o//
403a2(dkon brtsegs): zos pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// thos pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ bdag tu lta ba la brten pa dang / de dmigs
403a3(dkon brtsegs): ba can la ni 'thob pa 'am mngon par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu dge
403a4(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag ni sems can dmyal ba de dag nas ches myur bar ldangs zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ 'di na mi ti mug can dmigs pa'i lta ba dang ldan
403a5(dkon brtsegs): pa the tsom du gyur pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa de dag ni/ de lta ma yin no/ sha ri'i bu de lta smod kyi de bzhi ni de dag gi yos su mya ngan las
403a6(dkon brtsegs): 'da' ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin te/ myur du rnam par thar par ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ 'di ltar chos zab mo dag ma pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs
403a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rna blag te chos zab mo 'di mnyan nas ma rtog shing spangs te sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag ni ches myur bar rnam par thar par 'gyur
403a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ dmigs pa can the tsom du gyur pa gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin no// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
403b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod bdag dang tshang pa mtshungs pa spyod zhed dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i du gal te khyod tshangs par spyod pa mi len cing / tshangs par spyad pa
403b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod par mi byed pa de lta na/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'dzam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam
403b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang len par byed pa de ni spyod par byed kyi/ gang len par mi byed pa de na ci yang spyod par mi byed do// lha'i bu gang tshangs par sbyang ba dmigs
403b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de ni spyod par byed kying / gang dmigs par mi byed pa de ni ci yang spyod par mi byed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod tshangs par ma
403b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod/ lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshangs par mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo ni tshangs pa yang ma yin la/
403b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir kho bo tshangs par mi spyod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa' de ni 'di lta ste/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pas bstan
403b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te/ legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te kho bo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par gyur na ni// de lta na
403b8(dkon brtsegs): thogs par yang 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci tsam du bdag gi yod pa dang / ci tsam du bdag gis 'angon par zhen pa yod pa de tsam du thogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
404a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ gzhan sang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod sems can thams cad srog
404a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bral bar byed cing mtshon ca yang thogs par mi byed / ral gyi yang ma yin/ bong ba yang ma yin/ dbyug pa yang thogs par mi byed pa de lta na/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs
404a3(dkon brtsegs): par spyod par 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can sems can shes bya ba ci zhig
404a4(dkon brtsegs): yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can sems can zhes bgyi ba ni 'di lta ste/ ming tsam dang / 'dzin pa'i 'du shes tsam lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
404a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu de lta bas na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsang bar bya'o// sems can du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// srog tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes
404a6(dkon brtsegs): gsad par bya'o// gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o// ming du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gdus par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal cis dgus pa/
404a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// 'jas dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyi mtshon gyi gsad par byag/ shes rab kyi mtshon de ci nas 'dzin pa med pa dang / gcod pa med pa de ltar
404a8(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya zhing de ltar gsad par bya'o// lha'i bu rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyi 'di ltar gang gis bdag gis 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes gsad pa des
404b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad pa gang yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i
404b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gal to mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te 'jug cing / nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad
