404b5(dkon brtsegs): kho bo khyod dang tshangs par spyod do// lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nag po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin snyam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bya ba ma yin mchis
404b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lhag par bya ba mi bgyid pa'i lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs shes bya ba gang yin snyam/ sgra'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
404b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste/ de ni dkar po'i phyogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras
404b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyis sgrib par nus sam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni
405a1(dkon brtsegs): lus bsams nas/ de skad ces gal te khyod nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par
405a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs te 'jug par byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// zhes ston to// gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lnga
405a3(dkon brtsegs): bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod gsad pa dang po phyir byung ba de'i mgo la mtshon gyis 'debs par byed pa de lta na/
405a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs nas de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
405a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang pa gsad pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dod pa chags ni gsang pa zhes bya'o// na sdang dang gti mug ni gsang pa zhes bya'o// nga N+Dal dang / thob da/
405a6(dkon brtsegs): chab pa dang / zag dog dag sku dang / g.yo nga/ ster sna dang lhag par 'dzin pa dang mtshan ma dang / nye bar len pa dang / 'dugs dang tsar ba ni gas dpa na
405a7(dkon brtsegs): l+h+wa na dag ni gsang pa yin gsungs s+ho// 'i tharnam 'byung ba rnal 'acung spyad pa gang 'dod dgas kyi sems skyem pa pas babyud/
405a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi par byeng pa de la ni stong par snang bas/ mi sdug pa la 'jug ya mi gyi pa sems 'di la yas skyes gang du bya pa/ yul zham sa chags
405b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gang gis chags par 'gyur zhes 'dod chags kyi sems de nyid 'byung ba drung / 'jig pa la so sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar so sor rtog par
405b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa na/ 'dod chags kyang mi dmigs/ gang la chags par 'gyur pa dang / gang gis chags par 'gyur ba de yang mi dmigs so// gang gi tshe mi dmigs
405b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i tshe mi len to// gang gi tshe mi len pa de'i tshe mi 'dor ro// gang gi tshe mi 'dor ba de'i tshe mi 'dzin mi spong ste/ de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o//
405b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / paSh+ma khyal dang / 'khro ba dang / 'chab pa dang / phrag dog dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / sa re sna dang / lhag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan
405b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / nye bar len pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i sems la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ lha'i bu gang gsad pa de lta bu skyes ma thag tu gsod par byed pa de ni/
405b6(dkon brtsegs): gsad pa dang po phyir byung ba de'i mgo la mtshon gyis 'debs pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsam nas de skad ces ston to// gzhan yang 'jam dpa'
405b7(dkon brtsegs): gnon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed/ chos mnyes par mi byed/
405b8(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgod ste de skad
406a1(dkon brtsegs): ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin
406a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyes par byar nus snyam 'am/
406a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sa smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsam nas de skad ces gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed
406a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta na/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to// lha'i bu chos chos shes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos shes bya
406a5(dkon brtsegs): kha ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos nyid lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang / chos nyid mnyes
406a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsam nas de skad ces gal te khyod chos
406a7(dkon brtsegs): mnos par mi byed pa de lta na/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs pa spyod 'dod do zhes ston to// lha'i bu dge 'dun dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/
406a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni 'dus ma gyis kyis rab tu phye ba lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ 'dus ma gyis lags so//
406b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dus ma byas mnyes par byar nus snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal
406b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas/ de skad ces gal te khyod dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes
406b3(dkon brtsegs): ston to// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas su dmigs pa de ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed do// gang chos su dmigs pa de ni chos mnyes par byed do// gang dge 'dun du
406b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ni dge 'dun mnyes par byed do// lha'i bu sangs rgyas su dmigs pa dang / chos su dmigs pa dang / dge 'dun du dmigs pa des ni sangs rgyas mnyes par
406b5(dkon brtsegs): ma byas/ des ni chos mnyes par ma byas/ des ni dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa kho na yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des de dag mi dmigs pas/ des mnyes par ma byas pa'i
406b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang dag sangs rgyas la chags pa dang / chos la chags pa dang / dge 'dun la chags pa de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par byas/ chos mnyes
406b7(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ dge 'dun mnyes par byas pa yin no// gang dag gis sangs rgyas ma dmigs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas la chags pa med pas/ de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par ma
406b8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa yin no// gang dag gis chos la ma dmigs pa de dag ni chos la chags pa med pas/ de dag gis chos mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// gang gis dge 'dun ma dmigs pa/
407a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni dge 'dun la chags pa med pas/ de dag gis dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa yin no// lha'i bu mnyes par ma byas pa mnyes par ma
407a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa zhes pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni rnam par bshig pa'i gnas yin/ de ni sems
407a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i gnas yin/ de ni ma byung ba'i gnas yin/ de ni rnam par nges pa'i gnas yin/ de ni yid byung bar ma byas pa'i gnas yin pas/ de'i phyir mnyes
407a4(dkon brtsegs): par ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de'i phyir kho bo ni de las bsams nas/ de skad ces gal te khyod sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta
407a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod do zhes ston to// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
407a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'di ltar khyod zab mo'i gnas dag ston par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/ bdag cag gi khyod la bgyis pa bzo bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod
407a7(dkon brtsegs): byos pa gzo bar ma byed cig/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci bgyis pa mi gzo bar bgyi 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu khyod
407a8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa mi gzo bar byos la byas pa gzo bar ma byed cig/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod bgyis pa ma gzo bar bgyi 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu deng
407a9(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ kho bo ni byas pa mi bzo ba yin gyis/ byas pa gzo ba ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
407b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu byis pa rnam ni rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pas na/ byis pa rnams ni gzhan dang gzhan dag gis byed pa po ste/ gang gi phyir lta ba'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag
407b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni/ byas pa gzo ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bu yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dag ni bya ba 'am/ mi bya ba gang yang mi byed de/ gang gi tshe mi byed pa de'i
407b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir de dag ni byas pa mi gzo ba zhes bya'o// ci skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa lhag par byed
407b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' la/ gzhan len par yang mi byed/ bya ba gzhan yang mi byed pas mnyam pa nyid yin no zhes gsung pas na/ de'i phyir byas
407b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi gzo ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod bzod pa bam/ 'on te chos nyid dam gang la gnas te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu brtse
407b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang ma yin/ chos nyid la yang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal 'o na khyod gang la gnas te de skad ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes
407b7(dkon brtsegs): bu lus gang la gnas pa la'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bus lus gang la gnas/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus ni de bzhin
407b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang la gnas pa de la gnas so// lha'i bu gzhan yang de skad ces khyod bzod pa 'am/ 'on te chos nyid ngam gang la gnas te de skad ston ces zer ba ni/ lha'i bu bzod pa rnas
408a1(dkon brtsegs): // bya ba ni ming ste/ ming la ni gnas par mi nus so// chos nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam rtog pa med pa ste/ de la yang gnas med do// lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs
408a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can thams cad gang la gnas/ de ston par byed pa de nyid la zhugs te ston par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la zhugs de ston la/
408a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid grang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin don
408a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyin/ ci
408a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis na/ dge sbyong dang zam ze zhes bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir
408a6(dkon brtsegs): gan/ lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi chags/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams la sang mi chags pa de ni/ dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo snga ning / lha'i bu gang mig
408a7(dkon brtsegs): las mi 'jug/ rna ba las mi 'dzag/ snga las mi 'dzag/ lce las mi 'dzag/ lus las mi 'dzag/ yid las mi 'dzag pa don dge sbyong ma yin no nam kha bo sprul/ lha'i thus
408a8(dkon brtsegs): mas pa ma tsha das par ga gas pa med pa dang / kun tu gnas pa mad kyis kun tu gdas pa gdags pa mang 'dzin sa su man nam tshas na kyang sa na
408b1(dkon brtsegs): gang bas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang ba 'gros/ rnam cing tha dang bral ba deni tham po yin no nas kho ba smra pa'i phyir ro// gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/ zas ze yang ma yin padan
408b2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba'i tshig des bstan pa de ni de yin no// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi bsgom pa/ mngon par shes
408b3(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga thob pa/ lnga zhig 'dus par gyur pa de dag da dung bzod pa thob pa ma yin pas/ gnas shing snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gnas shing rnam par ldang bar byed de/ byang chub
408b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag gis sngon pa gsad pa dang / ma gsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsad pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran shing / de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa de'i las
408b5(dkon brtsegs): lag ma yod pas/ de dag sems yongasu gdung ba des/ chos zab mo dag la mi bzod cing bdag nyid la rten te/ rnam par rtog pa kho nar byed de/ de dag gis 'di lta ste/ chos
408b6(dkon brtsegs): ma la bzod pa ma thong pas/ kun nas ldang ba de rnam par gnon par ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gdul pa'i dbang gi phyir/
408b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems bsdu bar mdzad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ lag pa gams
408b8(dkon brtsegs): pas ral gyi grangs te/ legs par bad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su bcugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpas gzhon dur gyung pas 'di sa
409a1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// 'jas dpal nga ni gsang zin cing lags par gsang zin gyis thong shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal skyes bu gang zag gis
409a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe gsad do snyam pa'i sems bskyed par byed pa'i sems skyes pa yun ring po nas gsad zin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag 'di skams du sem
409a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ 'di la bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam shed bu ni 'ga' yang med do// 'di la pha yang med
409a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yang med sangs rgyas kyang med/ chos kyang med/ dge 'dun yang med do// 'di la gang mtshams med pa byed par 'gyur ba yang 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam
409a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni mkhas pa 'dzangs pa yid gzhungs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstod pa/ bsngags pa zab mo la bzod pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
409a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sngon gyis rgyal ba lhag par bya ba byas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ ci lta bzhin du chos ston pa
409a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par smra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa yin na/ de'i mtshon rnon po thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der drug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa
409a8(dkon brtsegs): yang de skad ces 'jam dpal nga ni gsad min cing / legs par gsad zin gyis dong shig gsung ba'i phyir te/ gal te 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba dang /
409b1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / ba nas bya ba dang / ma zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba'i chos ther zug tu gnas pa 'ga' zhig yongs grub par gyur na ni/ mtshams
409b2(dkon brtsegs): meng ba 'dzin pa de sangs par 'thung ba yang yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir chos de dag ni med pa/ log par yang dag pa ma yin par bzung ba/ stong pa sgyu ma ldan
409b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ de'i phyir 'di la gang byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la byed par 'gyur ba'i byed pa 'ga' yang med do snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gis de ltar shes
409b4(dkon brtsegs): khas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/
409b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste// yongs su rtog pas kun nas bskyed
409b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la grub pa ma mchis te// chos 'di thams cad stong pa lags// bdag tu 'du shes rmongs pa rnams// log par yongs su rtog par bgyid// sngon gyi mthar ni
409b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad pa'i// sug las byis pa de yang dran// tshe rabs snga ma rnams su ni// pha ma sbyin nas bkum gyur cing // dge slong dgra bcom bkum pa yi// sug las shin tu mi
409b8(dkon brtsegs): bzad bgyis// sug las de'i rnam smin gyis// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur cing // 'gyod pa skyes par gyur pa ni// chos thos pas na rnam dag gyur// grags chen zug rngu
410a1(dkon brtsegs): @#// 'byin pa yis// bdag cag 'gyong pa bsngal mdzad pas// gang la nyon mongs ma mchis pa'i// chos dbyings rjes su rtogs par gyur/ sangs rgyas
410a2(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa ste// thub pa thabs kyis mkhyen pa mnga'// thabs des sems can thams cad kyi// 'gyod pa dag ni rnam par stsal// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pas na//
410a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la sangs rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun mi dmigs 'di la ni// pha ma mchis dgra bcom min// 'di la 'gum pa ma mchis te// 'gum pa 'ga' yang mchis ma
410a4(dkon brtsegs): lags// mnyam nyid ji bzhin 'byung ba ste// de ni chos rnams mtshan nyid lags// 'jam dbyangs shes rab chen po pa// chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis//
410a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshon cha rnon po thogs nas ni// sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs// sangs rgyas ci bzhin mtshon de bzhin// de dag gnyi ga mtshan nyid gcig/ ma skye 'byung ba ma
410a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis te// 'di la 'gum pa 'ga' ma mchis// mtshon ma thos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi
410a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed dag rnam pa drub tu gams shing // sa chen po g.yos pa yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
410a8(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'azhugs te/ mtsha zhing bzhes pa de dag // rang rang gi bzhin
410b1(dkon brtsegs): / sa shes dgas na du na byung sa sbyang margyal
410b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'dzad ces bya ba yod de/ den de
410b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ma brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shArgya thub pa shes bya ba chos ston no// 'jig rten gyi khams
410b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
410b5(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa zhig 'dug pa/ des 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ shes rab kyi ral gyis mtshon
410b6(dkon brtsegs): rnon po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su rgyugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
410b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag gis/ shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te/ ci nas kyang sems can dpag tu med pa dag/ mig rnam par dag pa dang //
410b8(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol ba dang / bzod pa skyes pa dang / byang chub la zhugs par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to// de nas ldan 'das
411a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ci nas kyang 'khor ngan sems can las dang po bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnam par rtog pa mang ba gang
411a2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ mtshon de mi mthong zhing / chos bstan pa de yang mi thos pa de ltar byin gyi rlabs byin gyis rlabs so// de nas gnas
411a3(dkon brtsegs): brten ga ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ston pa bgrod pa'i phyir btul ba'i las mi zad
411a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon par 'dus byas pa/ de khyod la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/
411a5(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kho bos las mi zad pa de lta bu ni byas na/ de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// btsun pa sha
411a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de lta mod kyis sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i las gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba der kho bos yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa sha ri'i
411a7(dkon brtsegs): bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ chos thams cad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sha ri'i bu/ 'di ltar de btsun pa nyid la
411b1(dkon brtsegs): dris/ khyod ci ltar bzod pa de ltar ston cig/ btsun pa mtshon dmigs su yod dam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam
411b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa las dmigs su yong ngam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
411b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa dmigs su yod dam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu mtshon yang med/
411b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyang med/ rnam par smin pa yang med na/ 'o na las de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi bsam pa
411b5(dkon brtsegs): des bstan pa ltar na/ las de ni gang du yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad las med pa/ rnam par smin pa med pa'i
411b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'jam
411b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ci nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu mchi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar zug spro bar mdzad gsol/
412a1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag rang rang gi sangs
412a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing rnaMs su ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu'i kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnaM su blta so// bltas pa na
412a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra snyan pa yang thos/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa/ sangs
412a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug cing / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dri ba la chos ston pa dang / de dag tu byang chub
412a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'dus pa de snyed dang / lha'i bu 'dus pa de snyed kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi
412a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'di nas kyang mi g.yo la/ thams cad du yang bzhin nye bar ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// ngo mtshar to snyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dang/
412a7(dkon brtsegs): gzho nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma shin tu bsgrubs pa'i
412a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ stan las kyang mi g.yo la/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs drag kyang ston par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
412b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par bslabs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnaMs la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du de bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de snyed du sprul pa dag sprul par byed//
412b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos 'di sgyu ma lta bur rig pa'i phyiraro// de nas btso ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
412b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam
412b4(dkon brtsegs): grang+ga 'di thos pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
412b5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa de ni dgra btso pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rna grangs 'di la mos shing yid ches pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni 'dra
412b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yino// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de ni stong pa nyid ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lagaso// de ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa ci lta ba
412b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni smyon pa ma mchis pa ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni chos kyi kyi dbyings
412b8(dkon brtsegs): ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de ni dben pa ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so// de na bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
413a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa// dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas kyang ma 'ong ba'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod par
413a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / rigs kyi bu dang rig+sas kyi bu mo dag gi rnam du grags par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rab tu gsol/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi
413a3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten khas 'di na// lha dang mi rnaMs kyi rol mo'i sgra yang ji snyed pa de dag thas cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing / shing ljon pa dethas cad las kyang
413a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs dag rab tu rgyas shing lhags par gyur to// rdzing bu dag nas kyang pad+ma mang po dag rab tu 'thon par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
413a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khas 'di yang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos shing / snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// lha bye ba
413a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / phye ma dang /
413a7(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa'i char dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'beb so// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsil zhing glu'i dbyangs mang po dag kyang bsgrag
413a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thams cad kyi thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ kha mthun par tshig 'di skad ces a la la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa'i chos a la la/ chos a pa la
413b1(dkon brtsegs): chos/ 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong ngo // sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur zhing de
413b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yino// gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par byas
413b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ zab mo la bzod pa yin// zhes kyang smra so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
413b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di byin gyis bslabs pa'i slad du snga ltas 'di dag byung ba lags na/ 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyod par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

413b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das

414a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma mchis pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa dang / srog ma mchis pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa dang / shed las

414a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang / gti mug ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ma mchis pa dang / lta ba ma mchis pa

415a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon sum du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa
415a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gram ma mchis pa dang / pha rol ma mchis pa dang / tshu rol ma mchis pa dang / thar pa ma mchis pa dang /

415a4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar/ ma grol mi sbyor mi 'grol ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

415a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma bkrol/ yongasu mya ngan las ma bzlas/ de dag gis seMs can 'ga' yang ma brnyes/ ma bshig/ chos 'ga'
415a7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma bskyed// ma bkag/ rnam par ma bshig/ ma bskyed/ ma 'ong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can
415a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang 'grol bar mi 'gyur/ yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gis sems can gang yang brnyes par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ chos 'ga' yang
415b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi 'gyur/ 'gog par mi 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur/ skyed par mi 'gyur/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

415b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gog/ rnam par mi 'jig/ mi skyod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na/ spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan

415b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu gling na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden

415b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / shes rab ma mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang /

416a7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkye ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /

416b1(dkon brtsegs): thong shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub ses dpa' byas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
